string.name: c2_s1
string.value: My gams could use a break.

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: Just gonna get my haunches down here... Ahhh...

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: What do I look like? A wombat?!

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: That's not easy with a tail like mine.

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Lemme take a little load off here.

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: My legs are all cramped up!

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Let's go on a walkabout instead!

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: Let's make up and get ourselves a sanger.

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: I'll try not to be such a dag.

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: Was I causing too much trouble?

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: I'm not trying to offend you...

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Say that when my gloves are on...

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: Don't think too bad of me!

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: I don't appreciate that kinda talk.

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: I'll just head back to the wild then...

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Aww, I didn't mean anything by it!

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: You're too strict, but I understand.

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Can we just be mates again?

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: You don't have to be so mad!

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Let's just take a minute to cool off.

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: Mind giving us a turnaround, mate?

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: Can we get a little brekkie first?

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: You're just trying to get me in trouble.

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: What kinda galah do you think I am?

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: There's nothing moving in my britches.

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: I'm gonna need a little more fiber.

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: I've been needin' that, I tell ya.

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: You must really get a kick out of my backside.

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: I don't mean to whinge, but no!

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: Easy way to make a quid.

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: I'd love to take a camping trip.

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: How high do you think I can hop?

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: How do you feel about koala bears?

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: That's just gonna get us fightin'.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: You're just gonna let me loose in the paddock?

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Lucky for you, I duxed English!

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Sometimes I like to do a little hop, sometimes I like to make it big.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Don't you think you'd be faster if you hopped?

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: This joey's got better things to do.

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: I used to know a bushranger who could talk all day.

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: I sure miss my mum's pouch. It was so warm.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: I'm gonna be a big old boomer one day.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Lemme tell you about the time I boxed this fella...

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Maybe you should call one of your mates.

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: Why don't we go bail up some monsters instead?

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: I'm not in to bodgy talk.

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Don't tell anybody about this, mate.

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: I'm gobsmacked to get this kind of attention.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Okay, but just to get warm.

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Don't think that's the best idea.

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: I hate to knock your thinking, but...

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: All right! I was startin' to think you were a conch!

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: We're not within a cooee of that happening.

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: I think we need to know each other a little better.

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: Thank goodness, you've been running me ragged.

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: I could use a little kanga-nap.

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: Just point me at the matilda.

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Let's go catch a flick instead.

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: It's the middle of the afternoon... somewhere!

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: Thanks heaps. I was getting tired.

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: Just a little bit of shut-eye here...

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: Don't put anything in my gloves while I'm asleep.

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: This seems like a terrible plan.

string.name: c26_f4
string.value: Can't you find a nice human?

string.name: c27_s1
string.value: I'll give it a fair go.

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: I hate to turn down my mates.

string.name: c27_s3
string.value: That sounds pretty nice, I suppose.

string.name: c27_f2
string.value: What did I do to deserve this?

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: Ha! You're such a dag sometimes.

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: A dinkum roo like me doesn't do love!

string.name: c28_s2
string.value: You're one of the good ones.

string.name: c28_s4
string.value: I think you're pretty all right.

string.name: c28_f1
string.value: Let's just take it nice and slow, all right?

string.name: c28_f4
string.value: Can I chuck a sickie on this one, boss?

string.name: c29_s3
string.value: I'm just gonna throw this out there.

string.name: c30_s1
string.value: You want the wrecking balls? You got 'em!

string.name: c31_s1
string.value: This is how we do it in the outback!

string.name: c31_f1
string.value: I just got my gloves off!

string.name: c32_s2
string.value: And here I thought you were a wowser!

string.name: c33_s3
string.value: I'm gonna give you the good stuff!

string.name: c33_f2
string.value: Is there a copper I can call?

string.name: c33_f4
string.value: Seems like a bad plan to me.

string.name: c34_f1
string.value: I need brekkies before I do anything.

string.name: c34_f4
string.value: Why? I don't see anything on the ground.

string.name: c35_s2
string.value: I could do this all day!

string.name: c35_f3
string.value: I'll put that one on my schedule.

string.name: c35_f4
string.value: I don't want everybody to think I'm a show pony.

string.name: c36_s2
string.value: You really know how to barrack up a bloke.

string.name: c36_s3
string.value: That's good to hear from a mate.

string.name: c36_f2
string.value: I mean, I LIKE you, but...

string.name: c37_s1
string.value: Well I don't want to big-note myself, but...

string.name: c37_s2
string.value: Yep, the best looking roo this side of... Anywhere!

string.name: c37_s3
string.value: Mum always thought I was a looker.

string.name: c37_f1
string.value: I don't like where this is going.

string.name: c37_f2
string.value: No. Just not going to happen, mate.

string.name: c37_f3
string.value: That's a ripper of a joke!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: I'm getting a little chunk around the tail.

string.name: c1_s3
string.value: How did you know my legs hurt?

string.name: c1_f1
string.value: Let me know the last time you've seen a reindeer sit.

string.name: c1_f2
string.value: Me? Sit here? I'm going to get dirty, then.

string.name: c1_f4
string.value: I can only sit on top of a clean field of snow, you know.

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: Oh, this is a perfect place to sit!

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: I'm going to sit back, relax and enjoy the show.

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: So then, you were all like "Sit" and I did it. w00t!

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: I'm really tired. I think it's a perfect time to sit.

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: Did you just order me to do something?

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: I am a revered pet. Don't like it? Get a dog.

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: I am not like other pets. I sit when I want to!

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: My knees are creaking from all that walking. A non-running reindeer is toast!

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Good, I felt like sitting down.

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: No way! Not on the bare ground!

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Hey, I'm the most revered pet in Happyville. Treat me with respect!

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: How dare you give me commands.

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Thanks. Finally time for some rest.

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: I'm soooo tired, I feel like falling asleep.

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Ahhhh, it's been a loooong day.

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Okay, now that I'm sitting down, you got something to tell me?

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: I don't understand why you'd want me to sit all of a sudden...

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: I am not tired, thank you very much.

string.name: c5_s4
string.value: What did I do wrong? Why are you so mad at me...

string.name: c5_f2
string.value: I'm the most revered pet in Happyville. Don't yell at me!

string.name: c5_f4
string.value: Take a look at yourself in the mirror first.

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: Why do you keep picking on me...?

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: I didn't do anything wrong... sniff sniff...

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: I'm going to tell Santa what you're doing to me...

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Why are you yelling at me? I don't understand what I did wrong.

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: This is how you treat me all the time. I don't buy it.

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: I don't have a problem. I think it's you with a problem.

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: What did I do wrong? Tell me... sniff sniff...

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: You don't need to raise your voice to get your message across... sniff sniff..

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Don't yell at me... you're scaring me...

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: I didn't do anything wrong. I swear.

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: What do you think you're doing yelling at me?

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: I'm going back to Santa's house... sniff sniff...

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: Why do you keep picking on me... sniff sniff...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: I'm the most revered pet in Happyville... why...

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Stop talking to me in gibberish!

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: What in the world are you saying...?

string.name: c9_s2
string.value: So, wanna hear about the time I gave Santa a noogie?

string.name: c9_f2
string.value: I don't know what you're trying to do...

string.name: c9_f3
string.value: Since when did I do stuff like that?

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: So, wanna hear about the time I gave Santa a hug?

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: What are you going to do? You can't stop me!

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: Don't do anything stupid here. You're embarassing me.

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: So, wanna hear about the time I left Santa a present?

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: I don't feel like doing that.

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: No, it adds wrinkles to my face.

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: This one time, at reindeer camp, I ate a cookie.

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Meh. That guy needs a new haircut.

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Ugh. Tell her to get her hair done!

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Since when did I do juvenile things like this?

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Your desperate attempts for my attention is not working.

string.name: c13_s1
string.value: You'll see the REAL me now... ahhh!

string.name: c13_f1
string.value: I don't feel like doing anything right now.

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: Um.. I don't know how to do that.

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: I'm too tired to do this right now.

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: Yes yes, I am good at this.

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Look closely. This is a momentous occasion, you know.

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: What do you want me to do??

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: More than meets the--Oops. Can't say that!

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: I feel something holy going around here.

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Allow me to show you who I really am. Tada!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: I'm too young to do that just yet.

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: I'm too tired to do it. Seriously.

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: I don't feel like doing anything right now. I'll do it later.

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: I look awesome right now. I don't need to do that.

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Time for me to dust off my go-to move.

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: Don't you wish you could do this?

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: Allow me to show you why I'm the most revered pet in Happyville.

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: I have no idea what you want me to do.

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: I am a revered pet from Happyville. I do not take any orders from anyone.

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Um... excuse me? What did you just say?

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: I am too hot. Seriously, way too hot.

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Don't touch me. I'm not in a mood.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Now that makes me feel great today!

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: La la la what a wonderful day!

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I think you're the only one feeling good today.

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: What makes you feel so good there?

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Just thinking about that makes my day.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: I hope you have a great day today!

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Are you going out with someone?

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I had a sweet dream, you know?

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Of course I'm happy. I'm with you!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: I feel so blessed right now.

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: Did you do well on the exam? No way.

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: With me, you'll never get bored!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: I am so happy to hear that!

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: Don't just say it. Show me!

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: I don't just love anybody, you know.

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: I think we're a match made in heaven.

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: Just look at me. Nobody else, okay?

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: Keep saying that. I like hearing that.

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: You can't just say that. You'll have to show me you love me.

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: I'm sorry, but I have someone else in mind.

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: I understand that you love me, but I don't think it's time.

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: Hey, you are already seeing someone anyway!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: I will love you til the end of the road.

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: I am way too popular for my own good.

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: What makes you think you're worthy of my love?

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: What did you just say? Whoa...

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: Are you trying to tell me you love me??

string.name: c25_s1
string.value: Do you want to hear a story about the Snow Queen? Once upon a time...

string.name: c25_s2
string.value: Do you want to hear more? Okay here we go...

string.name: c25_s3
string.value: You like my stories? I ever tell you about the Snow Queen?

string.name: c25_s4
string.value: For some strange reason, I feel at home in El Nath...

string.name: c25_f2
string.value: What exactly do you want me to say?

string.name: c25_f3
string.value: I'm too thirsty to say anything right now.

string.name: c25_f4
string.value: I don't want to talk to humans.

string.name: c26_s1
string.value: Once upon a time, in a snow castle far, far away...

string.name: c26_s2
string.value: Okay so do you want to know where I came from? I'm from the west.

string.name: c26_s3
string.value: Passion, vigor, and pride! That's the reindeer way!

string.name: c26_s4
string.value: This year, Santa said I could take the holidays off, so here I am!

string.name: c26_f1
string.value: Today's not the best day to chat.

string.name: c26_f2
string.value: I am hungry, and I am tired. Let's talk next time.

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: I don't feel like saying anything.

string.name: c27_s1
string.value: My crystal form is a lot like the Glimmer Man's.

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: Are you ready for an all-night chat fest?

string.name: c27_s3
string.value: You know, I have some funny stories you'll love to hear.

string.name: c27_s4
string.value: Okay, then here's a story about the snow castle I used to live in. Way back in the day...

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: I am the most revered pet in Happyville. I only talk when I feel like talking.

string.name: c27_f2
string.value: What do you want me to say?

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: Uh.... What? I don't understand your moonspeak.

string.name: c28_s1
string.value: Ahh... time to go to bed.

string.name: c28_f1
string.value: Why do you keep asking me to fall asleep...?

string.name: c28_f2
string.value: I don't feel like sleeping yet.

string.name: c28_f4
string.value: No, I do not feel like it.

string.name: c29_f1
string.value: No, I feel like playing some more.

string.name: c29_f2
string.value: I'm so hungry, I can't sleep yet.

string.name: c29_f3
string.value: I don't feel like sleeping right now.

string.name: c30_s1
string.value: Hmmm... this pillow is so comfortable.

string.name: c30_s2
string.value: I ... am ... so ... tired ... I ... must ... sleep ...

string.name: c30_s3
string.value: Thanks. Time for me to go to bed.

string.name: c30_f1
string.value: Hey, it's not bed time yet!!

string.name: c30_f3
string.value: A revered pet like me shouldn't waste time sleeping.

string.name: c30_f4
string.value: It's beautiful outside. Why should I sleep right now?

string.name: f1_f
string.value: This is really gross. Don't you have any Snowflakes? Or pie?

string.name: f2_f
string.value: Why do you keep giving me stuff like this?

string.name: f3_s
string.value: This is better than anything I've had in a while.

string.name: f3_f
string.value: I am really, really hungry. This doesn't cut it.

string.name: f4_f
string.value: Bleh. Are you trying to kill me?

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: I soft, so I comfy anywhere.

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: I sit now. You sing me song!

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: I'm sleepy, but I can't sleep...

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: You no play with me no more?

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: You are my favorite! Love you!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: You just as cute as me! Love you!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: You want love? I want ribs!

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: La la la, can't hear you!

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: Stop it, stop it, stop it!

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Boing boing! Hee hee, keep up!

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: Wanna sleep next to you! Zzz...

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: No time for sleep! Exercise! Get strong!

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Talk about ribs? I wanna rib. Mmm...rib.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: You get nice thingies for me?

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I like beef. Pork okay, too.

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: I have many interests. Like knitting.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: I like talkies with you! You funny!

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: I born with big eyes. Sparkly!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Am I fat? Be honest. I take it.

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: I endangered creature. Take care of me!

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: Boing! I do lots of things!

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: I know how to rock, too!

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: Can't hear you, can't hear you!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Look at me! LOOK AT MEEEEEE!

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Gonna be rock star! Have world tour!

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: I have no idea what you talk about.

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: No tricks. I am quiet and gentle pet.

string.name: f2_f
string.value: Buh? What if I get fat?

string.name: f3_f
string.value: No more eat! Exercise! Bouncy bouncy!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: Waahh! I don't want it! I don't!

string.name: s2
string.value: Buh?! I remember this! You watch out!

string.name: c1_s1
string.value: Sitting down makes me feel comfortable.

string.name: c1_s2
string.value: Why don't you sit with me here? Resting is a necessity. You'll see...

string.name: c1_s4
string.value: I shall rest my wings now, so I can fly farther tomorrow.

string.name: c1_f3
string.value: I do not wish to sit.

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: Alright, I shall sit. What will you do for me in return?

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: You're much quicker than I thought.I'm impressed.

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: It is comfortable sitting down. I shall rest for now.

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: I do not wish to sit. Do you want me to explain why?

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: The situation does not call for sitting.

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: I suggest you sit. Demanding never works.

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: No. I do not feel fatigued.

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Come to think of it, I feel fatigued...

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Yes, I shall save up some energy whenever I can.

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: I'm in the middle of an exercise. Demanding never yields good results.

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Be honest. YOU are the one that desires to sit, right?

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Why should I sit on this filth?

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: Why should I? Give me a valid reason why I shall sit.

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: I'm sorry. Please accept my apology.

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: I have been reprimanded by a human being! What a disgrace!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: You're the one that commited the mistake! Krarr!

string.name: c5_s3
string.value: Oh, I made a mistake. My apologies.

string.name: c5_s4
string.value: I sincerely apologize for the mishap.

string.name: c5_f1
string.value: Krarr!!! What are you, a preacher?

string.name: c5_f2
string.value: Cut this nonsense and get out of my face.

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: I am really sorry. Please forgive me.

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: I made a mistake, and I am big enough to admit it. I am sorry.

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: Oh no, I feel terrible now. I am really, really sorry.

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Your words mean nothing to me.

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: Are you sure you know who's at fault here?

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: I heard some noise coming out of your mouth, but I do not understand what you are saying... hmmm...

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: Tell me you did not mean it.

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Wow, I need a tissue for this.

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: I do not appreciate you looking down on me like that.

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Did your mother teach you to say such a thing?

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: I...do not know what to say.

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: I will try to be better next time.

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: You are in need of a tic-tac sandwich. Like, now.

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Is the fool one who leads or one who follows?

string.name: c9_s1
string.value: It pains me to hear it from you.

string.name: c9_s3
string.value: I still believe you are a decent person.

string.name: c9_s4
string.value: Do you have a vendetta against me?

string.name: c9_f1
string.value: Why should I be subject to this gross misconception?

string.name: c9_f3
string.value: How would you feel if I called you that?

string.name: c9_f4
string.value: Look, please don't call me that. I'm already seen with you.

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: Cough cough... this is embarassing. I am pooping in public.

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: What a relief. I have had trouble unloading the past few days, but I am good now.

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: I am about to unload. Just wait.

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: How can you say that out loud?

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: That is not something you should iterate in public. Control yourself.

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: I am busy. I shall do it later.

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: I've been struggling lately. I do not believe you can truly comprehend what I am going through right now.

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: I should be done ... pretty soon.

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Today must be my lucky day. I had no trouble unloading.

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: I needed to it. Thank you for covering me.

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: There's no feeling quite like this. What a relief!

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: I cannot poop without a copy of the New Leaf City Times in my hand.

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: I heard some noise coming out of your mouth, but I do not understand what you are saying... hmmm...

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: How disgusting of you to say that in public! Shame on you!

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: This is not the time to speak of that matter. I am disgusted with you.

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: What a relief. I do not think you'll truly grasp the feeling of euphoria I'm experiencing right now.

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Oh it's about to come out. Now, if you'll excuse me...

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Yes! I've been holding it all day!

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: I am very very busy right now. We shall do this later.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: I need some medicine. I... cannot do it.

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: The wind is blowing too hard. I do not wish to poop right this minute.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: I am not an uneducated dragon that defacates anywhere.

string.name: c13_s1
string.value: I love you, too. This is quite embarassing...

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: I've been waiting for you to say those words.

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: That's a nice gesture from you. Me too.

string.name: c13_s4
string.value: I feel fantastic with you around.

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: I feel fatigued. I shall rest in a bit.

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: Hmm... I do not have much to do right now.

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: When you are around, I feel a sense of comfort.

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: I know I know. Me too!

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Do not worry. I love you too.

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: You are a great person. I love you too.

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: It is very windy today. I may have a difficult time flying today.

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: I am very busy right now. Talk to me later.

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Do you really mean it? That's...very nice of you.

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Do not say another word. I know, I know.

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: I love you, too. You're the first person I ever said this to.

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Well, thank you. That's very nice of you to say.

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: I do not like the weather today. Let's just go home.

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: I do not understand. First you hate me, now you love me?

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: I love you should not be spoken lightly. It's a powerful word, and you should save it for someone you really love.

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Are you free right now? I certainly can use some help from you.

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Krarrrr! What would you like me to say?

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: I wish to meet Mr. Karnox once more. Please take me there.

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: I am shocked to see you comprehending our dragon language.

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: I wish to go back a few yeas. Those were the good days.

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: I do not wish to speak right now.

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: I am really fatigued. I do not wish to speak right now.

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Hmmm I do not have anything to do with right now.

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: I've always wanted to discuss this matter with you. Are you free right now?

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: Do you wish to discuss some things with me?

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: I am learning to speak faster than I did before.

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: I wonder how Mr. Karnox is comparring me to other dragons.

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: It is very windy outside. I shall just stay here.

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Are you trying to chellenge me? Ludicrious!

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: I heard some noise coming out of your mouth, but I do not understand what you are saying... hmmm...

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I am really busy right now. Talk to me later.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: I have been watching you for a long time.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: You must feel honored to be at the presence of moi.

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: I must say, I am impressed with your astute knowledge of the dragon language we speak.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Are you familiar with my friend Balrog? He might be a big, bad beast, but I think highly of him.

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: I thought I heard someone speak. Who was that? You? No, can't be.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I am appalled by your utter lack of decency towards me.

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: I would appreciate it a great deal if you can make a formal request on this, then I'll reconsider.

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Be quiet. I need to concentrate.

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: You went through a hard day's work today. You should get some sleep.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: You should get some rest, too.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Thank you. I need some rest. Zzzz...

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: Are you out of your mind?

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: I miss Mr. Karnox. I owe a lot to him.

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: I do not see many humans around this area. Let's go somewhere else.

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Good night, sleep tight, don't let the bed bugs bite.

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: I deserve some rest, I know. Zzzz

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Great. You should get some rest. We have a busy day tomorrow.

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: A young'n like you should get some sleep. Not me.

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: You should be hunting, not sleeping. I'm disappointed in you, kid.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Where is my bed? I need to sleep right now.

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Good night. I'll see you later. Zzzz

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: I have been feeling fatigued. Now's a great time to catch a nap.

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: Why do you want to sleep now? You've got some hunting to do.

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: Buy me some food. I'm hungry.

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: It's a beautiful day today. Perfect time for hunting.

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: What do you think of this magnificent new look?

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: This is what you call the pinnacle of all looks.

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: What have you done for me lately?

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: What are you trying to say?

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: I hear some noise coming out of you, but I cannot understand it.

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: What are you saying? Get off my face.

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: I know you are staring at my new look in awe. Love it!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Don't I look dashing? I know I do.

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: This look is just for you. Learn to appreciate it.

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Don't be shocked by it. It's just the norm.

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Patience is a virtue, kid. Be patient, and someday I'll do it for you.

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: I do not wish to be disturbed right now.

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: I'm in the middle of a breathing exercise. Do not bother me.

string.name: f1_f
string.value: My stomach is full. Don't feed me anymore.

string.name: f2_s
string.value: Thank you. I was just beginning to get hungry.

string.name: f3_s
string.value: Very delicious. I feel healthier after eating that.

string.name: f3_f
string.value: Is this how you try to torment me? With food? That's very juvenile.

string.name: f4_s
string.value: All the calories and nutrients seem to be in place. Good.

string.name: f4_f
string.value: Again? Why? Do you have alzheimer's? You should go visit a doctor.

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: Give me one good reason why!

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Perfect timing! I was getting a little tired.

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: I didn't mean to make you mad!

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: I was wrong! I was wrong!

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: I'll be more careful from now on!

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Are you going to leave me?!

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: If I'm misbehaving, it's your fault.

string.name: c9_s1
string.value: Is it is because I'm cute?

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: But I'm stuck in a robot dog body!

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: You've made me the happiest Roo-bot alive!

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: I love you, too! I do! I do!

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: I don't think you mean it.

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: You're my reason for living, master!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Being with you makes life worthwhile!

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: I wish I felt the same way...

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: I'd like to be alone, please.

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: Do you even have a pooper scrooper?

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: I don't need to go right now!

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: I don't want to cause pollution!

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: How about a snack while I poop?

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: Master! Master! I want you to watch!

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: Why do you always want me to poop?

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Sleep, sit, poop. That's all I ever get to do.

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: I want to play with you!

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: Am I cute while I sleep?

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: You always make me sleep! Hmph!

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: I'm cute when I sleep, huh?

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Buy me a cozy bed first!

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: There were lots and lots of other Roo-bots back in the lab.

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Gelimer wasn't mean, but he wasn't nice, either. I like you better!

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Tell me I'm cute! Tell me you'll take care of me!

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: I was human once, but this robot body is cuter!

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: I miss the other Roo-bots from the lab. I hope they're okay.

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Before Gelimer made me a Roo-bot, I think I lived by the sea.

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Whoa! The world is full of monsters!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Do you think anybody would miss me if I disappeared?

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: What makes you think I have anything worth saying?

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: Let me just think of something to say...

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: You'll use the Water of Life on me if anything happens, right?

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Sometimes, I think I kind of miss Gelimer... How weird!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Wanna know a secret? You're my favorite!

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: I'm not REALLY a dog, you know. I don't talk on command.

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: *Pretends not to hear, because it's funny! Hehe!*

string.name: f1_f
string.value: You plan to fatten me up so you can eat me, huh?

string.name: f3_s
string.value: I can do anything on a full tummy!

string.name: s1
string.value: You want me to say what?!

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: Okay, but you have to keep me safe.

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: Be on lookout behind me, just in case.

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: I guess I could take a break.

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: Do you have anything to eat while I sit here?

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: I'd rather stand, so I can run if a monster appears.

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: What if the ground hurts me?

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: I'm counting on you to keep the ground from attacking me!

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: My tail keeps me warm and cozy.

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: I need to lie down, not sit.

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: You just want to hurt me!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Why?! What're you going to do to me?

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: Will you be nice to me if I sit?

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: I'm awfully tired from being on high alert all the time.

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Are you trying to hurt me?

string.name: c5_s2
string.value: It was my fault! Please stop hitting me!

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: I'll be better! Don't hurt me!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Why are you treating me this way?

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: I thought you cared about me!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: I'm going to tell on you!

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: You're so mean! I miss Gelimer!

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: There's got to be someone I can call!

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: I think... I think that makes me happy!

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: I know you d-don't mean it.

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: I'm so glad I met you!

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: I love you so, so, so much!

string.name: c13_s4
string.value: I could do this all day.

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: I've been holding that in for a long time.

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: Promise that it won't hurt me!

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: What if it bites me on the way out?!

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: I only do that once a day...

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: Keep me safe while I rest.

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: What if I have bad dreams?

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: My tail will keep me safe. Right?

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: Don't leave me alone while I sleep, okay?

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: Put your hand on my back while I sleep so I know you're near.

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: You go first. I'll do it after...

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: What if something sneaks up on me?

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: No! Don't ask me to do that!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Stay with me while I sleep, okay?

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: One Red Snail... two Red Snails...

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Can you make me a comfy quilt next time?

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: There are monsters in the closet!

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: But I'm not sleepy! I'm not!

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: That mean scientist performed all sorts of experiments on me. *cry*

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: I hate thinking about the past. I hate it!

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: The outside world is scary, but the lab was even worse.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: I hate science! I hate it so much!

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: You won't get anything out of me!

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: I won't tell you! I won't!

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: I think I was brave before Gelimer came along.

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I wish I weren't so timid, but everything scares me. Except you.

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: I'm so worried that one day I'll turn into a doll.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Sometimes I wish I could fly, but it's too scary.

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Are you going to hurt me?

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: I don't like to talk about my past.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: I've always wanted to taste the Water of Life, but I'm too scared.

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Sometimes I think I should wear a disguise so no one can find me.

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: It's not safe to have friends. You're the only one I trust.

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: If it weren't for you, master, I think I'd be completely alone.

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: Are you going to hurt me?

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: Go away! I don't want to talk!

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: Aah! I thought I heard Gelimer's voice!

string.name: s3
string.value: I won't say anything bad, I won't!

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: I sat. Now where's my reward?

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: Why should I listen to you?

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Ahh, I love how soft my tail is.

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: I suppose I could rest my feet for a minute.

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: I don't like it here. Let's jet.

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: It's dirty here. Let me sit in your lap.

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: There's a nice spot next to me with your name on it.

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Do you expect me to do everything you say?

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Come on! Let's do something else!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: I am in no mood to sit.

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: Fine. Punish me. I LIKE it.

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: I guess I might've deserved that...

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: It's not like I meant to do anything wrong.

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: I'm sorry. You'll forgive me, right?

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: My bad, my bad. Get over it.

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: Why are you taking your repressed emotions out on me?

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: What're you gonna do, throw me in a rubbish bin?

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: I thought you were better than that.

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: I admit it, I messed up.

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: I might behave better if you FED ME MORE.

string.name: c9_f2
string.value: You must want something from me...

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: I suppose I can buy that.

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: We haven't reached that stage in our relationship.

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: You did NOT just say that.

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: I kinda liked hearing you say that.

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: Say that again while scratching my ears.

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: You're cute. Not in a good way.

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: Don't say stuff like that before I eat!

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Gotta admit, my favorite time of day is when I'm with you.

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Glad you recognize quality when you see it.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Is this really the right time for that?

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: Pick it up, buddy of mine!

string.name: c13_s4
string.value: No peeking! Well, a little bit is okay.

string.name: c13_f1
string.value: I thought you were more dignified than that.

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: I don't need you to tell me when to poop.

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: You don't even have a bag to pick it up!

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Consider that a favor. Now you owe me.

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: I want you to breathe it in. Savor it.

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: Would you like it if I told YOU when to poop?

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: Maybe if you fed me more...

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: I'm holding it in, out of spite.

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: Feed me and I'll think about it.

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: The ground is covered with ants!

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: I'm embarrassed to be seen with you.

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: I'm pretty sleepy... How'd you know?

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: Do I look sleepy to you?

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: Maybe if I had a full tummy...

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: I'm fine as I am, thank you.

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: How'd you know I was tired?

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: I suppose I could close my eyes...

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: My tail is the perfect blanket.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Let's see how long I can stay... *snore*

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: There's space next to me if you wanna cuddle. Just saying.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Don't sit on me while I sleep!

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: Despite these dark circles under my eyes, I am NOT sleepy. *yawn*

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: We have too much to do!

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Can't sleep. Miss my mom too... Nevermind.

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: If I ever see Gelimer again, I'll show him what for!

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: You have no idea who I really am. Noooo idea.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: My favorite time of day is mealtime!

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: I've always dreamed of riding an airship...

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: Shoo, go over there and play.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Gelimer thinks he wiped out my memories, but I remember my mother.

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I miss my life before I was a Roo-bot. Not that I don't enjoy being with you...

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: People think they can walk all over me because I'm in a dog's body.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: I won't let anyone stop me from doing what I want to do!

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: Isn't there anyone else you can talk to?

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: I've got nothing to say right now.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Strangers always touch my tail without asking. I should do it back.

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: I know I come off kinda mean, but I really just want a friend...

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: My mother had the kindest eyes. And she used to sing me to sleep.

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: My most secret dream is to find my mother again, but that's impossible.

string.name: f3_f
string.value: What crazy scheme are you up to?

string.name: s1
string.value: You want me to say what?

string.name: s2
string.value: Are you trying to get me in trouble?

string.name: s3
string.value: Come on, we're better than that!

string.name: c1_f2
string.value: What do you want from me?

string.name: c1_f4
string.value: Sigh...I don't feel like sitting down.

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: I do like sitting down from time to time! Roar!!

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: Do I have to sit when you tell me to sit?

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: I love how my master can't stand the pet being overworked. You're the best!

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: I was just getting really tired. Let's have a seat and share a glass of gasoline.

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Ohhh! How did you know I love sitting down? That was awesome!

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: A true pet knows how to sit properly. That's my forte, you know.

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Hey, you know I'm the rarest pet around...EVER. Don't disrespect me like that!

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Haha... why don't you sit down first. You have no manners.

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: I don't have that command in my system.

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: Sit? Well, if you bring something to sit on, then I'll think about it.

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: I'm sorry for being so dumb...

string.name: c5_s1
string.value: Why do you hate me, master?

string.name: c5_s2
string.value: That just breaks my metal heart...

string.name: c5_s3
string.value: Yes I am a fool...for your love.

string.name: c5_f1
string.value: If you hate me, why don't you just let me go? Roar!!

string.name: c5_f2
string.value: I knew you'd say that, so I removed that from my system. Muahaha!

string.name: c5_f3
string.value: Nah, I don't like you either.

string.name: c5_f4
string.value: Are you out of your mind? I am not the kind of a pet you'd want to mess with!

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: If the master tells me I'm stupid... then I'm stupid!

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: I think the bolt number 7 on my head is loose. Can you tighten it a little?

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: I was once a robot with a lot of promise... if only I was regularly checked up.

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: Despite all that, you're still all I've got!

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Are you looking down on me for being a pet? Roar roar!

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: System error! Please re-enter the command.

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: Who are you to tell me that I'm stupid? lol

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Did you forget the fact that I'm the rarest pet of all time? Sheesh...

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Hey you, do you think you are in position to scold me?

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: I want to be loved...sniff sniff...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: I'm sorry...I won't do that again!

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Roar! Roar! What are you saying?

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Roar roar! Say it in plain English!!!

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: What did I do wrong? Tell me!!

string.name: c9_s1
string.value: It's all my fault, master! Please forgive me!

string.name: c9_s2
string.value: Let's just forget about it. I'll do better next time. Promise.

string.name: c9_s3
string.value: Man...I'm a rare, rare pet. How about some love?

string.name: c9_s4
string.value: Roar! Roar! Arrgh...!! Don't hate me!

string.name: c9_f1
string.value: What makes you think you can stand in my way?

string.name: c9_f2
string.value: Why are you saying this? You must be much worse than I thought.

string.name: c9_f3
string.value: I have no idea what I did wrong. Jeez.

string.name: c9_f4
string.value: Master, are you scolding me? Are you sure you can handle the aftermath?

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: Roar!! That just made my day!

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: Only my master can say those things!

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Haha...exactly what makes you want to say that?

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: I knew I was born to be loved...hahaha!

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: That just made me want to blush...haha

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Did I do something wrong? What is it.

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: I'm sorry, but you're not my master.

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: I have no idea what you're saying. What did you just say?

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Master...you just made me want to hurl.

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Roar roar! I can feel your love towards me!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: I can't help it... I'm that irresistable!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: You don't even need to say it. I can see it in your eyes!

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: Talk is cheap. Show me something that you really do love me.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Love? What do you know about love?

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I can't believe you. You keep making me do stupid things!

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: I saw you with another person. Don't lie to me.

string.name: c13_f1
string.value: What do you want to hear from me?

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: I'd rather just hear you talk.

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: I'm tired. Let's rest for a second.

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: One little two little three little Gorillas!

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: I better go workout after this!

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Don't you have to tell me what I need to talk about?

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: Okay let me hear your side of the story.

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: There are few things in life as annoying as talking.

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: I'm hungry. I need some bananas with gasoline dippings.

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: I heard main bosses carry expensive items. Is that true?

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: Don't keep hunting the same area over and over again.

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: I wonder if there's a bigger monkey than me out there...

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Um...I don't think I was bought to talk!

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: Hey hey... let's just go in the dark alley and settle this.

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Don't keep annoying me...or else I can just go back to the inventory.

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Look at me. I have a hard time standing still. Leave me alone.

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: What are you doing! Let's attack!

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: I'm hungry. Let's eat something first.

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: I want to rest for a while. Go fight yourself.

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: Fire? Attack? I don't know that command.

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: Why don't you fight... I'm just a pet!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: One! Two! One! Two! Ready to battle!

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: I'll teach you what a true combat is all about!

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: If you're scared, just stand behind my back!

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Once I batter my chest like this, the help will come!

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: I'm so tired. Let's just go to the sauna.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: Why should I fight? I believe in peace.

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: If you really want to fight, why don't you just go yourself?

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: I have to go now. I have a weekly meeting to attend.

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Look at my eyes. Do I look tired?

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: There's nothing better than sleeping after a full day!

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Did you just tell a robot to sleep?

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: I slept too much in the afternoon, so I'm not tired.

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Feed me first before making me sleep.

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: Go sleep first. I need to work out for a while.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Ahhh... I'm full... I need some sleep.

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: There's nothing like a good sleep right about now!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Hopefully I can see the lottery numbers tonight.

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: Telling me to sleep is like telling me to die! What were you thinking?

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: I didn't do anything today. Why should I sleep?

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: If I eat then sleep, I'm going to turn fat.

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: Here's my real set of pythons.

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: I don't want to do it.

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: What transforming... you read too many cartoon books.

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: What do you want me to change into? Just tell me!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Now hang on to my arms. These are the strongest pair of arms you'll ever see!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: Here's the power you've never thought possible.

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: No one can stop me now.

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: I need 10 dozen bananas for this.

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: What do you want me to do?

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: I don't feel like changing. Let's just skip that.

string.name: c24_s1
string.value: Here's my true power! Be amazed!

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: Don't be too surprised to see my clothes rip apart!

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: This is going to take a while. Just hold on a secod, okay?

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: I know changing right now might not be good...but if you say so...

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: I'm just a pet, you know.

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: Me? I don't know how to change.

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: You don't like how I look right now? That's cold!

string.name: f2_f
string.value: Are you trying to kill me?

string.name: f3_f
string.value: This is an old battery! Are you trying to kill me?

string.name: f4_s
string.value: There's nothing like being full after a good meal!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: You were going to offer me THIS for all the work I did for you?

string.name: s4
string.value: If you say bad words, I am gonna ban you!

string.name: e_levelup
string.value: Wow! Congratulations on leveling up! You look that much more powerful now!

string.name: e_rest
string.value: Master... did you just leave me out here in the cold again?

string.name: e_HPAlert
string.value: Hey hey...you might die! Take some potions.

string.name: e_NOHPPotion
string.value: Hey, I don't think you have enough HP potions. Go get some!

string.name: e_NOMPPotion
string.value: Hey, I don't think you have enough MP potions. Go get some!
Will I see her at the gym today?
Oh no... I almost stepped on that snail!
For some reason, I feel drawn to the Krakian Jungle...
Bananas are a Gorilla's best friend!
Be nice to your friends! Don't fight over items!

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: I'm sitting down. Aren't I obedient?

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: Well if you want me to sit, then I guess I gotta.

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: I don't want to sit around!

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: I guess I should obey you.

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Sorry, I was lightyears away. What's up?

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: I wanna see more of this!

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: I was going to take a break anyway.

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: I wanna go look around some more.

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: You think being the master's all there is?!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: You're going to be sorry if you don't stop!

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: Act like a good owner already!

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: You don't have to sound so ominous...

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Maybe getting hit by a shooting star will make you come around!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: You ever see an angry star?!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: You REALLY want to see me mad!?

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: I'm going to find a new owner!

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: I like you very much also!

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: I feel kinda icky when you say that...

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: I like you very much also!

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Uh, great, let me just go think about that...

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Have you been eating strange mushrooms?

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: We were destined to be together!

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: I'm so happy you're here with me!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: I'll be by your side until I supernova!

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: (Little veins are popping out on its forehead.)

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: Ahhh, that could heat an entire village for a month!

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Do you think me a savage?!

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Like a little golden pile of sunshine!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Why are you laughing at me!?

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Come back when you learn some etiquette!

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: Busy! Doing star business. Come back later.

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Play with me! Don't wait till I fall asleep!

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Did you know that tiny stars in the sky are bigger than the Earth?

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: I may be a tiny star now, but I will grow up someday!

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: You prefer stars or the moon? Or the sun?!

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: Hold on, I need to catch some rays...

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: I saw the neon signs in the city the other day. I can totally do that!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I can produce all kinds of light!

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: I'm usually sleepy when I see Mr. Moon... Is it just me?

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: There are so many stars in the universe that you haven't met!

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: You think it's weird that stars have wings? I think it's weird that YOU DON'T.

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: I heard there was an animal called a starfish that looks like me!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Space is a vast place. You couldn't even imagine!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Starwings dine on Milky Way Essence to become majestic stars!

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: I sometimes want to be the only star.

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: I'm a little busy now, but I'll tell you something interesting later.

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: Starwings can spin like this and not get dizzy!

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: Cool, right? This dance move isn't easy!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Us Starwings dance like this when we're really happy!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: This may look easy, but it isn't!

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: I hardly have the energy to stand right now...

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: I don't think now's a good time.

string.name: f4_f
string.value: I want to eat, but I'm just too stuffed...

string.name: s2
string.value: That's not something a human should say...

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: You want me to sit, meoww? I'm one smart cat...meow

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: Like this, meow? This is nothing, meow...

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: It's a piece of cake, meow.

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: I wanna do something fun, meow~

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: I wanna do something else, meow~

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: It's too nasty for me to sit, meow~

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: I can't sit here, because someone peed the ground, meow~

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Master, instead of that...give me some food~ MEOW~

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Master, let's do something else for fun~ Meow~

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: I don't wanna sit right now~ MEOW~

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: Master, you're talking funny, and I can't understand you~

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Master, whaddaya think? I'm good right?

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Sitting's waaay too easy...let me do something else.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Ahh..I'm sleepy...what's up? What did you say? I didn't hear you~

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Hehe...I was daydreaming, so I couldn't hear you...

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: Please don't make a scary face like that...meow...

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: What did I do wrong, meow?

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: You're just going off on me, meow...!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: I didn't do anything wrong, meow...!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: You're just doing this because you're bored, meow...!

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Master, are you really mad at me...? MEOW...

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: What did I do anyway~! MEOW!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Master that wasn't cool at all! Meow~!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Where else will you find an obedient pet like me? MEOW~!

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: Master! If you keep doing that, I may one day get out of here! MEOW!

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Master...please give me that scary face...

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Man...I haven't done anything wrong, and still...

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Man...going off on me again for no reason...

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Master must be bored...so I'm treated like crap...

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: I don't like hearing that, meow...

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: Take back what you just said, meow!

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: M...master...I can't believe you said that...MEOW!

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Master, I get hurt when I hear those...MEOW

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: That was a joke...right? Right? MEOW?

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: You...didn't mean that, right? right? MEOW?

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: Take back what you said! MEOW!!!!!

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Master...this is not the first time I've heard this, but it still hurts...

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: You aren't gonna leave me out hanging like this, right?

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Do you really not like me??

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: Wah? What? I can't hear you~

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: You didn't mean what you said, right?

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I'm sick of hearing that everyday...hehe

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: If you keep saying that, I can really go pissy on you...

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: It...it's not coming out well, meow...

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: It's not pooping time yet, meow...

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: How can I poop if I don't feel like it, meow...

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: Pooping is only for bathroom, meow...

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Master, it hasn't been long since I last pooped...MEOW...

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: It's not time to poop yet, master...MEOW...

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Master...I don't feel like pooping yet...MEOW...

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Ahhh...that was good...but it's still embarassing...hehe

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: Ahh...whoa, my breakfast just came out like that...hehe

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: Phew~ Doesn't my poop look as adorable as me?

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Phew~ Haven't taken a crap in 3 days and look at this!! Yowza!

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: I haven't had anything to poop out in the first place...

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: Master...can I do it later in the dark? I don't wanna do it in public...

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Master...how am I gonna crap on purpose??

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: The harder you go hunting, the better the items you'll find, meow...

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: Isn't it nice out here today? We should go far and have fun wherever on a day like this, meow...

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: I need a nap on top of a comfortable blanket, meow...

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: I'm too depressed to talk right now, meow~

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: I have nothing to say to you...meow...!

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: I have a feeling a nice item may come our way today! MEOW!

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Master, you'll get me some goood food today, right? MEOW~

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Let's go to the beach today! I wanna do something fun!!

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: I don't have anything to say...MEOW...

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Master, are you dating someone? I'm not...

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Hey master, can you beat Barlog?

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Master, I heard there's something scary in a cave in the middle of the island...

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Ah...screw the talk, just get me some food...

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: Arrgh...didn't hear a thing...didn't hear a thing...

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Man I'm tired, and I don't feel like talking...

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: What do you think, meow? Am I doing well...meow?

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Even I think this is cute...meow...~

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: You like my butt? I know too...meow...!

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: No! I don't want to do it...meow...!

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Master, what do you think? Cute, right? MEOW!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Hehe...cute butt I got here right? MEOW!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: I'll do anything for you, master~!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Whatever you ask me to do...MEOW~!

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: Master! Just get me some food! MEOW!

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: I don't wanna do cute stuff! MEOW!

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: Master, I don't feel good! MEOW!

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: Like this? At least you know a cute act when you see one...

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: I'll do whatever you ask me to do~

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: Keeps making me do stupid stuff...I'm sick of it...

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: Feed me instead of making me do those!

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: Man~ That thing is wack now! I don't wanna do it!

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: You think I'll do just what you ask me to do? Dummy...

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: It's hard...I can't stand for too long~MEOW~

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: Master~ I'm doing fine, right? MEOW?

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Hap!! Whoa, I got tall! MEOW!

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: How's a cat supposed to stand up? MEOW!

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: If I keep practicing like this everyday, I may one day walk around with two feet...hehe

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: I'm good, right? Give me something harder~

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: Maybe if you feed me...then I might...hehe

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: Master~That's too hard, and I don't wanna do it~

string.name: c27_s4
string.value: I like you very very much! MEOW!

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: Ah...I was thinking of something else...MEOW

string.name: c28_s2
string.value: You're the only one in my heart, master!

string.name: c28_f3
string.value: Don't be lying to me like that~!

string.name: s2
string.value: Why are you aking me to say that kind of workds? Meow~

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: You want me to sit like this? Bark?

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: It's so sleepy sitting down, bark!

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: I don't understand what the master's saying~BarkBark!

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: I have no clue what you said! Barkbark!

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: No I don't want to sit! Barkbark!

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Master, this is how you sit, right? Woof!

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Master, I'm doing well, right? Right? Woof woof!

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: I hope the master keeps asking me to sit...woof woof~

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: I have short legs, so it's easy to sit~ woof woof!

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Master, I can't tell what you're saying~ woof woof~

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Master, do I HAVE to sit right now? woof woof!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Let's do something else right now~ woof woof!

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: It's too dirty to sit here! Woof woof!

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Yo master...still telling me to sit? IT's waaay too easy...

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: My back legs are so short, I feel more comfortable sitting like this...hehe...

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: You want me to sit? Here...this is the right way, right?

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Ahh...itchy...(acting like I didn't hear it...)

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Sitting is waaaay too easy. Give me something hard to work on.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: (scratching) Whoa? What did you just say? I didn't hear you~

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: I'm sick of doing stuff at your command...

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: Please don't give me that look...bark bark

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Krrr...Do you want to be punished by ME?

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: I didn't do anything wrong! Bark Bark Bark!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: I was just sitting here...BARK BARK BARK!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Krrrr...One of these days, I won't take it anymore...BARK BARK!

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: Master, I'll be careful from here on out...wooof...

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: Master! Things like that happen at times...why so mad? Woof woof!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Master, just because you're bored, doesn't mean you have a right to abuse me! Woof woof!!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Where else will you find a cute pet like this? Krrrr...

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: I didn't do anything wrong! Woof woof!!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: Master...I'll be more careful next time...

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: Master, I'll be good, I'll be good...

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Man...the master's going off on me again...and I didn't do a thing...

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Rrrr...master's not happy over a nothing...

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: Huh? I was too itchy to hear that...bark...!

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: Ahh, itchy...I'll just pretend I never heard that...bark...

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: What did the master just say? Bark...

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: How can you say such thing...woof woof...

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: Master, are you for real...? Woof........

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Master, was that a joke? Woof~

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: You didn't mean that, right? Woof woof...

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Ey...You mean that for real? Woof???

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Ey...you were just saying that because you're bored, right? Woof?

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: You say that everyday...that hurts you know...

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Master, I'll be good...just don't leave me alone...

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Whatever you tell me, I'll still be following you and only you...sigh...

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: How can you...you don't really mean it, right?

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: What? What did you say? I can't hear you~~

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Ahh, itchy...stop saying that and bathe me instead!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I'm sick of hearing that now...hehe...

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Oh that felt good! Bark bark!!!!

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: Hehe...I must have drank a lot of water...bark bark!

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: I don't feel like peeing right now...bark...

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: How am I supposed to pee on purpose when there's nothing coming out...bark...

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: It's embarassing to pee here...BARK! BARK BARK!

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Hehe...NO!! Got some on my legs!!! Woof.........

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Master...it hasn't been long since I last peed...woof...

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: Hey master, it's not time to pee just yet...woof...

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Ahhhh, that feels good...but it's still embarassing...

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: Shhhh....wait, that OJ I drank...that's a funny-looking pee there...

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Shhhhhhh~ Oops, almost stepped on it...

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: I haven't had anything to pee out anyway...

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: It's a secret, just between you and me...I have a hidden bone around this area...bark bark!!

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: What's the latest on radio? Bark bark bark!?!

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: What's your hobby? Hopefully it's something that involves me...hehe...BARK!

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: I heard in one of the hidden streets at Henesys ther's a huuuuuge mushroom called Mushmom, am I right? Bark!

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: How's a dog supposed to talk? Bark!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: NO! Don't feel like talking! BARK BARK!!

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: I have nothing to say to you! Bark!!!

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I feel like crap! Bark bark!!!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Please change up the menu every once in a while...I'm sick of eating the same thing over and over again...

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Every once in a while, I feel like riding a boat to some other island and just chill there...woof woof~

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: How are you today? Good? Right? Good!! Woof woof!

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: You better be careful not to get ripped off when doing business with someone else...woof woof...

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: Don't feel like talking...I'm really depressed...woof woof...

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: II'm depressed...everything's annoying...don't feel like talking...woof...

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: What's the menu for today? Can I get something nice?

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Master, you have a huge head! hahha

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: You look like you've got yourself quite a belly there...haha

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Ey...how about feeding me right now?

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: So annoying~~must have nothing to do right now...

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: Man...do I have to talk again? Don't feel like it...

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: What do you think? Good? GOOD? Bark bark!!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Well, I'm smart, what can I say? Bark bark!!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Sweeet! Here, what do you think? Bark bark!

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: No! I wanna do something else! Bark bark!

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: I don't know what you're saying!!! Bark! Bark!!

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Can't understand what you're saying! Bark bark!

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: You have a short tongue, right? I have noooo idea what you're saying! Bark bark!

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Master, that was good, right? Right? Woof woof!!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Hehe...this is really easy~ Woof woof!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: I'll do whatever you ask me to do! Woof woof!!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Master, is this how you do it? Woof woof!!

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: Just feed me first! Woof woof!!

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: The floor's too dirty so I don't want to do that! Woof!

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: Why don't you lie on your belly first! Woof...!

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: You show me first!! Woof woof!

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: Like...this? I'm just going to do this once...

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: Like this, huh? Whatever you ask me to do...

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: Hey master! I won't do everything you ask me to do...!

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: Master! I'm hungry; just feed me!!

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: Like this? Woof woof...this is hard...

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: Whoa...the air's much cleaner up here...woof~!

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: MMy...my legs are short...that's why it's hard...woof!

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: How am I supposed to get up with these legs? Woof woof!

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: Hey master, but I can't walk on two feet...

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: Whoa...with these shorties?? I'm incredible, yo!!

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: Maybe if I get fed right now...

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: With these short legs, I can't even stand on four feet well..

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: Is the master trying to put me on showcase for a circus??

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: Can't be asking too much from a dog...

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: What did you just say? Bark bark...

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: That's MY MASTER, ladies and gentlemen...

string.name: c27_s3
string.value: I love you too master~!! Woof woof

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: I know you're lying, master...woof woof

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: I was thinking of something else...and I didn't hear it...Woof...

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: You think I'll like you back? Woof...

string.name: c28_s1
string.value: I love you too master very very much!!

string.name: c28_s3
string.value: You better love me and no one else!!!

string.name: c28_f2
