string.value: Everyone knows that's just a token gesture...

string.name: c28_f3
string.value: And then the master will go off on me later...

string.name: c28_f4
string.value: You think I'll fall for that again...?

string.name: f2_f
string.value: I'm so full I can't eat anymore...woof...

string.name: f3_s
string.value: Master, this is really delicious! Woof woof...

string.name: f3_f
string.value: Master, I can't eat anymore...woof woof...

string.name: s2
string.value: No, please don't say that! Woof~

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: I get sleepy from sitting down, but...kyu..

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: I should just sit here instead of roaming around~kyu~

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: So I just need to sit here, right, kyu??

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: Keeps making me do the same thing over and over again...anything else? kyu...?

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: Huh? I was thinking of something else for a sec...kyu...

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Master, sitting is waay too easy~!

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: You keep asking me to do some easy thing...KYU~!

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Master, you can't say it right, right? KYU?

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: It's too dirty to sit around here...KYU...

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: I gotta do one for the master every once in a while...

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Now that I sat, you need to feed me~

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: No more of that scary face...please...kyu...

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Man, just letting out on me, kyu!!

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: I wasn't doing anything! WHAT, kyu!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Master, what exactly did I do wrong? KYU!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: You won't find a more obidient pet around you! KYU!

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: I was just sitting there! KYU!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: So you're mad at me cuz you're bored, right?

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: This is too easy for me, key!

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: What do you think, master? I'm good, right? KYU?

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: If my master wants me to...KYU!

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: Hahh...I've just gotte much taller! KYU!

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Ey...I don't wanna do something boring like that...KYU

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Master what do you think? I'm good, right?

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: You won't find a bunny that can stand like I do.

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Now that I'm up like this, I can see things from afar.

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Standing up is sooo easy now...

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Ey...keeps asking me to do the same thing...

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: I can't hear you...I can't hear you.

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: It's still a long way to go before coming out...heh

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: So may people around here, how am I gonna poop in public?? kyu...

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: I just pooped a few min. ago...kyu...

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Ahhhhh...whoa, I almost stepped on it...KYU

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: It's not time to go poop yet...KYU

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Master...pooping should only be at bathrooms...KYU

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: Ahh...the poop looks really good today.

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: Ahh...master you can't step on it!

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Ahhh, that was good...whoa, master...you stepped on it...

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: I can't poop what I didn't eat...

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: Can you poop even if you don't feel like it?

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: I had nothing to eat all day, so no poop for me...

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: I must be constipating right now...

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: Is something wrong with you these days...? Don't worry, I'll be there for you, kyu...

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: When you're buying items, you need to make sure you're not being deceived...kyu...

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: If...you starve me, I may just crawl back into my home...so don't starve me too much...kyu...

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: I love the phrase "I love you" more than anything else in the world! kyu...

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: You ever see a rabbit talk? kyu...

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: I can't talk to you about things...kyu...

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: I have nothing to say to you! kyu...

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I'm in no mood to talk...kyu...

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: How about going from place to place instead of staying at a same place? KYU

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Isn't it not fun playing by yourself? I like hanging out with people...KYU...

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: There's a lot of ppl on this island so make sure you don't forget about being courteous to everyone around you...KYU...

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: I heard there's a dungeon in the middle of this island...KYU...

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I feel like crap, so I won't talk...KYU...

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: We pets are created by Cloy of Henesys.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: I know it's precious, but you need to take those potions while you fight to get stronger fast!

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Go do some quests and something good may happen~

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: There's not much to say but...feed me!

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: So annoying...I have nothing to say...

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: I'm tired, so I'll tell you later...

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: NO! You haven't showered in days! kyu...

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Master, I'll go hug you up~! Kyu!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Master, I can feel your heartbeat~! KYU!

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: Master...please go take shower right now!

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: NO~! I don't want to hug you! KYU!

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: I like how you embrace me, master

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: Master? You really think I'll hug you up?

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: And you were scolding me just now...

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: If you feed me, I will

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: Master, you smell! I don't wanna hug you~

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Play time~ Play time! PLAY TIME!!

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Who sleeps in the middle of the day...kyu?

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: Ahh...I'm sleepy...master, give me your arm as my pillow...kyu...

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: Please don't have delicious food all to yourself while I'm asleep...kyu...

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: Master! I feel fine~! Hang out with me!

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: If you sing me a song, then I'll fall asleep.

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: You know you're gonna write all over my face while I fall asleep...

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: I can't sleep cuz I'm hungry! FOOD! FOOD!

string.name: c26_s3
string.value: Really? Nice! I feel good~ kyu~

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: That wasn't for me, right? kyu?

string.name: c26_f4
string.value: That was a typo, right? kyu?

string.name: c27_s1
string.value: I love you too, master! KYU!

string.name: c27_s4
string.value: Hehe...I'm gonna tell everyone about this...KYU!

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: Master, I know you're lying. KYU!

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: You're just saying that, right? KYU?

string.name: c28_f2
string.value: One minute you're all over me, now you say you love me...

string.name: c28_f3
string.value: If you love me, how come you aren't feeding me?

string.name: c28_f4
string.value: You think I'll fall for it again...?

string.name: f4_s
string.value: Master this is soooo delicious! Kyu!

string.name: s2
string.value: Kyuu~ I am NOT gonna say that!

string.name: s3
string.value: I am definately not a bad rabbit!

string.name: s4
string.value: Don't make me say those words~

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: Yeah, I should rest up for a bit...ou...

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: So this is where I sit? Grr~

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: I can't understand what you're saying...ou...

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: Humans are still hard to understand...

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: This is a piece of cake~ Ou...

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Phew...good thing, because I was beginning to get tired of standing up~

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Haha...how did you know i wanted to sit for a sec?

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Master, before that, I'm really hungry...grrr...

string.value: Master, what did you say? Grr...

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: Can't hear you...hear hear you...can't hear you...ou...

string.value: (Too annoying...might as well do as what the master tells me to do...)

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Now that I'm sitting, get me some food!!

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Now~master, you should come sit here with me~

string.value: What is there to get mad at? Especially an adorable pet like me...ou...

string.value: If you keep doing that, I'm telling my mom!

string.value: What did I do wrong, anyway!! Kao!!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: Are you trying to go up against me? Kaooo!!

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: I'll hate you for saying that!! KAO!!

string.value: Master, I can't pee in public places...

string.value: Phew...I would have wet myself if I was even a minute late...

string.value: Master, how did you know I felt like peeing? Ahhh...I needed that...

string.value: Master, I have some pride in me, too! I can't pee out here in public!

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: Can YOU pee even when you don't feel like peeing?

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: Not unless you feed me first!

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: I've been thinking...of what I'm going to do when I grow up. What about you? Grr...

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: The other day, I saw some ppl that ran away after seeing me...why is that? Grr...

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: A pet like me that's still growing should be fed A LOT, understand? Grrr...

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: Is there really a terrifying monster that flies? I wanna see that too...

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: How am I supposed to speak human language? Grr...

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: (As if pets and humans can talk to each other...haha)

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: (Like I'll just talk that easily? Hehe...)

string.value: Every once in a while, it's good to explore new places...it's for your own good...grr

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: I heard from my friends that there are other islands around other than just this! I wanna see them...

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Is it true that fairies don't get along too well with humans? Grr...

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: I heard the farther you leave town, the stronger the monsters are...grr...

string.value: I said I have nothing to say! Grrr....

string.value: I heard from my friends that fairies LOVE shiny, sparkling objects...

string.value: The other day, I saw this person that got attacked by a pirate ship.

string.value: Do all humans have heads that big???? Interesting!!

string.name: c19_f1

string.value: It's not something I'll do whenever...grrr...

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: Arrgh, the sun's in my eyes...grrr...

string.value: Master, you smell! I don't wanna hug you~

string.value: Play time~ Play time! PLAY TIME!!

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Who sleeps in the middle of the day...kyu?

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: Ahh...I'm sleepy...master, give me your arm as my pillow...kyu...

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: Please don't have delicious food all to yourself while I'm asleep...kyu...

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: Master! I feel fine~! Hang out with me!

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: If you sing me a song, then I'll fall asleep.

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: You know you're gonna write all over my face while I fall asleep...

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: I can't sleep cuz I'm hungry! FOOD! FOOD!

string.name: c26_s3
string.value: Really? Nice! I feel good~ kyu~

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: That wasn't for me, right? kyu?

string.name: c26_f4
string.value: That was a typo, right? kyu?

string.name: c27_s1
string.value: I love you too, master! KYU!

string.name: c27_s4
string.value: Hehe...I'm gonna tell everyone about this...KYU!

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: Master, I know you're lying. KYU!

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: You're just saying that, right? KYU?

string.name: c28_f2
string.value: One minute you're all over me, now you say you love me...

string.name: c28_f3
string.value: If you love me, how come you aren't feeding me?

string.name: c28_f4
string.value: You think I'll fall for it again...?

string.name: f4_s
string.value: Master this is soooo delicious! Kyu!

string.name: s2
string.value: Kyuu... I am not gonna say that.

string.name: s3
string.value: I am not the kind of Rabbit who speaks of evil words,~

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: You want me to sit like this? Bark?

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: It's so sleepy sitting down, bark!

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: I don't understand what the master's saying~Barkbark!

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: I have no clue what you said! Barkbark!

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: No I don't want to sit! Barkbark!

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Master, this is how you sit, right? Woof!

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Master, I'm doing well, right? Right? Woof woof!

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: I hope the master keeps asking me to sit...woof woof~

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: I have short legs, so it's easy to sit~ Woof woof!

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Master, I can't tell what you're saying~ Woof woof~

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Master, do I HAVE to sit right now? Woof woof!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Let's do something else right now~ Woof woof!

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: It's too dirty to sit here! Woof woof!

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Yo master...still telling me to sit? It's waaay too easy...

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: My back legs are so short, I feel more comfortable sitting like this...hehe...

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: You want me to sit? Here...this is the right way, right?

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Ahh...itchy...(acting like I didn't hear it...)

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Sitting is waaaay too easy. Give me something hard to work on.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: (scratching) Whoa? What did you just say? I didn't hear you~

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: I'm sick of doing stuff at your command...

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: Please don't give me that look...bark bark

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Krrr...Do you want to be punished by ME?

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: I didn't do anything wrong! Bark Bark Bark!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: I was just sitting here...BARK BARK BARK!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Krrrr...One of these days, I won't take it anymore...BARK BARK!

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: Master, I'll be careful from here on out...wooof...

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: Master! Things like that happen at times...why so mad? Woof woof!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Master, just because you're bored, doesn't mean you have a right to abuse me! Woof woof!!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Where else will you find a cute pet like this? Krrrr...

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: I didn't do anything wrong! Woof woof!!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: Master...I'll be more careful next time...

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: Master, I'll be good, I'll be good...

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Man...the master's going off on me again...and I didn't do a thing...

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Rrrr...master's not happy over a nothing...

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: Huh? I was too itchy to hear that...bark...!

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: Ahh, itchy...I'll just pretend I never heard that...bark...

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: What did the master just say? Bark...

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: How can you say such thing...woof woof...

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: Master, are you for real...? Woof........

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Master, was that a joke? Woof~

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: You didn't mean that, right? Woof woof...

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Ey...You mean that for real? Woof???

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Ey...you were just saying that because you're bored, right? Woof?

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: You say that everyday...that hurts you know...

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Master, I'll be good...just don't leave me alone...

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Whatever you tell me, I'll still be following you and only you...sigh...

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: How can you...you don't really mean it, right?

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: What? What did you say? I can't hear you~~

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Ahh, itchy...stop saying that and bathe me instead!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I'm sick of hearing that now...hehe...

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Oh that felt good! Bark bark!!!!

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: Hehe...I must have drank a lot of water...bark bark!

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: I don't feel like peeing right now...bark...

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: How am I supposed to pee on purpose when there's nothing coming out...bark...

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: It's embarassing to pee here...BARK! BARK BARK!

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Hehe...NO!! Got some on my legs!!! Woof.........

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Master...it hasn't been long since I last peed...woof...

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: Hey master, it's not time to pee just yet...woof...

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Ahhhh, that feels good...but it's still embarassing...

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: Shhhh....wait, that OJ I drank...that's a funny-looking pee there...

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Shhhhhhh~ Oops, almost stepped on it...

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: I haven't had anything to pee out anyway...

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: It's a secret, just between you and me...I have a hidden bone around this area...bark bark!!

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: What's the latest on radio? Bark bark bark!?!

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: What's your hobby? Hopefully it's something that involves me...hehe...BARK!

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: I heard in one of the hidden streets at Henesys ther's a huuuuuge mushroom called Mushmom, am I right? Bark!

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: How's a dog supposed to talk? Bark!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: NO! Don't feel like talking! BARK BARK!!

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: I have nothing to say to you! Bark!!!

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I feel like crap! Bark bark!!!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Please change up the menu every once in a while...I'm sick of eating the same thing over and over again...

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Every once in a while, I feel like riding a boat to some other island and just chill there...woof woof~

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: How are you today? Good? Right? Good!! Woof woof!

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: You better be careful not to get ripped off when doing business with someone else...woof woof...

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: Don't feel like talking...I'm really depressed...woof woof...

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: I'm depressed...everything's annoying...don't feel like talking...woof...

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: What's the menu for today? Can I get something nice?

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Master, you have a huge head! hahaha

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: You look like you've got yourself quite a belly there...haha

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Ey...how about feeding me right now?

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: So annoying~~must have nothing to do right now...

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: Man...do I have to talk again? Don't feel like it...

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: What do you think? Good? GOOD? Bark bark!!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Well, I'm smart, what can I say? Bark bark!!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Sweeet! Here, what do you think? Bark bark!

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: No! I wanna do something else! Bark bark!

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: I don't know what you're saying!!! Bark! Bark!!

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Can't understand what you're saying! Bark bark!

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: You have a short tongue, right? I have noooo idea what you're saying! Bark bark!

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Master, that was good, right? Right? Woof woof!!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Hehe...this is really easy~ Woof woof!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: I'll do whatever you ask me to do! Woof woof!!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Master, is this how you do it? Woof woof!!

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: Just feed me first! Woof woof!!

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: The floor's too dirty so I don't want to do that! Woof!

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: Why don't you lie on your belly first! Woof...!

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: You show me first!! Woof woof!

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: Like...this? I'm just going to do this once...

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: Like this, huh? Whatever you ask me to do...

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: Hey master! I won't do everything you ask me to do...!

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: Master! I'm hungry; just feed me!!

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: Like this? Woof woof...this is hard...

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: Whoa...the air's much cleaner up here...woof~!

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: My...my legs are short...that's why it's hard...woof!

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: How am I supposed to get up with these legs? Woof woof!

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: Hey master, but I can't walk on two feet...

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: Whoa...with these shorties?? I'm incredible, yo!!

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: Maybe if I get fed right now...

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: With these short legs, I can't even stand on four feet well..

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: Is the master trying to put me on showcase for a circus??

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: Can't be asking too much from a dog...

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: What did you just say? Bark bark...

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: That's MY MASTER, ladies and gentlemen...

string.name: c27_s3
string.value: I love you too master~!! Woof woof

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: I know you're lying, master...woof woof

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: I was thinking of something else...and I didn't hear it...Woof...

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: You think I'll like you back? Woof...

string.name: c28_s1
string.value: I love you too master very very much!!

string.name: c28_s3
string.value: You better love me and no one else!!!

string.name: c28_f2
string.value: Everyone knows that's just a token gesture...

string.name: c28_f3
string.value: And then the master will go off on me later...

string.name: c28_f4
string.value: You think I'll fall for that again...?

string.name: f2_f
string.value: I'm so full I can't eat anymore...woof...

string.name: f3_s
string.value: Master, this is really delicious! Woof woof...

string.name: f3_f
string.value: Master, I can't eat anymore...woof woof...

string.name: s3
string.value: Don't make me say bad words! Woof!

string.name: c32_s1
string.value: Haha! Just tell me what to do, and I'll do it!

string.name: c32_s3
string.value: This is waay too easy! Bark!

string.name: c32_f2
string.value: We huskies don't have hands! Bark!

string.name: c32_f3
string.value: I don't want to do it~ bark!

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: Oink Oink~ Here I am sitting...

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: What are you talking about?! Arrrgghhh~

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: It's too CLEAN for me! Oink!

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: This is pretty easy~! Oink oink!

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: Show me your reward first! Oink!

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: I look nice when I'm sitting, yeah?

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: I'm too fat to sit~ Arggghhh~

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Arrghhh... Please understand me, I'm just too fat to sit!

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: Oink oink~ Don't be so scary, master...

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: I don't mean it master...Oink oink...

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: Alright, I promise no misbehave again...

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Master, did I do anything wrong? Oink!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: You won't find a more obedient pet around you! Oink!

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Please master, I promise to behave...

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Venting anger on me again! Arrggghhh!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: Well... you not gonna win this time..

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: Hahh... I can see far! Weeee!

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: You won't find a pig that can stand like I do... Oink oink...

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: OMG, I think I look cute!

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Don't look at me please~ Weee~

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: Only when you get the poop bag ready...

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: Hey, I just poop a few minutes ago...

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: Can you poop even if you don't feel like it?

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: I had no food all day!

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: It must have been a bad day for you, poor thing... Oink...

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: When you're buying items, you need to make sure you're not being deceived...Oink...

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: Let me give u a kiss... Oink...

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: What? Pigs just love to sleep, not talk!

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: Get that sweetie besides you to chat!

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Don't forget about being courteous to everyone around you...Oink oink...

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: I would like to try the AirShip to Ossyria master!

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Revive me with Water of Life when I turn into doll.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Master, don't forget to bring along your safaty charm when training!

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Quests and events are good for you, master!

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Oink oink... You are so warm~

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: I like you hugging me... Weee~

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: NO~! I'm not free for hugging now!

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: I dun wanna hug you, stupid!

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Play time~ Play time! PLAY TIME!!

string.name: c24_s1
string.value: Sleep with me master? Oink oink....

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: I'm so wide awake for the first time!

string.name: c26_s2
string.value: I love love love you! Weeee~~~

string.name: c26_s4
string.value: I'm so touched... so touched... so touched...

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: Are you sure? I'm so fat... sob...

string.name: c27_s1
string.value: Give me a loving hug! Weee...

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: You say that to others too yeah?

string.name: c28_s4
string.value: Tell me again tomorrow ok? I love to hear that...

string.name: c28_f2
string.value: I know you don't mean it...

string.name: c28_f3
string.value: Reward me and I'll believe you...

string.name: c31_s3
string.value: Haha...this is the way to do it, right? Oink~

string.name: c31_f1
string.value: I don't think pigs have hands, master! Oink~

string.name: c32_s1
string.value: Just tell me what to do, and I'll do it~!

string.name: c32_s2
string.value: I'm one smart pig, you know!

string.name: c32_f2
string.value: That's for dogs, not for pigs like me!

string.name: c32_f3
string.value: I don't want to do it. Oink...

string.name: f3_f
string.value: Too much.. it is just too much...

string.name: f4_f
string.value: Are you trying to kill me?

string.name: s3
string.value: Don't make me say weird things but give me some food~

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: Sitting down makes me Zzzz... but...Ooo..

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: Okay, I think I'll just sit ~Hoo Hoo~

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: You mean sit here, right, Ooo??

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: What are you trying to say...Grrr??

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: Dear master, why did you always repeat...any other stunt for me? Grrr...?

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: Are you crazy? It dirty my white fur here...Grrr...

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: It's too dirty to sit around here...Ooo...

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: Only food shall motivates me~! Hoo!

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: I gotta do one for you every once in a while...

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Now that I sat, give me my food!

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: Apologise for what I did, master...Hooo...

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Master, what exactly did I do wrong? Grrr!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: You won't find a more obidient pet around you! Ooo!

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: I was just sitting there! Grrr!

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Why are you mad again? AGAIN?

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: Come on... you're just bored, right?

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: What do you think, master? Nice?

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: Your wish is my command, master! Ooo...

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: Hahh...I've just gotte much taller! Oooo!

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: You won't find a bear that can stand like I do... Oooo...

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: Hmm... how am I gonna pee in public??

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: What? I just pee a few min. ago...

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: Great! It's time to release some toxic...Ooo

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: I just don't feel like it yet..

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Ahhh, that was good...woot... you stepped on that!

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: I'm not a water dispenser, master...

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: Can you pee even if you don't feel like it?

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: I had nothing to drink all day, so no pee for me...

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: Are you tired? Don't worry, I'll be there for you, Ooo...

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: When you're buying items, you need to make sure you're not being deceived...Ooo~

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: You want me to give you a hug? Don't be too stress alright?

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: How about some stunts for you master?

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Ok... What is it again NOW??!

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: Back to your training and stop disturbing me!

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: Give me some nice clothes to wear and I'll entertain you.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: How about going to another place instead of staying at the same place?

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Go party master! I like more people!

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Don't forget about being courteous to everyone around you...Hooo...

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Have you ever go to the dungeon before? Be careful with the bosses!

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: Bad day for me, I don't feel like talking...

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: Go away and leave me alone!

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Revive me with Water of Life when I turn into a doll.

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Master...you look cool with your new skill!!!

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Master, don't forget to bring along your safaty charm when training!

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Quests and events are good for you, master!

string.value: Just let me sleep first ok?

string.value: Master, let me hug you instead! Hooo!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Okay, you can come hug me~! Oooo!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Let me feel your heartbeat~! Hooo...

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: NO~! I'm not free for hugging now!

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: It's so warm in your arms... Hoo...

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: Who wants to hug you, stupid!

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Play time~ Play time! PLAY TIME!!

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: No no... no bed for me...

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: Ahh... so nice to have a nap... Ooo...

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: Feed me when I'm awake ok?

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: I'm not tired! Hang out with me master!

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: Come on... I'm ready for training!

string.name: c27_s1
string.value: I love you too, give me a hug! Hoo...

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: Don't hurt me with your lies... Grrr!

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: You say that to others too yeah?

string.name: c28_f2
string.value: Don't say you love me when you don't mean it...

string.name: c28_f3
string.value: Oh yeah, then where's my food?

string.name: c29_s1
string.value: Oh, really? Sweet!!! Let's play! Ooo~

string.name: c29_s2
string.value: I was soooo waiting for you to play with me~ Ooo~

string.value: Merry Christmas to you too! Where are my presents?

string.value: Tell me I'm the best thing you have on Christmas!

string.value: Ho ho ho, Meeerry Christmas! Did I sound like Santa?

string.value: May all your wishes come true, master!

string.value: I've heard that too often from Santa. Pssh.

string.value: No, I don't have presents for you.

string.value: No you aren't, because I'm here! Ru!

string.value: Ok, please stop this whining, ru!

string.name: c36_f2
string.value: This is not a soap opera, ru?

string.name: c36_f3
string.value: Maybe it's time for you to make friends, ru?

string.name: c36_f4
string.value: Well that wasn't hard to tell, ru?

string.name: c37_s1
string.value: Do you need help? You can talk to me, master.

string.name: c37_s2
string.value: Here, if only I can give you a pat on the back.

string.name: c37_s4
string.value: Hey, it's going to get better, okay?

string.value: That's because you've been bad this year!

string.name: c37_f3
string.value: It must be the snow. You're depressing me, master.

string.name: c37_f4

string.value: Hey, I'm ready to go! Ru!

string.value: See my nose lighting up? I'm excited! Ru!!

string.value: Woof woof~ I’m a smart Husky~!

string.value: A manager who asks for your password is a fraud~ woof woof woof!

string.value: I’m so happy when I’m looking at your face~ woof woof~

string.value: Whine... My back is so itchy~

string.value: I think I’m getting fat~ It’ probably because of your love~ woof woof!

string.value: If you have your liquid medicine with you, you don’t have to be afraid of any monsters~ woof woof woof!

string.value: Sometimes I think you and I look quite alike~ woof woof~

string.value: Woof woof~ When I feel good, my tail just wags on its own~

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Have you ever seen a talking penguin? WEK.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Any good movie to watch, WEK?

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Tell me you love me the most, WEK.

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Treat others just the way you want to be treated, WEK.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Take me to a seafood store, WEK.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: Don't feel like talking right now, WEK.

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: If I ever turn back into a doll, please get me a water of life so I can keep hanging out with you.

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: I'll help you gather up some items on the ground.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: I see a lot of elves these days. I heard they were very hard-working.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Don't tell others your ID and password.

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: And what exactly do you want from me?

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Don't bother me. I'm just chillin here.

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Now you gotta kiss me! WEK

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Hehe, give me a warm hug. WEK

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: I'm too heavy for you to hug, WEK.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: I've been in need of some love these days... WEK.

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: You can hug me as long as you want, WEK!

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: NO! You haven't showered in days! WEK!

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: I got no time for you, WEK!

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: Don't hug me too hard. I can't breathe.

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: Awwww, it's embarassing though. Hug me when no one's looking.

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: No, I wanna do something fun! WEK!

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Look, it's well into the morning right now, WEK.

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: I don't feel like sleeping here, WEK.

string.name: c24_s1
string.value: Master, you sleep here with me. WEK.

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: I was about to sleep anyway.

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: You need to wake me up later.

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: Don't tell me what to do.

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: It's not time to sleep yet.

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: I feel fine, I don't feel like sleeping.

string.name: c26_s4
string.value: This makes me feel good, WEK!

string.name: c26_f1
string.value: This makes me feel good, WEK!

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: Liar. I don't like you, WEK.

string.name: c26_f4
string.value: Really? I don’t think you do, though. WEK.

string.name: c27_s1
string.value: Do you really mean that, WEK?

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: You know how I feel about this, right? WEK~

string.name: c27_s3
string.value: I love you too, master! WEK!

string.name: c27_s4
string.value: Yay, I'm being loved by my master~ WEK!

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: And what do you want from me? WEK.

string.name: c27_f2
string.value: What? I didn't hear you. WEK.

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: I know you say that to others, too. WEK.

string.name: c28_s4
string.value: I love you too, master! Yay!!

string.name: c28_f2
string.value: We penguins don't take that phrase "I love you" lightly.

string.name: c28_f3
string.value: If you don't mean that, that I don't think you should say it.

string.name: c29_s3
string.value: So I should just stick it out like this? WEK..

string.name: c30_s2
string.value: You know I'm the bomb, WEK.

string.name: c30_f1
string.value: No way, I'm too tired. WEK.

string.name: c30_f2
string.value: I'm too lazy to do this. WEK.

string.name: c31_s2
string.value: Heavy, isn't it? I can't fly with these, though.

string.name: c31_s3
string.value: Is it fluffy? It feels good, right? This is fuuuun!

string.name: c31_f1
string.value: Ugh, this is quite a chore.

string.name: c31_f3
string.value: What am I, a dog? I'm a penguin, you know!

string.name: c32_s3
string.value: Make sure not to leave a hole on my cheek!

string.name: c32_f1
string.value: Um... do you know exactly where we are right now?

string.name: c32_f3
string.value: No way, I don't wanna do it.

string.name: c33_s3
string.value: Don't do it for too long, though. Yay!

string.name: c33_f1
string.value: Who in the right mind would wanna kiss you?

string.name: c33_f3
string.value: You ain't doing this for free.

string.name: c33_f4
string.value: Tell me that was a joke.

string.name: c34_s3
string.value: I deserve a trophy for this performance!

string.name: c34_s4
string.value: I believe I can fly!!! WEK WEK!

string.name: c34_f1
string.value: Um...don't I look a litttttle hefty for that?

string.name: c34_f2
string.value: Hey, have you ever seen a flying penguin?

string.name: c34_f3
string.value: You must have lost your mind.

string.name: c35_s2
string.value: Show me another penguin that can fly like me.

string.name: c35_s4
string.value: No need to waste time. Here we go!

string.name: c35_f3
string.value: I suggest you study a little on penguin's anatomy.

string.name: c35_f4
string.value: Um, have you heard of Law of Gravity? Hello!!

string.name: c36_s1
string.value: I'm at a loss for words...WEK!

string.name: c36_s2
string.value: It's hard to find a penguin as cute-looking as me! WEK!

string.name: c36_s3
string.value: Hey, I've been cute for quite some time, you know! WEK!

string.name: c36_s4
string.value: Really? You're not kidding, right? WEK!

string.name: c36_f2
string.value: I'm not CUTE. I'm DASHING. WEK!!!

string.name: c36_f3
string.value: I NEED SOME TRUTH AROUND HERE! WEK!

string.name: c36_f4
string.value: What do you want me to say in return, WEK?

string.name: c37_s2
string.value: You won't find a penguin quite like me. Enjoy it!

string.name: c37_s3
string.value: I can never get enough of your compliments!

string.name: c37_s4
string.value: Thanks for your kind words! I really appreciate that!

string.name: c37_f1
string.value: Since when did we compliment each other anyway...

string.name: c37_f4
string.value: Feed me instead of waxing stupid poetics like that.

string.name: f2_f
string.value: I can't eat no more. WEK.

string.name: f3_f
string.value: Ugh, I feel like throwing up. WEK.

string.name: f4_f
string.value: I need to be on a diet.

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: What do you think? Do you want to lie down with me?Grr~

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: Grrr~ my body's been aching, and this is gooood!

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: Grr~ No I don't want to lie down~!

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: Grr~! Man lying down here? That's a disgrace, a disgrace!!!

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: I can't lie down after a meal. I'll get fat really fast~ Grr~

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: This would have been perfect if I'm in a warm room right about now~ Kakaka~

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Kakaka~ All I need now is a bag of chips and a remote.

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: I can't hear you, I can't hear you! Grr~!

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Well, I feel like doing things my way, anyway~ Kakaka~

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: No, then I look fat~ Grr~

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Boss said it, so I might as well lie down~~ Kakaka~

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: Boss, lie down with me here. Oh, this is good!! Kakaka~

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Kakaka~ I must be really old, to really like lying down like this~!

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Kahaha~ shall I lie down for a little bit?

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Boss, you've grown up quiiiiiiiite a bit. Ordering ME to lie down? Huh? Grr?

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Hey, you're talking to a boss monster! No ORDERING here! Grr!

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Grr~ Boss, you lie down first~

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Grr~ Boss, I don't feel like doing it right now~

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: Ka ... I guess I screwed up this time.

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: Ka ... let me apologie as only a man can!

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: Don't tell this to my bro, Crimson Balrog!

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Grr!! Who are YOU to get mad at ME?

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Are YOU rebelling against me? Grr...

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: Look I didn't do it on purpose, so let it slide, alright? Grr...

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Grr~ Do you want me to take a bit out of you?

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: Now I'm angry!!! Really really angry! Krrrr!!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: Ka ... Boss is doing this because the boss worries about me. Not bad! I'm impressed!

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Ka ... you make a grown man like me cry.

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: A real man admits his mistakes. ...

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Krrr... this is making me MAD MAD MAD!!!!!

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: I'm about to lose control~!! Grrrrrrr !!!!

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: My eyes have hearts now~ Kakaka~...

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: You really mean it, huh? This is quite something~

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: And we're going to love forever, no? Grr~?

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: You make me laugh my butt off~

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: I can't just give my heart away like that~ Grr~

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Grr~ It's still a world worth living~

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: Your love makes me feel excited~ Kaka...

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: Kakaka~ do you feel my love, too?

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Arrrgh... Are you sure you just meant what you said?

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Grr~ Wahahahha I'm gonna tell my brother this!

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Boss you're a good person~ Grr~

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Kakaka~ Do you see these hearts coming out of my eyes?

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Kaka ... I love the Boss, too.

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: This is a little embarassing~ Yoohoo~

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: I feel like throwing up that 10 year old pizza ....

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: I told you to say the truth!

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Kakaka~ now to what extent will the boss lie to me?

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Kaka .. This embarasses the heck out of me!

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Kakaka~ nothing makes a Balrog dance quite like a compliment~

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: Um ... I'm not getting used to it.

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Kahaha~ I'm too sexy for this butt~

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: I do know that I'm one heck of a looking Balrog~

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Grr~ you like me, don't you?

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: I feel like throwing up after hearing all the lies you just said.

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: (throws up) NOW, do I look lovely?

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: I'll just pretend that I didn't hear that.

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Which part of me did Boss fall in love with? The luscious lips? Kakaka

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: Boss is getting better and better at lying~Grr~

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: Boss, your lies make me wanna throw up!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Hah ... Now I feel like doing something!

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: This is how you poop with class~

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: My gosh, this is huge. Wow.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: Grr~ Even a Balrog like me prefers to keep this on a down low~

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: If I poop here, I'll look ... like ...

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Pooping requires ample amount of concentration~

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Apply ample amount of pressure, and the poop will naturally ... come out~ Kakaka~

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Now I LOOK GREAT~! LOOK AT ME POOP!

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Pooping in a public place like this? Embarassing!

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: I ... am ... constipating ... need a medicine...

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Ahhh ... pooping in public takes a lot of guts.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Only the true men poop like this!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Kaka ... doesn't mine smell better than yours, boss?

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Boss, this is what you call a manly poop.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Kakaka, boss poop with me here.

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: Hey, people are staring at me!

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Do I HAVE to poop, boss? Really?

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: Kakaka~ take a look at this!

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: Kakaka ... no I'm not doing this to make you feel bad.

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: This is what you call a MANLY smile!

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: Ka... I'm going through a tough time...

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: Ka... I am too tired to smile today.

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: ... it's not easy being a loner.

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: Grrr, now this is one beautiful smile~

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: I am the biggest star in MapleStory! Muahahah

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: Ka ... I'm sad. Actually, I'm sad because I'm hungry.

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Being a loner is killing me again. Sob sob.

string.name: c24_s1
string.value: This is what I'd call a killer smile to you, Boss~

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: Boss, your smile looks a million bucks! Smile with me!

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: Kahaha~ I'm smiling because I'm feeling good~!

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: Kahaha ... I call this, the bossy smile.

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: Grrr... boss, you want me to smile, and now I feel like crying.

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: Loner Balrog at your service... sigh...

string.name: c25_s2
string.value: How do you like me sticking my tongue out on you? Blehhhh

string.name: c25_f1
string.value: This does not fit the description of Jr. Balrog.

string.name: c25_f3
string.value: Grrr ... real men don't stick their tongues out!

string.name: c26_s2
string.value: Bleeehhhh, doesn't this really make you mad?

string.name: c26_s3
string.value: Kakaka ... real men stick their tongue out in a classy manner like this.

string.name: c26_f1
string.value: My brother Crimson Balrog told me to cut it out.

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: Blehh isn't for free of charge.

string.name: c26_f4
string.value: I don't feel like doing it today. Leave me a lone.

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: I've been practicing 'blehh' for the last couple of weeks. You like this?

string.name: c27_s4
string.value: Boss, you like me blehing you, huh? Hahaha

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: Kaka... boss, you just keep doing it, and I'll make fun of you here.

string.name: c27_f2
string.value: Boss is blocking my way from becoming a true alpha dog.

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: Dude, this does not make me look like a boss character.

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: Boss, why do I have to do this?

string.name: c28_s2
string.value: Say hello to the purest set of eyes in MapleStory!

string.name: c28_s3
string.value: I know you like to see my eyes, so here they are!

string.name: c28_s4
string.value: Have you ever seen a look as piercing as this?

string.name: c28_f3
string.value: Kakaka, this isn't something I'll do for free.

string.name: c29_s1
string.value: Is this good enough? I know you like it.

string.name: c29_s2
string.value: In terms of my eyes, these are much more beautiful than that of my brother Crimson Balrog's!

string.name: c29_f1
string.value: Grr.., I don't feel like doing this.

string.name: c29_f2
string.value: Why don't we just lie down here and chill?

string.name: c29_f3
string.value: You'll get sick of it if you see this too often.

string.name: c30_s1
string.value: This is what you call the eyes of a true gentleman! Grr!

string.name: c30_s2
string.value: They call me Eagle-Eye Balrog~ Kakaka~!

string.name: c30_s3
string.value: Boss, this is how much I care about you. Just look at my eyes!

string.name: c30_f1
string.value: I'd like to chill for a second.

string.name: c30_f4
string.value: You try first, boss! Let me see your eyes!

string.name: c31_s1
string.value: Have you ever been to the Cursed Shrine?

string.name: c31_s2
string.value: Hey, I may look intimidating, but deep down inside, I'm a man in need of love~

string.name: c31_s3
string.value: Everytime I look at the mirror, I can't help but see how good-looking I am.

string.name: c31_s4
string.value: I like the fact that I look as manly as one can get in MapleStory~ Kakaka~

string.name: c31_f2
string.value: Kakaka, if I tell you, are you going to pay me?

string.name: c31_f3
string.value: Kakaka, my mouth is just dying to say something...

string.name: c31_f4
string.value: Hey, I'm watching Maple Idol! Move away from TV!

string.name: c32_s1
string.value: My wings are my source of pride and joy!

string.name: c32_s2
string.value: It's only obvious that people are scared of me. I'm Balrog!

string.name: c32_s3
string.value: These muscles... let's just say, these babies didn't come for free!

string.name: c32_s4
string.value: I know I'm good looking, and I want everyone to know that, too.

string.name: c32_f2
string.value: I feel like eating snack right now. Get me some!

string.name: c32_f3
string.value: Let's just lie down and chill.

string.name: c33_s1
string.value: Hey, boss, have you met my brother, Crimson Balrog?

string.name: c33_s2
string.value: I want to be much more masculine, like my brother Crimson.

string.name: c33_s3
string.value: I value friendship more than anything else!

string.name: c33_s4
string.value: Kaka ... it's been a pleasure knowing you, boss!

string.name: c33_f1
string.value: I don't feel like doing anything right now...

string.name: c33_f3
string.value: Let's just lie down and chillllll.

string.name: c33_f4
string.value: Let's do this some other time.

string.name: c34_s3
string.value: Grr.... And I am so sick of ...~Zzz..Z..zz..

string.name: c35_s1
string.value: I'll see you in my dream, kid!

string.name: c35_s2
string.value: Grr ... I feel like sleeping ... right ... now ...

string.name: c35_f1
string.value: Call me the hardest working Balrog in this world!

string.name: c35_f2
string.value: Grrr ... I don't feel like sleeping!

string.name: c36_s1
string.value: Grrr ... I better start scaring people that are on board ... grrr ...

string.name: c36_s3
string.value: Grrr ... the way of a man .... Boss ... stupid...

string.name: c36_f2
string.value: I don't feel like sleeping! Grr!

string.name: c36_f3
string.value: Grr!! Boss, are you just ordering me?!

string.name: c37_s1
string.value: Pshhh ... this isn't a regular GAS. Hahha.

string.name: c37_s2
string.value: This smell of gas is trickling my nose~ Kakaka~

string.name: c37_s4
string.value: Whoa, I almost pooped it away~!

string.name: c37_f1
string.value: How am I going to fart in public? No way!

string.name: c37_f2
string.value: Kahaha, people will really make fun of me.

string.name: c37_f3
string.value: Oh my, how can you say such thing...

string.name: c37_f4
string.value: Grrr ... does it HAVE to be just gas?

string.name: c38_s1
string.value: Pshhhh I can actually make a song out of my gaseous adventure.

string.name: c38_s2
string.value: Boss, check out the smell. Isn't it sweet? Haha.

string.name: c38_s3
string.value: My gosh, I'm feeling dizzy right now from all that gas...

string.name: c38_s4
string.value: Dang, this even smells like my snack from last night

string.name: c38_f3
string.value: Kahaha ... Boss, that was so mean for you to order me to do something degrading like this!

string.name: c38_f4
string.value: Look, I don't feel like passing out to my own gas.

string.name: f2_s
string.value: This tastes so good, I feel like passing out! Kakaka~

string.name: f2_f
string.value: Um... I ate til I almost threw up.

string.name: f3_s
string.value: A real MAN eats a lot!

string.name: f3_f
string.value: ... dang it, I feel like thrwing up

string.name: s2
string.value: Are you telling me to say such thing?

string.name: s3
string.value: I can't believe you just said that. Let me show you how powerful I am.

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: Is this the way, master? Oink~

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: Yes master! Oink will do whatever you wish...Oink~

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: How is Oink's sitting post, master...Oink~

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: Oink needs to sit badly! Ooink~

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: What are ya trying to say, master? Oink~

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Oooink!! Oink will be a good boy/girl! Oink!~

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Do I sit like this? Oink!

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: It's not like I'll be getting a prize for doing this... Oink~

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: I was sitting when my mom gave me a birth.

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: I needed to rest.. Thank you master.

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Let sit down and chat all you want!

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Wow... nice try... you almost had me.

string.name: c5_f1
string.value: But Oink is in happy mood! Oink~

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: Awwwww! Oink is so sorry,master! Oink Oink~

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: Oink will not do it again, master!! Oooink~~

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: Give me a second chance.... Oink...

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: I admit... I have been bad...

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: I won't do that again... Oink...

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: You are good at hurting others' feelings...

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: But I still love you... Oink...

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: I will be a good pet from now on.. Oink...

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Me? Are you talking to me?

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: Seriously, I didn't do anything wrong.

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Told you I did NOT do anything!

string.name: c10_s3

string.value: Huh? What are you talking about?

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: But, I didn't do anything wrong!!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: You always get mad! I don't like you!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Stop it! It's not my fault.

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: I'll do better next time. Kiyoong.

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: I'll do better next time. Kiyoong.

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: Why are you mad at me again?

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: I messed up. So so sorry~

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: I'll do better next time. Kiyoong.

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Because you didn't raise me right.

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: Hey, I did nothing wrong! Why are you mad at me for?

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Why are you getting so upset again?

string.name: c9_f2
string.value: Ahhh~ I wanna use the bathroom.

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: I feel the same way you do.

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: Do you even know what love is?

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: Sorry, I'm in love with another dragon.

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: I don't care about love~ Kiyong~~

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: I love you too master. Kiyoong~

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Yay! You know I feel the same way right? Kiyoong~~

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: You trying to confirm my love for you? I love you too~~

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: I'm tired of you following me around.

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Stop it. Do you even know what love is?

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: You always just say you love me, but you don't mean it. Toot.

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Me too, I can't live without you master. I love you~

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: I'm glad that you love me, master.

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: Those words again! I'm sick of it.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Stop it. I know you're lying.

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Again you're feeling lovey dovey. Stop it!

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: That's enough. I don't like you.

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: You want me to be hurt? Ki.yo. ong.. boo hoo..

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: It's so loud here I can't hear you.

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: Arrgh, I don't feel so good today.

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: So, am I a dumb dragon?

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Well, I don't like you either, Master.

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: Excuse me? You call me stupid? Whatever.

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: You're more stupid. More dumb. Nahnah na boo boo

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: It's so loud here I can't hear you.

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: I am not feeling too well right now.

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Is there really such thing as a dumb person?

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: I couldn't evolve because of you, and I'm the dumb one?

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: You said I'm stupid? You're so funny.

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: What in the world are you saying?

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Oh...the happiness of regular bowel movements~

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Do you have to poop too, master?

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: Don't be like this. I have a reputation, you know.

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: I need to eat in order to poop...

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Bum bum~ Look at that poop!

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Everything I ate all came out. Haha!

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: I have an empty stomach. Feed me!

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: Don't be like this. I have a reputation!

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: I don't need to poop now.

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: I don't want to poop here. Maybe somewhere else.

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Ohh ... oohhh ... I was holding it in for so long.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Ohhh~ That felt good. I'm a healthy young dragon.

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: Don't you have any class? I can't poop in public!

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: You should go to the restroom, master.

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: No I don't want to! Don't make me poop on your feet!

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: What should I tell you? Kiyong~

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Sometimes I wonder how I'll look like when I evolve into something new...

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: I have a pretty voice right? Kiyong. I get that a lot. Kiyong~

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: Be quiet and go away please.

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: You make me talk but don't even listen.

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: We dragons can evolve into adult dragons!

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: They say my grandfather granted someone's wish a long time ago~

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: Kiyoong I'm going to get you~ Nahnah na boo boo!

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: I was going to tell you an interesting story anyway. So, there I was...

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: I have nothing to say to you.

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: I have no clue what you mean.

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: I'm so hungry I can't think of anything to say.

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: So this guy walks into a potion shop...

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: You can't catch me. You can only hope to contain me!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: I wish I could evolve into a huge, mythical dragon just like those in cartoons, too~

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Take me to Mr. Garnox. Kiyoong.

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: I know you can talk. Don't make me talk back.

string.name: c24_s1
string.value: Tell me I'm the cutest you've ever seen!

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: I am too cute for you. Just kidding!

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: Cutie?? Me? I don't think so.

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: No. I'm mad because you didn't feed me earlier~

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: What will I look like when I change my appearance? I'm curious~Kiyong~

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: I don't feel so good today..I don't want to..Ki..Yo..Ong.

string.name: c25_s1
string.value: Tell me I'm the cutest you've ever seen!

string.name: c25_s4
string.value: I am the most adorable dragon ever!

string.name: c25_f1
string.value: I'm grown now!..Don't treat me like a baby~ kaaa~Kyaoh!

string.name: c25_f2
string.value: No. I fought with my friend today, so I'm not in a good mood.

string.name: c25_f3
string.value: It's about time for you to change the way you talk to me.

string.name: c25_f4
string.value: Am I a toy? Stop playing with me.

string.name: c26_s1
string.value: I'll show you just for today~ Kiyong!

string.name: c26_s2
string.value: Don't I look cute when I smile?

string.name: c26_s3
string.value: Tada! You won't find a more adorable pet than me!

string.name: c26_f1
string.value: Who are you trying to fool?

string.name: c26_f2
string.value: What will I look like after I change? I'm curious~ Kiyong~

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: You think you can just give me a little pat on the back and it's ok?

string.name: c26_f4
string.value: I don't really feel like it today~ Kiyong.

string.name: c27_s3
string.value: Yeah I was tired anyway, thanks!

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: You think I'm sleepy at this hour?

string.name: c27_f2
string.value: You go to sleep, Master! I'm not sleepy! Waahhh!

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: Where's my blanket? I need that to sleep!

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: No! I'm not going to sleep!

string.name: c28_s1
string.value: Sweet dreams to you too, Master~

string.name: c28_s4
string.value: This looks like a great place to crash... zzzzz

string.name: c28_f2
string.value: Why you want me to sleep?! I said I'm not going to sleep!!

string.name: c28_f3
string.value: I'll sleep when I fell like it! Blahhh!

string.name: c28_f4
string.value: I can't sleep during the daytime!

string.name: c29_s1
string.value: Don't bother me. I'm sleeping now~

string.name: c29_s2
string.value: Can you please shut the lights too?

string.name: c29_s4
string.value: Good night, Master! Sleep tight, don't let the bed bugs bite!

string.name: c29_f1
string.value: I'll sleep when I fell like it! Blahhh!

string.name: c29_f2
string.value: I can't sleep during the daytime!

string.name: c29_f4
string.value: I'm busy, don't talk to me!

string.name: f2_s
string.value: I want to eat a lot and grow up to become a BIG adult dragon~

string.name: f2_f
string.value: ughh... I'm so full. I can't eat any more...

string.name: f3_s
string.value: Kkiyong~ I'll eat a lot and become an adult dragon~~Yay~

string.name: f3_f
string.value: My stomach is so bloated I can't fly..Waahhh....

string.name: f4_f
string.value: But I'm not hungry..I don't want to eat!! Waahhh!!

string.name: c1_s1
string.value: Sitting down makes me feel comfortable.

string.name: c1_s2
string.value: Why don't you sit with me here? Resting is a necessity. You'll see...

string.name: c1_s4
string.value: I shall rest my wings now, so I can fly farther tomorrow.

string.name: c1_f3
string.value: I do not wish to sit.

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: Alright, I shall sit. What will you do for me in return?

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: You're much quicker than I thought.I'm impressed.

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: It is comfortable sitting down. I shall rest for now.

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: I do not wish to sit. Do you want me to explain why?

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: The situation does not call for sitting.

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: I suggest you sit. Demanding never works.

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: No. I do not feel fatigued.

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Come to think of it, I feel fatigued...

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Yes, I shall save up some energy whenever I can.

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: I'm in the middle of an exercise. Demanding never yields good results.

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Be honest. YOU are the one that desires to sit, right?

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Why should I sit on this filth?

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: Why should I? Give me a valid reason why I shall sit.

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: I'm sorry. Please accept my apology.

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: I have been reprimanded by a human being! What a disgrace!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: You're the one that commited the mistake! Krarr!

string.name: c5_s3
string.value: Oh, I made a mistake. My apologies.

string.name: c5_s4
string.value: I sincerely apologize for the mishap.

string.name: c5_f1
string.value: Krarr!!! What are you, a preacher?

string.name: c5_f2
string.value: Cut this nonsense and get out of my face.

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: I am really sorry. Please forgive me.

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: I made a mistake, and I am big enough to admit it. I am sorry.

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: Oh no, I feel terrible now. I am really, really sorry.

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Your words mean nothing to me.

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: Are you sure you know who's at fault here?

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: I heard some noise coming out of your mouth, but I do not understand what you are saying... hmmm...

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: Tell me you did not mean it.

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Wow, I need a tissue for this.

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: I do not appreciate you looking down on me like that.

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Did your mother teach you to say such a thing?

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: I...do not know what to say.

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: I will try to be better next time.

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: You are in need of a tic-tac sandwich. Like, now.

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Is the fool one who leads or one who follows?

string.name: c9_s1
string.value: It pains me to hear it from you.

string.name: c9_s3
string.value: I still believe you are a decent person.

string.name: c9_s4
string.value: Do you have a vendetta against me?

string.name: c9_f1
string.value: Why should I be subject to this gross misconception?

string.name: c9_f3
string.value: How would you feel if I called you that?

string.name: c9_f4
string.value: Look, please don't call me that. I'm already seen with you.

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: Cough cough... this is embarassing. I am pooping in public.

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: What a relief. I have had trouble unloading the past few days, but I am good now.

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: I am about to unload. Just wait.

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: How can you say that out loud?

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: That is not something you should iterate in public. Control yourself.

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: I am busy. I shall do it later.

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: I've been struggling lately. I do not believe you can truly comprehend what I am going through right now.

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: I should be done ... pretty soon.

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Today must be my lucky day. I had no trouble unloading.

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: I needed to it. Thank you for covering me.

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: There's no feeling quite like this. What a relief!

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: I cannot poop without a copy of the New Leaf City Times in my hand.

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: I heard some noise coming out of your mouth, but I do not understand what you are saying... hmmm...

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: How disgusting of you to say that in public! Shame on you!

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: This is not the time to speak of that matter. I am disgusted with you.

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: What a relief. I do not think you'll truly grasp the feeling of euphoria I'm experiencing right now.

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Oh it's about to come out. Now, if you'll excuse me...

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Yes! I've been holding it all day!

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: I am very very busy right now. We shall do this later.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: I need some medicine. I... cannot do it.

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: The wind is blowing too hard. I do not wish to poop right this minute.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: I am not an uneducated dragon that defacates anywhere.

string.name: c13_s1
string.value: I love you, too. This is quite embarassing...

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: I've been waiting for you to say those words.

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: That's a nice gesture from you. Me too.

string.name: c13_s4
string.value: I feel fantastic with you around.

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: I feel fatigued. I shall rest in a bit.

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: Hmm... I do not have much to do right now.

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: When you are around, I feel a sense of comfort.

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: I know I know. Me too!

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Do not worry. I love you too.

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: You are a great person. I love you too.

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: It is very windy today. I may have a difficult time flying today.

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: I am very busy right now. Talk to me later.

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Do you really mean it? That's...very nice of you.

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Do not say another word. I know, I know.

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: I love you, too. You're the first person I ever said this to.

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Well, thank you. That's very nice of you to say.

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: I do not like the weather today. Let's just go home.

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: I do not understand. First you hate me, now you love me?

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: I love you should not be spoken lightly. It's a powerful word, and you should save it for someone you really love.

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Are you free right now? I certainly can use some help from you.

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Krarrrr! What would you like me to say?

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: I wish to meet Mr. Garnox once more. Please take me there.

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: I am shocked to see you comprehending our dragon language.

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: I wish to go back a few yeas. Those were the good days.

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: I do not wish to speak right now.

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: I am really fatigued. I do not wish to speak right now.

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Hmmm I do not have anything to do with right now.

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: I've always wanted to discuss this matter with you. Are you free right now?

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: Do you wish to discuss some things with me?

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: I am learning to speak faster than I did before.

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: I wonder how Mr. Garnox is comparring me to other dragons.

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: It is very windy outside. I shall just stay here.

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Are you trying to chellenge me? Ludicrious!

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: I heard some noise coming out of your mouth, but I do not understand what you are saying... hmmm...

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I am really busy right now. Talk to me later.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: I have been watching you for a long time.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: You must feel honored to be at the presence of moi.

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: I must say, I am impressed with your astute knowledge of the dragon language we speak.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Are you familiar with my friend Balrog? He might be a big, bad beast, but I think highly of him.

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: I thought I heard someone speak. Who was that? You? No, can't be.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I am appalled by your utter lack of decency towards me.

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: I would appreciate it a great deal if you can make a formal request on this, then I'll reconsider.

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Be quiet. I need to concentrate.

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: You went through a hard day's work today. You should get some sleep.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: You should get some rest, too.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Thank you. I need some rest. Zzzz...

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: Are you out of your mind?

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: I miss Mr. Garnox. I owe a lot to him.

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: I do not see many humans around this area. Let's go somewhere else.

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Good night, sleep tight, don't let the bed bugs bite.

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: I deserve some rest, I know. Zzzz

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Great. You should get some rest. We have a busy day tomorrow.

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: A young'n like you should get some sleep. Not me.

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: You should be hunting, not sleeping. I'm disappointed in you, kid.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Where is my bed? I need to sleep right now.

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Good night. I'll see you later. Zzzz

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: I have been feeling fatigued. Now's a great time to catch a nap.

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: Why do you want to sleep now? You've got some hunting to do.

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: Buy me some food. I'm hungry.

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: It's a beautiful day today. Perfect time for hunting.

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: What do you think of this magnificent new look?

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: This is what you call the pinnacle of all looks.

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: What have you done for me lately?

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: What are you trying to say?

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: I hear some noise coming out of you, but I cannot understand it.

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: What are you saying? Get off my face.

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: I know you are staring at my new look in awe. Love it!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Don’t I look dashing? I know I do.

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: This look is just for you. Learn to appreciate it.

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Don’t be shocked by it. It's just the norm.

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Patience is a virtue, kid. Be patient, and someday I'll do it for you.

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: I do not wish to be disturbed right now.

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: I'm in the middle of a breathing exercise. Do not bother me.

string.name: f1_f
string.value: My stomach is full. Don't feed me anymore.

string.name: f2_s
string.value: Thank you. I was just beginning to get hungry.

string.name: f3_s
string.value: Very delicious. I feel healthier after eating that.

string.name: f3_f
string.value: Is this how you try to torment me? With food? That's very juvenile.

string.name: f4_s
string.value: All the calories and nutrients seem to be in place. Good.

string.name: f4_f
string.value: Again? Why? Do you have alzheimer's? You should go visit a doctor.

string.value: Sitting down makes me feel comfortable.

string.name: c1_s2
string.value: Why don't you sit with me here? Resting is a necessity. You'll see...

string.name: c1_s4
string.value: I shall rest my wings now, so I can fly farther tomorrow.

string.value: I do not wish to sit.

string.value: It is comfortable sitting down. I shall rest for now.

string.value: I do not wish to sit. Do you want me to explain why?

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: The situation does not call for sitting.

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: I suggest you sit. Demanding never works.

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: No. I do not feel fatigued.

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Yes, I shall save up some energy whenever I can.

string.value: Be honest. YOU are the one that desires to sit, right?

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Why should I sit on this filth?
