string.name: f4_s
string.value: All the calories and nutrients seem to be in place. Good.

string.name: f4_f
string.value: Again? Why? Do you have alzheimer's? You should go visit a doctor.

string.name: c1_s1
string.value: Thank you. I feel much better now sitting down.

string.name: c1_s2
string.value: Why don't you sit with me here? Resting is a necessity. You'll see...

string.name: c1_s4
string.value: I shall rest my wings now, so I can fly farther tomorrow.

string.name: c1_f1
string.value: Have you lost your mind? You should be busy hunting.

string.name: c1_f3
string.value: I do not wish to sit.

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: Alright, I shall sit. What will you do for me in return?

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: I was feeling quite uncomfortable. Thank you for the kind offer.

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: It is comfortable sitting down. I shall rest for now.

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: I do not wish to sit. Do you want me to explain why?

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: The situation does not call for sitting.

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: I suggest you sit. Demanding never works.

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: No. I do not feel fatigued.

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Come to think of it, I feel fatigued...

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Yes, I shall save up some energy whenever I can.

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: I will sit. This looks like an excellent place to sit.

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: I'm in the middle of an exercise. Demanding never yields good results.

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Be honest. YOU are the one that desires to sit, right?

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Why should I sit on this filth?

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: Why should I? Give me a valid reason why I shall sit.

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: I'm sorry. Please accept my apology.

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: I have been reprimanded by a human being! What a disgrace!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: You're the one that commited the mistake! Krarr!

string.name: c5_s3
string.value: Oh, I made a mistake. My apologies.

string.name: c5_s4
string.value: I sincerely apologize for the mishap.

string.name: c5_f1
string.value: Krarr!!! What are you, a preacher?

string.name: c5_f2
string.value: Cut this nonsense and get out of my face.

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: I am really sorry. Please forgive me.

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: I made a mistake, and I am big enough to admit it. I am sorry.

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: Oh no, I feel terrible now. I am really, really sorry.

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: I am busy. Talk to me later.

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: Are you sure you know who's at fault here?

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: I heard some noise coming out of your mouth, but I do not understand what you are saying... hmmm...

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: Tell me you did not mean it.

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Wow, I need a tissue for this.

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: I do not appreciate you looking down on me like that.

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Did your mother teach you to say such thing?

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: I...do not know what to say.

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: I will try to be better next time.

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: I am obviously a wiser creature than you, so do not hate.

string.name: c9_s1
string.value: It pains me to hear it from you.

string.name: c9_s3
string.value: I still believe you are a decent person.

string.name: c9_s4
string.value: Do you have a vendetta against me?

string.name: c9_f1
string.value: Why should I be subject to this gross misconception?

string.name: c9_f3
string.value: How would you feel if I called you that?

string.name: c9_f4
string.value: Look, please don't call me that.

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: Cough cough... this is embarassing. I am pooping in public.

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: What a relief. I have had trouble unloading the past few days, but I am good now.

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: I am about to unload. Just wait.

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: How can you say that out loud?

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: That is not something you should iterate in public. Control yourself.

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: I am busy. I shall do it later.

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: I have been struggling lately. I do not believe you can truly comprehend what I am going through right now.

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: I should be done ... pretty soon.

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Today must be my lucky day. I had no trouble unloading.

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: I needed to it. Thank you for covering me.

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: There's no feeling quite like this. What a relief!

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: I cannot poop without a copy of Maplestreet Journal in my hand.

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: I heard some noise coming out of your mouth, but I do not understand what you are saying... hmmm...

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: How disgusting of you to say that in public! Shame on you!

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: This is not the time to speak of that matter. I am disgusted with you.

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: What a relief. I do not think you'll truly grasp the feeling of euphoria I'm experiencing right now.

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Oh it's about to come out. Now, if you'll excuse me...

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Will it be okay for me to take care of my business now? I've been holding it in for an extended period of time.

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: I am very very busy right now. We shall do this later.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: I need some medicine. I... cannot do it.

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: The wind is blowing too hard. I do not wish to poop right this minute.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: I am not an uneducated dragon that defecates just anywhere.

string.name: c13_s1
string.value: I love you, too. This is quite embarrassing...

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: I've been waiting for you to say those words.

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: That's a nice gesture from you. Me too.

string.name: c13_s4
string.value: I feel fantastic with you around.

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: I feel fatigued. I shall rest in a bit.

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: Hmm... I do not have much to do right now.

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: When you are around, I feel a sense of comfort.

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: I know, I know. Me too.

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Do not worry. I love you too.

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: You are a great person. I love you too.

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: It is very windy today. I may have a difficult time flying today.

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: I am very busy right now. Talk to me later.

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Do you really mean it? That's...very nice of you.

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Do not say another word. I know, I know.

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: I love you, too. You're the first person I've ever said this to.

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Well, thank you. That's very nice of you to say.

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: I do not like the weather today. Let's just go home.

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: I do not understand. First you hate me, now you love me?

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: I love you should not be spoken lightly. It's a powerful word, and you should save it for someone you really love.

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Are you free right now? I certainly can use some help from you.

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Krarrrr! What would you like me to say?

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: I wish to meet Mr. Garnox once more. Please take me there.

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: I am shocked to see you completely comprehending our dragon language.

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: I wish to go back a few years. Those were the good days.

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: I do not wish to speak right now.

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: I am really fatigued. I do not wish to speak right now.

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Hmmm, I do not have anything to do with right now.

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: I've always wanted to discuss this matter with you. Are you free right now?

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: Do you wish to discuss some things with me?

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: I am learning to speak faster than I did before.

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: I wonder how Mr. Garnox is comparing me to other dragons.

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: It is very windy outside. I shall just stay here.

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Are you trying to challenge me? Ludicrous!

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: I heard some noises coming out of your mouth, but I do not understand what you are saying... hmmm...

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I am really busy right now. Talk to me later.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: I have been watching you for a long time.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: You must feel honored to be in the presence of moi.

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: I must say, I am impressed with your astute knowledge of the dragon language we speak.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Are you familiar with my friend Balrog? He might be a big, bad beast, but I think highly of him.

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: I thought I heard someone speak. Who was that? You? No, can't be.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I am appalled by your utter lack of decency towards me.

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: I would appreciate it a great deal if you can make a formal request on this, then I'll reconsider.

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Be quiet. I need to concentrate.

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: You went through a hard day. You should get some sleep.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: You should get some rest, too.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Thank you. I need some rest. Zzzz...

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: Are you out of your mind?

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: I miss Mr. Garnox. I owe a lot to him.

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: I do not see many humans around this area. Let's go somewhere else.

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Good night, sleep tight, don't let the bed bugs bite.

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: I deserve some rest, I know. Zzzz

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Great. You should get some rest. We have a busy day tomorrow.

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: A young'un like you should get some sleep. Not me.

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: You should be hunting, not sleeping. I'm disappointed in you, kid.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Where is my bed? I need to sleep right now.

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Good night. I'll see you later. Zzzz

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: I have been feeling fatigued. Now's a great time to catch a nap.

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: Why do you want to sleep now? You've got some hunting to do.

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: Buy me some food. I'm hungry.

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: It's a beautiful day today. Perfect time for hunting.

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: Ah, this is embarrassing, but I know you like it, so... tada!

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: No one can resist this look.

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: I am confident that you like this look.

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: I may be a dragon with class, but I can also exude some cuteness!

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: You have got to be kidding me...

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: I am not in a mood.

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: I do not appreciate your tone. Apologize.

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: What do you think I am, a dog?

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: For one time only... here it is. Tada!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: I haven't done this in a while, but I know you will like it.

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: I may have aged, but I've still got it~

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Unbelievable. I will not stoop that low to entertain you.

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: I am not a puppet. You cannot order me to do things of that nature.

string.name: c24_s1
string.value: Krarrr! Does this look stupendous, or what?

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: What do you think of this magnificent new look?

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: This is what you call the pinnacle of all looks.

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: What have you done for me lately?

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: What are you trying to say?

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: I hear some noise coming out of you, but I cannot understand it.

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: What are you saying? Get out of my face.

string.name: c25_s1
string.value: I know you are staring at my new look in awe. Love it!

string.name: c25_s2
string.value: Don’t I look dashing? I know I do.

string.name: c25_s3
string.value: This look is just for you. Learn to appreciate it.

string.name: c25_s4
string.value: Don’t be shocked by it. It's just the norm.

string.name: c25_f2
string.value: Patience is a virtue, kid. Be patient, and someday I'll do it for you.

string.name: c25_f3
string.value: I do not wish to be disturbed right now.

string.name: c25_f4
string.value: I'm in the middle of a breathing exercise. Do not bother me.

string.name: f1_s
string.value: I had been starving for a while. Great timing.

string.name: f1_f
string.value: What are you doing? I am more than content with what I ate just now. Don't offer me more food.

string.name: f2_s
string.value: Thank you. I have been craving meat for some time.

string.name: f2_f
string.value: Didn't I tell you I do not wish to eat right now? It's things like this that tears our relationship apart.

string.name: f3_f
string.value: I shall never overeat. Didn't your nutritionist tell you that?

string.name: f4_s
string.value: This was much better than expected. I commend you for your great choice of food.

string.name: f4_f
string.value: This is inedible! I am appalled by your lack of taste buds!

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: I get sleepy from sitting down, but...kyu..

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: I should just sit here instead of roaming around~kyu~

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: So I just need to sit here, right, kyu??

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: Keeps making me do the same thing over and over again...anything else? kyu...?

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: Huh? I was thinking of something else for a sec...kyu...

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Master, sitting is waay too easy~!

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: You keep asking me to do some easy thing...KYU~!

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Master, you can't say it right, right? KYU?

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: It's too dirty to sit around here...KYU...

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: I gotta do one for the master every once in a while...

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Now that I sat, you need to feed me~

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: No more of that scary face...please...kyu...

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Man, just letting out on me, kyu!!

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: I wasn't doing anything! WHAT, kyu!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Master, what exactly did I do wrong? KYU!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: You won't find a more obidient pet around you! KYU!

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: I was just sitting there! KYU!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: So you're mad at me cuz you're bored, right?

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: This is too easy for me, key!

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: What do you think, master? I'm good, right? KYU?

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: If my master wants me to...KYU!

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: Hahh...I've just gotte much taller! KYU!

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Ey...I don't wanna do something boring like that...KYU

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Master what do you think? I'm good, right?

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: You won't find a bunny that can stand like I do.

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Now that I'm up like this, I can see things from afar.

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Standing up is sooo easy now...

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Ey...keeps asking me to do the same thing...

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: I can't hear you...I can't hear you.

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: It's still a long way to go before coming out...heh

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: So may people around here, how am I gonna poop in public?? kyu...

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: I just pooped a few min. ago...kyu...

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Ahhhhh...whoa, I almost stepped on it...KYU

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: It's not time to go poop yet...KYU

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Master...pooping should only be at bathrooms...KYU

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: Ahh...the poop looks really good today.

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: Ahh...master you can't step on it!

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Ahhh, that was good...whoa, master...you stepped on it...

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: I can't poop what I didn't eat...

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: Can you poop even if you don't feel like it?

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: I had nothing to eat all day, so no poop for me...

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: I must be constipating right now...

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: Is something wrong with you these days...? Don't worry, I'll be there for you, kyu...

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: When you're buying items, you need to make sure you're not being deceived...kyu...

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: If...you starve me, I may just crawl back into my home...so don't starve me too much...kyu...

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: I love the phrase "I love you" more than anything else in the world! kyu...

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: You ever see a rabbit talk? kyu...

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: I can't talk to you about things...kyu...

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: I have nothing to say to you! kyu...

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I'm in no mood to talk...kyu...

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: How about going from place to place instead of staying at a same place? KYU

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Isn't it not fun playing by yourself? I like hanging out with people...KYU...

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: There's a lot of ppl on this island so make sure you don't forget about being courteous to everyone around you...KYU...

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: I heard there's a dungeon in the middle of this island...KYU...

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I feel like crap, so I won't talk...KYU...

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: We pets are created by Cloy of Henesys.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: I know it's precious, but you need to take those potions while you fight to get stronger fast!

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Go do some quests and something good may happen~

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: There's not much to say but...feed me!

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: So annoying...I have nothing to say...

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: I'm tired, so I'll tell you later...

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: NO! You haven't showered in days! kyu...

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Master, I'll go hug you up~! Kyu!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Master, I can feel your heartbeat~! KYU!

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: Master...please go take shower right now!

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: NO~! I don't want to hug you! KYU!

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: I like how you embrace me, master

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: Master? You really think I'll hug you up?

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: And you were scolding me just now...

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: If you feed me, I will

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: Master, you smell! I don't wanna hug you~

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Play time~ Play time! PLAY TIME!!

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Who sleeps in the middle of the day...kyu?

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: Ahh...I'm sleepy...master, give me your arm as my pillow...kyu...

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: Please don't have delicious food all to yourself while I'm asleep...kyu...

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: Master! I feel fine~! Hang out with me!

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: If you sing me a song, then I'll fall asleep.

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: You know you're gonna write all over my face while I fall asleep...

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: I can't sleep cuz I'm hungry! FOOD! FOOD!

string.name: c26_s3
string.value: Really? Nice! I feel good~ kyu~

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: That wasn't for me, right? kyu?

string.name: c26_f4
string.value: That was a typo, right? kyu?

string.name: c27_s1
string.value: I love you too, master! KYU!

string.name: c27_s4
string.value: Hehe...I'm gonna tell everyone about this...KYU!

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: Master, I know you're lying. KYU!

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: You're just saying that, right? KYU?

string.name: c28_f2
string.value: One minute you're all over me, now you say you love me...

string.name: c28_f3
string.value: If you love me, how come you aren't feeding me?

string.name: c28_f4
string.value: You think I'll fall for it again...?

string.name: f4_s
string.value: Master this is soooo delicious! Kyu!

string.name: s2
string.value: Kyuu~ I am NOT gonna say that!

string.name: s3
string.value: I am definately not a bad rabbit!

string.name: s4
string.value: Don't make me say those words~

string.name: c1_s2
string.value: Awesome. I don't even need a chair!

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: How did you know I needed some rest?

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: Not a Husky, dude. Try again.

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: The ground is a bit cold...perfect!

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Time to kick my feet up and chill.

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: My feet are going to be nothing but bones--wait. Never mind.

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Let me know how that works out for you.

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: You want to play "let's count sand'? No thanks.

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: These feet were made for stalkin'!

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: The ground is a bit cold...perfect!

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Time to kick my feet up and chill.

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: My feet are going to be nothing but bones--wait. Never mind.

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Let me know how that works out for you.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: You want to play "let's count sand'? No thanks.

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: These feet were made for stalkin'!

string.value: I have short legs, so it's easy to sit~ Woof woof!

string.value: You want me to sit? Here... this is the right way, right?

string.value: Ahh... itchy... (acting like I didn't hear it...)

string.value: Sitting is waaaay too easy. Give me something harder.

string.value: Master! Things like that happen at times... why so mad? Woof woof!

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: I didn't do anything wrong! Woof woof!

string.value: Rrrr... master's not happy over nothing...

string.value: I'll be better... bark... much better...

string.value: I'm hurt inside... pretty bad... bark...

string.value: How can you say such thing... bark...

string.value: What's your hobby? Hopefully it's something that involves me... hehe... bark!

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: I heard in one of the hidden streets at Henesys ther's a huuuuuge mushroom called Mushmom, am I right? bark!

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: How's a dog supposed to talk? bark!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: NO! Don't feel like talking! Bark bark!!

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: I have nothing to say to you! Bark!

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I feel like crap! Bark bark!!!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Please change the menu every once in a while... I'm sick of eating the same thing over and over again...

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Every once in a while, I feel like riding a boat to some other island... woof woof~

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: How are you today? Good? Right? Good!! Woof woof!

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: You better be careful not to get ripped off when doing business with someone else... woof woof...

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: I have nothing to say... woof...

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: Don't feel like talking... I'm really depressed... woof woof...

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: I'm depressed... everything's annoying... don't feel like talking... woof...

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: What's the menu for today? Can I get something nice?

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Master, you have a huge head! hahha

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: You look like you've got yourself quite a belly there... haha

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Ey... how about feeding me right now?

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: So annoying~~must have nothing to do right now...

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: Man... do I have to talk again? Don't feel like it...

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: What do you think? Good? GOOD? Bark bark!!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Well, I'm smart. What can I say? Bark bark!!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Sweeet! Here, what do you think? Bark bark!

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: No! I wanna do something else! Bark bark!

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: I don't know what you're saying!!! Bark!!

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Can't understand what you're saying! Bark bark!

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: You have a short tongue, right? I have noooo idea what you're saying! Bark bark!

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Master, that was good, right? Right? Woof woof!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Hehe... this is really easy~ Woof woof!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: I'll do whatever you ask me to do! Woof woof!!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Master, is this how you do it? Woof woof!!

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: Just feed me first! Woof woof!!

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: The floor's too dirty so I don't want to do that! Woof!

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: Why don't you lie on your belly first! Woof...!

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: You show me first!! Woof woof!

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: Like... this? I'm just going to do this once...

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: Master, I did well... right? Right?

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: Like this, huh? Whatever you ask me to do...

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: Hey master! I won't do everything you ask me to do...!

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: Master! I'm hungry. just feed me!!

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: Like this? Woof woof...this is hard...

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: Whoa...the air's much cleaner up here... woof~!

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: My... my legs are short, that's why it's hard... woof!

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: I won't do it... woof woof!

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: How am I supposed to get up with these legs? Woof woof!

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: Hey master, but I can't walk on two feet...

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: Whoa... with these shorties?? I'm incredible, yo!!

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: Maybe if I get fed right now...

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: With these short legs, I can't even stand on four feet well..

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: Is the master trying to put me on showcase for a circus??

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: Can't be asking too much from a dog...

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: What did you just say? bark bark...

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: That's MY MASTER, ladies and gentlemen...

string.name: c27_s3
string.value: I love you too master~! Woof woof!

string.name: c27_s4
string.value: Hehe... I feel good... woof woof!

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: I know you're lying, master... woof woof!

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: I was thinking of something else... and I didn't hear it... woof...

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: You think I'll like you back? Woof...

string.name: c28_s1
string.value: I love you too master very very much!!

string.name: c28_s3
string.value: You better love me and no one else!!!

string.name: c28_f2
string.value: Everyone knows that's just a token gesture...

string.name: c28_f3
string.value: And then the master will go off on me later...

string.name: c28_f4
string.value: You think I'll fall for that again...?

string.name: c32_s1
string.value: Haha! Just tell me what to do, and I'll do it!

string.name: c32_s3
string.value: This is waay too easy! Bark!

string.name: c32_f2
string.value: We huskies don't have hands! Bark!

string.name: c32_f3
string.value: I don't want to do it~ bark!

string.name: f2_f
string.value: I'm so full I can't eat anymore... woof...

string.name: f3_s
string.value: Master, this is really delicious! Woof woof...

string.name: f3_f
string.value: Master, I can't eat anymore... woof woof...

string.name: s3
string.value: Don't make me say bad words! Woof!

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: Maybe you should have a rest too Master!

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: How about a song as well?

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Don't you ever want to do anything else?

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: I can't understand a word you say!

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: How did you know I wanted to rest?

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: I need to take a rest now!

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: You are the best master ever!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: I don't want to sit here.

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: No... All this lying around is making me fat....

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Hey, it's something I'm good at!

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: I am getting fat because of all this resting!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Don't you want to play with me?

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: Don't look at me like that!

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: I will be better, really... Kiii…

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Master I won't do it again...

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: I'm good, you're bad... Yes that's it!

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Bad! You don't love me anymore!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I'm the most obedient pet around! AHHH!

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: One more of that and I'll ignore you!

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: Ahh… I must have drank too much.

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: You expect me to pee in public?

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: No, I don't need to now.

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Ahhh I feel so much better...

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: Wow! I must have drank a lot!

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: I don't feel like it! ARP! ARP!

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: It isn't nice for a monkey to pee here…

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Ah that is what I call real Monkey Business!

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: How am I supposed to pee when you didn't even feed me?

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: Why don't you pee in public too?

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Don't you have anything better to do than asking me to pee all the time?

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Ah, that's so nice of you!

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: Then why don't you feed me?

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Hmm, I feel all warm inside.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: I love you too! Give me a hug!

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: I don't think that you do!

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: You're referring to somebody else, right?

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: You're the best Master I could hope for!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I love you too! what about going for a hunt together?

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: I sure am a lucky monkey!

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: I love eating more than I love you!

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Are you sure? You haven't hugged me for ages!

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: You probably love your new weapon more!

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: I don't feel like it right now.

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: I can stand! I can stand!

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: I'll stand if you feed me!

string.name: c24_s1
string.value: Have you ever seen a monkey standing so straight?

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: Look Master! I'm good at this!

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: I did it! Master! I'm standing!

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: Can't you see I'm already standing?

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: Monkeys don't stand... we hang by our tails!

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: I'm tired from running after you all day!

string.name: c25_s1
string.value: I think I see some food over there…

string.name: c25_s2
string.value: I love it when you talk to me! Ki ki…

string.name: c25_s4
string.value: I love you master! Do you love me too?

string.name: c25_f2
string.value: I have nothing to say at all.

string.name: c26_s1
string.value: You can do quest instead of just killing monsters all the time.

string.name: c26_s2
string.value: Monkey's are the best pet there is, I think so anyway…

string.name: c26_s3
string.value: Don't you hate people that don't take care of their pets?

string.name: c26_s4
string.value: If you don't feed me, I'll go back home and not come out!

string.name: c26_f1
string.value: It is rude to wake a monkey from its sleep! ARP!

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: What's a monkey got to say?

string.name: c26_f4
string.value: I have nothing to say to you! ARP! ARP!

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: If you don't keep me fed, I'll run away to the circus!

string.name: c27_s3
string.value: If you buy me a meso magnet and item pouch I can collect all your loot for you!

string.name: c27_s4
string.value: Please try to appreciate me while I'm around, I don't live forever you know?

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: What do you expect me to tell you when I'm always following you around?

string.name: c27_f2
string.value: Don't you have any other things to do?

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: Why don't you talk to someone else?

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: I'm sure you can find someone else to talk to.

string.name: c29_s2
string.value: I want to play all day long!

string.name: c29_f1
string.value: How about we go somewhere else first?

string.name: c29_f2
string.value: Can't you see I'm busy now?

string.name: c29_f3
string.value: Feed me first... then I will think about it.

string.name: c30_f1
string.value: But I'm too hungry to play…

string.name: c31_f1
string.value: Who sleeps in the middle of the day? Not me!

string.name: c31_f3
string.value: How can I sleep on an empty tummy?

string.name: c32_s2
string.value: Yawn... It is time for bed…

string.name: c32_f1
string.value: I'm not sleepy, I want to climb trees!

string.name: c32_f3
string.value: I'm not as lazy as you think Master...

string.name: c32_f4
string.value: If you don't want to train, I'll just go alone!

string.name: f4_s
string.value: Master! I like this a lot!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: Master... are you trying to stuff me?

string.name: s3
string.value: I thought you were a better Master than that!

string.name: s4
string.value: Oh no! I can't hear such bad words!

string.name: c1_s2
string.value: The ground is nice and warm here.

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: Trying to lure me into a trap? I don't think so.

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: No pillow, so I can't sit.

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: You picked the perfect time to relax, Master!

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Time to chill. Got any Mapleade?

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: All I need now is a snack...

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Look a bit closer, you'll see why I'm not sitting.

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Did you see the sign? "Porcupines forbidden to sit".

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: If only I had a chair...

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Somehow, I will blame you for this.

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Quit looking at me like that.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Nonsense-you told me to do it!

string.name: c5_f4
string.value: No way is this my fault, no way!

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: Don't be mad with me, Master!

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Blaming me again? I refuse to cover for you this time!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Wait, I have something for you...the world's smallest violin.

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: When in a fit, just knit!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: I'll finish the socks I was making for you!

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: I just got the best cloth...

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: You threw away the last thing I made...

string.name: c9_s1
string.value: I got a new design to show you!

string.name: c9_s2
string.value: Time to make my Master a new pair of undies!

string.name: c9_s4
string.value: Maybe I'll make you a pair of pants...

string.name: c9_f1
string.value: How about a sock...in the mouth?

string.name: c9_f2
string.value: If the knit don't fit, it's time to quit!

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: What do you think I am, an animal?

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: I hope someone steps in it!

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: There's some on your shoe if you're looking for it.

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: You want me to stink up the joint? No!

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Nothing compares to the feeling of a great dump. Nothing!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Let me show you how to make a "prickly bush".

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: This is as good a spot as any...

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Fresh out. Try back later-like after dinner.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: I could end battles with this gas...

string.name: c13_s1
string.value: When the going gets tough, the tough get going!

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: Do not ever mistake me for a hedgehog.

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: The Mapler next to me is almost broke.

string.name: c13_s4
string.value: Doesn't that guy owe you money?

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: I charge 5000 mesos per word. Pay up.

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: No time like the present! Let's go!

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: I could get used to this...

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: You never know what's around the corner-be prepared!

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: I'll talk when golden pigs fly.

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: My spikes are sharp-if you lean close, I can give you a shave.

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: I love it when you level!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: When the going gets tough, I've seen you run away. Fast.

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: You don't need a breath mint, you just need to get socked in the face with a mint glove.

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Say something? How about "I'm not talking right now?"

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Put your mesos where your mouth is!

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: There is no spark in our relationship.

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Amusing. Do you do tricks, too?

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: I can see it in your eyes...it's not true!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: I've waited so long to hear you say that!

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Your love keeps me going, Master!

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: I love you just as much!

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: I can feel a spark-no, wait. Something was in my foot...

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: How funny! HAHAH-wait, you were serious?

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I've got a lotta love to spread around!

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: Let's not and say we did.

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: I feel a bit uncomfortable now...

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: I should throw one at you...

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: I've got all the pins you need!

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: Why do you hurt me so?

string.name: c25_f2
string.value: I got plenty of sleep last night.

string.name: c26_f4
string.value: The ground is cold and hard, I'm not sleeping here!

string.name: c27_s3
string.value: *YAWN* I think I'm ready for bed.

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: So now you notice I'm tired?

string.name: c27_f2
string.value: No way, you're going to try something.

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: Yea, right, sleep. I don't need any.

string.name: c29_s1
string.value: I knew I could do it!

string.name: c29_f1
string.value: Your orders aren't exactly clear you know...

string.name: c29_f2
string.value: You talk, I ignore you-it’s a great combo!

string.name: c29_f3
string.value: Who's the brains behind this operation again?

string.name: c29_f4
string.value: I guarantee this is your fault.

string.name: c30_s4
string.value: I'm a stickler for perfection. HA!

string.name: c30_f3
string.value: Porcupines do not speak that language.

string.name: c31_s2
string.value: Tell me how good I look...

string.name: c31_f2
string.value: What do I look like? A store?

string.name: c31_f3
string.value: You need more than a comb.

string.name: c31_f4
string.value: It's mine, and you can't have it.

string.name: c32_s2
string.value: Got a camera? I'm going to strike a pose.

string.name: c32_s3
string.value: I love being one of the beautiful people!

string.name: c32_f4
string.value: You can't have mine, get your own.

string.name: c33_f2
string.value: I need coconut milk before I do anything.

string.name: c33_f3
string.value: Have you fed your porcupine today?

string.name: c34_s4
string.value: I love to play with this ball!

string.name: c35_f1
string.value: Ninja do not reveal themselves in the day time.

string.name: c35_f2
string.value: What make you think I can do that?

string.name: c35_f4
string.value: Try again. This time with FEELING!

string.name: c36_f3
string.value: And I would do this because...

string.name: f1_f
string.value: Um, did you run over that?

string.name: f4_f
string.value: But I'm not hungry..I don't want to eat!! Waahhh!!

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: It’s good to be sitting down~ kyoho~♬

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: That's so easy~ Is this what you want? Kyo!

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: Did you think I would do as you told me to? Kyokyo~

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: No~ I don't want to sit down!

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: I feel like standing today! Kyo~♬

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: I’m sitting! Am I good or what?

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: I’m so pretty and I do as I'm told~ kyo~♬

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Phew~ It’s good to be sitting down~ Kyo~♪

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: I want to stay sitting! Kyokyokyo~♬

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Kyokyo! Sometimes I just want to be disobedient!

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: Kyo! I just don’t want to do it!

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: Kyo~ There’s nothing I can’t do!

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Let’s take a break. We’re already sitting anyway.

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: That's so easy~ Is this what you want? Kyo!

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: I don’t want to sit today! Kyohohong~

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Sometimes I just want to stand!

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Ha! Did you think I’d do it just because you told me to? Kyokyo!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: You sit down yourself! Kyokyo~ I bet you’re mad~

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: I’m so small, there’s no where to smack me~ Kyooong

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: I was bad this time. Kyohohoho~

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: I didn’t do anything wrong... Kyoho~

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: I’m so small and cute. How can you scold me! Kyoaaang!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: I’m going to be bad! KyooKyokyo!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: What? How dare you scold me! Kyoho~

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: Don’t be angry at me~ Kyohaaang

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: It hurts when you hit me~♪Don’t be angry~♬

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: I was bad... Did you think I’d say that? Kyohohot!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Why did you hit me! What did I do wrong?

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Ha! Did you think I would just stand here and get smacked? Kyohoho~

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: I can’t believe you got mad at me! I will not forgive you! Kyoho!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: Sob sob, I'll never do it again~ kyoho~

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Why are you doing this to me~ kyoaaang~

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Forgive me. I’ll be your obedient cutie~ kyoo♪

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: How dare you scold me? Kyohohot! You'll pay for this!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: Kyohaaak! How dare you get mad at me! I will not forgive you!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Kyohoho! Did you just get mad at me?

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: How dare you get mad at me! I’ll just! Run away~

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: Hahaha, it feels so great~ kyoo~♬

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: Hey~ You’re embarrassing me. Stop looking~ kyokyo~♪

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: I don’t feel like going right now~ kyoo~~♪

string.name: c10_f3

string.value: I have to poop if you say so~ kyo~(...poop~)

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: I don’t feel like pooping right now~ kyoo~~

string.value: What am I supposed to do? I don’t feel like pooping! Kyohohoho!

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: No no~ I don’t feel like pooping~

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Pooping isn’t something that can be done when you tell me too~ kyoo~

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: If you want me to, anytime! Pooop~

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Pooop~ poop poop! That feels great~ Kyoo~♪

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: I don’t poop anywhere anymore! Kyooo~

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: It’s not right to poop anywhere! Kyokyokyo!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I don’t feel like pooping! Kyohohoho!

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Kyohoho! I’m not going to poop!

string.value: I love you|I like you|My love

string.value: But I don’t like you. Kyokyo~

string.value: I love you|I like you|My love

string.value: I love you~ I love you~~

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Kyo~ I'm a little embarrassed to say this... Me too~~

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Kyokyo~ I’ll pretend I didn’t hear you.

string.name: c16
string.value: I love you|I like you|My love

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: I can speak well, too~ kyokyo~♪

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: Ah~ I’d like to play the guitar~ kyokyo~

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: I don’t feel like talking right now! Kyoho~

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: What do you want me to say! Kyooo~

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: Can’t you just leave me alone?

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: I hope you get a lot of good items! Kyokyo~♪

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: I think I am too cute! Kyokyo~♬

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Kyokyo~ shall I sing a song to the guitar music? Kyokyo~♬

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: I want to fly in the sky~ kyokyo~♬

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: Why don’t you just go and hunt?

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: Did you think that I would just chatter away?

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: Kyo! I don’t want to speak!

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Sometimes I just don't feel like speaking~ Kyohohoho!

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: I’m pretty, I’m cute and I can even speak very well! Kyokyo~~♬

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: I sing better than I talk~ Shall I sing a song? Kyohoho~~♬

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Don’t you think we make great conversation?

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Kyokyo! I’d rather sing than talk~ Kyoo~♪Kyo~♬

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: I just want to rest~ kyo~♪

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: Kyokyo! I just want to rest!

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Kyokyo~ Stop giving me so many orders!

string.value: Kyokyo~ I was just feeling sleepy! Kyohoho~

string.value: I’m going to sleep, don’t wake me~ Kyo~♬

string.value: I don’t want to sleep right now!

string.value: I want to sleep at home! Kyooo~

string.value: I want to play some more! Kyokyo~

string.name: c20_f4

string.name: c21
string.value: Let’s sleep|You must be sleepy|Zz|Good night

string.value: Kyo~ I’m going to sleep~ Keep hunting hard and get some new items!

string.value: Let’s go to sleep together! Kyooo~

string.value: Kyokyo! But I want to play~

string.value: I don’t usually do this, but I’ll do it especially for you! Kyokyo!

string.value: I don’t feel like transforming! Kyo!

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: This is not the time for that! Kyo!

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: Just go and do some hunting! Kyokyo!

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: What? I can’t hear you! Kyokyo!

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: I succeeded at transforming in time with the rhythm. Kyokyo~♪

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: Why don’t you just go and hunt? Kyo!

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: I will not do everything you tell me to! Kyo!

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: It’s not something I can do all the time!

string.name: f2_f
string.value: Kyokyo~ I don’t have an appetite! Kyooo~

string.name: f3_s
string.value: Kyo~ I’ll eat the delicious food and be a better pet~♬

string.name: f3_f
string.value: Give me something more tasty~ kyo~

string.name: f4_s
string.value: Kyokyo! It’s so delicious that I feel like I might fly away~♬

string.name: s2
string.value: I will not say that. Kyo!

string.name: s3
string.value: I are you making me say things like that! Kyo!

string.name: s4
string.value: You should be punished for saying that! Kyoot!

string.name: c1_s2
string.value: Hey, let's not get mean here!

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: How can you say such a thing!

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: ...my love for you melts with each tear...

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Joke? You didn't mean it... right?

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: I am so hurt right now...

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Do you really not like me?

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Watch that mouth--unless you want a snowball in it.

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: You need a new haircut, but I'm not saying anything.

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Do you really not like me? That was mean...

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Think snowballs don't hurt? Say that again and find out.

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: I hear Maple Claws is bringing you coal this year...

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: I'm so hot right now, I feel like melting!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: You just told me you loved me!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: I don’t know what love is.

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: Now that just made my day~

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: Ahhhh... nothing feels quite like being loved~

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Thank you... for loving me so much!

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: I love you too! It's the holiday spirit!

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: You should only say that to someone you really love.

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: You just told me you didn't like me!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: I know you love me. I can feel it~

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: That just made me feel awesome... I feel like flying~~

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: I love you too~ Tis the season of love!

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: You just love me for my snow.

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: I'm too cold to appreciate that.

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Sorry, the snowman you're trying to reach isn't here. Leave a message after the beep... BEEP.

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: I've been waiting for this! Merry Christmas!

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: Did you get some nice Christmas presents?

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: I've been good this year. I hope Maple Claws will give me some presents this year!

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: Hope you get some awesome Christmas presents this year!

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: Christmas is upon is, and I hope you find your true love this year!

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: No presents? Then feed me--we'll call it even.

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Merry Christmas to your friends and family!

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Did you get a lot of presents?

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Hope you enjoy a very Merry Christmas!

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: You can celebrate later. Let's do something else now.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: And you didn't get me anything. Sometimes I wonder where you are in this relationship.

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: No presents? Are you kidding me?

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Advice: Snowman + Christmas + No Presents = Failure.

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: What do you think of my eyes? Aren't they just adorable?

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: I'll do some cutesy stuff, as long as you give me some presents~

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Get me the latest copy of Snowman Styles, and I'll do it.

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: Um...just because you said so? Please.

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: What do you want me to do?

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: The best I got right now...

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: You like? I think I'm pretty cute...

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: I'm tired. I need some rest.

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: You know you like me~ I like you too!

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: You know what's cute? Balrogs. Let's go hunt some!

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: Yeah, whatever. You just want something from me...

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: I just want to rest. Maybe later.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: What are you doing? I did nothing wrong.

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: Say it again! SAY. IT. AGAIN.

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: I won't ever do it again...

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Do you want me to hit you with a snowball?

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: That's it. Let's take this outside.

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: I won't ever do it aga--hahahaha! Sorry, couldn't hold it in.

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: I dare you to say that again!

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Please forgive me. It's really my fault.

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: I'll be good. I'm a good snowman.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: I won't go against you. I'll behave.

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: I am not in a good mood. Don’t push me.

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: If you keep doing that, I'll throw some snowballs at you.

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: I double dare you to say that again!

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Did you get a lot of Christmas presents?

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Winter's the best time of the year. I hate summer...

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: I don't talk just because you tell me to.

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: You don’t have friends, right? Why do you keep bothering me?

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: I'm right at home in El Nath!

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: You're such an awesome friend. Let's go hunting!

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: Am I the only friend you have?

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: Hah... no, I won't say anything.

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: I don't feel like talking. Let's go hunting.

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: I'm so cool...sorry, I had to!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: Loved by many, appreciated by few. That's the life of a snowman for you.

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Isn't Christmas awesome? What do you feel like getting?

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: Are you bored? Well, I'm not.

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: If you hang out with me more, then I'll talk.

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: How many Caramel Onions did you eat? I can smell your breath from here!

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: You told me to talk, and here you are, not listening. I'm hurt.

string.name: c24_s1
string.value: I'm tired... I need some sleep.

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: We did hunt a lot today... let's get some sleep.

string.value: How did you know I was tired?

string.name: c25_f1
string.value: Hey, I was dozing off until now! I wanna play!

string.name: c26_s2
string.value: I am soooo tired right now... zzzzz

string.name: c26_f1
string.value: I can't sleep. Let's go somewhere!

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: I can't sleep! I am too excited about those presents!

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: Did you see it? Or was it too fast for you?

string.name: c27_s3
string.value: What do you think? Don't I look awesome?

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: I refuse to change on an empty stomach.

string.name: c28_s1
string.value: I can do that! Look at me!!!

string.name: c28_s2
string.value: Pay attention, because you might miss it!

string.name: c28_s3
string.value: Nice, huh? There's nothing quite like it!

string.name: c28_f1
string.value: Why? Because you said so? Pfft...

string.name: c28_f2
string.value: Why don't you do it for once? There's a change for you!

string.name: c28_f3
string.value: Think it's that easy? I'd like to see you try!

string.value: Awesome! There's nothing quite like icicles!

string.name: f3_s
string.value: Oh yeah! I love people that feed me!

string.name: f3_f
string.value: This is nasty. Do I look like a Turkey to you?

string.value: No! No! Kino don't wanna sit!

string.value: Arooo...Why doing this to cute Kino?

string.value: How dare you to be mad at Kino. Aroo!

string.value: Arrrr~ Don't be mad at Kino.

string.value: How dare you to be mad at Kino. Aroo!

string.value: How dare you to be mad at Kino. Aroo!

string.value: Nothing is better than relex chair.

string.value: Kino wanna relex in relex chair!
