string.value: I think it's time for me to get some rest. Sigh...

string.name: c25_s4
string.value: Let's have a shut eye for a second.

string.name: c25_f1
string.value: It's not time yet. You go sleep first.

string.name: c25_f2
string.value: I am not ready to sleep yet. I'm ready to fire away!

string.name: c25_f3
string.value: You always tell me to sleep.

string.name: c25_f4
string.value: I don't feel like sleeping right now.

string.name: c26_s1
string.value: Oh no, it's time already. Time to go to bed!

string.name: c26_s4
string.value: That was a long day. Good night!

string.name: c26_f1
string.value: Hey isn't it too early to go to bed?

string.name: c26_f2
string.value: I don’t sleep! Just replace the batteries for me!

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: I am too full to sleep!

string.name: c26_f4
string.value: I'll sleep later. You go ahead.

string.name: c27_s1
string.value: Lend me an arm so I can sleep on it!

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: Your voice is like a lullaby...

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: Isn't it way too early for bed?

string.name: c27_f2
string.value: I don't want to get fat by sleeping all the time.

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: I heard too much sleeping will kill you...seriously...

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: I need to level up! I have no time to sleep!

string.name: f2_s
string.value: That was good. I am full now!

string.name: f3_f
string.value: Seriously...do I look like someone that's hungry?

string.name: f4_s
string.value: My level of contentment has just increased.

string.name: f4_f
string.value: My level of discontent has just increased. Buzz off.

string.name: s4
string.value: If you say bad words, I am gonna ban you!

string.name: e_HPAlert
string.value: Hey you might die now. Go get some potions.

string.name: e_NOHPPotion
string.value: I don't think you have the HP potions. I can't feed you what you don't have.

string.name: e_NOMPPotion
string.value: I don't think you have the MP potions. I can't feed you what you don't have.
I feel like crap right now...
So breezy around here...ahhh, I like it.
I want a pudding that looks like a slime!
I feel off right now. I want to go to the Sleepywood Sauna for some rest. You know you can recover HP and MP much faster there, right?
Don't you think I'm the bomb?
No one can duplicate items or mesos. Watch out for those crooks!
Password? I won't tell you mine! Of course not!

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: Kling klang! At your command, master.

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: Kling klang! Just input the right command, and I'll do the rest.

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: Perfect command. You are a computer master! Kling klang!

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: Beep beep! An error has occurred.

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: Kling klang! I won't site until you sit first.

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: An error has occurred! Please double check the command. Beep! Beep!

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: "Sit" is such a great keyword for all pets... Kling klang!

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Oh oops! I almost farted while sitting down. Kling klang!

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: You know exactly what I want. I really wanted to sit right now...

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Hmmm...an important program that lets me sit is corrupt. I can't do it..heh

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: I want to talk today, master, beep beep!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Beep beep! Grrr...I can't move right now due to an error.

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: Make me move first. I don't see a lot of effort on your part.

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Ahhhh!! I almost cramped up my legs.

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Like this? Precise commands yield smart pets like me.

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: I feel too weak to stand.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: You just told me to sit. Jeez! Make up your mind!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: How many times do I have to tell you? You're saying it all wrong!

string.name: c5_s3
string.value: I'm in tip top shape right now. I'll follow your command.

string.name: c5_f2
string.value: Beep beep beep...ahh I gotta just sit.

string.name: c5_f3
string.value: My body's not functioning right today. Just let it go.

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: Master, you have been verified! Will stand now!

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Are you my master? Enter your ID and PW.

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: Are you trying to get another pet with a different color? I can read your mind, you know.

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Due to system overload, I cannot process commands for the rest of the day. Time for me to rest.

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: I want love and affection from my master. What's wrong with you?

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: You are a bigger dummy than I am.

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Who? What? What did you say?

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: If you say so...then it is so...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: I am a fool for your love, master.

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: I don't understand what you're saying.

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Now you're saying this. Do I look that easy?

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Unrecognizable word. I don't know what you're talking about.

string.name: c9_s2
string.value: I may be dumb, but I still follow your commands.

string.name: c9_s3
string.value: If I got fixed on time...I'd be the best robot in this world.

string.name: c9_s4
string.value: Stupid...? What do I need, a virus scan? Run it right now!

string.name: c9_f1
string.value: Master, you must be afraid of me.

string.name: c9_f2
string.value: First time hearing it. I can't find the resulting value for that command.

string.name: c9_f3
string.value: If you don't like me... then oh well, good riddance.

string.name: c9_f4
string.value: An error has occurred. Please leave. Beep beep!

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: What did I do wrong...? Shooooo...

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: I won't do that again. Please love me. Shooooo...

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: I'm sorry. I'll be better next time. Shooooo...

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: I'm only doing this to catch your attention. Shoooo...

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: What did you just say? I didn't do anything wrong!

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: My ears hurt... Stop nagging on me, master!!!

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: I hate you! You keep ragging on me for no reason!

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: Is that some foreign language? I don't understand a word of what you're saying...

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: I'm sorry...I didn't do that on purpose.

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: Are you really mad? I'm sorry...

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Are you messing with me? What did I do wrong?

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: So you're in a bad mood...that doesn't mean you can go off on me like that!

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: I have no idea what you're saying right now.

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: I did nothing wrong! It's all you!!

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: That was my bad. I won't ever do that again.

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: I'll do better now. Please don't hate me!

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: Are you just trying to pick something with me?

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Master, you need to loosen up a bit!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Seriously, it's really not that serious.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: I was trying to apologize, but I don't like your attitude.

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: Don't you like how I do all this for you?

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: Wow, you really want to hold my hand?

string.name: c13_f1
string.value: Hands? I only have feet... Shoooo...

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: Do I have to give you my hand when you're asking for it? Nah...

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: Are you trying to play rock paper and scissors?

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Am I sweet or what? Love me!!!

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Master, aren't you the nice one!

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: Here...I think my right hand looks better than left.

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: You don't even help me get a pedicure on my nails.

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: Here! Please help me get a pedicure.

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: I'm sleepy...why are you asking this to me?

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: I know what you mean. I understand...

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: You were scolding me just now, and now you love me? Whatever.

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: Have you been secretly liking me for a while?

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Seriously, is that all you got? Find another way to say that.

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: I think you're really into me now. Muahahaha.

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: Oh wow, my face is turning red.

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: I really really love you, too.

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: What? What did you say? I didn't hear you.

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: Do you need me for a favor? I won't do it.

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I love someone else. I'm sorry.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Wow...I can feel your love penetrating through my heart...

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: I love you, master! I really do!

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: I don't feel the love. I'm hungry.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I thought you were dating someone. Pssshhh..

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: You're empty handed. You expect me to accept you without anything?

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: I've heard that quite often, but...you're not my type.

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: I know I have a luscious voice. If you really want to hear it...ahem.

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: I want to talk to other people, too.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: I am a robot. That's it.

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: I need to be greased up. I feel clunky.

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: You said that I was too loud. Sheesh, make up your mind.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: I want to go see other places. Take me take me!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Really...I can't stand you... NOT! You know I love you.

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Who are you? And who am i??

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: I want something delicious...and I want a shirt or two...Can you pay for them?

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: I have nothing to say...why don't you say something instead?

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: I am tired! I talked a lot! It's your turn!

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: I have a wish...will you do it for me?

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: You are an awesome friend of mine! Thanks!!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: So you haven't forgotten me...we need more time to talk like this!

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: Wow...why does it feel like whenever you ask me to say something, I get tired all of a sudden?

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: What? What did you say? I didn't hear you.

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: I don't feel like talking right now. Maybe some other time.

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: Shhhh...I can't say this right now. I'll tell you later.

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: Boom chiki! Boom chiki! Ready to fire!

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: Don't I look awesome like this?

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: I'm ready now. Just say go!

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: Move everyone! Mad robot in town!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Target in play. Ready to fire.

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: Guns ready. Arms ready. Legs ready. Let's roll!

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: Beep! Beep! Sigh, I'm too old now.

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: I AM TIRED! Let me just sleep.

string.name: c24_s1
string.value: Okay, which weapon should I use?

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: Look at this posture. Isn't it awesome? No one will be able to go up against me!

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: I've been waiting for a day like this! Ready for attack!

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: What? What do you want me to do?

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: Where's my weapon? I can't find it!

string.name: c25_s2
string.value: I think it's time for me to get some rest. Sigh...

string.name: c25_s4
string.value: Let's have a shut eye for a second.

string.name: c25_f1
string.value: It's not time yet. You go sleep first.

string.name: c25_f2
string.value: I am not ready to sleep yet. I'm ready to fire away!

string.name: c25_f3
string.value: You always tell me to sleep.

string.name: c25_f4
string.value: I don't feel like sleeping right now.

string.name: c26_s1
string.value: Oh no, it's time already. Time to go to bed!

string.name: c26_s4
string.value: That was a long day. Good night!

string.name: c26_f1
string.value: Hey isn't it too early to go to bed?

string.name: c26_f2
string.value: I don’t sleep! Just replace the batteries for me!

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: I am too full to sleep!

string.name: c26_f4
string.value: I'll sleep later. You go ahead.

string.name: c27_s1
string.value: Lend me an arm so I can sleep on it!

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: Your voice is like a lullaby...

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: Isn't it way too early for bed?

string.name: c27_f2
string.value: I don't want to get fat by sleeping all the time.

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: I heard too much sleeping will kill you...seriously...

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: I need to level up! I have no time to sleep!

string.name: f2_s
string.value: That was good. I am full now!

string.name: f3_f
string.value: Seriously...do I look like someone that's hungry?

string.name: f4_s
string.value: My level of contentment has just increased.

string.name: f4_f
string.value: My level of discontent has just increased. Buzz off.

string.name: s4
string.value: If you say bad words, I am gonna ban you!

string.name: e_HPAlert
string.value: Hey you might die now. Go get some potions.

string.name: e_NOHPPotion
string.value: I don't think you have the HP potions. I can't feed you what you don't have.

string.name: e_NOMPPotion
string.value: I don't think you have the MP potions. I can't feed you what you don't have.
I feel like crap right now...
So breezy around here...ahhh, I like it.
I want a pudding that looks like a slime!
I feel off right now. I want to go to the Sleepywood Sauna for some rest. You know you can recover HP and MP much faster there, right?
Don't you think I'm the bomb?
No one can duplicate items or mesos. Watch out for those crooks!
Password? I won't tell you mine! Of course not!

string.name: c1_f2
string.value: What do you want from me?

string.name: c1_f4
string.value: Sigh...I don't feel like sitting down.

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: I do like sitting down from time to time! Roar!!

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: Do I have to sit when you tell me to sit?

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: I love how my master can't stand the pet being overworked. You're the best!

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: I was just getting really tired. Let's have a seat and share a glass of gasoline.

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Ohhh! How did you know I love sitting down? That was awesome!

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: A true pet knows how to sit properly. That's my forte, you know.

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Hey, you know I'm the rarest pet around...EVER. Don't disrespect me like that!

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Haha... why don't you sit down first. You have no manners.

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: I don't have that command in my system.

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: Sit? Well, if you bring something to sit on, then I'll think about it.

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: I'm sorry for being so dumb...

string.name: c5_s1
string.value: Why do you hate me, master?

string.name: c5_s2
string.value: That just breaks my metal heart...

string.name: c5_s3
string.value: Yes I am a fool...for your love.

string.name: c5_f1
string.value: If you hate me, why don't you just let me go? Roar!!

string.name: c5_f2
string.value: I knew you'd say that, so I removed that from my system. Muahaha!

string.name: c5_f3
string.value: Nah, I don't like you either.

string.name: c5_f4
string.value: Are you out of your mind? I am not the kind of a pet you'd want to mess with!

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: If the master tells me I'm stupid... then I'm stupid!

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: I think the bolt number 7 on my head is loose. Can you tighten it a little?

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: I was once a robot with a lot of promise... if only I was regularly checked up.

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: Despite all that, you're still all I've got!

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Are you looking down on me for being a pet? Roar roar!

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: System error! Please re-enter the command.

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: Who are you to tell me that I'm stupid? lol

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Did you forget the fact that I'm the rarest pet of all time? Sheesh...

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Hey you, do you think you are in position to scold me?

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: I want to be loved...sniff sniff...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: I'm sorry...I won't do that again!

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Roar! Roar! What are you saying?

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Roar roar! Say it in plain English!!!

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: What did I do wrong? Tell me!!

string.name: c9_s1
string.value: It's all my fault, master! Please forgive me!

string.name: c9_s2
string.value: Let's just forget about it. I'll do better next time. Promise.

string.name: c9_s3
string.value: Man...I'm a rare, rare pet. How about some love?

string.name: c9_s4
string.value: Roar! Roar! Arrgh...!! Don't hate me!

string.name: c9_f1
string.value: What makes you think you can stand in my way?

string.name: c9_f2
string.value: Why are you saying this? You must be much worse than I thought.

string.name: c9_f3
string.value: I have no idea what I did wrong. Jeez.

string.name: c9_f4
string.value: Master, are you scolding me? Are you sure you can handle the aftermath?

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: Roar!! That just made my day!

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: Only my master can say those things!

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Haha...exactly what makes you want to say that?

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: I knew I was born to be loved...hahaha!

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: That just made me want to blush...haha

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Did I do something wrong? What is it.

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: I'm sorry, but you're not my master.

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: I have no idea what you're saying. What did you just say?

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Master...you just made me want to hurl.

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Roar roar! I can feel your love towards me!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: I can't help it... I'm that irresistable!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: You don't even need to say it. I can see it in your eyes!

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: Talk is cheap. Show me something that you really do love me.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Love? What do you know about love?

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I can't believe you. You keep making me do stupid things!

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: I saw you with another person. Don't lie to me.

string.name: c13_f1
string.value: What do you want to hear from me?

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: I'd rather just hear you talk.

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: I'm tired. Let's rest for a second.

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: One little two little three little Gorillas!

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: I better go workout after this!

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Don't you have to tell me what I need to talk about?

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: Okay let me hear your side of the story.

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: There are few things in life as annoying as talking.

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: I'm hungry. I need some bananas with gasoline dippings.

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: I heard main bosses carry expensive items. Is that true?

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: Don't keep hunting the same area over and over again.

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: I wonder if there's a bigger monkey than me out there...

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Um...I don't think I was bought to talk!

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: Hey hey... let's just go in the dark alley and settle this.

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Don't keep annoying me...or else I can just go back to the inventory.

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Look at me. I have a hard time standing still. Leave me alone.

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: What are you doing! Let's attack!

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: I'm hungry. Let's eat something first.

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: I want to rest for a while. Go fight yourself.

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: Fire? Attack? I don't know that command.

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: Why don't you fight... I'm just a pet!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: One! Two! One! Two! Ready to battle!

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: I'll teach you what a true combat is all about!

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: If you're scared, just stand behind my back!

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Once I batter my chest like this, the help will come!

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: I'm so tired. Let's just go to the sauna.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: Why should I fight? I believe in peace.

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: If you really want to fight, why don't you just go yourself?

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: I have to go now. I have a weekly meeting to attend.

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Look at my eyes. Do I look tired?

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: There's nothing better than sleeping after a full day!

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Did you just tell a robot to sleep?

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: I slept too much in the afternoon, so I'm not tired.

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Feed me first before making me sleep.

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: Go sleep first. I need to work out for a while.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Ahhh... I'm full... I need some sleep.

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: There's nothing like a good sleep right about now!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Hopefully I can see the lottery numbers tonight.

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: Telling me to sleep is like telling me to die! What were you thinking?

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: I didn't do anything today. Why should I sleep?

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: If I eat then sleep, I'm going to turn fat.

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: Here's my real set of pythons.

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: I don't want to do it.

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: What transforming... you read too many cartoon books.

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: What do you want me to change into? Just tell me!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Now hang on to my arms. These are the strongest pair of arms you'll ever see!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: Here's the power you've never thought possible.

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: No one can stop me now.

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: I need 10 dozen bananas for this.

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: What do you want me to do?

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: I don't feel like changing. Let's just skip that.

string.name: c24_s1
string.value: Here's my true power! Be amazed!

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: Don't be too surprised to see my clothes rip apart!

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: This is going to take a while. Just hold on a secod, okay?

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: I know changing right now might not be good...but if you say so...

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: I'm just a pet, you know.

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: Me? I don't know how to change.

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: You don't like how I look right now? That's cold!

string.name: f2_f
string.value: Are you trying to kill me?

string.name: f3_f
string.value: This is an old battery! Are you trying to kill me?

string.name: f4_s
string.value: There's nothing like being full after a good meal!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: You were going to offer me THIS for all the work I did for you?

string.name: s4
string.value: If you say bad words, I am gonna ban you!

string.name: e_levelup
string.value: Wow! Congratulations on leveling up! You look that much more powerful now!

string.name: e_rest
string.value: Master... did you just leave me out here in the cold again?

string.name: e_HPAlert
string.value: Hey hey...you might die! Take some potions.

string.name: e_NOHPPotion
string.value: Hey, I don't think you have enough HP potions. Go get some!

string.name: e_NOMPPotion
string.value: Hey, I don't think you have enough MP potions. Go get some!
Will I see her at the gym today?
Oh no... I almost stepped on that snail!
For some reason, I feel drawn to the Krakian Jungle...
Bananas are a Gorilla's best friend!
Be nice to your friends! Don't fight over items!

string.name: c1_s1
string.value: Keep it up till the level up!

string.name: c1_f1
string.value: Keep it up till the level up!

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: Click on the NPC with bulb icon above its head and you can start the quest.

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: Click on the NPC with bulb icon above its head and you can start the quest.

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: I think I'm in love with you too.

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: I think I'm in love with you too.

string.name: c1_s3
string.value: How did you know my legs hurt?

string.name: c1_f1
string.value: Let me know the last time you've seen a reindeer sit.

string.name: c1_f2
string.value: Me? Sit here? I'm going to get dirty, then.

string.name: c1_f4
string.value: I can only sit on top of a clean field of snow, you know.

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: Oh, this is a perfect place to sit!

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: I'm going to sit back, relax and enjoy the show.

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: So then, you were all like "Sit" and I did it. w00t!

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: I'm really tired. I think it's a perfect time to sit.

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: Did you just order me to do something?

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: I am a revered pet. Don't like it? Get a dog.

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: I am not like other pets. I sit when I want to!

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: My knees are creaking from all that walking. A non-running reindeer is toast!

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Good, I felt like sitting down.

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: No way! Not on the bare ground!

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Hey, I'm the most revered pet in Happyville. Treat me with respect!

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: How dare you give me commands.

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Thanks. Finally time for some rest.

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: I'm soooo tired, I feel like falling asleep.

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Ahhhh, it's been a loooong day.

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Okay, now that I'm sitting down, you got something to tell me?

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: I don't understand why you'd want me to sit all of a sudden...

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: I am not tired, thank you very much.

string.name: c5_s4
string.value: What did I do wrong? Why are you so mad at me...

string.name: c5_f2
string.value: I'm the most revered pet in Happyville. Don't yell at me!

string.name: c5_f4
string.value: Take a look at yourself in the mirror first.

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: Why do you keep picking on me...?

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: I didn't do anything wrong... sniff sniff...

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: I'm going to tell Santa what you're doing to me...

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Why are you yelling at me? I don't understand what I did wrong.

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: This is how you treat me all the time. I don't buy it.

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: I don't have a problem. I think it's you with a problem.

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: What did I do wrong? Tell me... sniff sniff...

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: You don't need to raise your voice to get your message across... sniff sniff..

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Don't yell at me... you're scaring me...

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: I didn't do anything wrong. I swear.

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: What do you think you're doing yelling at me?

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: I'm going back to Santa's house... sniff sniff...

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: Why do you keep picking on me... sniff sniff...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: I'm the most revered pet in Happyville... why...

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Stop talking to me in gibberish!

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: What in the world are you saying...?

string.name: c9_s2
string.value: So, wanna hear about the time I gave Santa a noogie?

string.name: c9_f2
string.value: I don't know what you're trying to do...

string.name: c9_f3
string.value: Since when did I do stuff like that?

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: So, wanna hear about the time I gave Santa a hug?

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: What are you going to do? You can't stop me!

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: Don't do anything stupid here. You're embarassing me.

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: So, wanna hear about the time I left Santa a present?

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: I don't feel like doing that.

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: No, it adds wrinkles to my face.

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: This one time, at reindeer camp, I ate a cookie.

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Meh. That guy needs a new haircut.

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Ugh. Tell her to get her hair done!

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Since when did I do juvenile things like this?

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Your desperate attempts for my attention is not working.

string.name: c13_s1
string.value: You'll see the REAL me now... ahhh!

string.name: c13_f1
string.value: I don't feel like doing anything right now.

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: Um.. I don't know how to do that.

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: I'm too tired to do this right now.

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: Yes yes, I am good at this.

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Look closely. This is a momentous occasion, you know.

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: What do you want me to do??

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: More than meets the--Oops. Can't say that!

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: I feel something holy going around here.

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Allow me to show you who I really am. Tada!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: I'm too young to do that just yet.

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: I'm too tired to do it. Seriously.

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: I don't feel like doing anything right now. I'll do it later.

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: I look awesome right now. I don't need to do that.

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Time for me to dust off my go-to move.

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: Don't you wish you could do this?

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: Allow me to show you why I'm the most revered pet in Happyville.

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: I have no idea what you want me to do.

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: I am a revered pet from Happyville. I do not take any orders from anyone.

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Um... excuse me? What did you just say?

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: I am too hot. Seriously, way too hot.

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Don't touch me. I'm not in a mood.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Now that makes me feel great today!

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: La la la what a wonderful day!

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I think you're the only one feeling good today.

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: What makes you feel so good there?

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Just thinking about that makes my day.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: I hope you have a great day today!

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Are you going out with someone?

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I had a sweet dream, you know?

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Of course I'm happy. I'm with you!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: I feel so blessed right now.

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: Did you do well on the exam? No way.

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: With me, you'll never get bored!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: I am so happy to hear that!

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: Don't just say it. Show me!

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: I don't just love anybody, you know.

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: I think we're a match made in heaven.

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: Just look at me. Nobody else, okay?

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: Keep saying that. I like hearing that.

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: You can't just say that. You'll have to show me you love me.

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: I'm sorry, but I have someone else in mind.

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: I understand that you love me, but I don't think it's time.

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: Hey, you are already seeing someone anyway!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: I will love you til the end of the road.

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: I am way too popular for my own good.

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: What makes you think you're worthy of my love?

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: What did you just say? Whoa...

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: Are you trying to tell me you love me??

string.name: c25_s1
string.value: Do you want to hear a story about the Snow Queen? Once upon a time...

string.name: c25_s2
string.value: Do you want to hear more? Okay here we go...

string.name: c25_s3
string.value: You like my stories? I ever tell you about the Snow Queen?

string.name: c25_s4
string.value: For some strange reason, I feel at home in El Nath...

string.name: c25_f2
string.value: What exactly do you want me to say?

string.name: c25_f3
string.value: I'm too thirsty to say anything right now.

string.name: c25_f4
string.value: I don't want to talk to humans.

string.name: c26_s1
string.value: Once upon a time, in a snow castle far, far away...

string.name: c26_s2
string.value: Okay so do you want to know where I came from? I'm from the west.

string.name: c26_s3
string.value: Passion, vigor, and pride! That's the reindeer way!

string.name: c26_s4
string.value: This year, Santa said I could take the holidays off, so here I am!

string.name: c26_f1
string.value: Today's not the best day to chat.

string.name: c26_f2
string.value: I am hungry, and I am tired. Let's talk next time.

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: I don't feel like saying anything.

string.name: c27_s1
string.value: My crystal form is a lot like the Glimmer Man's.

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: Are you ready for an all-night chat fest?

string.name: c27_s3
string.value: You know, I have some funny stories you'll love to hear.

string.name: c27_s4
string.value: Okay, then here's a story about the snow castle I used to live in. Way back in the day...

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: I am the most revered pet in Happyville. I only talk when I feel like talking.

string.name: c27_f2
string.value: What do you want me to say?

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: Uh.... What? I don't understand your moonspeak.

string.name: c28_s1
string.value: Ahh... time to go to bed.

string.name: c28_f1
string.value: Why do you keep asking me to fall asleep...?

string.name: c28_f2
string.value: I don't feel like sleeping yet.

string.name: c28_f4
string.value: No, I do not feel like it.

string.name: c29_f1
string.value: No, I feel like playing some more.

string.name: c29_f2
string.value: I'm so hungry, I can't sleep yet.

string.name: c29_f3
string.value: I don't feel like sleeping right now.

string.name: c30_s1
string.value: Hmmm... this pillow is so comfortable.

string.name: c30_s2
string.value: I ... am ... so ... tired ... I ... must ... sleep ...

string.name: c30_s3
string.value: Thanks. Time for me to go to bed.

string.name: c30_f1
string.value: Hey, it's not bed time yet!!

string.name: c30_f3
string.value: A revered pet like me shouldn't waste time sleeping.

string.name: c30_f4
string.value: It's beautiful outside. Why should I sleep right now?

string.name: f1_f
string.value: This is really gross. Don't you have any Snowflakes? Or pie?

string.name: f2_f
string.value: Why do you keep giving me stuff like this?

string.name: f3_s
string.value: This is better than anything I've had in a while.

string.name: f3_f
string.value: I am really, really hungry. This doesn't cut it.

string.name: f4_f
string.value: Bleh. Are you trying to kill me?

string.name: c1_f1
string.value: What if I don't want to?

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: Do I have to sit when you tell me to?

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: I wanted to sit anyway... Thank you master!

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Then I'll take a quick rest. My beak is so heavy.

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Yay yay! Can I sit for a while?

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: I like flying much better, okay? Just let me be!

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Do you think my beak is too big to fly? I can fly!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Hey, if you're tired, YOU sit.

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Okay! Let's take a rest. We've been moving a lot.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Telling a bird to sit... What a stupid...

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Do you want my beak punch?

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: Then why did you take me!

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: I didn't know you hated me master...

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: Oh, no... I'll get mad if you say that!

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: What hurtful words... My beak feels a lot heavier today...

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: Hahaha! Take my beak punch! Pow! Pow!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: You thought that would offend me? Practice more.

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Hating me after choosing me? Your loss! Hahaha!

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: Such hurtful words when being loved isn't even enough! Bad master...

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: I'm sorry, but I don't understand.

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: Hahaha! Take my beak punch! Pow! Pow!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: If I'm stupid, then you're stupid too! You know that, right? Same for master and pet? Great!

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: No, I don't want to be yelled at.

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: Leave me alone.. I want to be alone.

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: I don't want to be yelled at! What should I do?

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Oh I'm sorry master. Forgive me...

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: Don't yell and say kind things, please? Pet my beak.

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: When are you going to stop yelling? I'm sorry but I'm hungry… Give me food.

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: Hey I don't understand a word you are saying. CooCoo! Do you know what this means?

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: You think that would scare me? Absolutely not. Hehe!

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: I'll take my punishment, just please forgive me this time.

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: I will be a good pet for you. I'm sorry master.

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: You always say no... Do I seem that easy?!

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: What did I do! I did nothing!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Leave me alone! Bad master! I hate you !

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: Yes, I only have my Master!

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: I only love myself. Because I'm worth it!

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Hehe! I love this feeling. You feel the same way?

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: I'm blushing so much that my beak is turning red...

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: Your undying love like the ever-burning Sun!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: I'm sorry, but I'm a bird and you are a human.

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: I already have a lover. Nice try though!

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: I'll think about it, but don't keep your hopes up too high.. I don't want to hurt you.

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: I will be with you always till the top level!

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: You are my everything! I love you!

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: Can't you just look at me?

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: I like tall people... Not such short ones like you... Sorry!

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: We are too different to love each other...

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Yeah, I think I'm getting hungry.

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Okay! I was actually a little bored so play with me.

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: I'm kind of busy now. Talk to me later.

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: What do you want me to say...

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Haha! Talking is my specialty among specialties. It will be loud, is that okay?

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: What a great weather! Feels like we'll be able to pick up some Elixir.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: People say heavy lips mean few words, but I'm the exact opposite. Hahaha!

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: I'm usually talkative, but right now I'm so hungry. Give me some food before you tell me to do something.

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: It's time for me to sleep... Let's talk tomorrow.

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: What am I supposed to say? How about at least giving me a subject?

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: I can't just talk through this beak! I can attack real good! Let's go!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: O-kay, prepared to attack! Let's do this, master!

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Collaborative attack of man and bird! It's got to be the first ever!

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Really, why do you bother me so much... Do this stuff alone, please?

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: Are you going to work me out like this on an empty stomach? This is bad!

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: I'm sorry I'm in for peace... Just talk it out. That's why my beak is so hug. Hehe!

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Good, I'll show my great power!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: I will swipe all with my huge beak!

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: Okay, have a good time there.

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: It is time to work. Lazy master!

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Do you think I can sleep with this beak?

string.name: c24_s1
string.value: Ah~ I'm so tired from laughing and chatting all day.. Good night master!

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: Hehe, then shall I try out the new Coconut Palm tree bed!

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: You let me rest when I've worked hard! The greatest master ever!

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: Look... The sun is staring right into our eyes. You sleep!

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: You think you can make a nice weapon with this speed? Hunt more monsters!

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: I can't just sleep with my heavy beak... Master will have to hold it up. Will you?

string.name: c25_f1
string.value: Can you be quiet so I can sleep?

string.name: c25_f2
string.value: You better give up if you think that's going to work on me!

string.name: c26_s1
string.value: Your whistle sound is so mellow and sweet...

string.name: c26_s2
string.value: Hmm? Actually this is a secret, but I only live in Brazil. Bet you didn't know that? Haha!

string.name: c26_s3
string.value: Oh, how do you do that? Tweeeeeeeet!

string.name: c26_f1
string.value: Hey you! Want to call out all those monsters? Keep quiet!

string.name: c26_f2
string.value: You're embarrassing me with that sound in this great Maple World.

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: I'm 30 years old now... I'm too old... Stop this...

string.name: f3_s
string.value: Wow, what great food! It's like heaven in my mouth!

string.name: f3_f
string.value: This can't fill up my starving tummy.

string.name: f4_s
string.value: This is the best ever!! This made my day. I love you master!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: You are too harsh... All this time, and you don't know about my taste yet?

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: No no no~ Kino don't know such a thing.

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: No! No! Kino don't wanna sit!

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: You want some nice cool drink?

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Want some juice in relex chair?

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Kino wanna rest now with master.

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: How nice~ I want some juice too.

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Kino will have some juice now.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: No! No! Kino don't wanna sit now!

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: Why doing this to cute Kino? Sob sob...

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: Arooo...Why doing this to cute Kino?

string.name: c7_f2

string.value: I love you too! Give me a hug!

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: You're referring to somebody else, right?

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: You're the best Master a monkey can have!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I love you too! What about going for a hunt together?

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: I'm such a lucky monkey to have you as my Master…

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: It is bad to tell lies Master, Please don't.

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: I love bananas more than I love you!

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Are you sure? You haven't hugged me for ages!

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: I'm sure you love your new weapon more! ARP!

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: I can stand! I can stand!

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Huh? My ear feels a liitle itchy here...

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: I'll stand if you feed me!

string.name: c24_s1
string.value: Have you ever seen a monkey standing so straight?

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: Look Master! Aren't I good at this?

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: I did it! Master! I'm standing!

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: Can't you see I'm already standing?

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: I'm tired running after you! I don't want to stand!

string.name: c25_s1
string.value: Look master, do you see a banana there?

string.name: c25_s2
string.value: I love the way you talk to me.

string.name: c25_s3
string.value: I love bananas! Do feed me more of those!

string.name: c25_s4
string.value: I love you Master! Do you love me too?

string.name: c25_f2
string.value: What do you expect me to say?

string.name: c26_s1
string.value: Instead of killing monsters, you can do quests to level up too!

string.name: c26_s2
string.value: Monkeys love bananas! I bet you didn't know that.

string.name: c26_s3
string.value: I hate people who abuse their pets, don't you?

string.name: c26_s4
string.value: If you don't feed me, I'll go back home and not come out!

string.name: c26_f1
string.value: It is rude to wake a monkey from its sleep! ARP!

string.name: c26_f2
string.value: Talk talk talk.. I want to do something else.

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: Tell me honestly, have you ever heard a monkey speak?

string.name: c26_f4
string.value: I have nothing to say to you! ARP! ARP!

string.name: c27_s1
string.value: We pets are created by Cloy of Henesys.

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: If you don't feed me well, I'll just run away!

string.name: c27_s3
string.value: If you buy me a meso magnet and item pouch I can collect all your loot for you!

string.name: c27_s4
string.value: I won’t live forever, so do treasure me when I'm around!

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: What do you expect me to tell you when I'm always following you around?

string.name: c27_f2
string.value: Don't you have any other things to do?

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: Why don't you ask my lupin brothers to talk to you instead?

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: Isn't it better for you to talk to your buddies instead?

string.name: c29_s2
string.value: I've wanted to play with you all day long!

string.name: c29_s3
string.value: What do you want to do?

string.name: c29_f2
string.value: Can't you see I'm busy now?

string.name: c29_f3
string.value: Feed me first... then I will think about it!

string.name: c29_f4
string.value: Don't even want to move my tail...

string.name: c30_s1
string.value: I've been waitiing for you to say that!

string.name: c30_s4
string.value: I'm thinking of how we are going to play Master!

string.name: c34_f1
string.value: Who sleeps in the middle of the day? Not me!

string.name: c34_f3
string.value: How to sleep when I'm hungry?

string.name: c35_s3
string.value: That was kind of you Master, I'm indeed tired!

string.name: c35_f1
string.value: Don't want to sleep! Let's climb trees instead?

string.name: c35_f3
string.value: I'm not as lazy as you think Master...

string.name: c35_f4
string.value: If you aren't training, I am!

string.name: f3_f
string.value: No more for me... too full!

string.name: f4_s
string.value: Master! I like this a lot!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: Master... are you trying to kill me?

string.name: s3
string.value: I thought you were a good Master...

string.name: s4
string.value: Kii, I thought I told you, I am against those bad words.

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: I'm a good boy, right? Gimme a treat! Yip yip!

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: Yip! Yip! I sat, so gimme a treat!

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: Yip! Yip! I can't do it!

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: You sit down too, master! Yip!

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: You're taking it easy on me 'cause you care. Right, master? Yip!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Yip! Sorry master, but I can't!

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: Yip! My legs are numb. I can't move...

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Yip! There's nothing I can't do if I'm with you, master!

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: Yip! Yip! I practice every day, just for you!

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Master! Master! Look at me! Yip!

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Am I doing good, master? Am I? Yip!

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Yip! Yip! I can't, my butt hurts!

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: This is boring. Let's try something harder! Yip!

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: I can't. Why? I don't know... Yip...

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: Yip. I'll do what you tell me...

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Yip! I didn't do anything bad!

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Yip! I thought you liked me!

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: Sorry. I'll be good! Yip yip!

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: I didn't know any better. Forgive me! Yip!

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: It was a mistake! Forgive me! Yip!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Yip! It was just one mistake!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: It's just a tiny mistake. Yip!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: I don't wanna be in trouble. Yip!

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: Yip! I am too a smart doggy!

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: Yip! Takes one to know one!

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Yip! I am smart! I am!

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: But you still like me, right? Right?

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: I still like you, master. Yip!

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Yip! I'm tired of this joke.

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: I know you don't mean it. Yip!

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Let's talk about something else. Yip!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Well, I think you're the bee's knees! Yip!

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: Is this a new game? Yip! Idiot! Mutt! Bad master!

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: I know you don't mean it. Yip!

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: No! Yip! I'm a big strong doggy!

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: I thought I was constipated, but...nope! Yip!

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Yip! But I already did! Yip!

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: Yip! I need a bag for my poop!

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Yip! This one looks just like me! Yip!

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: Yip! Yip! Okay, now clean it up!

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Watch out! I pooped there! Yip!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: I can't just poop all day, you know? Yip!

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: Yip... I think I'm constipated... Grr...

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: I'm trying, but there's nothing to poo.

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Yip! It doesn't smell bad, does it?

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Yip! Yip! Be careful! I dumped it right next to you.

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: I can't go right now. Yip yip!

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: I like waking up early! Yip yip yip!

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: You're my favorite! If anyone else likes you, I'll bite 'em! Yip!

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: Yip! Let's do a quest! Wanna do a quest? Let's do a quest!

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: When I look into your eyes, it's like I can read your mind. Yip!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Yip! Yip! I wanna be quiet right now. Yip yip yip yip yip!

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: *Whimper* It's so cloudy today. I wish the sun was out.

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I got nothing special to say. Yip!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Admins never ask for your password! Yip! What's a password?

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: I could look at you all day. Yip yip!

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Is there really a scary dragon living in Leafre? Yip!

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Yip! What do you like most about me, master? Yip yip!

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: Yip! Woah, I'm so out of it right now.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I tried to look up my horoscope, but I can't read. Yip!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: Yip! Yip yip! My back ITCHES!

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Yip! Yip! I can read your miiiind!

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Thanks to all the treats, I got a tummy! Yip!

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: I'm not scared of no monsters! Just gimme potions. Yip!

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: You look JUST like me, master. Yip!

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Yip! Yip! My tail's wagging! Look at it go!

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: I'm hungry. Gimme a snack. Yip!

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: Let's get on a boat! Yip!

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: Yip. What do you want me to say?

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Yip yip yip! Tell me a joke!

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Don't I look cool? Yip! Yip!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I can do this all by myself! Yip!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Yip! Yip! My tummy's on the ground.

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Yip! Does this make my butt look big?

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: Gimme more time to practice. Yip! Yip!

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Aren't I good? Gimme a treat! Yip!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Yip! I can do ANYTHING! Yip yip!

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: Ugh, my stomach. It hurts to crawl. Yip yip!

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: I'm still working on it. Teach me to do it better! Yip.

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: I could do this with my eyes closed. Yip!

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: I'm a good boy, right! Gimme a treat! Gimme a treat! Yip!

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: I'd even get you the stars from the sky if you ask me, master. Yip!

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: Sitting down is more comfy. Yip!

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: *Whimper*My back huuurts. Someone hit me yesterday!

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: Yip! Yip! This is too hard.

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: Yip yip yip! I'm so happy!

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: You're not talking to me, right? I am a dog. Yip!

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: I pooped in your slippers this morning. Yip!

string.name: c25_s2
string.value: I'll write this down in my diary! Yip! Can I have a diary?

string.name: c25_s3
string.value: I love you too, master! Yip yip yip!

string.name: c25_f1
string.value: Yip? Of course you do! I'm adorable!

string.name: c25_f2
string.value: Don't you have someone better to say that to? Yip!

string.name: c26_s1
string.value: I love you SO much! Yip yip!

string.name: c26_s3
string.value: If you tell that to another pet, I'll bite you! Yip!

string.name: f2_s
string.value: How did you know I'm hungry? Yip?

string.name: f3_s
string.value: This is so good! SO GOOD!

string.name: f3_f
string.value: Master... You're fattening me up... Yip!

string.name: f4_s
string.value: Yip yip! It's SO good. Gimme more!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: I-I don't wanna turn into a pig. I'm a dog! Yip yip!

string.name: s3
string.value: Don't put icky words in my mouth!

string.name: s4
string.value: Yip! Yip! Bad word is bad!

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: I don't want to sit here.

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Yes, a rest would be nice.

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Oh, my legs are sore. Thank you. Mrow!

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Don't order me around like that! Meow!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Meow... I don't sit in places like this.

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: A nice, leisurely rest would be nice...mrow!

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Some weather, huh? Let's relax for a while, master. Meow!

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Meow. Don't tell me what to do!

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: You can't always get what you want, master.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Do I look like a remote control cat to you?

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: I won't do it again. Meow!

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Why are you doing this? MROW!

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: What have I done wrong? Meow!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Meow! Why are you in such a bad mood?

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: I'm sorry! Forgive me! Forgive me!

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: H-how can you yell at me like that?!

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: Why are you taking it out on me? MROW!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Meow! I didn't do anything wrong. Bad master!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: I'm sorry! I won't do it again. Meow...

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: You're not enjoying this, are you?

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Are you really abandoning me? Meow! Meow!

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: Liar! I don't believe you! MROW!

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: Say it again! Say it again! Mew!

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: MEOW! You're the best! Mew! Mew!

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: Mrow... You know I'm a cat, right?

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: I'm sure you say that to all your pets.

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Mrrow... What can I say to that?

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: I'm happy to follow you around. Meow!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: You're the best master. I'll follow you forever!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Love is fine, but I'm hungry!

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: Ah! Shh, someone will hear you!

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: This is not a restroom! Meow, meow!

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Can you get me some toilet paper, master?

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Why...are you telling me to do this?

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: No one's watching, right? Watch out for me. Meow!

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: I made you a gift, master!

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Errr... I don't have to! Meow!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: I don't need to go! Do you, master?

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Meow... What am I suppose to do here...?

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Meow! Everyone's watching! I can't do it here!

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: Maybe a little cat nap would be good...

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: Meow. It's not time for bed yet...

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: Meow! The sun's still high in the sky!

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Aren't you sleepy, master? I'm sleepy.

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: Nothing beats sleeping on a soft pillow.

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: Don't let anyone wake me up. Meow!

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: Can't I just sleep when I want to? Mrow!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Why are you putting me to bed? It's too early!

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I still want to play! Mew!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: This was a such a long day.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: I feel like sleeping for 3 days. Meow!

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: Oh, just let me sleep already!

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I told you, I don't want to sleep! Meow!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: Isn't it too early for bed?

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Why do you always want to sleep, master? Meow!

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: What do you want me to say? Huh? Meow!

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: I grew up in an elegant palace.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Have you ever met as eloquent a cat as I?

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: What should we talk about? Meow!

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: I'm thirsty... Can I have a red potion?

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: It's your turn to talk, master.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: I hope this conversation never ends!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Have you ever had a Power Elixir? How did it taste? I want one!

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: I'm glad you're my master, master.

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Why do you keep saying that? Mew!

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: What are you talking to me for? Bored?

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: You can't talk me into liking you more, master. Mew!

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: You are truly skilled at bothering your pets.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: What's your wish? My wish is to be your kitty forever.

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: The most important thing is health. The second most important thing is...also health.

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: No thank you. Talking to you makes me mad.

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: Why talk when we could eat instead? Mrow!

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: Don't you have any other friends?

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: I'd rather talk to a wall.

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: Don't be surprised when I'm gone. Mrow!

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: Be careful not to fall into my clear blue eyes!

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: Why don't we go hunting? Meow!

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: I can't perform at the drop of a hat...

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: I'll be expecting a heartfelt applause. Meow!

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Well? Not many pets can do this!

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: I'll do what I want! Mrow!

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: I'll think about it...if you beg on your hands and needs.

string.name: f2_f
string.value: I don't want to eat anymore. Meow!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: Don't you have something different? Meow. Meow.

string.name: s3
string.value: Meow! How can you talk to me like that...?

string.name: s4
string.value: Meow! Are you a bad person, master?

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: I should rest a bit while I freshen up!

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: Neigh? But the ground is dirty...

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: I want to walk a bit more.

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Why don't you come sit with me master...neigh...

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Okay, you should get some rest too, master. Proompfh...

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Good idea. My legs were feeling a bit tired!

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: I don't want to get dirt in my hair!

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Fatigue is not good for the skin...neigh...

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: How did you know I wanted some rest?

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Hmmpfh! Don't try to coerce me!

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: I'm too lazy to fold my legs...wehee...

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: How can I sit in a place like this? No way! Hmmpf!

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: I don't know what this is about!

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: I can't hear you! Wehee, wehee!

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: I'm sorry... I won't do it again...

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: Proompfh... I still like you best...

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: Master, why are you mad at me?

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Proompfh, I'm gonna get mad too!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: Master...I'm sorry for hurting your feelings...

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: Neigh...please forgive me...I'll be a good unicorn...

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: Why are you so upset with me?

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: I'm gonna rebel! I'll show you!

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: So I'm the prettiest unicorn, right?

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: I love hearing that from you.

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Master... I know I'm pretty and all, but...

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: I've heard it so many times...

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Neigh... What can I say to that?

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Heeee... Brushing my mane was worth it!

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Master, I love you so much!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Master, you finally see my worth. Brr...

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Master, I'm so lucky to have met you. Proomph...

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: Please don't be so mushy before I eat...

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Neigh...I prefer the company of horses...

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Master... That's nice... But you smell funny.

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: I don't want to... I'm not going to...

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: Why? What are you gonna do with it?

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Okay, but watch my back. Proompfh!

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: My poop is cute like me!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: You go first. Then I'll think about it.

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Poop? Why don't you try feeding me first?

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: I am a dignified unicorn. I don't poop in public!

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: I'm not gonna do what you say! Proomph!

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: I want to dream of you...neigh...

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: You want me to sleep on the ground?!

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: If I sleep too much, I'll get fat!

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I want to play more. Wehee...

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: A pretty unicorn like me deserves a beauty sleep, right?

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Can you brush my mane while I sleep?

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: I'll get a good sleep so we can play some more!

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: My beautiful skin requires lots of sleep...zzz...

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: Should we be sleeping when your level is so low? Go hunt!

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: Neigh... I decide when and where I sleep...and I'm not sleepy!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: Where do you plan on going after I fall asleep? Take me with you!

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Proomph...I don't want to sleep in a place like this. Hmmpfh!

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: My hobby is brushing my mane...

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: I need to polish my horn sometime.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: I'm your most special pet, right?

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Have you ever seen a unicorn as pretty as me?

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: I don't have anything to say...

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: My golden mane can be difficult to manage!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Some days, I just want to run free and wild!

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: I'm so happy that you are my master.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: So, what do you think of my skills?

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: Today is a good day for meditation.

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: You are truly skilled at bothering your pets.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: One of these days, I want to soar through the sky with you on my back!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: I wish I could find a nice horse to be with...

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: I've thought about dying my mane, but it's already the best color!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: I was 1st place in the Unicorn Beauty Pageant!

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: I'm enjoying my peace and quiet, master!

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: Master, you need to grow up!

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: Oh, I was just talking to myself. What did you say?

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: Too much talking will give me wrinkles!

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: You'll cry tears of joy, master.

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: Proompfh. I'm only showing this to you, master!

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: It's a secret to everyone else. Okay?

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: Today is just not the day for it!

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: It's not something you can see anytime you want!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Transformation time! Master, just you wait!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: Heh, sometimes a cute look like this ain't too bad.

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: The beautiful unicorn is multi-talented, as well. Proompfh!

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Is that your best? I don't think so!

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Nothing in this world is free! Proompfh!

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: I'm just too tired right now. I'll show you some other time.

string.name: f3_f
string.value: I'm gonna get fat if I eat any more...

string.name: f4_s
string.value: Yummy food! Neigh... I'm so happy!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: You can't feed a pretty unicorn like me such cheap food.

string.name: s3
string.value: Pretty master, please use pretty words...wehee...

string.name: s4
string.value: True beauty starts with sincerity! Remember that!

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Good idea, I was feeling a bit tired.

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: W-wha-what? I can't hear you very well.

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Well, I really don't want to right now...

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Goo...so comfortable. Why don't you come sit with me, master?

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: I'm starting to feel sleepy just sitting here like this.

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: I don't want to sit right now! Why do you always want things your way?

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Can't I just lie down? Must I sit?

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: You're always getting mad at me...

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: I'm sorry... It was all my fault.

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: I'm sorry... I won't do it again.

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: Hmmpfh! You're always mad at me for no reason.

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Huh? I can't hear you. What did you say?

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: Okay, I won't do it ever again!

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: I'm so sorry, can you just forgive me this once?

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Always getting mad at me for no reason... I'm not even scared anymore.

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: Eek! Stop treating me like a child!

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Umm...I understand, but I'm afraid I can't...

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: I'm already in love with another bunny.

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: I really, really love you too, master.

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Master, you only love me, right?

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: I won't be tricked by your lies anymore.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: I'm already in love with a pink bunny. Sorry.

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Hya! Aah! That feels so good.

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: I don't really need to go right now...

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Make sure no one looks, okay?

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Well, I just don't need to go right now...

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: There's so many people around here!

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: I think something good is going to happen today.

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: I'm really scared of snow...I can't hide.

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: There are times when I just don't want to talk.

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: White bunnies can hide in the snow. I can hide in...charcoal.

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: I like having black fur. I'm like a ninja bunny!

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: I just want to rest. I'm tired.

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: I don't have anything to say! Why don't you talk?

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: A Desert Rabbit came to visit me. I thought he was a dust mop.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: The Moon Bunny says people keep bothering him about rice cakes.

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: Master, why don't we just take a nap today?

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I don't have enough energy to talk.

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: Why do you want me to stand up? I want to sleep.

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Not too bad for a bunny eh? Maybe I can walk on two legs soon!

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Aren't you asking a bit too much of me?

string.name: f4_s
string.value: Foo, foo! This is so good!

string.name: s3
string.value: I'm really disappointed in you, master. You really shouldn't be that way!

string.name: s4
string.value: If you don't have anything nice to say, don't say anything at all!

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Good idea, I was feeling a bit tired.

string.name: c3_f1

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Well, I really don't want to right now...
