string.value: A Desert Rabbit came to visit me. I thought he was a dust mop.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: The Moon Bunny says people keep bothering him about rice cakes.

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: Master, why don't we just take a nap today?

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I don't have enough energy to talk.

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: Why do you want me to stand up? I want to sleep.

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Not too bad for a bunny eh? Maybe I can walk on two legs soon!

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Aren't you asking a bit too much of me?

string.name: f4_s
string.value: Foo, foo! This is so good!

string.name: s3
string.value: I'm really disappointed in you, master. You really shouldn't be that way!

string.name: s4
string.value: If you don't have anything nice to say, don't say anything at all!

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: Lala...such a cool wind in my mane.

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: Wehee...I don't desire to do so!

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Ah...I miss the chairs in the castle...

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Thank you for your kind consideration.

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: How dare you! Do you realize who you are speaking to?!

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: Aah, since you are asking, I shall.

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: If that is what you wish! Wehee!

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Owie! I've been pricked by a thorn!

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: I'd rather not, I'm a bit sore.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Wehee! How dare you try to command me?

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Okay, hut! Ahh! My legs won't bend!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: La ti da...I can't hear you...

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: Lala, I am singing a song of repentance!

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: I am of a noble personage.

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: I can get angry as well! You...cough cough...my throat...

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: You must not like me anymore.

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: I acknowledge my mistake. I am sorry!

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Please accept the apology of a unicorn prince.

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Do you realize that you are speaking to one of nobility?!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: I am quite disappointed in you!

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Sigh...It is only natural for a horse to move forward!

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: I am truly sorry, but I cannot return the sentiment.

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: I am not the right one for you.

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Lala... My heart is yours as well!

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: I hope that your heart shall never change.

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: I will stand by you always!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: I will overcome our differences, to stand by you!

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: I shall be returning to my kingdom soon.

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: We are of different classes. I am sorry.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Did you at least bring me some sugar cubes?

string.name: c13_s4
string.value: If that is what you desire...

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: I am a prince, but I can be down to earth! Hrrgh!

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: No, this is not right! Not right at all!

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: I hope that you will learn to be a bit more elegant.

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Phhhhhhrt... You didn't hear that! It wasn't me!

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: Unicorns are too dignified for pooping.

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: I am no commoner. How can I go in such a place as this?

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: My leavings are not for all to see!

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: You should get some rest too.

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: I am find just as I am!

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: You need to move around more. Look at your love handles!

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: Posture is important, even when sleeping...zzz...

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: So, this is how the homeless sleep...

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: Can you even think of sleeping at your level?

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Why don't you prepare a nice bed for me first?

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: Aah...I miss my golden bed back in the castle.

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I am not used to taking orders!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: I wish for my kingdom to appear in my dreams.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: We have much to do. There is no time for sleeping!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: How dare you try to command me!

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Bring me some sugar cubes! I am hungry!

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Lala...I am the first prince of the Unicorn Kingdom!

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: I have come here just to meet you.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Dignity and elegance are my pride and calling.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: I shall invite you to my kingdom someday.

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Lala... Let us sing a song!

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: My sister is a beautiful unicorn with a light blue mane.

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Esel and I are good friends.

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: I hope that my sister will be able to visit Maple World.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Esel and I still feel quite...lonely.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Members of the royal family like myself must be careful in all that we say and do!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: It wasn't a mistake that brought me to Maple World.

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: My kingdom is inhabited by only unicorns.

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Do you wish to learn some manners from me?

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: Elegant unicorns such as myself enjoy silence.

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: What? You surprised me. I wasn't expecting you to talk to me.

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: I'm in no mood to talk.

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: There are days when i just feel like being alone. Alone!

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: It is not for anyone to see.

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: If I don't move for 10 minutes, call a doctor.

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: How dare you command a member of the royal family!

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: I refuse! How can an unicorn of my stature stoop so low?

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: Wehee! How dare you try to command me?

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: I am too tired for a trick!

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: I shall show you something that Esel can't even attempt!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: This is a secret move, passed down through the royal family.

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: Aah...I don't think I can perform that today!

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: How can you ask me to do such a thing? I cannot!

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: I am too tired. Please bring me a sugar cube.

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: Wehee. It's not something you can see anytime you want to!

string.name: f2_f
string.value: I am quite full! Please, no more!

string.name: f3_f
string.value: Aah...I miss the meals back in my kingdom..

string.name: s3
string.value: A beautiful word for a beautiful person...

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: Give me a pillow to sit on!

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Just...gonna close my eyes...for a second...

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Stop telling me what to do!

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: I'm not listening to you! You're not my real dad!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Neigh! I don't wanna sit. I wanna sleep.

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: I don't listen to ugly people!

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Whinney... Don't you like me anymore?

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: How can you be mad at a cutie like me?

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: You make me so sad! Neigh!

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: This horn is sharp. Don't make me stab you!

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Promise to love me forever and ever?

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Sorry, but I'm a limited edition unicorn...

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: I'm holding out for my knight in shining armor.

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: FRRRT! N-no, I made that sound with my mouth! Honest!

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: Snort. I'm going to use the toilet!

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: Why are you so curious about it, master? Whinney!

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Give me some sugar cubes, and I'll think about it!

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: No! I wanna play some more!

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Why don't we go hunting instead?

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: Why do I gotta sleep outside? Whinney!

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: No. I'm going to play some more!

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: I'm waiting for my knight in shining armor.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Do you really think it's okay to have a pet unicorn? My legs are tired...

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Whinney! I'm the mysteriousest unicorn of all!

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: My brother's a total snob! Don't tell anyone I said that, okay?

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Esel always makes fun of my mane, but Esel's mane is totally dyed!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Sssh, this is a secret. This hairband is actually my brother's...

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Whinney! Go play on your own!

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: I'm gonna take a nap now.

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Hoompfh, I wanna play with my brother and Esel!

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: Whinney! Not in the mood today.

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: Neigh! Neigh! Why don't YOU talk?

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: Whinney. I'm going to go play.

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: I learned this from a fairy. Neigh!

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: Whinney. I wanna be a star!

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: Stop trying to make me work!

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: Neigh! Only because you asked me!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: I'm gonna turn into a pigacorn!

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: I should rest a bit while I freshen up!

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: Neigh? But the ground is dirty...

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: I want to walk a bit more.

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Why don't you come sit with me master...neigh...

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Okay, you should get some rest too, master. Proompfh...

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Good idea. My legs were feeling a bit tired!

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: I don't want to get dirt in my hair!

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Fatigue is not good for the skin...neigh...

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: How did you know I wanted some rest?

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Hmmpfh! Don't try to coerce me!

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: I'm too lazy to fold my legs...wehee...

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: How can I sit in a place like this? No way! Hmmpf!

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: I don't know what this is about!

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: I can't hear you! Wehee, wehee!

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: I'm sorry... I won't do it again...

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: Proompfh... I still like you best...

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: Master, why are you mad at me?

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Proompfh, I'm gonna get mad too!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: Master...I'm sorry for hurting your feelings...

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: Neigh...please forgive me...I'll be a good unicorn...

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: Why are you so upset with me?

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: I'm gonna rebel! I'll show you!

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: So I'm the prettiest unicorn, right?

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: I love hearing that from you.

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Master... I know I'm pretty and all, but...

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: I've heard it so many times...

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Neigh... What can I say to that?

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Heeee... Brushing my mane was worth it!

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Master, I love you so much!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Master, you finally see my worth. Brr...

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Master, I'm so lucky to have met you. Proomph...

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: Please don't be so mushy before I eat...

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Neigh...I prefer the company of horses...

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Master... That's nice... But you smell funny.

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: I don't want to... I'm not going to...

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: Why? What are you gonna do with it?

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Okay, but watch my back. Proompfh!

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: My poop is cute like me!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: You go first. Then I'll think about it.

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Poop? Why don't you try feeding me first?

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: I am a dignified unicorn. I don't poop in public!

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: I'm not gonna do what you say! Proomph!

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: I want to dream of you...neigh...

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: You want me to sleep on the ground?!

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: If I sleep too much, I'll get fat!

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I want to play more. Wehee...

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: A pretty unicorn like me deserves a beauty sleep, right?

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Can you brush my mane while I sleep?

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: I'll get a good sleep so we can play some more!

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: My beautiful skin requires lots of sleep...zzz...

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: Should we be sleeping when your level is so low? Go hunt!

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: Neigh... I decide when and where I sleep...and I'm not sleepy!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: Where do you plan on going after I fall asleep? Take me with you!

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Proomph...I don't want to sleep in a place like this. Hmmpfh!

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: My hobby is brushing my mane...

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: I need to polish my horn sometime.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: I'm your most special pet, right?

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Have you ever seen a unicorn as pretty as me?

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: I don't have anything to say...

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: My golden mane can be difficult to manage!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Some days, I just want to run free and wild!

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: I'm so happy that you are my master.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: So, what do you think of my skills?

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: Today is a good day for meditation.

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: You are truly skilled at bothering your pets.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: One of these days, I want to soar through the sky with you on my back!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: I wish I could find a nice horse to be with...

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: I've thought about dying my mane, but it's already the best color!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: I was 1st place in the Unicorn Beauty Pageant!

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: I'm enjoying my peace and quiet, master!

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: Master, you need to grow up!

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: Oh, I was just talking to myself. What did you say?

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: Too much talking will give me wrinkles!

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: You'll cry tears of joy, master.

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: Proompfh. I'm only showing this to you, master!

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: It's a secret to everyone else. Okay?

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: Today is just not the day for it!

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: It's not something you can see anytime you want!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Transformation time! Master, just you wait!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: Heh, sometimes a cute look like this ain't too bad.

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: The beautiful unicorn is multi-talented, as well. Proompfh!

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Is that your best? I don't think so!

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Nothing in this world is free! Proompfh!

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: I'm just too tired right now. I'll show you some other time.

string.name: f3_f
string.value: I'm gonna get fat if I eat any more...

string.name: f4_s
string.value: Yummy food! Neigh... I'm so happy!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: You can't feed a pretty unicorn like me such cheap food.

string.name: s3
string.value: Pretty master, please use pretty words...wehee...

string.name: s4
string.value: True beauty starts with sincerity! Remember that!

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: Lala...such a cool wind in my mane.

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: Wehee...I don't desire to do so!

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Ah...I miss the chairs in the castle...

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Thank you for your kind consideration.

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: How dare you! Do you realize who you are speaking to?!

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: Aah, since you are asking, I shall.

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: If that is what you wish! Wehee!

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Owie! I've been pricked by a thorn!

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: I'd rather not, I'm a bit sore.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Wehee! How dare you try to command me?

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Okay, hut! Ahh! My legs won't bend!

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: I am truly sorry, but I cannot return the sentiment.

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: La ti da...I can't hear you...

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: Lala, I am singing a song of repentance!

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: I am of a noble personage.

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: I can get angry as well! You...cough cough...my throat...

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: You must not like me anymore.

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: I acknowledge my mistake. I am sorry!

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Please accept the apology of a unicorn prince.

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Do you realize that you are speaking to one of nobility?!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: I am quite disappointed in you!

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Sigh...It is only natural for a horse to move forward!

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: I am truly sorry, but I cannot return the sentiment.

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: I am not the right one for you.

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Lala... My heart is yours as well!

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: I hope that your heart shall never change.

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: I will stand by you always!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: I will overcome our differences, to stand by you!

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: I shall be returning to my kingdom soon.

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: We are of different classes. I am sorry.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Did you at least bring me some sugar cubes?

string.name: c13_s4
string.value: If that is what you desire...

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: I am a prince, but I can be down to earth! Hrrgh!

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: No, this is not right! Not right at all!

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: I hope that you will learn to be a bit more elegant.

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Phhhhhhrt... You didn't hear that! It wasn't me!

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: Unicorns are too dignified for pooping.

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: I am no commoner. How can I go in such a place as this?

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: My leavings are not for all to see!

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: You should get some rest too.

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: I am find just as I am!

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: You need to move around more. Look at your love handles!

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: Posture is important, even when sleeping...zzz...

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: So, this is how the homeless sleep...

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: Can you even think of sleeping at your level?

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Why don't you prepare a nice bed for me first?

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: Aah...I miss my golden bed back in the castle.

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I am not used to taking orders!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: I wish for my kingdom to appear in my dreams.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: We have much to do. There is no time for sleeping!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: How dare you try to command me!

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Bring me some sugar cubes! I am hungry!

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Lala...I am the first prince of the Unicorn Kingdom!

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: I have come here just to meet you.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Dignity and elegance are my pride and calling.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: I shall invite you to my kingdom someday.

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Lala... Let us sing a song!

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: My sister is a beautiful unicorn with a light blue mane.

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Esel and I are good friends.

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: I hope that my sister will be able to visit Maple World.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Esel and I still feel quite...lonely.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Members of the royal family like myself must be careful in all that we say and do!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: It wasn't a mistake that brought me to Maple World.

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: My kingdom is inhabited by only unicorns.

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Do you wish to learn some manners from me?

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: Elegant unicorns such as myself enjoy silence.

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: What? You surprised me. I wasn't expecting you to talk to me.

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: I'm in no mood to talk.

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: There are days when i just feel like being alone. Alone!

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: It is not for anyone to see.

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: If I don't move for 10 minutes, call a doctor.

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: How dare you command a member of the royal family!

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: I refuse! How can an unicorn of my stature stoop so low?

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: Wehee! How dare you try to command me?

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: I am too tired for a trick!

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: I shall show you something that Esel can't even attempt!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: This is a secret move, passed down through the royal family.

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: Aah...I don't think I can perform that today!

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: How can you ask me to do such a thing? I cannot!

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: I am too tired. Please bring me a sugar cube.

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: Wehee. It's not something you can see anytime you want to!

string.name: f2_f
string.value: I am quite full! Please, no more!

string.name: f3_f
string.value: Aah...I miss the meals back in my kingdom..

string.name: s3
string.value: A beautiful word for a beautiful person...

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: Give me a pillow to sit on!

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Just...gonna close my eyes...for a second...

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Stop telling me what to do!

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: I'm not listening to you! You're not my real dad!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Neigh! I don't wanna sit. I wanna sleep.

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: I don't listen to ugly people!

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Whinney... Don't you like me anymore?

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: How can you be mad at a cutie like me?

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: You make me so sad! Neigh!

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: This horn is sharp. Don't make me stab you!

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Promise to love me forever and ever?

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Sorry, but I'm a limited edition unicorn...

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: I'm holding out for my knight in shining armor.

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: FRRRT! N-no, I made that sound with my mouth! Honest!

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: Snort. I'm going to use the toilet!

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: Why are you so curious about it, master? Whinney!

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Give me some sugar cubes, and I'll think about it!

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: No! I wanna play some more!

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Why don't we go hunting instead?

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: Why do I gotta sleep outside? Whinney!

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: No. I'm going to play some more!

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: I'm waiting for my knight in shining armor.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Do you really think it's okay to have a pet unicorn? My legs are tired...

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Whinney! I'm the mysteriousest unicorn of all!

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: My brother's a total snob! Don't tell anyone I said that, okay?

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Esel always makes fun of my mane, but Esel's mane is totally dyed!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Sssh, this is a secret. This hairband is actually my brother's...

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Whinney! Go play on your own!

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: I'm gonna take a nap now.

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Hoompfh, I wanna play with my brother and Esel!

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: Whinney! Not in the mood today.

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: Neigh! Neigh! Why don't YOU talk?

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: Whinney. I'm going to go play.

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: I learned this from a fairy. Neigh!

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: Whinney. I wanna be a star!

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: Stop trying to make me work!

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: Neigh! Only because you asked me!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: I'm gonna turn into a pigacorn!

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: No no no~ Kino don't know such a thing.

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: No! No! Kino don't wanna sit!

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: You want a nice, cool drink?

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Want some juice in the relaxing chair?

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Kino wanna rest now with master.

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: How nice~ I want some juice, too.

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Kino will have some juice now.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: No! No! Kino don't wanna sit now!

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: Why do this to cute Kino? Sob sob...

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: Arooo... Why do this to cute Kino?

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: How dare you be mad at Kino! Aroo!

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: Argh! I hate you for being mad at me!

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Arrrr! Don't be mad at Kino!

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: How dare you be mad at Kino?! Aroo!

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: How dare you be mad at Kino?! Aroo!

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: Just a glass of juice please~

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: No poop now. Glass of juice please~

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Kino poops only in the potty.

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: I was just about to. Aroo!

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Kino wanna meet master in my dream~

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: Kino don't know what you're saying!

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: Kino will dream of you, master~

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: Nothing's better than a relaxing chair.

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: Drinking juice and sitting on a comfy chair... Aroo~~~

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: You know what's in my bag? Aroo~

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: Kino wanna relax in a relaxing chair!

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: What? Kino don't know what that is. Aroo~

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Kino wanna go on an adventure with you.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Aroo... Kino is kinda tired today. How about you?

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: Kino has no idea what you're saying. Aroo~

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Kino wants some juice in the relaxing chair.

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Aroo! Aroooo! Kino is so happy to be with you!

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Aroo! You wanna hear something funny? Eh, maybe next time~

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: No! Kino's not in the mood to talk now.

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: You mean...you want Kino to say something?

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Kino will just go to sleep now.

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: You can't just walk around saying that!

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: You should've at least prepared some nice, sparkling stones.

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: Eek! You're not serious, are you?

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: You're the only one for me, master~

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: Forget the mushy stuff. Let's just have some juice.

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: Phew... Kino needs to sit for now...

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: Nothing beats a lovely glass of orange juice.

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: Nevermind~ Kino will have some juice now.

string.value: Even Kino's bleh is so cute!

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: What? What did you just say?

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Kino don't want any of that.

string.value: No! No! Kino don't do such a thing.

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: There's a lot of ppl on this island so make sure you don't forget about being courteous to everyone around you...KYU...

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: I heard there's a dungeon in the middle of this island...KYU...

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I feel like crap, so I won't talk...KYU...

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: We pets are created by Cloy of Henesys.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: I know it's precious, but you need to take those potions while you fight to get stronger fast!

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Go do some quests and something good may happen~

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: There's not much to say but...feed me!

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: So annoying...I have nothing to say...

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: I'm tired, so I'll tell you later...

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: NO! You haven't showered in days! kyu...

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Master, I'll go hug you up~! Kyu!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Master, I can feel your heartbeat~! KYU!

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: Master...please go take shower right now!

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: NO~! I don't want to hug you! KYU!

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: I like how you embrace me, master

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: Master? You really think I'll hug you up?

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: And you were scolding me just now...

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: If you feed me, I will

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: Master, you smell! I don't wanna hug you~

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Play time~ Play time! PLAY TIME!!

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Who sleeps in the middle of the day...kyu?

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: Ahh...I'm sleepy...master, give me your arm as my pillow...kyu...

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: Please don't have delicious food all to yourself while I'm asleep...kyu...

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: Master! I feel fine~! Hang out with me!

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: If you sing me a song, then I'll fall asleep.

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: You know you're gonna write all over my face while I fall asleep...

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: I can't sleep cuz I'm hungry! FOOD! FOOD!

string.name: c26_s3
string.value: Really? Nice! I feel good~ kyu~

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: That wasn't for me, right? kyu?

string.name: c26_f4
string.value: That was a typo, right? kyu?

string.name: c27_s1
string.value: I love you too, master! KYU!

string.name: c27_s4
string.value: Hehe...I'm gonna tell everyone about this...KYU!

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: Master, I know you're lying. KYU!

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: You're just saying that, right? KYU?

string.name: c28_f2
string.value: One minute you're all over me, now you say you love me...

string.name: c28_f3
string.value: If you love me, how come you aren't feeding me?

string.name: c28_f4
string.value: You think I'll fall for it again...?

string.name: f4_s
string.value: Master this is soooo delicious! Kyu!

string.name: s2
string.value: Kyuu... I am not gonna say that.

string.name: s3
string.value: I am not the kind of Rabbit who speaks of evil words,~

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: Keep watch while I sleep, master.

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: I'll just rest my eyes for a minute...

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: You're not the boss of me!

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: Nah, nah, nah. I hear nothing.

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: I'm sorry! I didn't mean it!

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: I wish Utah were my master instead.

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: I'm sorry! I didn't mean it!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I wish Utah were my master instead.

string.value: Are you even capable of truly loving?

string.value: I feel warm and fuzzy inside!

string.name: c1_f2
string.value: I see no purpose in sitting.

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: Why are you mortals always so frivolous with your wishes?

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: Does this please you, oh temporary master?

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: Have you decided your real wishes yet?

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: May I do something else? Grawr?

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Does this make me look more regal?

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Wouldn't you rather I eat someone?

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: I just place my bottom upon the ground?

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: Sitting with you is quite relaxing.

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: I am able to conjure the powers of the heavens as well, you know?

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: I will, should you bring me a loaf of the meat variety.

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Seven hundred thousand years of magical power and you ask me to sit.

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Ask me for riches like a normal person!

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: I am seated already, mortal. Are you blinded with awe?

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Speak to me when you have discovered respect.

string.name: c5_s2
string.value: I will attempt to be better.

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: That may be a slight overreaction.

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: Well, if you put it that way...

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: Do not blame me for being myself!

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Perhaps it is YOU who are at fault, mortal!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: I have done nothing to earn your scorn!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: A bolt of lightning might change your attitude.

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: I understand, you are under a lot of stress.

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: I am above your mortal emotions.

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Was I so wrong? It was only a squirrel!

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: I will not be sad! I will not be sad!

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: One of these days, I'm going to drop this marble on your head.

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Is this how you mortals treat one another?!

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: I will watch you fry one day.

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: I haven't felt this bad since I ate that priest.

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: I find you strangely terrifying, mortal.

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: I have shamed a thousand generations of my ancestors.

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: But I have done everything you asked!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: You are the most fickle mortal I've ever met.

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: You are adorable when you are angry.

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Find something else to yell at!

string.name: c9_s2
string.value: I hope you do not come to harm.

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: Aren't you supposed to be trembling in fear?

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: I will not be talked down to!

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: You are making my scales itch.

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Why do my cheeks feel warm? WHAT HAVE YOU DONE TO ME?!

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: My heart thumps when you say these measly words!

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: I believe you mortals would say, "ditto".

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: My dragon heart is not to be trifled with.

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: Do not say anything you will regret.

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: I, uh, have to wash my scales tonight.

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Hey, how about those Green Mushrooms? Very green, aren't they?

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Would you like me to take you flying?

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: I will move the heavens for you!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Might a humble dragon receive a kiss?

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: Are mortal affections given so freely?

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: I am sure you say this to all your pets.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Who needs love when you have power?!

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: My eyes may be closed, but I have the reflexes of a water dragon!

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: I was already going to do that.

string.name: c13_f1
string.value: Perhaps you'll think of a better wish later.

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: Grawr! It is not my nap time!

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: I have little need for such things.

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: I suppose I could use a recharge.

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: We mighty dragons have no need for sleep!

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: This place is not fit for my great slumber!

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: I am no cat, content to lie in the sun!

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: May I rest upon your lap? This cloud is quite cold.

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Oh, the dreams I will have!

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Your wish is granted, mortal! Zzzzzz

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: What if I were to eat you in my sleep?

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: This area is too loud! My dragon ears are sensitive.

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Can't we go battle some monsters?

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: I JUST drank some dragon coffee!

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Allow me to fill in your pitiful knowledge of dragons...

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: I was once a mere thunder lizard, until I caught this orb.

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: Do know you how luck you are? Let me tell you.

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: If that is what you wish...

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: I did not descend from the heavens to banter!

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: Your world is teeming with life.

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: My mane is made of the finest spun gold.

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: I am omnipotent and all powerful, but I do get a little lonely.

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Hold on, let me see if I have anything...NO.

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: Why do you waste my power?

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Your enormous head must be quite a burden.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Does this orb make my tail look fat?

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: All behold the glory of my master and its silly face!

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: My wisdom sounds much better in the original Dragon.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: What do you want to talk about?

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: Do the powers of the gods so amuse you?

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: This show of force is quite exhausting.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Grawr! Look at all these lightning bolts!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: My thunder will break the heavens!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: This is no mere trick! This is an event!

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: I tire of these petty displays.

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Have you nothing better to wish for?!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: I will sink through my cloud if I eat another bite!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: I try to say no, but my belly continues to rumble.

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: No more, I have much...um...business to attend to.

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: Truly you are a great chef, master!

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: Do not look upon me. I am such a fat dragon...

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: You will not be my master forever...

string.name: c22
string.value: I do not comprehend your ridiculous ways.

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: I WILL eat you. You are but a worm in my eyes.

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: Do not curse the commander of lightning!

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: My real form is scary, Mr'kuma!

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: You do trick. I want laugh when you fall.

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: I show you already! You have bad brain!

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: What if I did this at your next surprise party?

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Let's go scare some little girls with this trick!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: With this power, I could conquer all of you puny humans.

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Bask in awe, master! I am a being of pure terror!

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: How about I torch all your underwear instead?

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Are you sure? You can never unsee it.

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Shouldn't we be undermining somebody's hope?

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: I'll eat your eyebrows if you tell me that again!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: What are you trying to do to me?!

string.name: s3
string.value: Old boss call me that. He so cool.

string.name: s4
string.value: Hey! Even we demons have some etiquette.

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: Why should I listen to you?

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: Do I look like a dog to you? Sit, indeed!

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: Yes, perhaps I shall rest my wings. RAWK!!

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: Who are you to order me around? Hm?

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: Birds can't sit, you featherless buffoon!

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: I'm sitting already! I'm sitting RIGHT NOW!

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Yes, yes, what is it?! I swear, if you tell me to sit one more time...

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: I would be DELIGHTED if you joined me! Don't you have a chair?

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Very well. But what's this? No cushion?

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: You dare tell me to sit? RAWK!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Where shall I sit? On your shoulder? Or on your head?

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: The dictionary defines 'sit' as resting with the torso vertical and the body supported on the buttocks. Correct?

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: Yes, it's nice to sit with my intellectual equal. RAWK!

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Yes, I am quite tired. We've been on a long journey, and I fear I've talked myself into a stupor. RAWK!

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Why do you insist I sit?

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Don't you know any other commands?!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: No. No, that's quite all right. Rawk!

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: Perhaps I was bad. But you'll hear no apology from me!

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: Of course. It won't happen again. Whatever you say.

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: What can I say? My apologies.

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: What is the meaning of this? Unbelievable...

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: I've nothing to say to a tyrant like you!

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: How does throwing a temper tantrum help anything?

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: There's no need to be so forceful.

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: I understand. But is this really my fault?

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: I'll hear you out. What did I do wrong this time?

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: Rawk! Do you want an apology?

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: If you can explain to me what I did wrong, I will be more than happy to apologize.

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Perhaps what I did was wrong, but will an apology REALLY make you feel better?

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: I know what I did was wrong! I don't need you to remind me.

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Yes, I'm a bad parrot. Does that make you feel better?

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: I have nothing to say to you. RAWK!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: I don't know what you're talking about, and I don't care!

string.value: I can't sleep on the floor! Bring me some nice, comfortable branches to perch on.

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: I can't talk now. I'd rather chat! Rawk! Rawk! RAAAWK!

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: You're going to hit me after I fall asleep, right? I'm on to you!

string.name: c18_f4

string.value: Sometimes the cap'n doesn't use good grammar! Rawk!

string.value: Don't get me wrong, Adriano's a fine navigator. But isn't he a little too quiet?

string.value: A pirate ship is blind without a good parrot in the crow's nest! Rawk!

string.value: Hello! Hello! Kraw want a cracker!

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: Why should I listen to you?

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: Do I look like a dog to you? Sit, indeed!

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: Yes, perhaps I shall rest my wings. RAWK!!

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: Who are you to order me around? Hm?

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: Birds can't sit, you featherless buffoon!

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: I'm sitting already! I'm sitting RIGHT NOW!

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Yes, yes, what is it?! I swear, if you tell me to sit one more time...

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: I would be DELIGHTED if you joined me! Don't you have a chair?

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Very well. But what's this? No cushion?

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: You dare tell me to sit? RAWK!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Where shall I sit? On your shoulder? Or on your head?

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: The dictionary defines 'sit' as resting with the torso vertical and the body supported on the buttocks. Correct?

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: Yes, it's nice to sit with my intellectual equal. RAWK!

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Yes, I am quite tired. We've been on a long journey, and I fear I've talked myself into a stupor. RAWK!

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Why do you insist I sit?

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Don't you know any other commands?!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: No. No, that's quite all right. Rawk!

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: Perhaps I was bad. But you'll hear no apology from me!

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: Of course. It won't happen again. Whatever you say.

string.value: What can I say? My apologies.

string.name: c6_f4

string.name: c7_s3

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: I understand. But is this really my fault?

string.name: c7_f2

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: Rawk! Do you want an apology?

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: I know what I did was wrong! I don't need you to remind me.

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Yes, I'm a bad parrot. Does that make you feel better?

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: Watch Bonkey dance. Watch Bonkey dance!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: Bonkey best dancer. Dance dance dance!

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Shake Bonkey shake! Shake shake shake!

string.name: c1_f2
string.value: I see no purpose in sitting.

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: Why are you mortals always so frivolous with your wishes?

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: Does this please you, oh temporary master?

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: Have you decided your real wishes yet?

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: May I do something else? Grawr?

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Does this make me look more regal?

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Wouldn't you rather I eat someone?

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: I just place my bottom upon the ground?

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: Sitting with you is quite relaxing.

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: I am able to conjure the powers of the heavens as well, you know?

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: I will, should you bring me a loaf of the meat variety.

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Seven hundred thousand years of magical power and you ask me to sit.

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Ask me for riches like a normal person!

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: I am seated already, mortal. Are you blinded with awe?

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Speak to me when you have discovered respect.

string.name: c5_s2
string.value: I will attempt to be better.

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: That may be a slight overreaction.

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: Well, if you put it that way...

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: Do not blame me for being myself!

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Perhaps it is YOU who are at fault, mortal!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: I have done nothing to earn your scorn!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: A bolt of lightning might change your attitude.

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: I understand, you are under a lot of stress.

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: I am above your mortal emotions.

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Was I so wrong? It was only a squirrel!

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: I will not be sad! I will not be sad!

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: One of these days, I'm going to drop this marble on your head.

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Is this how you mortals treat one another?!

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: I will watch you fry one day.

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: I haven't felt this bad since I ate that priest.

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: I find you strangely terrifying, mortal.

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: I have shamed a thousand generations of my ancestors.

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: But I have done everything you asked!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: You are the most fickle mortal I've ever met.

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: You are adorable when you are angry.

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Find something else to yell at!

string.name: c9_s2
string.value: I hope you do not come to harm.

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: Aren't you supposed to be trembling in fear?

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: I will not be talked down to!

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: You are making my scales itch.

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Why do my cheeks feel warm? WHAT HAVE YOU DONE TO ME?!

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: My heart thumps when you say these measly words!

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: I believe you mortals would say, "ditto".

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: My dragon heart is not to be trifled with.

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: Do not say anything you will regret.

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: I, uh, have to wash my scales tonight.

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Hey, how about those Green Mushrooms? Very green, aren't they?

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Would you like me to take you flying?

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: I will move the heavens for you!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Might a humble dragon receive a kiss?

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: Are mortal affections given so freely?

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: I am sure you say this to all your pets.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Who needs love when you have power?!

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: My eyes may be closed, but I have the reflexes of a water dragon!

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: I was already going to do that.

string.name: c13_f1
string.value: Perhaps you'll think of a better wish later.

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: Grawr! It is not my nap time!

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: I have little need for such things.

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: I suppose I could use a recharge.

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: We mighty dragons have no need for sleep!

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: This place is not fit for my great slumber!

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: I am no cat, content to lie in the sun!

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: May I rest upon your lap? This cloud is quite cold.

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Oh, the dreams I will have!

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Your wish is granted, mortal! Zzzzzz

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: What if I were to eat you in my sleep?

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: This area is too loud! My dragon ears are sensitive.

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Can't we go battle some monsters?

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: I JUST drank some dragon coffee!

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Allow me to fill in your pitiful knowledge of dragons...

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: I was once a mere thunder lizard, until I caught this orb.

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: Do know you how luck you are? Let me tell you.

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: If that is what you wish...

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: I did not descend from the heavens to banter!

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: Your world is teeming with life.

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: My mane is made of the finest spun gold.

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: I am omnipotent and all powerful, but I do get a little lonely.

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Hold on, let me see if I have anything...NO.

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: Why do you waste my power?

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Your enormous head must be quite a burden.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Does this orb make my tail look fat?

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: All behold the glory of my master and its silly face!

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: My wisdom sounds much better in the original Dragon.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: What do you want to talk about?

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: Do the powers of the gods so amuse you?

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: This show of force is quite exhausting.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Grawr! Look at all these lightning bolts!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: My thunder will break the heavens!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: This is no mere trick! This is an event!

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: I tire of these petty displays.

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Have you nothing better to wish for?!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: I will sink through my cloud if I eat another bite!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: I try to say no, but my belly continues to rumble.

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: No more, I have much...um...business to attend to.

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: Truly you are a great chef, master!

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: Do not look upon me. I am such a fat dragon...

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: You will not be my master forever...

string.name: c22
string.value: I do not comprehend your ridiculous ways.

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: I WILL eat you. You are but a worm in my eyes.

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: Do not curse the commander of lightning!

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: My real form is scary, Mr'kuma!

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: You do trick. I want laugh when you fall.

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: I show you already! You have bad brain!

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: What if I did this at your next surprise party?

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Let's go scare some little girls with this trick!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: With this power, I could conquer all of you puny humans.

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Bask in awe, master! I am a being of pure terror!

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: How about I torch all your underwear instead?

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Are you sure? You can never unsee it.

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Shouldn't we be undermining somebody's hope?

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: I'll eat your eyebrows if you tell me that again!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: What are you trying to do to me?!

string.name: s3
string.value: Old boss call me that. He so cool.

string.name: s4
string.value: Hey! Even we demons have some etiquette.

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: You want me to sit like this? Bark?

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: It's so sleepy sitting down, bark!

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: I don't understand what the master's saying! Kong!

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: I have no clue what you said! Barkbark!

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: No I don't want to sit! Barkbark!

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Master, this is how you sit, right? Woof!

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Master, I'm doing well, right? Right? Woof woof!

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: I hope the master keeps asking me to sit...woof woof!

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: I have short legs, so it's easy to sit! woof woof!

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Master, I can't tell what you're saying! woof woof!

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Master, do I HAVE to sit right now? woof woof!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Let's do something else right now! woof woof!

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: It's too dirty to sit here! Woof woof!

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Yo master...still telling me to sit? IT's waaay too easy...

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: My back legs are so short, I feel more comfortable sitting like this...hehe...

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: You want me to sit? Here...this is the right way, right?

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Ahh...itchy...(acting like I didn't hear it...)

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Sitting is waaaay too easy. Give me something hard to work on.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: (scratching) Whoa? What did you just say? I didn't hear you!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: I'm sick of doing stuff at your command...

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: Please don't give me that look...bark bark!

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Krrr...Do you want to be punished by ME?

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: I didn't do anything wrong! Bark Bark Bark!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: I was just sitting here...BARK BARK BARK!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Krrrr...One of these days, I won't take it anymore...BARK BARK!

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: Master, I'll be careful from here on out...wooof...

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: Master! Things like that happen at times...why so mad? Woof woof!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Master, just because you're bored, doesn't mean you have a right to abuse me! Woof woof!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Where else will you find a cute pet like this? Krrrr...

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: I didn't do anything wrong! Woof woof!!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: Master...I'll be more careful next time...

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: Master, I'll be good, I'll be good...

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Man...the master's going off on me again...and I didn't do a thing...

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Rrrr...master's not happy over a nothing...

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: Huh? I was too itchy to hear that...bark...!

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: Ahh, itchy...I'll just pretend I never heard that...bark...

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: What did the master just say? Bark...

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: How can you say such thing...woof woof...

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: Master, are you for real...? Woof........

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Master, was that a joke? Woof!

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: You didn't mean that, right? Woof woof...

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Ey...You mean that for real? Woof???

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Ey...you were just saying that because you're bored, right? Woof?

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: You say that everyday...that hurts you know...

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Master, I'll be good...just don't leave me alone...

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Whatever you tell me, I'll still be following you and only you...sigh...

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: How can you...you don't really mean it, right?

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: What? What did you say? I can't hear you!

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Ahh, itchy...stop saying that and bathe me instead!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I'm sick of hearing that now...hehe...

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Oh that felt good! Bark bark!

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: Hehe...I must have drank a lot of water...bark bark!

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: I don't feel like peeing right now...bark...

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: How am I supposed to pee on purpose when there's nothing coming out...bark...

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: It's embarassing to pee here...BARK! BARK BARK!

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Hehe...NO!! Got some on my legs!!! Woof.........

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Master...it hasn't been long since I last peed...woof...

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: Hey master, it's not time to pee just yet...woof...

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Ahhhh, that feels good...but it's still embarassing...

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: Shhhh....wait, that OJ I drank...that's a funny-looking pee there...

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Shhhhhhh! Oops, almost stepped on it...

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: I haven't had anything to pee out anyway...

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: It's a secret, just between you and me...I have a hidden bone around this area...bark bark!

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: What's the latest on radio? Bark bark bark! Kong!

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: What's your hobby? Hopefully it's something that involves me...hehe...BARK!

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: I heard in one of the hidden streets at Henesys ther's a huuuuuge mushroom called Mushmom, am I right? Bark!

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: How's a dog supposed to talk? Bark!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: NO! Don't feel like talking! BARK BARK!

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: I have nothing to say to you! Bark!

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I feel like crap! Bark bark!!!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Please change up the menu every once in a while...I'm sick of eating the same thing over and over again...

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Every once in a while, I feel like riding a boat to some other island and just chill there...woof woof!

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: How are you today? Good? Right? Good!! Woof woof!

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: You better be careful not to get ripped off when doing business with someone else...woof woof...

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: Don't feel like talking...I'm really depressed...woof woof...

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: II'm depressed...everything's annoying...don't feel like talking...woof...

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: What's the menu for today? Can I get something nice?

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Master, you have a huge head! hahha!

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: You look like you've got yourself quite a belly there...haha!

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Ey...how about feeding me right now?

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: So annoying! must have nothing to do right now...

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: Man...do I have to talk again? Don't feel like it...

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: What do you think? Good? GOOD? Bark bark!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Well, I'm smart, what can I say? Bark bark!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Sweeet! Here, what do you think? Bark bark!

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: No! I wanna do something else! Bark bark!

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: I don't know what you're saying!!! Bark! Bark!

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Can't understand what you're saying! Bark bark!

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: You have a short tongue, right? I have noooo idea what you're saying! Bark bark!

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Master, that was good, right? Right? Woof woof!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Hehe...this is really easy! Woof woof!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: I'll do whatever you ask me to do! Woof woof!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Master, is this how you do it? Woof woof!

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: Just feed me first! Woof woof!!

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: The floor's too dirty so I don't want to do that! Woof!

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: Why don't you lie on your belly first! Woof...!

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: You show me first!! Woof woof!

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: Like...this? I'm just going to do this once...

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: Like this, huh? Whatever you ask me to do...

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: Hey master! I won't do everything you ask me to do...!

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: Master! I'm hungry; just feed me!

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: Like this? Woof woof...this is hard...

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: Whoa...the air's much cleaner up here...woof!

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: MMy...my legs are short...that's why it's hard...woof!

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: How am I supposed to get up with these legs? Woof woof!

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: Hey master, but I can't walk on two feet...

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: Whoa...with these shorties? I'm incredible, kong kong kong!

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: Maybe if I get fed right now...

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: With these short legs, I can't even stand on four feet well..

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: Is the master trying to put me on showcase for a circus?

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: Can't be asking too much from a dog...

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: What did you just say? Bark bark...

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: That's MY MASTER, ladies and gentlemen...

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: I know you're lying, master...woof woof.

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: I was thinking of something else...and I didn't hear it...Woof...

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: You think I'll like you back? Woof...

string.name: c28_s1
string.value: I love you too master very very much!

string.name: c28_s3
string.value: You better love me and no one else!

string.name: c28_f2
string.value: Everyone knows that's just a token gesture...

string.name: c28_f3
string.value: And then the master will go off on me later...

string.name: c28_f4
string.value: You think I'll fall for that again...?

string.name: f2_f
string.value: I'm so full I can't eat anymore...woof...

string.name: f3_s
string.value: Master, this is really delicious! Woof woof...

string.name: f3_f
string.value: Master, I can't eat anymore...woof woof...

string.name: s2
string.value: No, please don't say that! Woof!

string.value: You want me to sit like this? Bark?

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: It's so sleepy sitting down, bark!

string.name: c2_f3

string.value: I didn't do anything wrong! Bark Bark Bark!

string.value: I was just sitting here...BARK BARK BARK!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Krrrr...One of these days, I won't take it anymore...BARK BARK!

string.value: Master, I'll be careful from here on out...wooof...

string.value: Master! Things like that happen at times...why so mad? Woof woof!

string.value: Master, just because you're bored, doesn't mean you have a right to abuse me! Woof woof!

string.value: Master, I'll be good, I'll be good...

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: Huh? I was too itchy to hear that...bark...!

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: Ahh, itchy...I'll just pretend I never heard that...bark...

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: What did the master just say? Bark...

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: How can you say such thing...woof woof...

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: Master, are you for real...? Woof........

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Master, was that a joke? Woof!

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: You didn't mean that, right? Woof woof...

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Ey...You mean that for real? Woof???

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Ey...you were just saying that because you're bored, right? Woof?

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: You say that everyday...that hurts you know...

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Master, I'll be good...just don't leave me alone...

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Whatever you tell me, I'll still be following you and only you...sigh...

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: How can you...you don't really mean it, right?

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: What? What did you say? I can't hear you!

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Ahh, itchy...stop saying that and bathe me instead!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I'm sick of hearing that now...hehe...

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Oh that felt good! Bark bark!

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: Hehe...I must have drank a lot of water...bark bark!

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: I don't feel like peeing right now...bark...

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: How am I supposed to pee on purpose when there's nothing coming out...bark...

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: It's embarassing to pee here...BARK! BARK BARK!

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Hehe...NO!! Got some on my legs!!! Woof.........

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Master...it hasn't been long since I last peed...woof...

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: Hey master, it's not time to pee just yet...woof...

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Ahhhh, that feels good...but it's still embarassing...

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: Shhhh....wait, that OJ I drank...that's a funny-looking pee there...

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Shhhhhhh! Oops, almost stepped on it...

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: I haven't had anything to pee out anyway...

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: It's a secret, just between you and me...I have a hidden bone around this area...bark bark!

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: What's the latest on radio? Bark bark bark! Kong!

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: What's your hobby? Hopefully it's something that involves me...hehe...BARK!

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: I heard in one of the hidden streets at Henesys ther's a huuuuuge mushroom called Mushmom, am I right? Bark!

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: How's a dog supposed to talk? Bark!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: NO! Don't feel like talking! BARK BARK!

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: I have nothing to say to you! Bark!

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I feel like crap! Bark bark!!!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Please change up the menu every once in a while...I'm sick of eating the same thing over and over again...

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Every once in a while, I feel like riding a boat to some other island and just chill there...woof woof!

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: How are you today? Good? Right? Good!! Woof woof!

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: You better be careful not to get ripped off when doing business with someone else...woof woof...

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: Don't feel like talking...I'm really depressed...woof woof...

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: II'm depressed...everything's annoying...don't feel like talking...woof...

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: What's the menu for today? Can I get something nice?

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Master, you have a huge head! hahha!

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: You look like you've got yourself quite a belly there...haha!

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Ey...how about feeding me right now?

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: So annoying! must have nothing to do right now...

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: Man...do I have to talk again? Don't feel like it...

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: What do you think? Good? GOOD? Bark bark!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Well, I'm smart, what can I say? Bark bark!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Sweeet! Here, what do you think? Bark bark!

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: No! I wanna do something else! Bark bark!

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: I don't know what you're saying!!! Bark! Bark!

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Can't understand what you're saying! Bark bark!

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: You have a short tongue, right? I have noooo idea what you're saying! Bark bark!

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Master, that was good, right? Right? Woof woof!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Hehe...this is really easy! Woof woof!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: I'll do whatever you ask me to do! Woof woof!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Master, is this how you do it? Woof woof!

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: Just feed me first! Woof woof!!

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: The floor's too dirty so I don't want to do that! Woof!

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: Why don't you lie on your belly first! Woof...!

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: You show me first!! Woof woof!

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: Like...this? I'm just going to do this once...

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: Like this, huh? Whatever you ask me to do...

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: Hey master! I won't do everything you ask me to do...!

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: Master! I'm hungry; just feed me!

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: Like this? Woof woof...this is hard...

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: Whoa...the air's much cleaner up here...woof!

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: MMy...my legs are short...that's why it's hard...woof!

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: How am I supposed to get up with these legs? Woof woof!

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: Hey master, but I can't walk on two feet...

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: Whoa...with these shorties? I'm incredible, kong kong kong!

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: Maybe if I get fed right now...

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: With these short legs, I can't even stand on four feet well..

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: Is the master trying to put me on showcase for a circus?

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: Can't be asking too much from a dog...

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: What did you just say? Bark bark...

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: That's MY MASTER, ladies and gentlemen...

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: I know you're lying, master...woof woof.

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: I was thinking of something else...and I didn't hear it...Woof...

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: You think I'll like you back? Woof...

string.name: c28_s1
string.value: I love you too master very very much!

string.name: c28_s3
string.value: You better love me and no one else!

string.name: c28_f2
string.value: Everyone knows that's just a token gesture...

string.name: c28_f3
string.value: And then the master will go off on me later...

string.name: c28_f4
string.value: You think I'll fall for that again...?

string.name: f2_f
string.value: I'm so full I can't eat anymore...woof...

string.name: f3_s
string.value: Master, this is really delicious! Woof woof...

string.name: f3_f
string.value: Master, I can't eat anymore...woof woof...

string.name: s2
string.value: No, please don't say that! Woof!

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: You want me to sit like this? Bark?

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: It's so sleepy sitting down, bark!

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: I don't understand what the master's saying! Kong!

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: I have no clue what you said! Barkbark!

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: No I don't want to sit! Barkbark!

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Master, this is how you sit, right? Woof!

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Master, I'm doing well, right? Right? Woof woof!

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: I hope the master keeps asking me to sit...woof woof!

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: I have short legs, so it's easy to sit! woof woof!

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Master, I can't tell what you're saying! woof woof!

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Master, do I HAVE to sit right now? woof woof!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Let's do something else right now! woof woof!

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: It's too dirty to sit here! Woof woof!

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Yo master...still telling me to sit? IT's waaay too easy...

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: My back legs are so short, I feel more comfortable sitting like this...hehe...

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: You want me to sit? Here...this is the right way, right?

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Ahh...itchy...(acting like I didn't hear it...)

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Sitting is waaaay too easy. Give me something hard to work on.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: (scratching) Whoa? What did you just say? I didn't hear you!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: I'm sick of doing stuff at your command...

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: Please don't give me that look...bark bark!

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Krrr...Do you want to be punished by ME?

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: I didn't do anything wrong! Bark Bark Bark!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: I was just sitting here...BARK BARK BARK!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Krrrr...One of these days, I won't take it anymore...BARK BARK!

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: Master, I'll be careful from here on out...wooof...

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: Master! Things like that happen at times...why so mad? Woof woof!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Master, just because you're bored, doesn't mean you have a right to abuse me! Woof woof!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Where else will you find a cute pet like this? Krrrr...

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: I didn't do anything wrong! Woof woof!!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: Master...I'll be more careful next time...

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: Master, I'll be good, I'll be good...

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Man...the master's going off on me again...and I didn't do a thing...

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Rrrr...master's not happy over a nothing...
