string.name: c3_s2
string.value: I sit on ground for now.

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: You no want I steal gold? I steal good, Mr'kuma.

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Don't wanna! I wanna set your hair on fire!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Sit? Me not know word. Hehehe...

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Okay, human. You tell me when we are going to eat monsters again.

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: I will sit for you, Mr'kuma. You are scary and powerful!

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: I do as you say, for now...

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Later, you sit and I get to burn houses down!

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: No way! I am not your kr'grana!

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: I don't wanna! I am mighty and full of fangs!

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Rak! Why you always want to sit?!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: You take me to lake of fire first!

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: My old boss was scary too. He eat my brother! So fun!

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: You scare many monsters with your talk! Scare me a little too...

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: No talk to me like kr'gana. Me much strong!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Rak unar! I eat your wallet tonight!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: I like it when you are angry, Mr'kuma. I will be angry too!

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Yes! Let's find some little kids to yell at!

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: Everytime you yell, I feel a little more at home...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Ha! More! Tell me how worthless I am!

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: You always say the same insults. Think up something new!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: I know you can do better than that, Mr'kuma.

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: I know you have more rage in you than that...

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: I don't want to be flattered right now!

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Why you talk like wimp, Mr'kuma?

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Grauk-mouthed unar! You think I simple?!

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: I no fall for trick. Old Mr'kuma trick me like this long ago.

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: Hand over wallet, Mr'kuma. You go crazy in your mind.

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: I come back when you not trying to eat me.

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: You are the cruelest of all masters...and I like it.

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Are you mad at me because I tortured your goldfish? He was asking for it!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: That is the rudest thing you can say in demon culture!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Now I see you are just trying to be mean to me. Thank you, Mr'kuma!

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: There is no such thing as love.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: My heart is cold and black like a piece of coal!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I'm almost getting used to this constant abuse.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: You're just trying to make me get mad again.

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Why say word "poop" all time, Mr'aku?

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: You like drakla so much? I give to you.

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: I not eat enough monster today!

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: You no treasure drakla. It MY drakla!

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Master, you love pooping as much as I do!

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: I bet I can burn a hole in the ground with this one...

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: I love stinking up your fresh air, Mr'kuma.

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Empty out everything, master. Even your soul!

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: I'll let go of this poop when I darn well feel like it.

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: My bottom still hurts from the last one.

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: I have got to stop eating so many spicy monsters.

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: Good unar. We find many nightmare!

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: I like sleep. Let me eat many monster heads when wake.

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: You sleep too, Mr'kuma. I steal many wallet for you later.

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: No! You try take my eyeballs while I sleep!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: I no want to! I want eat shopkeeper toes!

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: Sleep yourself, Mr'putama. I go find demon friends.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: I could go for a little power nap on some hot coals.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Don't destroy any villages without me, okay, Mr'kuma?

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: I'll wake up when home freezes over.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Pitchforks, fire, and screaming people. This is going to be a great dream.

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: You can go to sleep if you want. I promise not to chew on your nose.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I don't need to rest! I'm an infernal machine!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: I ate an entire case of espresso beans while you weren't looking.

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: I know better than to trust you.

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: I am great and wise man-demon!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: I am Mr'kuma to ghost of death like you are Mr'kuma to me.

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: I will let you avoid death, if you prove that you are strong.

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Only the guilty have to fear death. Are you guilty?

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: If you can stand in the face of death, we can be partners in destruction.

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: I make poona energy for you, Mr'kuma!

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: See my power! We destroy much together!

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: My real form is scary, Mr'kuma!

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: You do trick. I want laugh when you fall.

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: I show you already! You have bad brain!

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: What if I did this at your next surprise party?

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Let's go scare some little girls with this trick!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: With this power, I could conquer all of you puny humans.

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Bask in awe, master! I am a being of pure terror!

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: How about I torch all your underwear instead?

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Are you sure? You can never unsee it.

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Shouldn't we be undermining somebody's hope?

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: I'll eat your eyebrows if you tell me that again!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: What are you trying to do to me?!

string.name: s3
string.value: Old boss call me that. He so cool.

string.name: s4
string.value: Hey! Even we demons have some etiquette.

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: I sit on ground for now.

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: You no want I steal gold? I steal good, Mr'kuma.

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Don't wanna! I wanna set your hair on fire!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Sit? Me not know word. Hehehe...

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Okay, human. You tell me when we are going to eat monsters again.

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: I will sit for you, Mr'kuma. You are scary and powerful!

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: I do as you say, for now...

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Later, you sit and I get to burn houses down!

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: No way! I am not your kr'grana!

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: I don't wanna! I am mighty and full of fangs!

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Rak! Why you always want to sit?!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: You take me to lake of fire first!

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: My old boss was scary too. He eat my brother! So fun!

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: You scare many monsters with your talk! Scare me a little too...

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: No talk to me like kr'gana. Me much strong!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Rak unar! I eat your wallet tonight!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: I like it when you are angry, Mr'kuma. I will be angry too!

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Yes! Let's find some little kids to yell at!

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: Everytime you yell, I feel a little more at home...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Ha! More! Tell me how worthless I am!

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: You always say the same insults. Think up something new!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: I know you can do better than that, Mr'kuma.

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: I know you have more rage in you than that...

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: I don't want to be flattered right now!

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Why you talk like wimp, Mr'kuma?

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Grauk-mouthed unar! You think I simple?!

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: I no fall for trick. Old Mr'kuma trick me like this long ago.

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: Hand over wallet, Mr'kuma. You go crazy in your mind.

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: I come back when you not trying to eat me.

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: You are the cruelest of all masters...and I like it.

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Are you mad at me because I tortured your goldfish? He was asking for it!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: That is the rudest thing you can say in demon culture!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Now I see you are just trying to be mean to me. Thank you, Mr'kuma!

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: There is no such thing as love.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: My heart is cold and black like a piece of coal!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I'm almost getting used to this constant abuse.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: You're just trying to make me get mad again.

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Why say word "poop" all time, Mr'aku?

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: You like drakla so much? I give to you.

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: I not eat enough monster today!

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: You no treasure drakla. It MY drakla!

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Master, you love pooping as much as I do!

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: I bet I can burn a hole in the ground with this one...

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: I love stinking up your fresh air, Mr'kuma.

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Empty out everything, master. Even your soul!

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: I'll let go of this poop when I darn well feel like it.

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: My bottom still hurts from the last one.

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: I have got to stop eating so many spicy monsters.

string.value: Bask in awe, master! I am a being of pure terror!

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: How about I torch all your underwear instead?

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Are you sure? You can never unsee it.

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Shouldn't we be undermining somebody's hope?

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: I'll eat your eyebrows if you tell me that again!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: What are you trying to do to me?!

string.name: s3
string.value: Old boss call me that. He so cool.

string.name: s4
string.value: Hey! Even we demons have some etiquette.

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: I sit on ground for now.

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: You no want I steal gold? I steal good, Mr'kuma.

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Don't wanna! I wanna set your hair on fire!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Sit? Me not know word. Hehehe...

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Okay, human. You tell me when we are going to eat monsters again.

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: I will sit for you, Mr'kuma. You are scary and powerful!

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: I do as you say, for now...

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Later, you sit and I get to burn houses down!

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: No way! I am not your kr'grana!

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: I don't wanna! I am mighty and full of fangs!

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Rak! Why you always want to sit?!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: You take me to lake of fire first!

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: My old boss was scary too. He eat my brother! So fun!

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: You scare many monsters with your talk! Scare me a little too...

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: No talk to me like kr'gana. Me much strong!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Rak unar! I eat your wallet tonight!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: I like it when you are angry, Mr'kuma. I will be angry too!

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Yes! Let's find some little kids to yell at!

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: Everytime you yell, I feel a little more at home...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Ha! More! Tell me how worthless I am!

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: You always say the same insults. Think up something new!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: I know you can do better than that, Mr'kuma.

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: I know you have more rage in you than that...

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: I don't want to be flattered right now!

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Why you talk like wimp, Mr'kuma?

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Grauk-mouthed unar! You think I simple?!

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: I no fall for trick. Old Mr'kuma trick me like this long ago.

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: Hand over wallet, Mr'kuma. You go crazy in your mind.

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: I come back when you not trying to eat me.

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: You are the cruelest of all masters...and I like it.

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Are you mad at me because I tortured your goldfish? He was asking for it!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: That is the rudest thing you can say in demon culture!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Now I see you are just trying to be mean to me. Thank you, Mr'kuma!

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: There is no such thing as love.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: My heart is cold and black like a piece of coal!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I'm almost getting used to this constant abuse.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: You're just trying to make me get mad again.

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Why say word "poop" all time, Mr'aku?

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: You like drakla so much? I give to you.

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: I not eat enough monster today!

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: You no treasure drakla. It MY drakla!

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Master, you love pooping as much as I do!

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: I bet I can burn a hole in the ground with this one...

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: I love stinking up your fresh air, Mr'kuma.

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Empty out everything, master. Even your soul!

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: I'll let go of this poop when I darn well feel like it.

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: My bottom still hurts from the last one.

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: I have got to stop eating so many spicy monsters.

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: Good unar. We find many nightmare!

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: I like sleep. Let me eat many monster heads when wake.

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: You sleep too, Mr'kuma. I steal many wallet for you later.

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: No! You try take my eyeballs while I sleep!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: I no want to! I want eat shopkeeper toes!

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: Sleep yourself, Mr'putama. I go find demon friends.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: I could go for a little power nap on some hot coals.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Don't destroy any villages without me, okay, Mr'kuma?

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: I'll wake up when home freezes over.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Pitchforks, fire, and screaming people. This is going to be a great dream.

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: You can go to sleep if you want. I promise not to chew on your nose.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I don't need to rest! I'm an infernal machine!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: I ate an entire case of espresso beans while you weren't looking.

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: I know better than to trust you.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: I am Mr'kuma to ghost of jealousy like you are Mr'kuma to me.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Have you felt jealousy of another, unar-master?

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: I will let you avoid jealousy, if you prove that you are strong.

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: You will see the firey hand of jealousy!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: If you can make me jealous, we can have a real relationship.

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: I make poona energy for you, Mr'kuma!

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: See my power! We destroy much together!

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: My real form is scary, Mr'kuma!

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: You do trick. I want laugh when you fall.

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: I show you already! You have bad brain!

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: What if I did this at your next surprise party?

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Let's go scare some little girls with this trick!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: With this power, I could conquer all of you puny humans.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: I am Mr'kuma to ghost of fear like you are Mr'kuma to me.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Have you ever felt true fear, unar-master?

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: I will let you avoid fear, if you prove that you are strong.

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: I will show you the face of fear! Mwahaha!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: If you can scare me like my old boss, we can hang out.

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: I make poona energy for you, Mr'kuma!

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: See my power! We destroy much together!

string.value: What if I did this at your next surprise party?

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Let's go scare some little girls with this trick!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: With this power, I could conquer all of you puny humans.

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Bask in awe, master! I am a being of pure terror!

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: How about I torch all your underwear instead?

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Are you sure? You can never unsee it.

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Shouldn't we be undermining somebody's hope?

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: I'll eat your eyebrows if you tell me that again!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: What are you trying to do to me?!

string.name: s3
string.value: Old boss call me that. He so cool.

string.name: s4
string.value: Hey! Even we demons have some etiquette.

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: 말을 참 잘드는 나란 더키 착한 더키.

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: 그렇게 앉고 싶으면 주인님이나 앉아 있어라 더키.

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: 더키 혼자 있고 싶다. 조금 있다 다시 말해라 더키.

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: 우리 주인님을 위해서 라면 얼마던지 더키~!

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: 흥! 방석 없으면 앉지 않는다. 더키!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: 더키 지금은 하고 싶은 기분이 아니다.

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: 주인님은 내 눈에 흐르는 눈물이 안보이냐. 용서해달라 더키..

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: 제발 그러지 마라 주인님아. 더키 진심으로 반성하고 있다.

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: 주인님은 이상하다. 더키 밥도 안주고 혼내기만 하냐 더키!!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: 더키 못살게 굴면 경찰을 부를테다. 꽥!!

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: 더키만 못살게 구는 못된 주인님. 한번만 더 그러면 더키 도망갈지도 모른다.

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: 더키 기분 너무 좋다. 한번 더 말해달라.

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: 그 말 진심이냐? 우리 주인님이 최고다.♡

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: 안타깝지만 더키는 임자 있는 품절오리다. 다른 오리 찾아봐라.

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: 사랑.. 이런 기분이 사랑인가. 더키 주인님에게 빠져 버릴것 같다.

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: 이런 얘기는 둘만 있을때 해달라 더키.

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: 다른데 가서 알아보는게 좋을것 같은데? 더키?

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: 내 주인님이라서 더키는 너무 행복하다. 꽥♡

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: 다정한 주인님~♡ 더키의 어디가 제일 사랑스러운거지?

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: 하루에 열번씩 더키한테 사랑한다고 얘기해주기~ 약속~♡

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: 더키는 그 마음 변하지 않길 바란다.

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: 이럴수록 주인님만 힘들어 진다. 더키 포기해라.

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: 오늘은 왠지 좋은 꿈을 꿀것 같은데? 꽥♡

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: 더키 졸린거 어떻게 알고? 그럼 조금만 잘까?

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: 아직 더키 잘 시간 아니다. 꽤엑!

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: 그 레벨에 잠이 오냐? 빨리 사냥하러 가자. 더키.

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: 내가 제일 좋아하는 분홍 베개 ♡ 잠이 솔솔 온다 더키.

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: 더키 자는 동안 나를 지켜줘 주인님.

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: 요즘은 자도 자도 졸린거 같다.. 더키..

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: 안 졸린데 왜 자꾸 자라고 하는거냐? 주인님 수상하다. 꽥!

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: 더키 자면 버리고 갈라고? 안속는다. 꽥꽥!

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: 더키 졸릴때 알아서 잘꺼다. 신경쓰지 마라. 더키!

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: 나 잠들면 혼자 맛있는거 먹을라고? 절대 잘 수 없다. 더키!

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: 날씨가 참 좋치? 펫 산책로에 놀러가는건 어때? 더키?

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: 지금은 말하고 싶은 기분이 아니다. 더키

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: 더키의 빨간 머플러 어때? 더키는 패션리더~

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: 오늘은 왠지 주인님과 밤새 떠들고 싶어 ♡

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: 주인님은 나아니면 얘기할 친구도 없는거냐. 더키?

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: 스쿠버 페페와 더키는 아무 사이도 아니다. 오해하지 마. 꽥~.

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: 이건 비밀인데.. 더키는 변신도 할 수 있다.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: 주인님과 수다 떠는 이 시간이 더키는 제일 행복하다.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: 옛날 옛날 아주 먼 옛날에 더키라는 오리가 있었는데..더키..

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: 오늘은 말을 너무 많이 했다. 더키. 내일 다시 얘기하자. 더키.

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: 주인님 심심하냐? 이럴 시간에 사냥이나 해라. 더키

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: 이것이 바로 최신 유행하는 더키 댄스~

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: 에브리 바디~ 댄스~ 위드 미~ 꽥 꽥~

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: 더키 춤 보기 전에 주인님이 시범을 보여줘라. 꽥!

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: 주인님이 노래 불러주면 더키가 춤 추겠다.

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: 난 신날 땐 막춤을 춰~. 꽥~ 꽥~

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: 잘 추면 칭찬해 줘야 한다. 더키~

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: 더키의 현란한 스텝~. 주인님은 절대 떠라 할 수 없을걸?

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: 더키 춤 추는 모습 보면 반할 텐데..? 꽥?

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: 춤추면 놀릴거 다 알고 있다. 더키!

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: 주인님은 안 하면서 시키기만 하는 거냐. 더키 반항할 테다. 꽥!

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: 더키는 몸치라 춤 같은 건 추지 않는다. 더키!

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: 눈 크게 뜨고 잘 봐라. 꽥!

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: 변신? 이런 거 말하는 거냐? 더키?

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: 아무 때나 할 수 있는게 아니다. 꽥!

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: 아무도 없을 때만 할 수 있다. 더키..

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: 지금은 졸려서 힘들 거 같다. 꽥.. 조금 쉬었다가 하자.

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: 주인님이 원한다면 특별히 한번만 보여줄게 더키!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: 날이면 날마다 오는 변신술이 아니다. 더키!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: 이 날을 위해 매일 엽습했다. 더키!

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: 변신한 모습을 보면 더키한테 반할지도 모를걸?

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: 더키 지금은 변신하고 싶은 기분이 아니다. 꽤엑..

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: 꽥! 제대로 봐 주지도 않으면서 왜 시키는 거냐! 더키 힘들다.

string.name: f4_s
string.value: 주인님이 주는 먹이가 최고로 맛있다. 더키~!

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: 주인님!! 전 주인님 말이라면 뭐든지 할거에요!

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: 이히이잉 주인님. 작고 귀여운 저한테 왜그래요??

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: 아히이잉~♡ 제 얼굴 봐서 한번만 봐주세요오옹~

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: 크아앙~ 화내지 말고 제 이야길 들어보세요~ 어흐응

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: 재미 없어요. 다른거 하고 놀아요 주인니임~♡

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: 끄~~응. 아기 호랑이 응가는 약으로도 쓴대나 뭐래나~

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: 크릉! 주인님!! 제 응가 크기 좀 보세요!!

string.name: c13_s1
string.value: 주인님.주인님. 저는 너무 작고 귀엽지 않나요? 어흥?

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: 저는 아기 호랑이인데, 말도 잘해요. 게다가 외국어까지!! 멍멍?

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: 살랑살랑 귀여운 제 꼬리. 정말 귀엽죠?

string.name: c13_s4
string.value: 주인님은 저의 어디가 제일 예쁜가요? 주인님이 말해보세요.

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: 사실 저는 아기 호랑이가 아니고.. 고양이에요~ 냐~옹

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: 어흐응! 저에게 물약을 맡기시면 편하게 사냥할 수 있어요.

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: 주인님은 맨날 놀면서 나한테만 이거해라 저거해라!! 크릉!

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: 우리 끝말잇기 할까요? 제가 먼저~ 어흐으응~ 칼슘!

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: 주인님! 주인님은 원래부터 그렇게 다리가 짧았어요?

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: 재미있는 이야기 해주세요~ 호랑이가 담배피던 시절이야기 그런거요.

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: 가가아저씨 얼굴은 정말 너무 길지 않아요? 어흥~

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: 저도 가끔은 혼자 있고 싶어요. 조용히 해주실래요?

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: 배가 고파서 잠을 잘 수가 없어요~ 고기 반찬 주세요. 주인님~

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: 어흥이는 이렇게 시끄러운 곳에서 잠들 수 없어요!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: 주인님. 지금이 잘때가 아니 잖아요! 어흐흥!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: 주인님도 좋은꿈 꾸세요. 메소부자 되는 꿈이요~ 어흥

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: 저는 지금 고기가 너무 먹고 싶어 잠을 잘 수가 없어요.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: 엄마가 보고 싶어서 잠이 오질 않아요. 어흐응

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: 폭신한 이불을 깔아 줘야 잠을 자죠. 크릉!

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: 크르릉! 그런 말을 듣고 싶은게 아니에요!

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: 제 눈에서 나오는 하트가 보이시나요? 어흥

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: 어흥이 기분이 너무너무 좋아 날아갈 것만 같아요♡

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: 다리가 짧아서.. 앉으나 서나 별 차이 없죠?

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: 여기서 잠깐 쉬어 갈까요? 도시락은 없어요?

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: 마침 다리가 아파오던 참이었어요. 고마워요. 뿡뿡♡

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: 내 마음을 알아 주는건 우리 주인님 뿐이라니까요. 뿡뿡♡

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: 시원한 바람을 맞으며 잠깐 쉬어가는것도 좋겠어요.

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: 날씨가 참 좋쵸? 주인님도 같이 앉아요. 뿡~♡

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: 모든게 주인님 뜻대로 이루어지진 않을거에요. 켕..

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: 마음 깊은곳에서 부터 반성하고 있답니다. 엉엉

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: 이렇게 울고 있는데... 계속 혼내실 거에요?

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: 켕! 저는 잘못한게 없는것 같은데요. 나쁜 주인님..

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: 이렇게 혼내는 주인님 마음도 편하시지만은 않겠죠?

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: 뿌웅.. 주인님 마음 푸세요. 이렇게 울잖아요.

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: 저를 진정 버리시는 건가요?? 뿌우 뿌우…

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: 매일 화만 내고 그러시면 도망갈 지도 몰라요.뿌우..

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: 왜 이렇게 저를 못살게 구시는거에요! 뿡!

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: 저도 화낼줄 안다구요! 그만 하세요! 뿡뿡!!

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: 식전에는 그런말 삼가해 주셨으면 하는 부탁이..

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: 주인님만 좋다면 저는 언제라도 좋아요. 뿌우..

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: 항상 사랑받는 나는 세상에서 가장 행복한 뿡뿡이!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: 사랑도 좋지만 일단 밥먼저 먹는건 어때요? 뿌우?

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: 사랑은 장난이 아니라고요. 정신 차리세요. 주인님!!

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: 아무도 안보는거 맞죠? 망 봐주세요. 뿡♡

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: 켕! 사람들이 쳐다 보잖아요! 이런곳에서는 할 수 없어요!

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: 푹신한 베게위에서 편안한 수면은 건강에 좋답니다.

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: 잘때는 누구에게도 방해 받고 싶지 않아요. 뿡

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: 제가 자고 싶을때 자면 안될까요? 뿌우..?

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: 왜 저를 재우시려고… 아직 잘 시간 아니라구요.

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: 주인님도 같이 주무실래요? 제 옆에 누우세요.

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: 잠도 제 마음대로 못자게 할건가요? 나쁜 주인님?

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: 자고 싶지 않다고 말씀 드렸을텐데? 켕!!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: 지금 잠 자리에 들기에는 너무 이른시간 같지 않나요?

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: 주인님은 잠 꾸러기인가봐요. 매일 잠만 자자고 해. 뿌우…

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: 이렇게 말 잘하고 예쁜 스컹크 보신적 있나요?

string.value: 목이 너무 마른데…시원한 빨간포션이라도 한잔 주신다면..?

string.name: c20_s1

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: 파워 엘릭서 드셔 보셨어요? 어떤 맛이에요? 뿡뿡이도 먹어 보고 싶어요.

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: 왠일로 저한테 말을 다 걸어주시고..? 심심하신 가요?

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: 이런다고 생기실거 같죠? 안 생겨요. 뿌우

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: 주인님은 펫을 귀찮케하는 용한 재주가 있으시네요.

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: 더 열심히 하는 뿡뿡이 이쁘게 지켜 봐주세요~,

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: 첫째도 건강~. 둘째도 건강~. 주인님은 건강 하시죠?

string.name: c21_f2

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: 잠깐 친구랑 놀고 오세요. 저는 급한 볼일이 있답니다.

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: 주인님은 말이 안통해요. 차라리 벽이랑 얘기 하겠어요.

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: 쳐다 봐주시지도 않을거 면서 매일 시키기만 하시나요?

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: 주인님을 위해서라면 열번도 더 할 수 있다고요~ 뿡 ♡

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: 어때요? 이런 개인기를 할 수 있는 펫은 이 뿡뿡이 밖에 없답니다.

string.value: Sure... If it makes you happy.

string.value: I guess it's time for me to obey…

string.value: Maybe you should have a rest too Master!

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Can you sing me a song as well?

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Is that the only thing you can ask me to do?

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Have you ever seen a monkey sitting still?

string.value: Can I really take a rest?

string.value: How did you know I wanted to rest?

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: I need to take a rest here!

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: You are the best master ever!

string.value: It is so dirty here, I can't rest!

string.value: No... I'm getting fat these days....

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: I am getting fat because of all this resting!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Just because you don't want to play with me, huh?

string.value: Don't look at me like that!

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: I will be better, really... Kiii...

string.value: Master I won't do it again...

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: I'm good, you're bad... Yes that's it!

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Bad! You don't love me anymore!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I'm the most obedient pet around! AHHH

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Say it again and I'll ignore you.

string.value: Ahh I must have drank too much.

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: You expect me to pee in public?

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Ahhh I feel so much better...

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: Wow.. what a lot I must have drank!

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Look at that Master... Have you ever seen a monkey pee?

string.value: How can I pee when nothing's coming out?

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: I don't feel like it! ARP! ARP!

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: It isn't nice for a monkey to pee here...

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Ah that is what I call real Monkey Business!

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: How am I supposed to pee when you didn't even feed me?

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: Why don't you pee in public too?

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Don't you have anything better to do than asking me to pee the whole day?

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: Me ear feels a little itchy here...

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: I love you too Master.. kiiii...

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Hmm, Master you're so nice to me!

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: I feel nice and warm inside!

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: I love you too! Give me a hug!

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: You're referring to somebody else, right?

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: You're the best Master a monkey can have!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I love you too! What about going for a hunt together?

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: I'm such a lucky monkey to have you as my Master…

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: It is bad to tell lies Master, Please don't.

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: I love bananas more than I love you!

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Are you sure? You haven't hugged me for ages!

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: I'm sure you love your new weapon more! ARP!

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: I can stand! I can stand!

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Huh? My ear feels a liitle itchy here...

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: I'll stand if you feed me!

string.name: c24_s1
string.value: Have you ever seen a monkey standing so straight?

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: Look Master! Aren't I good at this?

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: I did it! Master! I'm standing!

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: Can't you see I'm already standing?

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: I'm tired running after you! I don't want to stand!

string.name: c25_s1
string.value: Look master, do you see a banana there?

string.name: c25_s2
string.value: I love the way you talk to me.

string.name: c25_s3
string.value: I love bananas! Do feed me more of those!

string.name: c25_s4
string.value: I love you Master! Do you love me too?

string.name: c25_f2
string.value: What do you expect me to say?

string.name: c26_s1
string.value: Instead of killing monsters, you can do quests to level up too!

string.name: c26_s2
string.value: Monkeys love bananas! I bet you didn't know that.

string.name: c26_s3
string.value: I hate people who abuse their pets, don't you?

string.name: c26_s4
string.value: If you don't feed me, I'll go back home and not come out!

string.name: c26_f1
string.value: It is rude to wake a monkey from its sleep! ARP!

string.name: c26_f2
string.value: Talk talk talk.. I want to do something else.

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: Tell me honestly, have you ever heard a monkey speak?

string.name: c26_f4
string.value: I have nothing to say to you! ARP! ARP!

string.name: c27_s1
string.value: We pets are created by Cloy of Henesys.

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: If you don't feed me well, I'll just run away!

string.name: c27_s3
string.value: If you buy me a meso magnet and item pouch I can collect all your loot for you!

string.name: c27_s4
string.value: I won't live forever, so do treasure me when I'm around!

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: What do you expect me to tell you when I'm always following you around?

string.name: c27_f2
string.value: Don't you have any other things to do?

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: Why don't you ask my lupin brothers to talk to you instead?

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: Isn't it better for you to talk to your buddies instead?

string.name: c29_s2
string.value: I've wanted to play with you all day long!

string.name: c29_s3
string.value: What do you want to do?

string.name: c29_f2
string.value: Can't you see I'm busy now?

string.name: c29_f3
string.value: Feed me first... then I will think about it!

string.name: c29_f4
string.value: Don't even want to move my tail...

string.name: c30_s1
string.value: I've been waitiing for you to say that!

string.name: c30_s4
string.value: I'm thinking of how we are going to play Master!

string.name: c32_f2
string.value: What's so nice about my tongue!

string.name: c32_f3
string.value: It's tiring... I don't want to...

string.name: c33_f1
string.value: What do you want my tongue for?

string.name: c33_f2
string.value: It's rude to stick out one's tongue! Don't you know that?

string.name: c33_f4
string.value: Yucks! That's a disgusting habit you have master...

string.name: c34_f1
string.value: Who sleeps in the middle of the day? Not me!

string.name: c34_f3
string.value: How to sleep when I'm hungry?

string.name: c35_s3
string.value: That was kind of you Master, I'm indeed tired!

string.name: c35_f1
string.value: Don't want to sleep! Let's climb trees instead?

string.name: c35_f3
string.value: I'm not as lazy as you think Master...

string.name: c35_f4
string.value: If you aren't training, I am!

string.name: f3_f
string.value: No more for me... too full!

string.name: f4_s
string.value: Master! I like this a lot!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: Master... are you trying to kill me?

string.name: s3
string.value: I thought you were a good Master...

string.name: s4
string.value: Kii, I thought I told you, I am against those bad words.

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: You want me to sit, meoww? I'm one smart cat...meow

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: Like this, meow? This is nothing, meow...

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: It's a piece of cake, meow.

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: I wanna do something fun, meow~

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: I wanna do something else, meow~

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: It's too nasty for me to sit, meow~

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: I can't sit here, because someone peed the ground, meow~

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Master, instead of that...give me some food~ MEOW~

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Master, let's do something else for fun~ Meow~

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: I don't wanna sit right now~ MEOW~

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: Master, you're talking funny, and I can't understand you~

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Master, whaddaya think? I'm good right?

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Sitting's waaay too easy...let me do something else.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Ahh..I'm sleepy...what's up? What did you say? I didn't hear you~

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Hehe...I was daydreaming, so I couldn't hear you...

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: Please don't make a scary face like that...meow...

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: What did I do wrong, meow?

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: You're just going off on me, meow...!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: I didn't do anything wrong, meow...!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: You're just doing this because you're bored, meow...!

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Master, are you really mad at me...? MEOW...

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: What did I do anyway~! MEOW!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Master that wasn't cool at all! Meow~!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Where else will you find an obedient pet like me? MEOW~!

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: Master! If you keep doing that, I may one day get out of here! MEOW!

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Master...please give me that scary face...

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Man...I haven't done anything wrong, and still...

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Man...going off on me again for no reason...

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Master must be bored...so I'm treated like crap...

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: I don't like hearing that, meow...

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: Take back what you just said, meow!

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: M...master...I can't believe you said that...MEOW!

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Master, I get hurt when I hear those...MEOW

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: That was a joke...right? Right? MEOW?

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: You...didn't mean that, right? right? MEOW?

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: Take back what you said! MEOW!!!!!

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Master...this is not the first time I've heard this, but it still hurts...

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: You aren't gonna leave me out hanging like this, right?

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Do you really not like me??

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: Wah? What? I can't hear you~

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: You didn't mean what you said, right?

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I'm sick of hearing that everyday...hehe

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: If you keep saying that, I can really go pissy on you...

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: It...it's not coming out well, meow...

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: It's not pooping time yet, meow...

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: How can I poop if I don't feel like it, meow...

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: Pooping is only for bathroom, meow...

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Master, it hasn't been long since I last pooped...MEOW...

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: It's not time to poop yet, master...MEOW...

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Master...I don't feel like pooping yet...MEOW...

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Ahhh...that was good...but it's still embarassing...hehe

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: Ahh...whoa, my breakfast just came out like that...hehe

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: Phew~ Doesn't my poop look as adorable as me?

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Phew~ Haven't taken a crap in 3 days and look at this!! Yowza!

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: I haven't had anything to poop out in the first place...

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: Master...can I do it later in the dark? I don't wanna do it in public...

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Master...how am I gonna crap on purpose??

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: The harder you go hunting, the better the items you'll find, meow...

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: Isn't it nice out here today? We should go far and have fun wherever on a day like this, meow...

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: I need a nap on top of a comfortable blanket, meow...

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: I'm too depressed to talk right now, meow~

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: I have nothing to say to you...meow...!

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: I have a feeling a nice item may come our way today! MEOW!

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Master, you'll get me some goood food today, right? MEOW~

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Let's go to the beach today! I wanna do something fun!!

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: I don't have anything to say...MEOW...

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Master, are you dating someone? I'm not...

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Hey master, can you beat Barlog?

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Master, I heard there's something scary in a cave in the middle of the island...

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Ah...screw the talk, just get me some food...

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: Arrgh...didn't hear a thing...didn't hear a thing...

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Man I'm tired, and I don't feel like talking...

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: What do you think, meow? Am I doing well...meow?

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Even I think this is cute...meow...~

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: You like me? I like you too. Meow!

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: No! I don't want to do it...meow...!

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Master, what do you think? Cute, right? MEOW!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Hehe... Cute. But I got here, right? MEOW!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: I'll do anything for you, master~!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Whatever you ask me to do...MEOW~!

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: Master! Just get me some food! MEOW!

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: I don't wanna do cute stuff! MEOW!

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: Master, I don't feel good! MEOW!

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: Like this? At least you know a cute act when you see one...

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: I'll do whatever you ask me to do~

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: Keeps making me do stupid stuff...I'm sick of it...

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: Feed me instead of making me do those!

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: Man~ That thing is wack now! I don't wanna do it!

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: You think I'll do just what you ask me to do? Dummy...

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: It's hard...I can't stand for too long~MEOW~

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: Master~ I'm doing fine, right? MEOW?

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Hap!! Whoa, I got tall! MEOW!

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: How's a cat supposed to stand up? MEOW!

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: If I keep practicing like this everyday, I may one day walk around with two feet...hehe

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: I'm good, right? Give me something harder~

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: Maybe if you feed me...then I might...hehe

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: Master~That's too hard, and I don't wanna do it~

string.name: c27_s4
string.value: I like you very very much! MEOW!

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: Ah...I was thinking of something else...MEOW

string.name: c28_s2
string.value: You're the only one in my heart, master!

string.name: c28_f3
string.value: Don't be lying to me like that~!

string.name: s2
string.value: Why are you making me say that? Meow~

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: WEK~~ this is the way to do it, right?

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: Sit? Okay! I stll feel great though ~~~ WEK~ WEK~

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: You show me how to do it first...WEK

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: I never learned how to sit... weK!

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Keep letting me do this ~~ WEK~

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Do I sit like this? WEK!

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: You must be kidding me... WEK

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Don't let me do stupid things like this... WEK..

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: It's not like I'll be getting a prize for doing this... WEK

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: I mastered the art of sitting.

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: I can sit! I really can sit!!

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Give me something harder to do.

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Wait til I turn back into a doll... then I'll sit.

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Look, I'm fat, and it's hard for me to sit.

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: And what are you trying to say? WEK!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: Umm... you're no different than me. WEK!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Don't tell me what to do! WEK!

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: I won't do that again... WEK... WEK....

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Okay now ... calm down ... WEK WEK..

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: I get it. I'll be a good penguin now.

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: What do you want me to do? WEK!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Did I do anything wrong? WEK?

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: My heart's been torn to pieces... sigh...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: What can I do to make you feel better?

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Hey, you're the one that started!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: Seriously, I didn't do anything wrong.

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: Don't look! This is embarassing. WEK

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: Long way to go before I poop. WEK

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: I don't feel like pooping. WEK.

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Hah, I ate a lil too much last night. WEK

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: Sorry. It's going to reak here. WEK.

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: I don't want anyone seeing this. WEK

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: I haven't felt it, yet. WEK.

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Hey, don't look. It's not a pretty sight.

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Ahhh, this is quite a relief.

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: You must really like the smell of poop.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: I can't poop now. I held on to it for too long.

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I can't poop what I never ate.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Can you force yourself to poop?

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Of course, the penguins must stand tall... WEK.

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: So I stand and sit, then stant and sit. WEK!

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: I don't want to do it, WEK!

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: This is a piece of cake, WEK.

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: I'm good, right? Give me something harder to do, WEK.

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Can I do something else? I'm tired, WEK.

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Don't tell me what to do, okay? WEK!

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: I can do it. I'm the bomb, right?

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: What other penguin can stand so beautifully like this?

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: If I keep practicing, I may be able to run one of these days.

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: Don't repeat the same thing over and over again.

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: The weather's beautiful today, perfect for a chit chat, WEK.

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: If you find somethng delicious, give me some, WEK.

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: Do you want to kiss me on the cheek? WEK!

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: I can help you out, WEK!

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: What? Who said I was fat? WEK!!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Have you ever seen a talking penguin? WEK.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Any good movie to watch, WEK?

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Tell me you love me the most, WEK.

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Treat others just the way you want to be treated, WEK.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Take me to a seafood store, WEK.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: Don't feel like talking right now, WEK.

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: If I ever turn back into a doll, please get me a water of life so I can keep hanging out with you.

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: I'll help you gather up some items on the ground.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: I see a lot of elves these days. I heard they were very hard-working.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Don't tell others your ID and password.

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: And what exactly do you want from me?

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Don't bother me. I'm just chillin here.

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Now you gotta kiss me! WEK

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Hehe, give me a warm hug. WEK

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: I'm too heavy for you to hug, WEK.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: I've been in need of some love these days... WEK.

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: You can hug me as long as you want, WEK!

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: NO! You haven't showered in days! WEK!

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: I got no time for you, WEK!

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: Don't hug me too hard. I can't breathe.

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: Awwww, it's embarassing though. Hug me when no one's looking.

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: No, I wanna do something fun! WEK!

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Look, it's well into the morning right now, WEK.

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: I don't feel like sleeping here, WEK.

string.name: c24_s1
string.value: Master, you sleep here with me. WEK.

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: I was about to sleep anyway.

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: You need to wake me up later.

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: Don't tell me what to do.

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: It's not time to sleep yet.

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: I feel fine, I don't feel like sleeping.

string.name: c26_s4
string.value: This makes me feel good, WEK!

string.name: c26_f1
string.value: This makes me feel good, WEK!

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: Liar. I don't like you, WEK.

string.name: c26_f4
string.value: Really? I don't think you do, though. WEK.

string.name: c27_s1
string.value: Do you really mean that, WEK?

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: You know how I feel about this, right? WEK~

string.name: c27_s3
string.value: I love you too, master! WEK!

string.name: c27_s4
string.value: Yay, I'm being loved by my master~ WEK!

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: And what do you want from me? WEK.

string.name: c27_f2
string.value: What? I didn't hear you. WEK.

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: I know you say that to others, too. WEK.

string.name: c28_s4
string.value: I love you too, master! Yay!!

string.name: c28_f2
string.value: We penguins don't take that phrase "I love you" lightly.

string.name: c28_f3
string.value: If you don't mean that, that I don't think you should say it.

string.name: c29_s3
string.value: So I should just stick it out like this? WEK..

string.name: c30_s2
string.value: You know I'm the bomb, WEK.

string.name: c30_f1
string.value: No way, I'm too tired. WEK.

string.name: c30_f2
string.value: I'm too lazy to do this. WEK.

string.name: c31_s2
string.value: Heavy, isn't it? I can't fly with these, though.

string.name: c31_s3
string.value: Is it fluffy? It feels good, right? This is fuuuun!

string.name: c31_f1
string.value: Ugh, this is quite a chore.

string.name: c31_f3
string.value: What am I, a dog? I'm a penguin, you know!

string.name: c32_s3
string.value: Make sure not to leave a hole on my cheek!

string.name: c32_f1
string.value: Um... do you know exactly where we are right now?

string.name: c32_f3
string.value: No way, I don't wanna do it.

string.name: c33_s3
string.value: Don't do it for too long, though. Yay!

string.name: c33_f1
string.value: Who in the right mind would wanna kiss you?

string.name: c33_f3
string.value: You ain't doing this for free.

string.name: c33_f4
string.value: Tell me that was a joke.

string.name: c34_s3
string.value: I deserve a trophy for this performance!

string.name: c34_s4
string.value: I believe I can fly!!! WEK WEK!

string.name: c34_f1
string.value: Um...don't I look a litttttle hefty for that?

string.name: c34_f2
string.value: Hey, have you ever seen a flying penguin?

string.name: c34_f3
string.value: You must have lost your mind.

string.name: c35_s2
string.value: Show me another penguin that can fly like me.

string.name: c35_s4
string.value: No need to waste time. Here we go!

string.name: c35_f3
string.value: I suggest you study a little on penguin's anatomy.

string.name: c35_f4
string.value: Um, have you heard of Law of Gravity? Hello!!

string.name: c36_s1
string.value: I'm at a loss for words...WEK!

string.name: c36_s2
string.value: It's hard to find a penguin as cute-looking as me! WEK!

string.name: c36_s3
string.value: Hey, I've been cute for quite some time, you know! WEK!

string.name: c36_s4
string.value: Really? You're not kidding, right? WEK!

string.name: c36_f2
string.value: I'm not CUTE. I'm DASHING. WEK!!!

string.name: c36_f3
string.value: I NEED SOME TRUTH AROUND HERE! WEK!

string.name: c36_f4
string.value: What do you want me to say in return, WEK?

string.name: c37_s2
string.value: You won't find a penguin quite like me. Enjoy it!

string.name: c37_s3
string.value: I can never get enough of your compliments!

string.name: c37_s4
string.value: Thanks for your kind words! I really appreciate that!

string.name: c37_f1
string.value: Since when did we compliment each other anyway...

string.name: c37_f4
string.value: Feed me instead of waxing stupid poetics like that.

string.name: f2_f
string.value: I can't eat no more. WEK.

string.name: f3_f
string.value: Ugh, I feel like throwing up. WEK.

string.name: f4_f
string.value: I need to be on a diet.

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: Yoooou're not the boss of meeeeee.

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: I don't have to listen to yoooooou.

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: You're not my daaaaaad. Or my mooooooom.

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: You're not gonna eeeeat me, riiiiight?

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Yooooou like caaaakes more than piiiiiies, right?

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: I aaaaalways wanted to learn to baaaaake.

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Run run run, as fast as...waaaait, that's not right.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Let them eeeeeeat pie! Cakes are your friend!

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: I'm giving you the siiiilent treeeatment. Oooops.

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: Noooo. I ate too much. Can't belieeeeve.

string.name: c25_s1
string.value: Glad you see my true potential!

string.name: c25_s2
string.value: I'm the best looking Cake in the country!

string.name: c26_s3
string.value: My moves are sweeeet like sugar.

string.name: c26_f1
string.value: I neeeeed a better partner. Hee hee.

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: If I trip, I go splaaaaaat.

string.name: c27_s1
string.value: I call this the Caaaake Waaaalk!

string.name: c28_f3
string.value: What if my frooooosting comes offfffff?

string.name: c31_s1
string.value: Why did Sally sell seashells by the seashore?

string.name: c31_s2
string.value: The measure of a Mapler is determined by his friends.

string.name: c31_s3
string.value: Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever.

string.name: c31_s4
string.value: Imagination is more important than knowledge.

string.name: s4
string.value: I'm sweet but yooooou're not. Hee hee.

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Pie do nothing but sit. Hee hee.

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Floor dirty. Pie have 3 second rule.

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Pie fall down. Pie meant to do that.

string.value: Rock-a-bye pie-e, in the hot oven... Zzz

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Pie get it. Pie sleep, wake up on plate! No way!

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: Pie hear something dumb. Pie no listen.

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Pie no understand, but pie obey.

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: Pie did it, pie do it again! Nyah!

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Pie filled with love! Or cherries. Pie no remember.

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: Pie not ready for relationship. Pie want be friends.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Pie hate clowns. Take pie, throw, go splat.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Why pie missing piece? You take?

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Pie ready for bigger things! Pie ready for ice cream!

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Pie am well-rounded friend. Hee hee!

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Pie lucky number is 3.14...pie forget rest.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Pie want meet nice tart, settle down. You help pie?

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Do who with the what now?

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: Pie just ate? Pie no remember.

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: Where good food? Pie is gourmet.

string.value: Glad you see my true potential!

string.name: c25_s2
string.value: I'm the best looking Pie in the country!

string.name: c26_s3
string.value: Pie boogie! Sound gross, is fun!

string.value: Pie need right partner. Not you.

string.value: Pie on the right track, baby! Pie was baked this way!

string.value: Pie not feelin' the vibe here.
