string.name: f4_f
string.value: What are you trying to do to me?!

string.name: s3
string.value: Old boss call me that. He so cool.

string.name: s4
string.value: Hey! Even we demons have some etiquette.

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: I'm a nice lamb that obeys well!

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: I was going to sit, baa!

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: I was actually planning to rest, baa!

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: I'm going to play more, baa!

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Baa baa, you should sit down too.

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Baa baa? What did you say?

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: I can't hear you, I can't hear you, baa baa!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: I'm going to fly around more, baa baa!

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Should we rest a bit? Baa baa.

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Baa baa! What a peaceful feeling!

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Baa baa? Are you talking to me?

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: I don't hear anything, baa baa!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Baa? What's with you all of sudden?

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: Baah! (It appears to be calling its mother...)

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: Baa! Don't do this to me...

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Baa... maybe I should change owners.

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: I don't even wanna hear it...

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: Baa baa! It's all my fault!

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Baa! Did I really mess up that badly?

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: Baa... I won't do that again...

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: Hmph, I'll be the bigger ram.

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: My patience has limits, baa baa.

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Are you going to keep this up, baa?

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: If only I had a nicer owner...

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Why do you always yell at me... *Cries*

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: I'm going to tell my mommy, baa baa...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Wahhhh! You're just mean because you're bigger than me!

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: I really wish I could just smack you, baa baa.

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: I'm gonna call animal protective services!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: I can get scary when I'm angry, baa...

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Baa baa... THAT does it! (Veins popping.)

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: Baa baa! I like, I like!

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: I like you very much also!

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: Baa baa. You aren't supposed to joke around like that.

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: Treat me well when you have the chance, baa.

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Baa! I'm always on your side!

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: I said... I can't hear you!

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Baa Baa! I got it, I got it!

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Baa! I love hanging out with you!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Baa! Affectionate actions make Pufframs dance!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Baa baa. I already know your feelings.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: So what do you want me to do, baa baa?

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: I'm shocked, I don't even have words.

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: (Little veins are popping out on its forehead.)

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: Do you KNOW what you are saying?

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Something needs to go in for something to come out!

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Baa baa! Every day is a healthy day!!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: It's not going to come out just because you whine!

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: Baa... let's have some common sense, shall we?

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Baa baa... You want to get smacked?

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: I'll let you off for today...

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: No! I want to play more!

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: I want to play more, baa baa!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Baa... someday I'll soar higher than a dragon. Baa...

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: Can't you see that my eyes are still WIDE open?

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: Baa baa? What are you saying?

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: I'm not that lazy, baa baa.

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Baa Baa! So today, I'm going to... (Now it won't stop talking.)

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Are you amazed by flying lambs? So the secret of our race is...

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Maple World is a pretty nice place to live, baa baa.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: When we were living up in the sky, angels mistook us for clouds.

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Is it strange that I talk?

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Baa? Weren't we talking just a second ago?

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Have you every had a Cloud Candy? It's the baaaaa-st.

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: If there's one thing I hate, it's wolves.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: We are called Pufframs because we live above the clouds.

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Baa baa... just leave me alone...

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: I don't want to talk right now, baa.

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Mmm... are you hungry for a conversation?

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Baa baa, would it be better to walk or fly?

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Baa baa, you want to hear something interesting?

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Which one of us do you think can fly faster? Me or the eagle?

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: To the Pufframs, the Golden Horn is a symbol of adulthood.

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: You look bored... too bad I'm not!

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: (It appears to be thinking about something.)

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: What if I say no, baa baa?

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: This is the Puffram booty dance!!

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: Am I in the circus or something, baa baa?

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: Baa baa... I said, it sounds annoying...

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: I actually have this super cool trick... but I don't feel like it right now.

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: (Jumps up and down.) Baa! Baa! Baa! Baa!

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: It's super fun when you do it above the clouds, baa baa.

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Can't I just be your pet?

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Too hungry... no strength... baa baa.

string.name: f3_s
string.value: Baa baa, eating time's my favorite time!!

string.name: s2
string.value: You want to get reported, baa baa?

string.name: s4
string.value: I'm so disappointed in you, baa baa!!

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: I think I will, thank you.

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: I'm extra adorable when I sit. Look!

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: As you wish! Can I have some ramen now?

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: Sigh, why are you so bossy?

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: I think better on my feet.

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: All right. I think I deserve a rest.

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: A bowl of ramen would make this moment perfect.

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Sure. Why don't you sit with me?

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: What? Here? At least get me a chair.

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: I don't want to get my tail dirty.

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: I'll sit here and think about ramen.

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: My legs are short and cute, but they get tired sometime.

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: I want to travel, not sit!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: I really don't feel like sitting right now.

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: You're right. Just 'cause I'm cute doesn't mean I can get away with everything.

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: If I let you have my ramen, will you stop scolding me? Please?

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: You don't know what you're talking about.

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Are you TRYING to make me mad?

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: If I behave, will you give me some ramen?

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: You're going to make me cry!

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: You still love me, don't you?

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: C'mon. You can't scold someone THIS cute.

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: I'll run away, and then you'll regret getting mad at me.

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: Don't stand so close to me.

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: For that, I'll let you scratch my tummy.

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Do I look easy to you?

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Then shower me with ramen, please!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: I always knew I was irresistible.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Not as much as I love myself.

string.name: c13_s1
string.value: When you gotta go, you gotta go.

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: Hope you brought along toilet paper!

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Such a perfectly round little pelle!

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Not right now. I have a headache.

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: You into that sort of thing?

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Does this make me a party POOPer? Get it?

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Hey! Are you saying I have a stick up my butt?

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: Will you sing me a lullaby?

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: Don't even THINK of using me as a pillow.

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: You're not the boss of me.

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: You can sleep if you want. I'm busy.

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: I hope I dream of ramen.

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: I count pies and donuts to fall asleep.

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: Will you pet me until I doze off?

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: I only sleep on silk sheets.

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Last time I slept, someone tied my tail to my ears. Pass!

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I'm refusing just to be rebellious.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: I suppose I could afford to take a break.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Hey, I just wanted to tell you that I think you're really... Zzz.

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: You should rest, too. You can cuddle with me.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Coffee ramen, pizza ramen, donut ramen... Zzz.

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: Do I LOOK sleepy to you?

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: You're so lazy, sometimes you disgust me.

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: I have recipes to create! No time for sleep!

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: I'm not chubby, I'm big-boned. Just wanted to let you know.

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Everybody who meets me, loves me. Didja know that?

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Just 'cause I'm cute doesn't mean my life is easy.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Ramen is really good with sugar and honey. Try it!

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Go away. I'm sick of your face.

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: Why do you always follow me around?

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Ugh, what do you want from me?

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: My dream is to become the world's best ramen chef!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I think about new ramen recipes all the time. Imagine: deep-fried ramen!

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Here's a secret: my parents can transform into human shape.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Do you think red herb ramen would do well in this market?

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Don't you have anyone else to pester?

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: You must be really lonely to be bothering me.

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: I'm going to pretend I don't see you.

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: Don't speak until you're spoken to!

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: I figure, if I stick with you, I'll get to travel and try all sorts of ramen!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: I'm actually a really great dancer. I've got the perfect figure for it.

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: People who want to bring me down say I'm fat, but I know it isn't true.

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Sometimes people tell me I have no parents. I don't get it. I DO have parents!

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: Do I LOOK like I'm in the mood?

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: We can dance if we want to!

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: Ah, I'm so adorable when I dance, I want to hug myself.

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: You love me even more than before I danced, don't you?

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: I'm not here for your amusement.

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: I'll think about it, IF you get me some ramen.

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: Believe it or not, I'm actually quite shy.

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: You ain't never seen nobody as cute as me!

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Buy me a mirror so I can admire myself when I dance!

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: What, and then you'll give me a treat? How demeaning.

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: I'm on strike until you take me to a new ramen restaurant.

string.name: f3_s
string.value: This is why I love you.

string.name: f3_f
string.value: I could eat ten servings in one sitting!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: Mouth...likes. Stomach, not so much. Too full!

string.name: s4
string.value: I can hear you, you know.

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: You want me to sit like this? bark?

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: I get sleepy sitting down, bark!

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: Ahh... this is easier~ BARK BARK~

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: I can't understand what the master is saying~ BARK BARK!

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: It's too hard to understand~ BARK BARK!

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: I have no clue what you said! Bark bark!

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: No. I don't want to sit! BARK BARK!

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Master, this is how you sit, right? Woof!

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Master, I'm doing well, right? Right? Woof woof!

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: I hope the master keeps asking me to sit...woof woof~

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: I have short legs, so it's easy to sit~ Woof woof!

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Master, I can't tell what you're saying~ Woof woof~

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Master, do I HAVE to sit right now? Woof woof!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Let's do something else right now~ Woof woof!

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: It's too dirty to sit here! Woof woof!

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Still telling me to sit? It's waaay too easy...

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: My hind legs are so short. I feel more comfortable sitting like this... hehe...

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: You want me to sit? Here... this is the right way, right?

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Ahh... itchy... (acting like I didn't hear it...)

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Sitting is waaaay too easy. Give me something harder.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: (scratching) Whoa? What did you just say? I didn't hear you~

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: Please don't give me that look... bark bark!

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Krrr...Do you want to be punished by ME?

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: I didn't do anything wrong! BARK BARK!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: I was just sitting here... BARK BARK!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Krrrr...One of these days, I won't take it anymore... BARK BARK!

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: Master, I'll be careful from here on out... wooof...

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: Master! Things like that happen at times... why so mad? Woof woof!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Master, boredom doesn't give you the right to abuse me! Woof woof!!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Where else will you find a cute pet like this? Krrrr...

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: I didn't do anything wrong! Woof woof!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: Master... I'll be more careful next time...

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Man, master's going off on me again and I didn't do a thing...

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: Master, things happen sometimes... why so mad??

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Rrrr... master's not happy over nothing...

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: I'll be better... bark... much better...

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: I'm hurt inside... pretty bad... bark...

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: How can you say such thing... bark...

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: Huh? I was too itchy to hear that... bark...!

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: Ahh, itchy... I'll just pretend I never heard that... bark...

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: What did the master just say? bark...

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: How can you say such thing... woof woof...

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Master, I'm really really hurt... woof...

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: Master, are you for real...? Woof...

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: Master, you didn't really mean it... right? Woof...

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Master, was that a joke? Woof~

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: You didn't mean that, right? Woof woof...

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Ey... You mean that for real? Woof???

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Ey... you were just saying that because you're bored, right? Woof?

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: You say that everyday... that hurts you know...

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Master, I'll be good... just don't leave me alone...

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Whatever you tell me, I'll still be following you and only you...sigh...

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: How can you... you don't really mean it, right?

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: What? What did you say? I can't hear you~~

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Ahh, itchy... stop saying that and bathe me instead!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I'm sick of hearing that now... hehe...

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Now, THAT was embarassing~ Bark bark~

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: Oh man, this smells... bark bark...

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: I don't feel like pooping... bark

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: Still a long way to go before coming out... heh

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: So may people around here, how am I gonna poop in public?? bark bark...

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: I just pooped a few min. ago... bark bark...

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Ahhhhh... whoa, I almost stepped on it... bark bark

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: I almost got constipated... bark bark

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Ahhh, that was good... bark bark

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Master... the poop isn't coming out... bark bark!

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: It's not time to go poop yet... bark bark

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Master...I don't feel it yet... bark bark

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Master...pooping should only be at the bathroom... bark bark

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: Ahh...the poop looks really good today

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: Ahh...master you can't step on it!

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Ahhh, that was good... whoa, master...you stepped on it...

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: I can't poop what I didn't eat...

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: Can you poop even if you don't feel like it?

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: I had nothing to eat all day, so no poop for me...

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: I must be constipating right now...

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: It's a secret, just between you and me...I have a hidden bone around this area... bark bark!!

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: What's the latest on radio? bark bark bark!?!

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: What's your hobby? Hopefully it's something that involves me... hehe... bark!

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: I heard in one of the hidden streets at Henesys ther's a huuuuuge mushroom called Mushmom, am I right? bark!

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: How's a dog supposed to talk? bark!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: NO! Don't feel like talking! Bark bark!!

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: I have nothing to say to you! Bark!

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I feel like crap! Bark bark!!!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Please change the menu every once in a while... I'm sick of eating the same thing over and over again...

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Every once in a while, I feel like riding a boat to some other island... woof woof~

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: How are you today? Good? Right? Good!! Woof woof!

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: You better be careful not to get ripped off when doing business with someone else... woof woof...

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: I have nothing to say... woof...

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: Don't feel like talking... I'm really depressed... woof woof...

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: I'm depressed... everything's annoying... don't feel like talking... woof...

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: What's the menu for today? Can I get something nice?

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Master, you have a huge head! hahha

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: You look like you've got yourself quite a belly there... haha

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Ey... how about feeding me right now?

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: So annoying~~must have nothing to do right now...

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: Man... do I have to talk again? Don't feel like it...

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: What do you think? Good? GOOD? Bark bark!!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Well, I'm smart. What can I say? Bark bark!!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Sweeet! Here, what do you think? Bark bark!

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: No! I wanna do something else! Bark bark!

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: I don't know what you're saying!!! Bark!!

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Can't understand what you're saying! Bark bark!

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: You have a short tongue, right? I have noooo idea what you're saying! Bark bark!

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Master, that was good, right? Right? Woof woof!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Hehe... this is really easy~ Woof woof!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: I'll do whatever you ask me to do! Woof woof!!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Master, is this how you do it? Woof woof!!

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: Just feed me first! Woof woof!!

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: The floor's too dirty so I don't want to do that! Woof!

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: Why don't you lie on your belly first! Woof...!

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: You show me first!! Woof woof!

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: Like... this? I'm just going to do this once...

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: Master, I did well... right? Right?

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: Like this, huh? Whatever you ask me to do...

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: Hey master! I won't do everything you ask me to do...!

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: Master! I'm hungry. just feed me!!

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: Like this? Woof woof...this is hard...

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: Whoa...the air's much cleaner up here... woof~!

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: My... my legs are short, that's why it's hard... woof!

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: I won't do it... woof woof!

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: How am I supposed to get up with these legs? Woof woof!

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: Hey master, but I can't walk on two feet...

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: Whoa... with these shorties?? I'm incredible, yo!!

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: Maybe if I get fed right now...

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: With these short legs, I can't even stand on four feet well..

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: Is the master trying to put me on showcase for a circus??

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: Can't be asking too much from a dog...

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: What did you just say? bark bark...

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: That's MY MASTER, ladies and gentlemen...

string.name: c27_s3
string.value: I love you too master~! Woof woof!

string.name: c27_s4
string.value: Hehe... I feel good... woof woof!

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: I know you're lying, master... woof woof!

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: I was thinking of something else... and I didn't hear it... woof...

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: You think I'll like you back? Woof...

string.name: c28_s1
string.value: I love you too master very very much!!

string.name: c28_s3
string.value: You better love me and no one else!!!

string.name: c28_f2
string.value: Everyone knows that's just a token gesture...

string.name: c28_f3
string.value: And then the master will go off on me later...

string.name: c28_f4
string.value: You think I'll fall for that again...?

string.name: c32_s1
string.value: Haha! Just tell me what to do, and I'll do it!

string.name: c32_s3
string.value: This is waay too easy! Bark!

string.name: c32_f2
string.value: We huskies don't have hands! Bark!

string.name: c32_f3
string.value: I don't want to do it~ bark!

string.name: f2_f
string.value: I'm so full I can't eat anymore... woof...

string.name: f3_s
string.value: Master, this is really delicious! Woof woof...

string.name: f3_f
string.value: Master, I can't eat anymore... woof woof...

string.name: s3
string.value: Don't make me say bad words! Woof!

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: Sitting down makes Yeti want to see Pepe~ Grr~

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: Yeti's feeling good~ Yeti's feeling really good~~ Grr

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: Yeti doesn't want to sit~ Grr~

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: Yeti wants to do something different~ Grrr~

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: Yeti is too shy... to sit... GrrGrr~

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: Grrr~ Yeti today doesn't want to listen~

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Yeti likes to sit, too~ Yeti's legs are feeling better now~

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Yeti sits, and so does the master~ Grrr~

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Grr~ Yeti sits, and Yeti sleeps~ Zzzz

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Grrr~ Yeti feels good~ Yeti likes sitting down~

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Yeti does not understand what the master is saying~ Grr~

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Grr~!! Yeti feels like rebelling right now~ Grr~!!

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Grr~ Yeti is good at following the master's orders~

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: Yeti is good at doing this and others~ Grrr~

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Yeti is sitting down very comfortably right now. GrrGrr~

string.name: c4_s4

string.value: I born with big eyes. Sparkly!

string.value: Am I fat? Be honest. I take it.

string.value: Gonna be rock star! Have world tour!

string.value: I have no idea what you talk about.

string.value: No tricks. I am quiet and gentle pet.

string.value: Buh? What if I get fat?

string.value: No more eat! Exercise! Bouncy bouncy!

string.value: Waahh! I don't want it! I don't!

string.value: Buh?! I remember this! You watch out!

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: I guess I have been working pretty hard.

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: Will that make the constituents like me more?

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: I've got a few bills to review anyway...

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: I just had these slacks pressed.

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: That's no way to win a campaign!

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Maybe I need a rocking chair...

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: My voters really love when I sit down.

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Can we do something else, please?

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: I don't like to sit down, I like to work!

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: It's as easy as fair taxation!

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: A good sit helps the mind focus!

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: I could do this all day.

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: You repeat yourself quite a bit.

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: I can't afford to look silly.

string.name: c5_s1
string.value: I suppose I could use some rest.

string.name: c5_s2
string.value: That'll give me time to think about my next bill.

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: I don't know the meaning of the word!

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: That's not how you win elections, friend.

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: I could use a little time off...

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Just going to run over my speech a few times...

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: My advisors told me to look busy!

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: No way, no how, no sirree.

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: When I set my mind to something, it happens.

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: I like that, makes me seem more down-to-earth.

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: There are hands to shake somewhere!

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: I hope I've still got your vote.

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: Don’t take that out of context.

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: Don't give up on me yet!

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: I was wrong about that, and I admit it.

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: My opponent is just as bad as me!

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: I know that wasn't he best result, but I can fix it.

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Please don't hit me in front of the cameras...

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Why are you blaming me? It was one of my aides!

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: I suppose we all have to relieve ourselves.

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: For the good of the country!

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: Drinking lots of water is good for you.

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: I'm feeling a little exposed, but here we go.

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: Keep it out of the media, okay?

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: I'm the boss, I don't have to listen!

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: I don't know what to say...

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: I feel pretty strongly about you too.

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: Don't flip-flop now, I need your vote!

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I know a fibber when I hear one.

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: I don't know if this is the right time...

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: I'll have to run that past my advisors.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: The whole world is going to know!

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: This is a scandal just waiting to happen.

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: Get outta here before the press gets wind of this!

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Well, uh, you wanna talk about the economy?

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Can you tell that to the reporters?

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Really? Because I haven't seen a buffet in weeks.

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: No sir, I don't like it.

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: I'm perfectly comfortable where I am.

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: What looks better? One leg, or two?

string.name: c24_s1
string.value: In the blink of an eye, I stand.

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: We're going to hit the issues!

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: Look what a perfect candidate I am.

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: I can walk and talk with the best of them.

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: I should be working on my speech.

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: Can we get a little food first?

string.name: c25_s1
string.value: Let me tell you about my recovery plans.

string.name: c25_s2
string.value: We need to bring our troops home!

string.name: c25_s3
string.value: The military isn't strong enough yet.

string.name: c25_s4
string.value: It's time to get real about family values!

string.value: I need some more time to fix this speech.

string.name: c25_f3
string.value: I don't know what to say...

string.value: America is the best nation on the planet!

string.name: c26_s2
string.value: I'm bringing the stars and stripes back!

string.name: c26_s4
string.value: What do you know about income tax regulation?

string.name: c26_f2
string.value: I need to talk with my advisors first.

string.name: c27_s1
string.value: I believe in hard work and good people!

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: It's good to be on the right side.

string.name: c27_s3
string.value: Remember to take care of yourself and your country!

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: Everything you need to know is on my campaign website.

string.name: c27_f2
string.value: The debates aren't for another few days!

string.name: c28_s1
string.value: I can be fun, like normal people!

string.name: c28_s2
string.value: Hard work and no play is un-American.

string.name: c28_s4
string.value: I can do this all day!

string.name: c28_f1
string.value: There's too much work to do.

string.name: c28_f4
string.value: We still need to talk about the important issues!

string.name: c29_s1
string.value: Have I shown you my fastball?

string.name: c29_s2
string.value: Let's play... With the federal deficit!

string.name: c29_s3
string.value: I love a good bit of fun!

string.name: c29_s4
string.value: Can't wait to see how fun this looks on the news.

string.name: c29_f2
string.value: Playing alone is just no fun.

string.name: c29_f3
string.value: Can't we just watch eagles for a while?

string.name: c30_s1
string.value: You know what's fun? Balanced budgets.

string.name: c30_s2
string.value: Come help me find an alternative energy source! Wooo!

string.name: c30_s4
string.value: I'm going to pretend I'm president already!

string.name: c30_f1
string.value: We're running out of games here.

string.name: c30_f2
string.value: People aren't going to take us seriously.

string.name: c30_f3
string.value: Let me check with my advisors first.

string.name: c30_f4
string.value: I think the people want to see me being more serious.

string.name: c31_s4
string.value: A little shut-eye is good for the complexion.

string.name: c31_f1
string.value: Just a little more work, okay?

string.name: c31_f2
string.value: There's no time! I need to prepare a statement.

string.name: c31_f3
string.value: I can't let the delegates see me sleeping!

string.name: c31_f4
string.value: I'm not ready to rest! I'm ready to fight!

string.name: c32_s1
string.value: Time for sweet dreams of my heroes...

string.name: c32_f1
string.value: You're just waiting to get a funny picture of me for the papers.

string.name: c32_f2
string.value: There's a whole lot of meeting and greeting to do!

string.name: c32_f3
string.value: I should be kissing babies right now!

string.name: c32_f4
string.value: Now's not the time to be slacking off.

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: I guess I have been working pretty hard.

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: Will that make the constituents like me more?

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: I've got a few bills to review anyway...

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: I just had these slacks pressed.

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: That's no way to win a campaign!

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Maybe I need a rocking chair...

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: My voters really love when I sit down.

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Can we do something else, please?

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: I don't like to sit down, I like to work!

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: It's as easy as fair taxation!

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: A good sit helps the mind focus!

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: I could do this all day.

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: You repeat yourself quite a bit.

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: I can't afford to look silly.

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: Don't give up on me yet!

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: I was wrong about that, and I admit it.

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: My opponent is just as bad as me!

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: I hope I've still got your vote.

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: Don’t take that out of context.

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: The whole world is going to know!

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: This is a scandal just waiting to happen.

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: Get outta here before the press gets wind of this!

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Well, uh, you wanna talk about the economy?

string.name: c9_s1
string.value: I don't know if this is the right time...

string.name: c9_s2
string.value: I'll have to run that past my advisors.

string.name: c9_f1
string.value: Don't flip-flop now, I need your vote!

string.name: c9_f2
string.value: I know a fibber when I hear one.

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: I hope I've still got your vote.

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: Don’t take that out of context.

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: Don't give up on me yet!

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: I was wrong about that, and I admit it.

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: My opponent is just as bad as me!

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: I know that wasn't he best result, but I can fix it.

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Please don't hit me in front of the cameras...

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Why are you blaming me? It was one of my aides!

string.name: c13_s1
string.value: I'm feeling a little exposed, but here we go.

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: Keep it out of the media, okay?

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: I'm the boss, I don't have to listen!

string.value: I suppose we all have to relieve ourselves.

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: For the good of the country!

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: Drinking lots of water is good for you.

string.value: Time for sweet dreams of my heroes...

string.value: You're just waiting to get a funny picture of me for the papers.

string.value: There's a whole lot of meeting and greeting to do!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: I should be kissing babies right now!

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Now's not the time to be slacking off.

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: I believe in hard work and good people!

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: It's good to be on the right side.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Remember to take care of yourself and your country!

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Everything you need to know is on my campaign website.

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: The debates aren't for another few days!

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Let me tell you about my recovery plans.

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: We need to bring our troops home!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: It's time to get real about family values!

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: I need some more time to fix this speech.

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: I don't know what to say...

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: America is the best nation on the planet!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: I'm bringing the stars and stripes back!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: What do you know about corporate regulation?

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: I need to talk with my advisors first.

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: What looks better? One leg, or two?

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: No sir, I don't like it.

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: I'm perfectly comfortable where I am.

string.name: f1_f
string.value: I feel pretty strongly about you too.

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: How do you expect a Merlion to sit? On my tail? Rwarrrrr!

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: Let me sit in a nice pose like this! Cute? Rwarrrrr!

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: It wasn't easy sitting down on my tail but here you go! Pretty me?

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: It's never easy to sit on my tail! Rwarrrrr!

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: Let's do the Merlion Dance! rwarrrr!

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: Can we do something else? Like, spitting water?

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: It's too nasty for me to sit, rwarrrr!

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: I can't sit here, I will obstruct the railway station! Rwarrrrrr!

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: It was nicely done right? Rwarrrrr!

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Sitting was never easy for me, but I did it! Rwarrrrrr!

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Why not instead of asking me to sit, you get me some cookies? rwarrrrr!

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Let's do the Kallang Wave for fun shall we? rwarrrrrrrrr!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: I need to strike a nicer pose to sit! rwarrrrrrr!!

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: Are you all hopped up on Gummy Bears? I can't understand you!

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: It's not easy being the iconic symbol of Singapore!

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: It was a piece of cake!

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Whaddaya think? It was cute right?

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Why don't you wear a Mermaid suit and try sitting down! Rwarrrrrrr!

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Sitting's waaay too easy...let me do something else.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Ahh..I'm sleepy...what's up? What did you say? I didn't hear you!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Hehe...I was daydreaming, so I couldn't hear you...

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: tskkkk! you gave me a fright!

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: I am a Lion and you ain't scaring me! NO!

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Tell me baby where did we go wrong? Rwarrrrrrr!!!

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Why not you tell me to take all the blame?

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: Oh so you think I did something wrong eh?

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: I know you don't mean it, you don't!

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: You're not really mad at me are you? Tskkkkk!

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: I promise I wont do that again!

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: What did I do wrong anyway? Which way? Tskkkk!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: You are trying to be cool but you are not cool!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: I can be resting at Sentosa and not walk around being your pet you know? Tskkkkk!

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: If you keep doing that, one day I will spit water at your face!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: I will take note of it and be careful from now on!

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: This I promise you! That I will be good!

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: You don't stare at a Merlion like that!

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: I don't think I have done anything wrong but you are...

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: I have been in here for so long.. longer than you!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: You see! You going all out at me again for nothing! Rwarrrrrrrrr!

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: You must be bored! No problem, let me spit water in your face!

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: So you think you are more clever than me? Really?

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: Throw me around all you want, I'm just gonna splash you!

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: You don't like me? You can leave me here! rwarrrrrr!!

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: Ok, you win! No more waterworks.

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: I dare you to NOT take back what you just said! RWARRRRRR!

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: It takes one to see one jerkface! tskk tskkk!

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: You won't like an angry Merlion! rwarrrrrr!!

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: ...I can't believe you said that... rwarrrrrr!

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: My heart is like beach glass, it breaks easily, and has been smoothed by the waves of the sea.

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: Tell me it's not from your heart, or I will spit water in your face!

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: YOU HAVE CROSSED THE LINE, YOUNG ONE! RWARRRR!

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: I give you 60 seconds to take back what you just said!

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: You broke my heart into a million pieces!

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: You hurt me once, you hurt me twice! When will this stop?

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: You'd leave me behind like this? Who do you think you are? RWARRRR!!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: I still like you, really! Hehe!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Do you not love me cause I am cute?

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: Wah? What? I can't hear you~

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: You didn't mean what you said, right?

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Say that again and you get a face full of water!

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: It got stuck at the causeway! Helpppp!

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: Oh, it smell like durian! Yikes.

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Not yet! Not yet time to poop!

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: I dont want to poop, what can you do to me?

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: I can't go while you're looking at me.

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: No more poops! Too much bad luck!

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Oh dear, the smells are coming out!

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: I'm all out of poop power.

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: It's been a while since the poop has flowed so regularly.

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: Please bear with me while I create the feeling!

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: I don't want! I don't want!

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Do you read the newspaper when you poop?

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Ahhhh! The feeling is sooooo gooood!

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: I can't believe the buffet I had earlier just came out like that!

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: The more I look at my poops, the more they look like you!

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: I haven't had a poop this good in years!

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: There was nothing to come out in the first place!

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: Errrrr can you bring me to the toilet? I cannot poop here, I am very shy!

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: You can't force me to poop if I don't have to! RWARRR!

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: Seek and you will find! Time to go hunt some rare drops!

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: Let's go for a tan on the beach! I will spit water at you to cool you down!

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: Sometime I wish someone could cover me with a blanet at night!

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: How do Merlions talk? They spit water out from their mouth! HAHA!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Very hard to talk to you with this much water in my mouth.

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: I have nothing to say, nothing!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: The sun is out to play, so are the Merlions!

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: The sky and the heavens tell me you will get lucky today!

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Bring me some food and I will give you more luck!

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Shall we try out something fun today?

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: Don't say this when you don't mean it!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: I have little to say! rwarrrr!

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: I might be big but you can hold me tight!

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Who are you dating? Can I date them?

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Hey, Have you heard of the Legendary Phantom Thief?

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: I heard that in a faraway island in a cave, there lives a scary monster with three heads!

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Get me some cookies and we shall talk!

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: I don't wanna close my eyes! I don't wanna fall asleep!

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Man I am so tired, don't feel like talking to people today!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Hehehe! So shy now, I'm blushing! rwarrrr!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Sure? Ok, I take it as a YES!

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: What's up young one? Got cookies?

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: ORLY? OK! I LOVE YOU TOO!

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: I love you too! Really! Rwarrrr!

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: Really? Haha! I love you too!

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: You are very cool! I love you!

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: Pass me some food like... NOW! NOW! NOW!

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: My mind isn't working straight today, I was thinking of something else!

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: I know you are lying! You ARE!

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: Whatever goes around, comes around! Right back at ya!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: You are my one and only!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: Me too me too ME TOO!

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Have you been eating my special Merlion cookies?

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: Time to give me some food! Like... NOW!

string.name: c24_s1
string.value: Will you hug me to bed tonight?

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: I am sleepy, can you give me your arms as my pillow?

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: You don't pretend to sleep when you are not! I can read your mind!

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: The night is still young! Let's grab some cookies!

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: If you sing me a lullaby, I will go to bed!

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: I know you will run away when I am asleep!

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: I can't sleep on empty stomach! cookies PLEASE!

string.name: c25_s4
string.value: Let's go for a ride! Vrooooommm!

string.name: c25_f1
string.value: You do it once but not twice alright!

string.name: c25_f2
string.value: I can't just do it anywhere.

string.name: c25_f3
string.value: Good thing only last while it last and goes to those who waits!

string.name: c25_f4
string.value: Let's just sit and relax, ok?

string.name: f2_f
string.value: I have to stop eating, I am overweight!

string.name: f3_f
string.value: There's a limit to my stomach capacity!

string.name: f4_s
string.value: Can I have a 2 piece Fun Meal please?

string.name: f4_f
string.value: Hey, I am REALLY FULL! STOP FEEDING ME!

string.name: s2
string.value: Why are you talking to me in alien language?

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: Butterflies don't sit! We only fly around! Hehe!

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: I'm gonna try sitting! This is something new!

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: I didn't know sitting down was that easy!

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: I wanna do something fun, poof!

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: I wanna do something else, poof!

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: It's too nasty for me to sit, poof!

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: I can't sit here, someone peed on the ground! Pooof!

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Can I fly around instead? POOF!

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Let me take you for a ride! Poof!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: How are butteflies gonna sit?! Huh?!

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: It's not easy being a butterfly...

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: That was a piece of cake...

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Why don't YOU sit instead? hehe!

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: I have difficulties sitting down... let's try something else shall we?

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Ahh..I'm sleepy...what's up? What did you say? I didn't hear you!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Hehe! My mind was blank! I didn't catch what you were talking about...

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: I got a fright, that was scary!

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: It's not cool at all, clickkkk!

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: Please don't give me a scary face! I am a timid butterfly!

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Tell me what went wrong! Clickkkk!

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: You are ranting at me! Clickkkkk!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: I didn't do anything to deserve this! Clickkkk!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: I know you don't mean it right? You were just bored aren't you? Clickkkkk!

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: I am sorry, so sorry! Clicck clickkk!

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Are you really mad at me? Clickkk clickkk!

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: I promise I won't do that again... clickk clickk!

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: What did I do anyway?! Clickkk!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: That wasn't cool at all! Pooof!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Where else will you find an obedient pet like me? POOFFF!

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: If you keep doing that, I may one day get out of here! Clickk Clickkk!

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Man...I haven't done anything wrong, and still...

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: ...Things happen in life for a reason...

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Man... you are going off on me again for no reason...

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: You must be bored...treating me like this...

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: I.. I don't mean that.. pooof!

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: I don't like hearing that, poooff...

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: Take back what you just said, pooof!

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: ...I can't believe you said that...CLICKKK CLICKKK!

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: I get hurt when I hear those...CLICKKK!

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: That was a joke...right? Right? CLICKKK!

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: You...didn't mean that, right? right? CLICKKK!

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: Take back what you said! CLICKKK!!!!!

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: ...This is not the first time I've heard this, but it still hurts...

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: You aren't gonna leave me out hanging like this, right?

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Do you really not like me??

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: Wah? What? I can't hear you~

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: You didn't mean what you said, right?

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I'm sick of hearing that everyday...hehe

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: If you keep saying that, I'm gonna get grumpy!

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: It...it's not coming out well, clickkk!

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: It's not pooping time yet, pooooof...

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: How can I poop if I don't feel like it, poooff!

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: Pooping is only for bathroom, clickkkk!

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: How am I supposed to poop when you're looking at me? Clickkkk!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: It hasn't been long since I last pooped... clickkk clickkkk!

string.name: c15_f2

string.value: I heard there's something scary in a cave in Leafre!

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Let's put the talk aside, it's time to get some food to eat! POOOF!

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: You must be really bored aren't you? Pooooofff!

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: Arrgh...didn't hear a thing...didn't hear a thing...

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Sometime butterflies do have our OFF day!

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: You sure you are not lying?

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: That's so sweet! I LOVE YOU TOO! Pooooooof!

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: Thanks thanks! I love you too! Poooooof!

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: I guess I am starting to fall in love with you too! Pooooof!

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: I like you very very much! Poooof!

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: That came as a surprise! I am experiencing butterflies in my stomach now!

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: Catch this cupid's arrow from me to you! Pooooof!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: My heart will go on and on for you, pooooof!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: ORLY? I LOVE YOU TOO! Pooooof!

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: You don't really see a butterfly blush don't you? I am blushing now!

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: Quit playing games with my heart! Poooof!

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: You gotta lay off those gummi bears!

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Don't say you love me, you don't even know me! clickkk clickkk!

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: Time to grab some bites! Poooof!

string.name: c24_s1
string.value: Time to sleep in my cosy leaf bed! Will you hug me to sleep tonight?

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: Hold me tight in your arms! Clickkk Clickkk!

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: Don't let the bed bugs bite! Hehe!

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: Let's go for some late night! I am not sleepy!

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: Sing me a lullaby and I will go to my wonderland!

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: Let me dance with the moon and stars tonight!

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: I can't sleep cause I am dreaming of something...

string.name: c25_s1
string.value: Let the power of the butterflies transform!

string.name: c25_s2
string.value: Time to transform into a Monster Moth!

string.name: c25_f1
string.value: Can't just do it all the time, you know.

string.name: c25_f2
string.value: I can't just do it anywhere.

string.name: c25_f3
string.value: Too much only spoils the fun.

string.name: c25_f4
string.value: Let's just sit and relax, shall we?

string.name: f2_f
string.value: I have to stop eating now! Arghhh!

string.name: f3_s
string.value: You're really good at it aren't you?

string.name: f3_f
string.value: I'm too full to eat anymore!

string.name: s2
string.value: Why are you aking me to say that kind of words? Clickkk clickkkkk~

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Or we could do something else.

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Do you hear yourself? All these commands.

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: I'm going to sleep. Don't touch me.

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Sitting's waaay too easy. I'm feeling under-utilized here.

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Ahh, I'm sleepy. Can't hear you...

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: I was just minding my own business... then this! Squerch!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: Why do you do this? Squerch?

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: I know squerch kwon do and I WILL use it! Squerch!

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: You're not really mad, right? Right?

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: Some masters let their pets have fun...

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: I looked up other masters. Turns out there are plenty of options.

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: I promise I'll be good now.

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: I haven't done anything wrong, and still...

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: Is there a reason for this or do you just like yelling?

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: I'm so used to it, I don't even feel it anymore.

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Master gets bored, so I get yelled at.

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: Did you just say what I think you said? Squerch.

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: I think I love you, too!

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: And you just had to tell me?

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Ah. I thought you were going to say something else.

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: That was a good one... haha...

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: You're the only one in my heart, master!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: You're making my gills red, master.

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Oh! Oh! Me too! Me too!! Hehe.

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Probably should have kept that one to yourself.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: You'll have to do better than that.

string.name: c13_f1
string.value: It's not pooping time yet. Squerch.

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: How can I poop if you don't feed me? Squerch.

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: Pooping is only for the bathroom. Squerch.

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Oooh... I almost stepped in it.

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: It hasn't been long enough yet, master.

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: Not really into pooping on command.

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: When do I get to tell YOU to poop, master?

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Whoa, my breakfast came out just like that.

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: Phew! Doesn't my poop look as adorable as me?

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: You can tell it's been a while! Yowza!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: I don't have anything to poop out in the first place!

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: I'm saving it all for one big poop.

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: I'm tired. I need to sleep. Squerch.

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: So sleepy... Let me sleep... Squerch...

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: How am I going to sleep if I'm not even tired! Squerch!

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: You... come... sleep... with... me... Squerch.

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: Don't go eat something good while I'm asleep! Squerch.

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: Master, I just slept! I'm... not... zzzz...

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: So you can doodle on my fins? No thanks!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: I'm hungry! Can't sleep! Feed me!

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: I'll do whatever you ask me to do, master!

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Don't ditch me while I'm sleeping.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: How about a treat instead? Squerch.

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: The more you go hunting, the better the items you'll find. Squerch.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Isn't it nice out here today? We should go somewhere to play! Squerch.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: I need a nap on top of a comfortable blanket. Squerch.

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Have you ever heard of a chatty shark? Squerch.

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: I have nothing to say to you. Squerch.

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: I can't talk to you right now. Squerch.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: I have a feeling a nice item may come our way today!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Master, you'll get me some good food today, right?

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: How are you today? Good? Good!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: A lot of people are here, so make sure to be courteous!

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: I don't have anything to say.

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: Not much goin' on over here.

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Master, are you dating someone? I just met someone. Maybe we could go on a double date?

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Master, you have a huge head. Hahaha. HUGE!

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: This is boring. I need something more exciting.

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: Why do you keep talking to me? I'm trying to sleep.

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: This is my area of expertise. Squerch.

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: You won't find a cuter pet anywhere! Squerch.

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: Whoa, master must have gone nuts.

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Master, what do you think? Cute, right? Squerch!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: Like this? At least you know a cute act when you see one.

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: My friends love it when I do this!

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: You think I'll just do whatever you ask... I thought you were smarter.

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: How do I put this… No?

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: Master! Just get me some food! Squerch!

string.name: f2_s
string.value: Master, this is so delicious... Squerch!

string.name: f2_f
string.value: I am about to blow up... squerch.

string.name: f3_s
string.value: This is as good as it gets!

string.name: f4_s
string.value: Heh heh, this is my favorite!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: Are you trying to kill me, master?

string.name: s3
string.value: Squerch! MY precious mouth would never spit those venomous words!

string.name: s4
string.value: Please, no... no words like that... Squerch.

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: I soft, so I comfy anywhere.

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: I won't do it! Pinka piii!

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: I sit. You sing me a song!

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: I'm sleepy, but I can't sleep...

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: Hee hee... I roll over easy!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: I have a surprise for you...

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: You won't play with me no more?

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: I feel so comfortable around you.

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: It's fantastic hanging out with you.

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: Scram. I'm not in the mood!

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: Yawn. I can't be bothered at the moment. Zzzz.

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Shower me with all your love! Pinkaaa!

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Lurve? Lub? What? Forget it, I'll just sit around and rub my tummy.

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: You're annoying. I have nothing else to say.

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: I'm afraid I'll have to reject you. Piinkapiii!

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: I've been waiting for you to say those words!

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: That's so nice! I feel the same way about you!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: You're just as cute as me! I love you!

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Don't lie. My little ol' heart will shatter.

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I'm very busy right now. Can we talk about this later?

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: You can't possibly think I have a good impression of you, can you?

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: Stop it, stop it, stop it!

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Boing boing! Hee hee, keep up!

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Leave the lights on! I'm scared of the dark.

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: I wanna sleep next to you! Zzz...

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Let's play a little longer... Pwwease?

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Nighty night, master! I lov…vee…ee… Zzzz.

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Can you tuck in my blankie if I accidentally kick it off?

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: No time for sleep! Must xercise! Get strong!

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: What do you want to hear? Piinkaaa?

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Why am I called a bean? I look more like a mouse.

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: I can't stay balanced and talk at the same time.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: My dream is to be a DJ.

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I like beef! Pork's okay, too.

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: I have many interests. Like knitting.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: I like talkies with you! You funny!

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: I was born with big eyes. Sparkly!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Am I fat? Be honest. I take it.

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: I'm endangered. Take care of me!

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: Boing! I do lots of things!

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: I know how to rock, too!

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: Can't hear you, can't hear you!

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: I am a guitar master! Wahnananana!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Look at me! LOOK AT MEEEEEE!

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Gonna be rock star! Have a world tour!

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: I have no idea what you're talking about.

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: No tricks. I am a quiet and gentle pet.

string.name: f2_f
string.value: Buh? What if I get fat?

string.name: f4_f
string.value: Waahh! I don't want it! I don't!

string.name: s2
string.value: Buh?! I'll remember this! You watch out!

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: Are you testing me? Now I'm scared to move.

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: Happy now? Can we go now?

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: La di da... Doo doo doop...

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: Don't you care about saving the world?

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: I'll just pretend I didn't hear that.

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: La di da... Doo doo doop...

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: La di da... Doo doo doop...

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: Okay, fine. It was MY fault, okay?!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: It was YOUR fault. You made me do it!

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: Okay, fine. It was MY fault, okay?!

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: Do you have it in you to forgive me?

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: I'll make you regret saying that.

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Don't say it unless you mean it!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: How can you say that to me?!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: I'm sorry, so now you can't be mad anymore.

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: I won't ever do that again. Promise!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: All words have consequences. Just wait and see.

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: When you're least expecting it, I'll get you back...

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: I'm not unhappy you said that.

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: You're kind of sweet, I suppose.

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: I'm not quite ready to say it back, but thanks.

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: I... Well, shucks, I love you, too.

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: At least buy me dinner first.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: I'll just pretend I didn't hear that.

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: Please tell me no one's watching.

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: I'm not that kind of dragon.

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: Don't ask that of me. Please!

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: You just don't let up. Oh, very well.

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: Why are you doing this to me?

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: It makes me uncomfortable that you're watching.

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: This... This actually feels kind of good.

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: I, uh, I have a headache.

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: I'm actually really getting into this.

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: You're watching, right? It's not the same if you don't watch.

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Don't MY feelings matter to you?

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: Why are you doing this to me?

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Please. I just want to disappear.

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Leave the lights on! I'm scared of the dark.

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: I'm fine as I am, thanks very much.

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: You go on and mind your own business.

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: You may go to bed first, if you wish.

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: If you weren't so much bigger than me, I wouldn't have to listen to you.

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: I refuse to go to sleep yet!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Just because you're tired doesn't mean I am.

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: You can be a real pest.

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: You'll keep the boogieman away, right?

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: You're going to have to say that again, and slower.

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: But what if the nightmares return? Sniffle.

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: I come from a line of prestigious dragons, you know.

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: My daddy could change colors. He could even turn invisible!

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: My daddy could beat up all the other dragon's daddies.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: My daddy's roar would make you go deaf.

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: I'd like to see you try to make me.

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: You can be a real pest.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Someday, I'll rule over ALL the dragons.

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: What about YOUR heritage? Are you anyone special?

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: I'll tell you a secret. It took me a long time to learn how to fly.

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Sometimes, I just don't understand what you want.

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Isn't there anyone else you can go bother?

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: I have no idea what you want.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: When I grow up, I'll be able to turn invisible like my daddy.

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Just watch. I'll turn invisible. There, did you see it?!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Hey, what do you think of the Nova?

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Can i go play with the other dragons?

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: You can be a real pest.

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: I learned this from my daddy.

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: I don't have any talents, I swear!

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: I don't know what you want.

string.name: s3
string.value: You are so mean. Don't talk to me.

string.name: s4
string.value: I'm so disappointed in you. So disappointed.

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: You can be a real pest.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Someday, I'll rule over ALL the dragons.

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: What about YOUR heritage? Are you anyone special?

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: I'll tell you a secret. It took me a long time to learn how to fly.

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Sometimes, I just don't understand what you want.

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Isn't there anyone else you can go bother?

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: I have no idea what you want.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: When I grow up, I'll be able to turn invisible like my daddy.

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Just watch. I'll turn invisible. There, did you see it?!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Hey, what do you think of the Nova?

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Can i go play with the other dragons?

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: You can be a real pest.

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: I learned this from my daddy.

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: I don't have any talents, I swear!

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: I don't know what you want.

string.name: s3
string.value: You are so mean. Don't talk to me.

string.name: s4
string.value: I'm so disappointed in you. So disappointed.

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: Are you testing me? Now I'm scared to move.

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: Happy now? Can we go now?

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: La di da... Doo doo doop...

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: Don't you care about saving the world?

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: I'll just pretend I didn't hear that.

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: La di da... Doo doo doop...

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: La di da... Doo doo doop...

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: Okay, fine. It was MY fault, okay?!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: It was YOUR fault. You made me do it!

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: Okay, fine. It was MY fault, okay?!

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: Do you have it in you to forgive me?

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: I'll make you regret saying that.

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Don't say it unless you mean it!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: How can you say that to me?!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: I'm sorry, so now you can't be mad anymore.

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: I won't ever do that again. Promise!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: All words have consequences. Just wait and see.

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: When you're least expecting it, I'll get you back...

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: I'm not unhappy you said that.

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: You're kind of sweet, I suppose.

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: I'm not quite ready to say it back, but thanks.

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: I... Well, shucks, I love you, too.

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: At least buy me dinner first.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: I'll just pretend I didn't hear that.

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: Please tell me no one's watching.

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: I'm not that kind of dragon.

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: Don't ask that of me. Please!

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: You just don't let up. Oh, very well.

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: Why are you doing this to me?

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: It makes me uncomfortable that you're watching.

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: This... This actually feels kind of good.

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: I, uh, I have a headache.

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: I'm actually really getting into this.

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: You're watching, right? It's not the same if you don't watch.

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Don't MY feelings matter to you?

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: Why are you doing this to me?

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Please. I just want to disappear.

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Leave the lights on! I'm scared of the dark.

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: I'm fine as I am, thanks very much.

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: You go on and mind your own business.

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: You may go to bed first, if you wish.

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: If you weren't so much bigger than me, I wouldn't have to listen to you.

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: I refuse to go to sleep yet!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Just because you're tired doesn't mean I am.

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: You can be a real pest.

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: You'll keep the boogieman away, right?

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: You're going to have to say that again, and slower.

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: But what if the nightmares return? Sniffle.

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: I come from a line of prestigious dragons, you know.

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: My daddy could change colors. He could even turn invisible!

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: My daddy could beat up all the other dragon's daddies.

string.value: My daddy's roar would make you go deaf.
