string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Don't expect too much from a pumpkin

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Pumpkin thinks Master should be able to play fine on his own

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Pump pump pump Kin kin kin!

string.name: f3_f
string.value: You probably haven't seen a pumpkin that died of overeating...

string.name: f4_s
string.value: I will eat it all Pumpkin~!

string.name: s4
string.value: Master, you're such a disappointment Pumpkin!

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: Fine, I'll do as you tell me, Rabbit

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: Hey, my clothes are getting dirty, Rabbit!

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: So we're taking a break, Rabbit?

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: My legs were just starting to hurt, Rabbit

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Why don't you sit too? Rabbit

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: I walk with two feet, Rabbit

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: I'll do whatever I want, Rabbit

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: Don't tell me what to do, Rabbit

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: I'll have to sit if you tell me to, Rabbit

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Are you looking out for me and telling me to rest... you're a good.. .good master, Rabbit

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: How dare you block Rabbit's way

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Is that an order? I refuse, Rabbit

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: There's too much dust here... No, Rabbit

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: My clothes are too expensive! I can't just sit anywhere, Rabbit

string.name: c5
string.value: Punch|No|I dare you|You asked for it

string.name: c6
string.value: Punch|No|I dare you|You asked for it

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: Come see me on the roof, Rabbit

string.name: c7
string.value: Punch|No|I dare you|You asked for it

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Oh no, I can't bear for you to scold me!

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: Do you wish to feel Rabbit's wratch?

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: Ah... well, I'll have to let it go, Rabbit

string.name: c8
string.value: Punch|No|I dare you|You asked for it

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Is this where we part? Rabbit

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: Have you ever been slapped by a rabbit?

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Phew... If Rabbit was just a year younger…

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Feeling lovely feelings all over, Rabbit♡

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: What's wrong all of a sudden?

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: Hold, hold on.. give me some time to think, Rabbit

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Well, that's you, and I'm a pet!

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: I don't know if I should like you this much, Rabbit~♡

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: I can't believe I'm so happy♡

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: I will obey you all my life, Rabbit~!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Why are you doing this, Rabbit!?

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: Do you want to go to the police, Rabbit?

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: I don't think this is right, Rabbit

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: Don't talk to me now, Rabbit

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: This is an important moment, Rabbit

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Now is not the time for that, Rabbit

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: There's nothing to come out, Rabbit

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: I think I need to gather more, Rabbit

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: Rabbit~ Don't say such things and let's just play~

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Give me some toilet paper, Rabbit

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: These days, my digestion is great, Rabbit

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: Time for letting everything go, Rabbit

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Close my eyes and just… relax... Rabbit

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Don't talk about dirty things, Rabbit

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: Haven't been up for too long, Rabbit

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: Ready and rarin' to go, Rabbit

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: Now is not the time to sleep, Rabbit

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: This has to be the paradise… Ra… bbit...

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: Now is not the time for us to sleep, Rabbit

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: You have to sleep on the bed, Rabbit

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: I went shopping yesterday… Rabbit Rabbit

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Do you know what's trendy these days, Rabbit?

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: I think you know how to dress yourself, Rabbit

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Rabbit only wears designer brands, Rabbit

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Not all expensive things are luxury items, Rabbit

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: What fits you well matters, Rabbit

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Don't copy others because they all wear it, Rabbit

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: You can tell what kind of person you are by looking at your clothes, Rabbit

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Rabbit's hair was perfected by Master's soul

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Want to go shopping with Rabbit?

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Be careful of Petite.... She's a scary woman, Rabbit

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: What if I don't want to, Rabbit?

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: Ha ha ha, Rabbit sure can shine, right?

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: I told you I'm busy, Rabbit

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: You're asking for too much from Rabbit

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: What are you talking about, Rabbit?

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: Well, this much I can do~ Hoggy!

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: I'm not sitting because I want to~ Touchy~

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: Why do I have to listen to Touchy?

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: I'm not sitting because I want Touchy to like me!

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Touchy~ Touchy~ You should be patting me when I've done as you've asked!

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: It's such a bother, but I'll do it~ Hoggy~ You appreciate it right~?

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Not really.. I'm not doing this for Touchy!

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Hoggy~ Hoggy~ You don't even know the basics Touchy!

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: No! Ask another pet to do such things!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: What's so great about listening to what Touchy says? You tell me first~ Hoggy~

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: Sit? I forgot how to sit when I was 3~!

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Touchy should be sitting if I do! I'm not sitting because I worry Touchy might be tired!

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: Hoggy~ Hoggy~ Don't think I'm doing this for you to like me!

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Touchy~ Don't expect me to sit! But I'm going to sit~!

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: I'm only sitting because my legs hurt! Don't take it the wrong way, Touchy!

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Touchy! Touchy! Now you should know what my personality is like!

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Don't play jokes with me! Touchy~ I'm quite a Touchy~!

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Does Touchy think I am an obedient pet? If so, that's a Touchy misunderstanding~!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Hoggy! Hoggy! I'm so sick of it~! Why are you telling just me to sit down?

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: Why are you doing this? Because I'm Touchy?

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: Touchy… How could you say that!

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: Because I am Touchy.... Touchy doesn't have to be this way too!

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: Sob... I will get even worse! Touchy~

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: Hoggy! Don't you see my hair is all pulled up?

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Why should I be listening to such things! Touchy!

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: Touchy? Don't say such things! I will be good from now on! Touchy...

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: Touchy? What's the matter? Aren't you feeling well today?

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Hoggy... Hoggy... Why am I crying?

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: Hate you! Touchy broke my heart! Hoggy!

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: You didn't just say that to me, did you? Think hard! Hoggy~

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Hoggy! Hoggy! I'm so mad right now! Don't touch me! Hoggy!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: You better take that back! Don't you know I'm Touchy? Touchy!

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: It was definitely Touchy's fault! He can't do this to me!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: Touchy! Don't say such things! I will call you, Master from now on, huh?

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: I'm not crying because Touchy hurt me! I just wanted to let some tears out!

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: Master! I'm sorry! I won't talk Touchy anymore! Don't be upset anymore!

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: What's happening? Why am I crying? It was just Touchy talking....

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: If you keep saying such things, I will prick you with this Touchy fur!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: Touchy! Touchy! Can't believe I have to listen to such things... I should just starve myself to death...

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Touchy~ Such lines won't work on Touchy's heart. Say something worse!

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Fine! I will! Hoggy~ So you know me now, huh? Hoggy~

string.name: c9_s2
string.value: :P~~! How about it? Touchy is getting angry? Hoggy~

string.name: c9_s4
string.value: It feels great to do this to Touchy~ Touchy~

string.name: c9_f1
string.value: Touchy~ I don't want to! Touchy~

string.name: c9_f2
string.value: I don't want to show you! Touchy~!

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: How about it Touchy? Even my tongue stuck out looks pretty~ Hoggy~

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: I'm not making fun of Touchy because I am Touchy! You know how I feel!

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: So you like the Touchy talk! Well, :P!

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: :P~! :P~! How about it? Aren't I good at making fun? Touchy~

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: Such jokes do not suit a fine hedgehog!

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: Touchy~ I can't stick my tongue out because it hurts~!

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: Hoggy~ I will only pick on Touchy if I feel like making fun!

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: I'm disappointed! I don't make fun of other people! Hoggy!

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: You appreciate it right~? Because you can admire the tongue of the greatest hedgehog in the world?

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: How do you like it? My Touchy charisma! You envy Touchy right? Touchy~

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: I just want to make fun of Touchy right now~! Take it!

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: Touchy~ :P~! So? Isn't it cuter than you expected? Touchy~ Touchy~

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Touchy, you do it! I don't want to stick my tongue out! Touchy~!

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: If you keep asking me to do these things, I will hug you. It will hurt a lot~ Hoggy~

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Hoggy~Hoggy~ So stop bothering me! It's so annoying!

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Well I wasn't going to! You're so gullible Touchy~!

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: I actually did want to go~ Great timing! Touchy~

string.name: c13_s4
string.value: Hoggy! Hoggy! Don't talk to me when I'm pushing!

string.name: c13_f1
string.value: Great hedgehogs go to bathrooms in secret~ Touchy!

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: How could I go when you're staring?

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: Touchy you do it first! I'll follow your lead~!

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: I'm not going because Touchy told me to!

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Hoggy~ feels refreshing~ feels good~ Hoggy~!

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Touchy~ Do you want to see me push Touchy?

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: Hoggy! You can't go in such a humble place~!

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: Tell me to poop after feeding me something! I'm starving. Touchy~!

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Touchy~ I'm already going! Get ready to clean up Touchy!

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Now that I'm fed such delicious things, I can let out a lot~! Thanks~ Touchy~

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: My stomach was hurting~! Thanks a lot! Touchy~

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Good Good~ Refreshing! I will call you, Master once since I'm in a good mood~!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Touchy! What did you just ask me to do? Could you not make me get more and more touchy?

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: I'm so hungry I couldn't push anything out, even if I wanted to! How could you do this to me?! Touchy~

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Hoggy~ Hoggy~ I only go when I want to go! That's my way~! Hoggy!

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Touchy! If I go right now, it won't be much! I will wait and poop later!

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: Touchy~ I'm not saying this because I like you Touchy!

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: Hoggy~ Needles are quite prickly~ But you always hug me. I'm so grateful! Hoggy~

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: Touchy~ Always cheer up Touchy! You can be strong Touchy! Like me~

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: Touchy you are so great for understanding hedgehog language. Touchy~Touchy~

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: Touchy~ I don't want to talk right now! I don't feel so good!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Why are you making me more touchy~! Touchy~!

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: Hoggy~ Hoggy~ Don't tell me what to do~ Hoggy~

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: Touchy~ I will talk! But I won't give you my heart!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: We spent such a long time together... now shall I call you, Master? Touchy~!

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Hoggy~ I wish I could travel with Master all my life~ Hoggy~

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Touchy! Thank you for loving me and taking care of me all the time~ Touchy!

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: I have critical skills! Rolling Attack! With needles up and body rolled up~!

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: Touchy~ you know me! Why do you make me do these things in the first place~!

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: Hoggy~ Now stop~! Stop the talking as well~! Stop eating? No!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: Touchy you speak hedgehog first~! Touchy~

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: I'm sorry! I can't say it!

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Touchy~ I appreciate how you feel Touchy. Touchy~

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: I don't want to listen to such things! I really don't~ Hoggy!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Touchy~! You and I feel the same Touchy~♡

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Touchy~ Don't ask for my love! Touchy~

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: I'm sorry but we're not in that kind of relationship! Hoggy~!

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: Touchy~ I'm not giving you any reaction because I'm Touchy~! Touchy!

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Hoggy~ Hoggy! My heart will also be for you Touchy~ Hoggy!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Touchy~ The reason why I'm so touchy is that~ It's because I like you Touchy~♡

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: No~ Can't have second thought! But, why do I keep falling for Touchy?

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Touchy Now I will be less touchy to you~! Touchy~

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: Love? That's for Junior Reaper! Touchy!

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: Hoggy~ I know you say sweet things but at the same time your eyes are after another pet!

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: Hoggy! Then come hug me tightly! Hoggy~!

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: Okay~ Okay~ I will take your word for it~ Touchy~Touchy~

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: I've always thought Touchy was a great master. Touchy~!

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: Hoggy~ Let's spend more time than we've spent together already~ Hoggy~

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: Now I will also show how I feel~ Master~♡ Master♡ How about it? You like?

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: From now on I will be a little, just a little less touchy~♡ Touchy~ Touchy~

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: I was going to say you, Master, but~ I won't~! Touchy!

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: Touchy~ Touchy~ I'm quite touchy right now! Be careful Touchy~! Touchy!

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: Touchy you're all good except that you say I love you too easily~! Touchy~

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: I don't have the strength right now! I will tell you later! I'm too tired! Hoggy!

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: Touchy~ I'm going to sleep~ Touchy~

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: Touchy! I can't sleep when Touchy is being so loud! Touchy!

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: How can I sleep when I'm not sleepy? Hoggy~

string.name: c24_s1
string.value: Touchy! I'm sorry I fell asleep ahead of you.... Talked so much...

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: Hoggy~ Hoggy~ Now that we've spent such a long time together you know my bedtime~!

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: Touchy~ I've been so touchy all my energy is gone. Ah~ I think I'm passing out~

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: Hoggy~ Now you're tucking me in~ Impressive~ Hoggy~

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: Touchy! No! I don't want to sleep! Don't force me~!

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: Touchy~ If Touchy isn't sleeping with me I won't either~! Touchy~

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: Hoggy~ It's hard for me to sleep when my needles are prickling me too! Hoggy~

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: Touchy! First feed me. I can't sleep because I'm too hungry! Touchy~

string.name: c25_s1
string.value: I'm not sleeping because I'm sleepy... I'm really not falling asleep because I'm sleepy....

string.name: c25_s2
string.value: We have to be together longer, but I'm too sleepy right now! I'm sorry~ Master~!

string.name: c25_s3
string.value: Hoggy~ One good deed before I go to bed~ I will call you, Master~ Hoggy!

string.name: c25_s4
string.value: Touchy~ I hope Master has a happy Maple trip even when I'm asleep~

string.name: c25_f1
string.value: Touchy~ if you keep ordering me to do stuff, I will be bad! No~ I will get more touchy!

string.name: c25_f2
string.value: Hoggy! Do you want me to fall asleep? Well, yeah, I guess you would!

string.name: c25_f3
string.value: Hoggy~ I'm not at all tired right now! So how can you ask me to go to sleep?

string.name: c25_f4
string.value: Touchy~ Why don't you go to bed first Touchy? I will do the hunting!

string.name: f2_f
string.value: Hoggy~ I'm so full right now! Hoggy!

string.name: f3_s
string.value: I'm not eating because I want to♡ Really♡

string.name: f3_f
string.value: Making me eat the same stuff over and over again will make me get sick of it Touchy!

string.name: f4_s
string.value: Now I like the affection behind the food you are giving me~ Hoggy~

string.name: f4_f
string.value: Touchy~ I'm on a diet right now! I'm going to lose weight! You hear me? Touchy~

string.name: s3
string.value: You know I'm touchy, right, Touchy? So don't say those things! I will get touchy!

string.name: s4
string.value: I will only call Touchy Master when you talk nice♡

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: Kyong~ Do you want to sit together~?

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: I'll think about it Kyong Kyong

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Kyong Kyong~I wish this was the rose garden

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: I am a free Sand Fox~

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Kyong~ I don't like dust. It's not sand~

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: Don't tell me what to do~ Kyong!

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: Why? You think I look so pretty sitting down?

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: This is cooler than my star~!

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: I wanted to be with you too Kyong♡

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Can you tell me one more time~?

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Kyong I don't want to take orders~

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Kyong! Why are you taking the chair just for yourself~?

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Kyong Kyong~ I can do that on my own!

string.name: c5
string.value: Punch|No|I dare you|You asked for it

string.name: c6
string.value: Punch|No|I dare you|You asked for it

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: Don't you think I'm pretty anymore...?

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: I wasn't trying to get you mad...

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Kyong! What's this? Are you trying to act like a Master?

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: Kyong Kyong! I'm going to go back to my star!

string.name: c7
string.value: Punch|No|I dare you|You asked for it

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Kyong... do you hate me much?

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: I'm scared, why are you doing this?

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: What's that? Did you just raise your hand?

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Kyong Kyong ! I'm going to get mad too!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Kyong! You're not my friend! You're stubborn!

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: Kyong Kyong! I am a beast of the desert!

string.name: c8
string.value: Punch|No|I dare you|You asked for it

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: I'm sorry... if you get so mad, I get scared

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Why are you doing this? This is unacceptable on our star

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: What are you doing? Are you scolding me? Ha!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: I have many friends who like me! Kyong!

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: You're the only one in the world, my precious♡

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: Like it this way and that♡

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: Hey no~! We're of different species!

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: I'm so happy that I met you here♡

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: Well, the cold hard truth is I'm not…

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Thank you, so much but... that's it

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: I waited for you for an hour♡

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: I'm so glad I came to Maple World♡

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Are we staying together from now on~?

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: What's wrong all of a sudden?

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I will pretend as if I haven't heard so you forget it too

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: I am a free Sand Fox, so don't tie me down

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: Kyong! Oh dear, it's a lot of work~

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: Kyong?? Are you out of your mind?

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: I don't know why you're are making me do it, but... success!

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: Push with all you've got Kyong!

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: I can't… I mean I haven't eaten anything

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: Kyong Kyong you aren't the only one who uses the bathroom

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Oh dear, my face is all read! Kyong!

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: I don't do things like pooping!

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: I will poop if I wish to! Can you go away?

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: What? The sun is high above in the sky!

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: I am an independent Sand Fox, I don't go to sleep during the day!

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: Let's play just a little more~!

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Going to bed already? You're more lazy than I thought!

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: Kyong Kyong Let's play together later

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: Well, in that case, I will take a short break Kyong~!

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: These days, my hearing isn't so good Kyong!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Spending the night out is romantic, but not today!

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: Kyong Kyong~ If you are tired, you can go to sleep first!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Kyong~ Then sweet dreams to you too~!

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Kyong Kyong... I want to see roses and the prince...

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Kyong... it's so romantic to fall asleep in the desert!

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: Don't tell me what to do Kyong!

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I will consider it if you bring me blankets and pillows!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: Are we not going hunting? You don't know romance, do you?!

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: What you're more lazy than I thought~ You!

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Kyong~ I want to go to the free desert!

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: I used to hang out with a prince! Ah-hem!

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: I so want to have star candies~ I really want some!

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: What~? I am a mysterious fox!

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: Kyong Kyong What do you want to hear from me?

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: It's a secret! Keep digging~ Kyong!

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Kyong~! I'm too tired to talk... Mmm

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Kyong~! Do you wanna go see a shooting star?

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Kyong! The star I visited with the prince was nicer than this one!

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Don't you want to know which star I was on? Kyong Kyong!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Kyong Kyong... Eating star candies makes me feel better~

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Kyong! I am a quiet Sand Fox!

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: Kyong Kyong... What did you just say?!

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Kyong~ It's such a bother to talk!

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: I saw my own kind at the zoo I was so surprised

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Kyong~! There are so many humans in this star!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: I am the one and only talking Sand Fox!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: I take care of my fur everyday you know~

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: Kyong~ Play on your own for a while!

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: Kyong Kyong~! I want to take the day off today!

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: Kyong~ I won't tell me secret to anyone!

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: What do you want to hear Kyong~?

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: I am a dancing Sand Fox~!

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: I wish there is also a song!

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: Kyong Kyong♡ I want to perform this~

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: Kyong I don't want to my throat hurts!

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: What are you talking about? I can't do things like that!

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: Kyong~ I will do some other sports!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: This dance is totally popular in Asteroid B612!

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Kyong! How about it? Do you want to give it a go?

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: Kyong Kyong I'm too tired, I can't~!

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Kyong~ Today isn't the only day~

string.name: f3_s
string.value: It's a relief that I am a Sand Fox Yum Yum♡

string.name: f4_s
string.value: Kyong♡ I was craving this just before!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: Wa, wait! I'm so full Kyong!

string.name: s1
string.value: What? How can you say that?

string.name: s2
string.value: I so hate you! You're not who I thought you were!

string.name: s4
string.value: Saying bad things! Earth is a desolate place!

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: I will sit if you ask me to!

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: I'm so sad I don't want to do it! Wahh!

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Thank you, Master~ Koala thank you

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: I hate dust! Koala is clean~

string.value: It's a bit too much Koala..

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: Why are you doing this? Sob…

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: Master, I love you so so much♡

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: I will be beside you always

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: Why are you asking me to do those things?

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: Not now, hold on a minute

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Why don't you go ahead and sleep?

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: How about you stop making me do things..!?

string.value: Koala comes from a place very far away!

string.value: Always live with a smile! Koala!

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: I sat like Master told me to~

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: I'm sitting nicely~ Tell me I did well~

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: Can't I just stay like this?

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: I wish we can do easy things everyday~

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Yes~ have a seat here, Master

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: What's the point? There's not much difference in sitting and standing up...

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: I'm not going to leave Master's side~

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: It would be better to sit on your wide soft legs~

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Sometimes, I have to listen to Master~

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: You can rest next to me for a while~

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Master~ you can ask me to do harder stuff sometimes~

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: I will sit if Master, sits!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Sometimes, I want to try other stuff~

string.name: c5
string.value: Punch|No|I dare you|You asked for it

string.name: c5_f1
string.value: Master, you have to take the lead~

string.name: c6
string.value: Punch|No|I dare you|You asked for it

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: I will think about what I did, but don't starve me...

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: Don't look at me with that angry face... I'm sad...

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: But I'm trying to be good...

string.name: c7
string.value: Punch|No|I dare you|You asked for it

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: I can't go on if you hate me...

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: You have to tell me properly~ I can't understand~

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: Master, you don't know how I feel!

string.name: c8
string.value: Punch|No|I dare you|You asked for it

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: It's so sad when Master talks like that...

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: I'm sorry! It will never happen again

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: I want to be adored by Master, that's all~ Please understand~

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Master~ It will never happen again~

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: How could you get angry at a nice pet like me?

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: You have to let it go now~!

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: I'm leaving.. How could my Master not trust me…?

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: Ah well... I don't know.. what to say

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: No matter how many times I hear it, it feels so good~♡

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: I have butterflies in my stomach. I don't know what to do~

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: I love you~ I love you~♡

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: I'm not such an easy pet, you know

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: I feel so good, I can fly♡

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Tell me you love me ten times a day~ Promise~♡

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: I too will love only you, Master♡

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Now I will also show how I feel~ Master~♡ Master♡ How about it? You like?

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: Master... Please change your clothes and come back~ smells~

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Master, but you will get mad!

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Master, you've also fallen for me!

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: It's embarrassing, but if Master asks..!

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: An adventurer must know the time and place!

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: We have to uphold public ethics!

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: Ah! Master, please think before you order me!

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: It's embarrassing when you look at my bottom~

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: It's hard to poop, my stomach hurts

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: Why.. are you making me do this?

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: Why are you forcing me to poop?!

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: If you order me to poop, then I shall~ (...Pooh~..)

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: My poop even doesn't even smell~♡

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Ow~ My bottom is huge and it's so easy to poop~

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: I don't know what poop is~

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: You have to take me to the bathroom, Master!

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Aren't you going to bed? You look tired...

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: I'm going to bed now! Master~

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Master, see you in my dreams!

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: Are you sleepy, Master? I'm not...!

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: It doesn't look like it's time for bed already

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: I'll just take a brief rest~ Zzzz♡

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: Now you're tucking me in~ not bad~

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: I want to go downtown with you, Master~

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: I just got up, and you want me to go back to sleep?

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: Why are you trying to make me sleep.. It's not bedtime yet.

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: At least sing me a lullaby!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: I want to fall asleep on your lap...

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Will you sleep with me Master? Lie next to me

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: It was a tiring day Zzzz....

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: We have to be together longer, but I'm too sleepy right now! I'm sorry~ Master~!

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: Making me sleep when I'm not even fed yet! You're a bad Master!

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I want to play with Master~ Wanna play~

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: I'm not sleepy, I want to play♡

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Tasty food~ Your soft arms are the best~♡

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: I like Henesys grass because it's so soft~

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Master, where do you think I look the prettiest? Tell me yourself

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: The falling leaves are making me sad...

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: I'm not saying a word from now on~

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Ah... Why is the sky blue? I'm sad...

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Well, the pet languages are all different actually~ I can't talk with Yetis or White Tigers~

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I want to go on an exciting adventure with Master~♬

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: I get jealous when Master talks with another pet!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: You can hunt comfortably if you leave the potion with me

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Are you bored? Let's get a facial together~

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Let's talk next time~ I'm tired today~

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Master, you're the best in the whole universe~ right?

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Talking to you makes me so happy

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: I'm so happy to be with you~♡

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Sometimes, fairies recommend those who did good deeds~

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: I don't know what to say~

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: Sometimes, I want to be alone. Can you be quiet?

string.name: f1_s
string.value: This is my favorite time of all times~♡

string.name: f2_f
string.value: Master, are you bothered by me for some reason?

string.name: f3_s
string.value: It suits my refined taste buds perfectly~

string.name: f3_f
string.value: I ate too much and my stomach hurts...

string.name: f4_s
string.value: Master, you eat too~ It's so good!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: You don't deserve to be a master! Why are you feeding me when I've already eaten?

string.name: s2
string.value: Master! You can't say those things!

string.name: s4
string.value: I'm not going to say that~

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: Master, you're so great for looking out for my legs~

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: Master, are you taking care of me?

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: I have to sit with you, Master~!

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Haven't taken a rest since forever~

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: I will sit later~ Right now I got cramps in my legs~

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: I think I'll get dirt on me!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: If I sit, I won't be able to play~ Let's just go out to play~

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Master, you think I'm good at everything, right?

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: I listen to whatever you tell me to, Master~

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: I'm happy to see you are pleased~

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: But I want to run around more...

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: What did you just say, Master? I didn't hear you~

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Right now, standing up feels more comfortable!

string.name: c5
string.value: Punch|No|I dare you|You asked for it

string.name: c5_f1
string.value: Master, you have to take the lead~

string.name: c6
string.value: Punch|No|I dare you|You asked for it

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: Don't be mad~ I won't do it anymore~

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: But I'm trying to be good...

string.name: c7
string.value: Punch|No|I dare you|You asked for it

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: Don't be mad, Master. I'll never do it again

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: But you're still my favorite, Master...

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: I'm so good and sincere~ Why are you getting mad all the time?

string.name: c8
string.value: Punch|No|I dare you|You asked for it

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: Master, if you feel better again, I will kiss you 100 times~♡

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Master~ It will never happen again~

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Hm... I'm thinking about what I did wrong...

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: It's not fun. Let's play something else, Master~♡

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: How could you get angry at a nice pet like me?

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: Ah well... I don't know.. what to say

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: No matter how many times I hear it, it feels so good~♡

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: My heart will always be yours too~!

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Okay~ Okay~ I'll take your word for it~

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: I'm not such an easy pet, you know

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Now I will also show how I feel~ Master~♡ Master♡ How about it? You like?

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: Master... Please change your clothes and come back~ smells~

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Love is not a game. Get it together, Master!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Master, but you will get mad!

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: I was going to say you, Master, but~ I won't~! Touchy!

string.name: c13_s4
string.value: It's embarrassing, but if Master asks...!

string.name: c13_f1
string.value: Ah! Master, please think before you order me!

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: An adventurer must know the time and place!

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: We have to uphold public ethics!

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: For some reason, the poop seems to have a special energy.

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Why are you forcing me to poop?!

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: There's no bag to pick up my poop~

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Ah... Looking at my poop makes me feel as if there is another one of me...

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Hee hee~ Pooping makes me feel good~

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: My poop even doesn't even smell~♡

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: I have to want it to go though... Can you do it by will, Master?

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: I'm going next door to play~

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: I want to pee... Can I pee?

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: I can't sleep in such a loud place!

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: Master, do you think it's time for bed?

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: I was tired. It's good that you asked me to go to sleep...

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: I want to see myself in my dreams..

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: I've been waiting for this! Good night, Master ♡

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: Are you going to bed already?

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: You go to bed first Master~

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: Sleeping all day will make you fat!

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: Next to you, I sleep better, Master...

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Master, your voice is like a lullaby...

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: I hope you sleep tight too Master...

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Next to you, I sleep better, Master...

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: I'm not sleepy, I want to play♡

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: Master, you must be a sleeepy head. You always ask me to sleep

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: I want to rest sitting down!

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: If you keep ordering me, I will get bad!

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: I like Henesys grass because it's so soft~

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Master, you look so great today~! I think I'm falling for you~!

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Whenever you are down and tired~ Just call me~

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Master, guard me if we see scary monsters during hunts!

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Is it fascinating for you to see me talk? Why do you keep talking to me?

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: It's a secret that I can talk...

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: I don't feel like talking today...

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: I've gotten picky lately~ but I like anything Master gives me♡

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Niki in the night market is so cheesy~

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Factory owner Mr. Kaho in Ludibrium is so nice~

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: How does the penguin and Pepe know each other?

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: Your beauty is so stunning I can't talk~

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: I've gotten picky lately~ but I like anything Master gives me♡

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Sometimes, fairies recommend those who did good deeds~

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: I think my Master is the strongest in the whole world!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Master, don't you have a lover? Do you want me to fix you up with someone?

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: My dream is for you to be happy~

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: I can't hear you~ can't hear you~~!

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: I don't know what to say~

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: I want to be left alone in my solitude...

string.name: f1_f
string.value: ... I don't want a Master who tells me to eat until I feel bad...

string.name: f3_s
string.value: It's so good, I think I'm passing out~♡

string.name: f4_f
string.value: Uh... I'm so full. I can't eat anymore...

string.name: s1
string.value: You shouldn't say those bad things!

string.name: s4
string.value: You gotta talk nice to hear nice stuff!

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: Do you want to sit together~?

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: Master, you're so great for looking out for my legs~

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: Is this how I'm supposed to sit?

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: I have to sit with you, Master~!

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: I don't know~ I don't know things like that~

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Sitting makes your body and mind relaxed.

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Yes~ have a seat here, Master

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: I wish we can do easy things everyday~

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: I think I'll get dirt on me!

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Let's just do rock-paper-scissors and have the losing person sit~ Oh! I'm not a person~

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: I can do anything with you, Master!

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: Can't I sit like this everyday~?

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Let's do some sports, and get up~

string.name: c5
string.value: Punch|No|I dare you|You asked for it

string.name: c5_f2
string.value: Master, you have to take the lead~

string.name: c6
string.value: Punch|No|I dare you|You asked for it

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: I will be good~ Just don't scold me~

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: I will think about what I did, but don't starve me...

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: I've never seen you like this before...

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: But I'm trying to be good...

string.name: c7
string.value: Punch|No|I dare you|You asked for it

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: I'll be careful from now on...

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: I think I might hate you, Master…

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: You fool~! You're a fool, Master!

string.name: c8
string.value: Punch|No|I dare you|You asked for it

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: I'm sorry! It will never happen again

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: I want to be adored by Master, that's all~ Please understand~

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: It's so sad when Master talks like that...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Please forgive me for just this once~

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Will you get mad when I'm so pretty~?

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Sure sure~ You're right~ Let's just say so~

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: I have butterflies in my stomach. I don't know what to do~

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: I can't get sick of listening to that~♡

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: No matter how many times I hear it, it feels so good~♡

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: I'm not such an easy pet, you know

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: No thank you! I will just have a glass of juice~

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Do you have feelings for me?

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: I will do anything for you, Master~♡

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: Master, but you will get mad!

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: How far will Captain's lie will go?

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Master, you've also fallen for me!

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: I was going to say you, Master, but~ I won't~! Touchy!

string.name: c13_f1
string.value: Master, you need to learn about public decency…

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: Ah! Master, please think before you order me!

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: We have to uphold public ethics!

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: Poop~ Poop~ Do you know the pooping song?

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Why.. are you making me do this?

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: I don't want to poo poo!

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: Can't be bothered. You do it for me Master?

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: How many times are you asking me to poop a day?

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Ah... Looking at my poop makes me feel as if there is another one of me...

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: How did you know I wanted to poop?

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: Hee hee~ Now that I went, wipe me~

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: So much poop, thanks to your love, Master~♡

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: You're too fond of poop you know that? You said poop just before~!

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: I want to pee... Can I pee?

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: I can't poop when I haven't eaten anything!

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: I don't know what poop is~

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: It feels too early for bed

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: It doesn't look like it's time for bed already

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: I want to see you in my dreams, Master~♡

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: I want to see you in my dreams, Master~♡

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: If you won't go to sleep with me I'm not sleeping either~!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Master how could you ask me to go to sleep without a bed?

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I hope you sleep tight too Master...

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Going to bed with Master… Zzzzz…

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Sweet dreams to you too Master~

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: It was a tiring day Zzzz....

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: I hope Master has a happy Maple trip, even when I'm asleep~

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: Doesn't it feel to early to go to bed?

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I don't feel like going to bed!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: I want to play with Master~ Wanna play~

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Captain, you're always giving me orders!

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: The world seems to be evolving around me~

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: I like Henesys grass because it's so soft~

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: It wasn't easy learning the human language~

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: I want to chat, but... I was told I was too loud...

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: The falling leaves are making me sad...

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: I'm not saying a word from now on~

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: I want to go on an exciting adventure with Master~♬

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I want to eat ice cream

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: I'm a bit tired today. How about you, Master?

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: They say you can make a wish on the moon, and it might come true~

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Factory owner Mr. Kaho in Ludibrium is so nice~

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: They say you can make a wish on the moon, and it might come true~

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Are you bored? Let's get a facial together~

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: Right now, I'm enjoying the solitude

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: I think my Master is the strongest in the whole world!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: We spent such a long time together... Now shall I call you, Master?

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Talking to you makes me so happy

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: My dream is for you to be happy~

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: I want to hear Master's story~

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: I spent the whole night up talking to Husky… My throat hurts...

string.name: f1_f
string.value: I don't want to transform into a pig...

string.name: s1
string.value: Even if it's Master's orders, I won't do it!

string.name: s3
string.value: Pretty Master always say pretty things please!

string.name: s4
string.value: Don't make me say those things again and again~

string.value: That anger is all going back to you

string.value: I belong to a magic tribe

string.value: I control the Spirit of Fear.

string.value: Have you ever felt true fear?

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Do you wish to avoid fear by getting close to me?

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: I will make you experience true fear!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: You are worthy of the magic clan if you are able to scare me.

string.value: You are a true magic clan

string.value: I belong to a magic clan

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: I am a sensuous magic clan woman.

string.value: I control the Spirit of Jealousy.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Have you ever been jealous of someone?

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Do you wish to get rid of jealousy by getting close to me?

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: I will distance you from everyone with jealousy!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: I will acknowledge you if you can make me get jealous!

string.value: You are a true magic clan

string.value: It's best not to do it

string.name: s2

string.value: You are not worth the magic clans

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: I don't want to sit here.

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Yes, a rest would be nice.

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Oh, my legs are sore. Thank you. Mrow!

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Don't order me around like that! Meow!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Meow. I don't sit in places like this.

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: A nice, leisurely rest would be nice. Mrow!

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Some weather, huh? Let's relax for a while, master. Meow!

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Meow. Don't tell me what to do!

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: You can't always get what you want, master.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Do I look like a remote control cat to you?

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: I won't do it again. Meow!

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Why are you doing this? MROW!

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: What have I done wrong? Meow!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Meow! Why are you in such a bad mood?

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: Please cut me some slack. Mew.

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: I'm sorry! Forgive me! Forgive me!

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: H-how can you yell at me like that?!

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: Why are you taking it out on me? MROW!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Meow! I didn't do anything wrong. Bad master!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: I'm sorry! I won't do it again. Meow...

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: You're not enjoying this, are you?

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Are you really abandoning me? Meow! Meow!

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: Liar! I don't believe you! MROW!

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: Say it again! Say it again! Mew!

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: Mrow... You know I'm a cat, right?

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: I'm sure you say that to all your pets.

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Mrrow... What can I say to that?

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: I'm happy to follow you around. Meow!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: You're the best master. I'll follow you forever!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Love is fine, but I'm hungry!

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: Ah! Shh, someone will hear you!

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: This is not a restroom! Meow, meow!

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Can you get me some toilet paper, master?

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Why are you telling me to do this?

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: Really? You want me to do what?!

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: No one's watching, right? Keep a look out. Meow!

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: I made you a gift, master!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: I don't need to go! Do you, master?

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Meow. What am I suppose to do here?

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Meow! Everyone's watching! I can't do it here!

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: Maybe a little cat nap would be good.

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: Meow. It's not time for bed yet.

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: Meow! The sun's still high in the sky!

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Are you sleepy, master? I'm not sleepy.

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: Nothing beats sleeping on a soft pillow.

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: Don't let anyone wake me up. Meow!

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: Can't I just sleep when I want to? Mrow!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Why are you putting me to bed? It's too early!

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I still want to play! Mew!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: This was a such a long day.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: I feel like sleeping for three days. Meow!

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I told you, I don't want to sleep! Meow!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: Isn't it too early for bed?

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Why do you always want to sleep, master? Meow!

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: What do you want me to say? Huh? Meow!

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: I grew up in an elegant palace.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Have you ever met as eloquent a cat as I?

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: What should we talk about? Meow!

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: I'm thirsty. Can I have a red potion?

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: It's your turn to talk, master.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: I hope this conversation never ends!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Have you ever had a Power Elixir? How did it taste? I want one!

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: I'm glad you're my master, master.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Who's your favorite pet? Me, right?

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Why do you keep saying that? Mew!

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: What are you talking to me for? Bored?

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: You can't talk me into liking you more, master. Mew!

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: You are truly skilled at bothering your pets.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: What's your wish? My wish is to be your kitty forever.

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: The most important thing is delicious fish. The second most important thing is...also fish!

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: No, thank you. Talking to you makes me mad.

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: Why talk when we could eat instead? Mrow!

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: Don't you have any other friends?

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: I'd rather talk to a wall.

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: Don't be surprised when I'm gone. Mrow!

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: Be careful not to fall into my clear blue eyes!

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: Why don't we go hunting? Meow!

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: I can't perform at the drop of a hat...

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: I'll be expecting a heartfelt applause. Meow!

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Well? Not many pets can do this!

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: I'll do what I want! Mrow!

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: I'll think about it if you beg on your hands and knees.

string.name: f2_f
string.value: I don't want to eat anymore. Meow!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: Don't you have something different? Meow. Meow.

string.name: s3
string.value: Meow! How can you talk to me like that...?

string.name: s4
string.value: Meow! Are you a bad person, master?

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: I soft, so I comfy anywhere.

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: I sit now. You sing me song!

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: I'm sleepy, but I can't sleep...

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: You no play with me no more?

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: You are my favorite! Love you!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: You just as cute as me! Love you!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: You want love? I want ribs!

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: La la la, can't hear you!

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: Stop it, stop it, stop it!

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Boing boing! Hee hee, keep up!

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: Wanna sleep next to you! Zzz...

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: No time for sleep! Exercise! Get strong!

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Talk about ribs? I wanna rib. Mmm...rib.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: You get nice thingies for me?

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I like beef. Pork okay, too.

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: I have many interests. Like knitting.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: I like talkies with you! You funny!

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: I born with big eyes. Sparkly!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Am I fat? Be honest. I take it.

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: I endangered creature. Take care of me!

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: Boing! I do lots of things!

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: I know how to rock, too!

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: Can't hear you, can't hear you!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Look at me! LOOK AT MEEEEEE!

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Gonna be rock star! Have world tour!

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: I have no idea what you talk about.

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: No tricks. I am quiet and gentle pet.

string.name: f2_f
string.value: Buh? What if I get fat?

string.name: f3_f
string.value: No more eat! Exercise! Bouncy bouncy!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: Waahh! I don't want it! I don't!

string.value: Buh?! I remember this! You watch out!

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: I'd sit if this were a rose field.

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: I'm a free fox! I sit for no one!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: I hate this dusty ground. Gimme sand!

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: I was hoping we'd get to do that soon.

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: I'm pretty when I sit, huh?

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: This place is cooler than my star.

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: I didn't mean to upset you.

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: Whatever, I'm going back to my star!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: You're so mean all the time!

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: Did you just raise your hand?

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: You're not a friend! You're a bully!

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: I'm the savage beast of the desert!

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: I might cry if you yell...

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: What the? This wouldn't be allowed on my star...

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: Are you actually scolding me right now?

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: I have a LOT of friends who like me!

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: You're a one of a kind person!

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: I like you today. I'll like you more tomorrow.

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: Give me some Star Candies, and we'll talk!

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Am I prettier than a rose?

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: You don't know how to play!

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: I've been waiting so long for you to say that!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Are we going to stay together? Forever?

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: My face is gonna get red! Wanna see?

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: I could use a little space.

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Let's pretend we didn't have this talk.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: I'm a free-spirited fox! Don't try to chain me!

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: Okay, but you have to clean it up!

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: I'll really pour myself into this one!

string.name: c13_s4
string.value: I could do this all day!

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: I only do that for ME!

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: I don't know why you want that, but you got it!

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Arooo! My face is all red now!

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: I don't think I'll ever stop!

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: I'll poop when I wanna poop!

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: You're going to get us in trouble!

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: I'm independent! I take naps on my own time!

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Going to sleep already? You're lazy!

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: Ah, my soft and cozy tail.

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: I'm going to dream up a storm!

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: Sorry, I can't hear you, I'm having fun right now!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Sleeping out in the open is romantic, but not now.

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: I want to enjoy the day! Aroo!

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Arooo... I miss the prince and rose... zzz

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Sleeping in the desert is SO romantic!

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: Bring me a blanket and pillow or no deal!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: Why aren't we out hunting? That's way more fun!

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Aroo! I want to go to the desert of freedom!

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: I used to travel with a wonderful prince!

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: I love Star Candy so much!

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: What are we talking about? I'm a fox!

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: Arooo! Did you want to hear something?

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: A fox has to keep some secrets!

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Wanna go watch the shooting star?

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: The star that the prince and I went to was much better.

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Aren't you curious about the meteor I was on?

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Eating star candy can make you feel better!

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: We foxes are known for our quietness.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: I can't believe they have more like me at a ZOO!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: There are so many people on this star!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: I get my fur trimmed on a daily basis.

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: You should learn to entertain yourself!

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: You should play some music first!

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: I want to be in a concert!

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: I don't know what that means.

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: Aroo! I wanna do something else!

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: Up and down my head goes!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: The prince taught me how to do that!

string.value: That dance is super popular on asteroid B-612!
