string.name: s3
string.value: Yip yip! How could you say that?

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: So I sit like this? Peng?

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: Peeng? I sat like you told me to!

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: Are you worried that my feet are tired?

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: Show me how to do it! Peeng!

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: I have to sit on this bare ground? Peng?

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: You sit down too, master! You look tired! Peng!

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: It's a good thing my butt is so fluffy! Peng peng!

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Peng, thank you master! I was actually kinda tired.

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Ah, it feels like I came to a picnic! Peng peng!

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: I'm gonna look like a cushion if I sit... peng peng...

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: My legs aren't even hurting... do I really have to sit? Peng?

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: I don't want to sit unless it's on your lap... Peeng...

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: My legs are too short... Peng...

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Now that I sat down, I feel sleepy... peng...

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: I'll do whatever you tell me to!

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: I was actually feeling a bit tired! Peng!

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Peng peng! You sit down and rest too!

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Sitting makes my belly look fat.

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Right now, I feel more comfortable standing! Peng!

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Once I sit, it will be hard to get up, peng...

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: Hearing that from you hurts my feelings. Peng.

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: Peeng... I didn't do it on purpose...

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: I didn't think it will make you angry. Peeng...

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Peeng? I don't get what I did wrong?

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Peeng! But I told you that I didn't mean to!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: Are you just taking your anger out on me? Peng peng!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: You're scolding me for eating too much, aren't you? Peng peng!

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: Don't get angry. I won't do it again... peng peng...

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: I just did that to get your attention!

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Peeng... I'll be careful from now on...

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: Peng peng! I didn't do anything wrong.

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: It's hard to understand your words! Peng peng!

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: Peng! You're a real jerk sometimes!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: A-are you gonna throw me away? Peng...

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Peeng. Hearing that makes me so sad.

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: I bet you're saying that for my own good.

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: I learned it from watching you!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: Peeng! I hate it when you get mad for no reason.

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Peeng! Sometimes I just want to fly away!

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: Peng! When I met you, it was love at first sight!

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: That was a really bad joke, peng peng.

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: I'll pretend I didn't hear that, master... peeng...

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: I know what you feel, but that's just... peng...

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: I was waiting for those words! Peng peng!

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: I'll give you a smooch anytime! Peng peng peng!

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: Peng... this is a little weird, but I like it.

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Peng? What did you just say?

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Peng peng! I love giving smooches!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Give me a smooch too, master!

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: I thought I heard something weird...

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: It's like the violent winds of El nath...

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Peeng! Excuse me for a second then!

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: Peeng peeng... I didn't even eat that much...

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: Peeng... I don't feel like pooping.

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Peeng! Can you block for me?

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Take me to a restroom! Peeng?

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: Peeng peeng... do I really have to?

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: I think I need a laxative... Peeng...

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: Don't forget to clean up after I'm done! Peeng!

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: That's so embarrassing! I can't... I can't! Peng!

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: I think that's against the law...

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: I'm too cute to poop! No way! Peng peng!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Peng? Really? You really think so?

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Thank you for the compliment! Peng peng!

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: You're trying to butter me up!

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I like it better when you're honest...

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: I've heard that a million times!

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: I have an awesome owner! Peng peng!

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Peng peng! I know, everybody tells me that.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: You know how to make a penguin happy! Peng!

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: Can't you say something more original? Peeng?

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: You sure know how to look at a penguin! Peng peng!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I feel like I'm falling for you all over again! Peng peng!

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Peng peng! I'm not as awesome as you, though!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: I feel like I can fly when you say that! Peng peng!

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: I want to hear 'cool' more than 'pretty'! Peng!

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: Sounds like you're just trying to flatter me. Peng?

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Peng? I didn't hear you. Can you say that again?

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: Are you sure I don't look fat?

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: Peng... I can feel your love!

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: Don't say tricky things to me! Peng peng...

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: I'm sorry, but you aren't my type. Peng peng.

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: Peng... love? Human language is difficult!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: My love for you grows and grows!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: What do I do? My heart won't stop beating! Peeng!

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Peng peng! I just want to brag about this to everyone!

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Why are you trying to flatter me like that?

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Peng peng? Are you trying to eat me?

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: Peeng... I only like other penguins. Maybe a parrot...

string.name: c24_s1
string.value: Do you see my love overflowing?

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: Peeng! I feel like singing a song!

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: Love sure is a wonderful word. Peeng!

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: Penguins and humans can never be!

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: You should bring me a nice fish if you mean it.

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: I thought you were seeing someone already!

string.name: c25_s2
string.value: Peng peng! Human language is hard!

string.name: c25_s3
string.value: You may not think we get cold, but El Nath is super frosty!

string.name: c25_s4
string.value: I'm feeling a little chubby. Need more fish!

string.name: c25_f1
string.value: So what do you want me to say? Peeng?

string.name: c25_f2
string.value: When was the last time you saw a talking penguin?

string.name: c26_s1
string.value: Are you wondering if real penguins make the peng noise?

string.name: c26_s2
string.value: I want some mackerel ice cream. Peng!

string.name: c26_s3
string.value: The Pepes in El Nath are my mean cousins!

string.name: c26_s4
string.value: I can't fly, but I'm still a bird!

string.name: c26_f2
string.value: I want to hear you talk first. Peng...

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: ... I really don't have much to say. Peng?

string.name: c26_f4
string.value: Peeng... is there something you want to hear?

string.name: c27_s1
string.value: Pepes and yetis are friends, but penguins hate yetis! Peeng.

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: Chloe is really good at knitting! You didn't know that, did you?

string.name: c27_s3
string.value: Someone even asked me whether I really have legs. Peeng...

string.name: c27_s4
string.value: Peng peng... Sometimes I want to fly in the sky.

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: Talking to your pets makes you look like a crazy person!

string.name: c27_f2
string.value: I don't really have anything to talk about...

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: There are too many people here.

string.name: c28_s3
string.value: Peng peng! I totally feel the love!

string.name: c28_s4
string.value: Hugs make me warm! Peng peng!

string.name: c28_f3
string.value: I thought you wanted my hand?

string.name: c29_s2
string.value: Hug me tight, master! Peng peng!

string.name: c29_s3
string.value: I love being hugged by you, master!

string.name: c29_s4
string.value: I can't reach you, master! Pick me up! Peng peng!

string.name: c29_f2
string.value: Eh, give me a flipper instead!

string.name: c29_f3
string.value: There are too many people watching!

string.name: c29_f4
string.value: I'll pretend I didn't hear that!

string.name: c30_s1
string.value: I love my hug-loving master! Peng!

string.name: c30_s3
string.value: Hug me! Hug me! Hug me master!

string.name: c30_f2
string.value: Should I shake your hand instead? Peng.

string.name: c30_f3
string.value: We need to talk about personal boundaries...

string.name: c30_f4
string.value: I don't want to do that in public!

string.name: c31_f1
string.value: Sleep on the ground? Where's the ice?

string.name: c31_f2
string.value: I can't sleep when I'm not sleepy. Peng!

string.name: c31_f3
string.value: Penguins sleep on full bellies. Peng peng!

string.name: c32_s3
string.value: I hope I see a Pepe in my dreams... Peeng...

string.name: c32_f1
string.value: There's not even a bed! Why do you hate me?

string.name: c32_f2
string.value: You're going to run away as soon as I close my eyes!

string.name: c32_f3
string.value: What, do you think I'm lazy?

string.name: c33_s1
string.value: You sleep well too. Peng peng!

string.name: c33_s2
string.value: I want to sleep on your lap... Peeng...

string.name: c33_s3
string.value: I love napping when you're around... Peeng...

string.name: c33_f1
string.value: If I sleep too much, I'll get fatter... then I won't be as cute!

string.name: c34_s2
string.value: I'll be able to fly one day, right?

string.name: c34_s3
string.value: One day, penguins will fly like eagles!

string.name: c34_f1
string.value: You have to teach me how to fly first... Peeng...

string.name: c34_f2
string.value: What will you give me if I fly? Peng?

string.name: c34_f3
string.value: Peeng? Have you ever seen a penguin fly?

string.name: c35_s1
string.value: I'll show you that penguins can fly too! Peeng!

string.name: c35_s2
string.value: I flew! I flew! Sort of...

string.name: c35_s3
string.value: I'll fly us away to the moon one day!

string.name: c35_f1
string.value: Oh, no, my belly's too heavy.

string.name: c35_f2
string.value: You really think it's possible to fly with these wings? Peng?

string.name: c35_f3
string.value: Peng peng? I can't fly away and leave you here all alone!

string.name: f2_s
string.value: Thank you for the food! Peng peng!

string.name: f2_f
string.value: Arg... I'm too full. It's impossible to eat anymore... Peng...

string.name: f3_s
string.value: Peeng! Maybe I'll get taller if I keep eating!!

string.name: f3_f
string.value: My stomach is going to pop... peng...

string.name: f4_s
string.value: Wow! It must be delicious! Thank you! Peng!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: Peeng... Do you have a grudge against me?

string.name: s3
string.value: Aren't you supposed to talk nicely? Peeng?

string.name: s4
string.value: Peeng? I'll get upset if you keep saying weird things!

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: Aye, I could use a little break.

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: Ahh, nothin' like relaxin' on a bomb.

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: Go on, cap'n. I'll watch this bomb.

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: Why do ye ask such things?

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: I agree, it be time for a rest.

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: This bomb be special, ye know.

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Ye should rest as well. I worry about ye.

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Yarr, me legs were gettin' tired.

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Don't make me peck at ye.

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: That not be a very inspirin' order.

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: Now all I be needin' is some blueberries.

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: I not be sleepin'. Just restin' me eyes.

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: I not be carin' for ye orders.

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Ye not be understandin' who yer messin' with...

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Do I look like a dog to ye?

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: Don't make me walk the plank!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Ye need to be more carin' than that.

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: Bah. I be wantin' some grub.

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: I be reflectin' upon me mistakes.

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: Sorry. I'll be a much better pirate.

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Keep this up, and ye'll have a mutiny on ye hands!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: You treat ye crew like this?

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: Ye be my best mate, capn'n.

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: If we be stuck together, I be okay with that.

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: Always good to have the cap'n's ear!

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: That's behavior unbecoming a pirate, cap'n!

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: Life at sea be lonely, cap'n. Deal with it.

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: I feel a bit sick, cap'n. And I not be seasick.

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: Stop givin' me the crazy eye, cap'n!

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Ahoy there! Ye be makin' me feathers all ruffled.

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: That's a good one, cap'n. Never gets old.

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: That's good, cap'n. We are shipmates, after all.

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: I'm so glad our piratey ways brought us t'gether!

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Yarr, I be tryin' ta eat here!

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: Not sure how I feel about bein' yer crew, cap'n.

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Yeah you do. No surprise there.

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: You gone soft on me, cap'n?

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Ye be the only cap'n for me!

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: I be swashin' any buckles you want!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: I'll be ye first mate anytime, cap'n.

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: This be the happiest moment in me piratey life.

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: Nay, cap'n, my ladybird awaits me at our next port of call.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: That's inappropriate conduct for a cap'n, cap'n.

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I love TREASURE, cap'n. And you should, too.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Ye compliment is bilgewater to me.

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: Now THAT is a real pirate's poop.

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: Even pirates have standards, ye scallywag!

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: This not be the poop deck, cap'n.

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Yarr, I be a few pounds lighter now!

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Yarr, I be givin' it all I've got!

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: I'm not swabbin' up after this, cap'n.

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: Ye be one strange pirate, cap'n...

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: This be hurtin' me confidence in ye.

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: It be an unhealthy obsession, but I be needin' ta go...

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: I'll not cross swords 'till I've had a good poop!

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: I've made me own buried treasure!

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Ye be havin' the sea crazies, cap'n?

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: I be dreamin' of plunder tonight.

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: I be sleepin' well with a bomb under me pillow.

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Ye takin' first watch, cap'n? Goodnight, then.

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: Nay, cap'n, there's work to be done!

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: The sun be shinin'! I can't sleep now!

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: There's plenty more fight in me, cap'n!

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: You sleep. I be takin' first watch.

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: Aye, just need a good bomb to sleep on.

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: Ye shouldn't disturb a sleepin' pirate...

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: You keep watch, cap'n...I'll get some shut-eye.

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: I've plenty of fire in me! I don't need sleep!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: I'm not following that order! I'll mutiny!

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: Nay, cap'n, there's piratin' to be done!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Aye, I could use a little sleep after that.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Gonna catch a few winks before our next voyage.

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Time for bed. Hope the bomb don't blow.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Aye, I'll be dreamin' of booty!

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: Ye don't have ta give orders all the time, cap'n!

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: Why sleep when there's pillaging to be done?

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: Don't make me turn on ye!

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Ye should repect me! I be a scary pirate!

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: I'm gonna be king of the pirates!

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: One day, I'll own me own ship...the Black Pebble.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Want to see me treasure map? Ha! Too bad!

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: I once lived with a navy admiral, ye know.

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: Let's hear ye story first, cap'n.

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: I don't trust ye enough to share me secrets...

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: I broke free from a navy admiral's cage.

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: The sea be the only place for me.

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: I be in love with blueberries, ye know.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Have ye planned dinner? I be wantin' fruits!

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: If ye be bored, round us up some treasure!

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: I'll be a great captain meself one day.

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: This hat be the finest silk, ye know.

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: We spend too much time on land, cap'n!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: I always wanted to be a pirate.

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: Nay, it be me alone time.

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: I'll abandon ship if ye keep this up!

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: See these? These be skin-color tights!

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: For me next trick, I'll break out of me cage!

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: This be only for ye, cap'n!

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: I be too hungry for ye tricks.

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: I'd like to see ye do this!

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: I be gettin' sick of ye pesterin'.

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: Oh, no. Ye go first, cap'n.

string.name: f3_f
string.value: Me belly be full ta burstin'!

string.name: f4_s
string.value: It be too delicious, I say!

string.name: s3
string.value: Ye be abusin' the chain of command.

string.name: s4
string.value: Do ye need to go back ta cap'n school?

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: I think I will, thank you.

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: I'm extra adorable when I sit. Look!

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: As you wish! Can I have some ramen now?

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: Sigh, why are you so bossy?

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: I think better on my feet.

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: All right. I think I deserve a rest.

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: A bowl of ramen would make this moment perfect.

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Sure. Why don't you sit with me?

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: What? Here? At least get me a chair.

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: I don't want to get my tail dirty.

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: I'll sit here and think about ramen.

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: My legs are short and cute, but they get tired sometime.

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: I want to travel, not sit!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: I really don't feel like sitting right now.

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: You're right. Just 'cause I'm cute doesn't mean I can get away with everything.

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: If I let you have my ramen, will you stop scolding me? Please?

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: You don't know what you're talking about.

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Are you TRYING to make me mad?

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: If I behave, will you give me some ramen?

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: You're going to make me cry!

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: You still love me, don't you?

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: C'mon. You can't scold someone THIS cute.

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: I'll run away, and then you'll regret getting mad at me.

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: Don't stand so close to me.

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: For that, I'll let you scratch my tummy.

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Do I look easy to you?

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Then shower me with ramen, please!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: I always knew I was irresistible.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Not as much as I love myself.

string.name: c13_s1
string.value: When you gotta go, you gotta go.

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: Hope you brought along toilet paper!

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Such a perfectly round little pelle!

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Not right now. I have a headache.

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: You into that sort of thing?

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Does this make me a party POOPer? Get it?

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Hey! Are you saying I have a stick up my butt?

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: Will you sing me a lullaby?

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: Don't even THINK of using me as a pillow.

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: You're not the boss of me.

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: You can sleep if you want. I'm busy.

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: I hope I dream of ramen.

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: I count pies and donuts to fall asleep.

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: Will you pet me until I doze off?

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: I only sleep on silk sheets.

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Last time I slept, someone tied my tail to my ears. Pass!

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I'm refusing just to be rebellious.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: I suppose I could afford to take a break.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Hey, I just wanted to tell you that I think you're really... Zzz.

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: You should rest, too. You can cuddle with me.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Coffee ramen, pizza ramen, donut ramen... Zzz.

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: Do I LOOK sleepy to you?

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: You're so lazy, sometimes you disgust me.

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: I have recipes to create! No time for sleep!

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: I'm not chubby, I'm big-boned. Just wanted to let you know.

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Everybody who meets me, loves me. Didja know that?

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Just 'cause I'm cute doesn't mean my life is easy.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Ramen is really good with sugar and honey. Try it!

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Go away. I'm sick of your face.

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: Why do you always follow me around?

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Ugh, what do you want from me?

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: My dream is to become the world's best ramen chef!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I think about new ramen recipes all the time. Imagine: deep-fried ramen!

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Here's a secret: my parents can transform into human shape.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Do you think red herb ramen would do well in this market?

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Don't you have anyone else to pester?

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: You must be really lonely to be bothering me.

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: I'm going to pretend I don't see you.

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: Don't speak until you're spoken to!

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: I figure, if I stick with you, I'll get to travel and try all sorts of ramen!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: I'm actually a really great dancer. I've got the perfect figure for it.

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: People who want to bring me down say I'm fat, but I know it isn't true.

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Sometimes people tell me I have no parents. I don't get it. I DO have parents!

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: Do I LOOK like I'm in the mood?

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: We can dance if we want to!

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: Ah, I'm so adorable when I dance, I want to hug myself.

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: You love me even more than before I danced, don't you?

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: I'm not here for your amusement.

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: I'll think about it, IF you get me some ramen.

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: Believe it or not, I'm actually quite shy.

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: You ain't never seen nobody as cute as me!

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Buy me a mirror so I can admire myself when I dance!

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: What, and then you'll give me a treat? How demeaning.

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: I'm on strike until you take me to a new ramen restaurant.

string.name: f3_s
string.value: This is why I love you.

string.name: f3_f
string.value: I could eat ten servings in one sitting!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: Mouth...likes. Stomach, not so much. Too full!

string.name: s4
string.value: I can hear you, you know.

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Funny, I was just planning to sit anyway.

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: I actually look better when I'm sitting.

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: I shall sit, but NOT because you told me to.

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: And why should I listen to you?

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: I can't hear you . Speak up.

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: I never tire, I'm just sitting for fun.

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: I will permit you to sit next to me.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: I can neither hear nor see you right now.

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: Hmph. Fine. I get the point.

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: You'll never hear me say this again, but I'm sorry.

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: I suppose you detest me now.

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: I KNOW you're not talking to ME.

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: I'll do you a favor and pretend I didn't hear that.

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: You have three seconds to take that back.

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Fine! Just don't expect an apology.

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: I don't even know what I did.

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: But I'm always up to no good!

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: I don't even know why I'm saying this, but sorry.

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Why are you acting like this?

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: How DARE you speak to me like this!

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: I suppose I ought to say thanks, but instead I'll say: SCRAM.

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: You have to do better than that.

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: So many fans, so little time to crush all their hearts.

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Yes, I'm one of a kind.

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Stick around. I might have some use for you.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: You're kidding yourself if you think you have a chance with me.

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Have you looked in a mirror lately?

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Now clean it up. Use your hands.

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Consider that a favor. Now you owe me.

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Some things you just don't do in public.

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: You're not even going to bribe me?

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: I don't know if you can tell, but I'm rolling my eyes.

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: Don't bother me while I sleep.

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: Okay, but only because I want to.

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: You think you can just tell me what to do?

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: Maybe if you weren't so NOISY.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: I better get something out of this.

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: Do you have any idea what time it is?

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: But I'll have nightmares about your face.

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: Your stench is too strong. Can't fall asleep.

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: You really think you can make me?

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: I can spend hours thinking of ways to make people cry.

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: There's nothing more satisfying than an evil deed done well.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: The weather annoys me. Change it.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: You want me to talk? There, I talked.

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I enjoy traveling. Why else do you think I let you hang around?

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: I enjoy food. So feed me.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Sometimes, I wonder where I came from.

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Just who do you think you're bossing around?

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: If I wanted to talk, I'd talk.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: I want to lock all the people I despise into a dark, windowless room.

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Big Headward has an awfully large head for such a small brain.

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Some creatires are so ugly, I don't know how they can stand to look in the mirror

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: That Wonky the Fairy'll eat anything. I've tested it.

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: I'm the silent but deadly type.

string.name: f2_s
string.value: Well, well. Not bad at all.

string.name: f4_f
string.value: Are you blind? Can't you see that I'm full?

string.name: s3
string.value: Try to keep it classy, will you?

string.name: s4
string.value: Mind your manners. You embarrass me.

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: Pyoo, let's a rest a little!

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: I'm still up and kicking, ookyu!

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: Pyoo! I'm going to play more!

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Pyoo? Don't we still have a long way to go?

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Ookyu? I don't want to rest right now...

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: Pyoo! Am I sitting down, or laying down?

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Ookyu, it's the perfect time to rest!

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Pyoo! Just for a minute, okay?

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Ookyu? I don't like being ordered around!

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: We can't rest like this everyday!

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Ookyu, just a couple more steps!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Pyoo? Are you hurt? Why do you keep wanting to rest?

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Don't talk to me like that!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: Pyoo! Are you really going to keep doing this?!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: I said, don't order me around!

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: Ookyu... I miss the north pole...

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: Pyoo! I'm going to leave you then!

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Sorry... I won't do it again...

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Hmph! I told you to treat me nicely!!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: Pyoo!! I'm going back to the north pole!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: I'm going to tell on you!

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Pyoo! I can be scary too!

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: I like you very much also!

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Pyoo! I like you better than the north pole.

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: Pyoo! I'm so lucky to have a master like you!

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Pyoo! I love hanging out with you.

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Pyoo! I'll be with you forever!

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Ookyu, did you eat some bad fish?

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I'm a Harp Seal, and you are a human!

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: Ookyu! You should be ashamed of yourself!

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Tell me that AFTER you feed me!!

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: You can't order me to do everything!

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Ookyu! Every day is a healthy day!!

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: This is shameful! You'll be hearing from my Harp Lawyers!

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: The sun is still shining bright!

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: Still a long way to go!

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: I don't think it's time to sleep yet.

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: You are a sleepyhead, aren't you, master?

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: I don't want to sleep yet.

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: I'll sleep when I get sleepy, okie?

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Good seals are early to bed, early to rise.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I guess master isn't too healthy...

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: Why do you always tell me to sleep?

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Is this going to make us closer?

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Well you know, in the north pole... (It just rambles on)

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: I saw this weird animal in the forest... (It won't stop talking)

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Do you know the difference between true seals and fake seals?

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: I love it here because there aren't any polar bears.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: I wish I had some snow to lie on.

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I'm all white so I can hide from polar bears in the snow!

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Will you protect me from polar bears, master?

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: I'm sure glad for nice people like you, master.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Pigs sure are weird! Why do their bottoms curl up like that?

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Ookyu ookyu! Isn't it hard walking on two legs, master?

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Where are we going today? Anywhere's fine with me!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: What should we eat for dinner? I want some yummy milk!

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: I don't feel like opening my mouth... too much work...

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: I love you, you love me!

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: Pyoo pyoo pyoo! (It seems to be singing.)

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: Ookyu ookyu, pyoo! Ookyu ookyu, pyoo!

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: You show me something first, master!

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: Itsy bitsy seals and penguins, dancing at north pole!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: Three seals in a house, daddy seal, mommy seal, and baby seal!

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: You want your pet to show its talents?

string.name: f3_s
string.value: Pyoo! You sure take good care of me, master!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: Don't you think I've gotten a little fat?

string.name: s2
string.value: What goes around, comes around you know?

string.name: s3
string.value: I don't want to be a pottymouth!

string.name: s4
string.value: Words reflect your insides, you know?!!

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: I'm a nice lamb that obeys well!

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: I was going to sit, baa!

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: I was actually planning to rest, baa!

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: I'm going to play more, baa!

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Baa baa, you should sit down too.

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Baa baa? What did you say?

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: I can't hear you, I can't hear you, baa baa!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: I'm going to fly around more, baa baa!

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Should we rest a bit? Baa baa.

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Baa baa! What a peaceful feeling!

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Baa baa? Are you talking to me?

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: I don't hear anything, baa baa!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Baa? What's with you all of sudden?

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: Baah! (It appears to be calling its mother...)

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: Baa! Don't do this to me...

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Baa... maybe I should change owners.

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: I don't even wanna hear it...

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: Baa baa! It's all my fault!

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Baa! Did I really mess up that badly?

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: Baa... I won't do that again...

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: Hmph, I'll be the bigger ram.

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: My patience has limits, baa baa.

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Are you going to keep this up, baa?

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: If only I had a nicer owner...

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Why do you always yell at me... *Cries*

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: I'm going to tell my mommy, baa baa...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Wahhhh! You're just mean because you're bigger than me!

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: I really wish I could just smack you, baa baa.

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: I'm gonna call animal protective services!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: I can get scary when I'm angry, baa...

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Baa baa... THAT does it! (Veins popping.)

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: Baa baa! I like, I like!

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: I like you very much also!

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: Baa baa. You aren't supposed to joke around like that.

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: Treat me well when you have the chance, baa.

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Baa! I'm always on your side!

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: I said... I can't hear you!

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Baa Baa! I got it, I got it!

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Baa! I love hanging out with you!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Baa! Affectionate actions make Pufframs dance!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Baa baa. I already know your feelings.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: So what do you want me to do, baa baa?

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: I'm shocked, I don't even have words.

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: (Little veins are popping out on its forehead.)

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: Do you KNOW what you are saying?

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: Ahhh, that could heat an entire village for a month!

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Something needs to go in for something to come out!

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Baa baa! Every day is a healthy day!!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: It's not going to come out just because you whine!

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: Baa... let's have some common sense, shall we?

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Baa baa... You want to get smacked?

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: I'll let you off for today...

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: No! I want to play more!

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: I want to play more, baa baa!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Baa... someday I'll soar higher than a dragon. Baa...

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: Can't you see that my eyes are still WIDE open?

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: Baa baa? What are you saying?

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: I'm not that lazy, baa baa.

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Baa Baa! So today, I'm going to... (Now it won't stop talking.)

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Are you amazed by flying lambs? So the secret of our race is...

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Maple World is a pretty nice place to live, baa baa.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: When we were living up in the sky, angels mistook us for clouds.

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Is it strange that I talk?

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Baa? Weren't we talking just a second ago?

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Have you every had a Cloud Candy? It's the baaaaa-st.

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: If there's one thing I hate, it's wolves.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: We are called Pufframs because we live above the clouds.

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Baa baa... just leave me alone...

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: I don't want to talk right now, baa.

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Mmm... are you hungry for a conversation?

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Baa baa, would it be better to walk or fly?

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Baa baa, you want to hear something interesting?

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Which one of us do you think can fly faster? Me or the eagle?

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: To the Pufframs, the Golden Horn is a symbol of adulthood.

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: You look bored... too bad I'm not!

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: (It appears to be thinking about something.)

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: What if I say no, baa baa?

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: This is the Puffram booty dance!!

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: Am I in the circus or something, baa baa?

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: Baa baa... I said, it sounds annoying...

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: I actually have this super cool trick... but I don't feel like it right now.

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: (Jumps up and down.) Baa! Baa! Baa! Baa!

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: It's super fun when you do it above the clouds, baa baa.

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Can't I just be your pet?

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Too hungry... no strength... baa baa.

string.name: f3_s
string.value: Baa baa, eating time's my favorite time!!

string.name: s2
string.value: You want to get reported, baa baa?

string.name: s4
string.value: I'm so disappointed in you, baa baa!!

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: I sit on ground for now.

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: I sit on ground for now.

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: You no want I steal gold? I steal good, Mr'kuma.

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Don't wanna! I wanna set your hair on fire!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Sit? Me not know word. Hehehe...

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Okay, human. You tell me when we are going to eat monsters again.

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: I will sit for you, Mr'kuma. You are scary and powerful!

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: I do as you say, for now...

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Later, you sit and I get to burn houses down!

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: No way! I am not your kr'grana!

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: I don't wanna! I am mighty and full of fangs!

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Rak! Why you always want to sit?!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: You take me to lake of fire first!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: No talk to me like kr'gana. Me much strong!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Rak unar! I eat your wallet tonight!

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: My old boss was scary too. He eat my brother! So fun!

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: You scare many monsters with your talk! Scare me a little too...

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: No talk to me like kr'gana. Me much strong!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Rak unar! I eat your wallet tonight!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: I like it when you are angry, Mr'kuma. I will be angry too!

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Yes! Let's find some little kids to yell at!

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: Everytime you yell, I feel a little more at home...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Ha! More! Tell me how worthless I am!

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: You always say the same insults. Think up something new!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: I know you can do better than that, Mr'kuma.

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: I know you have more rage in you than that...

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: I don't want to be flattered right now!

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: Why you talk like wimp, Mr'kuma?

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: Grauk-mouthed unar! You think I simple?!

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Why you talk like wimp, Mr'kuma?

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Grauk-mouthed unar! You think I simple?!

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: I no fall for trick. Old Mr'kuma trick me like this long ago.

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: You are the cruelest of all masters...and I like it.

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Are you mad at me because I tortured your goldfish? He was asking for it!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: That is the rudest thing you can say in demon culture!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Now I see you are just trying to be mean to me. Thank you, Mr'kuma!

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: There is no such thing as love.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: My heart is cold and black like a piece of coal!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I'm almost getting used to this constant abuse.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: You're just trying to make me get mad again.

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: Why say word "poop" all time, Mr'aku?

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Why say word "poop" all time, Mr'aku?

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Master, you love pooping as much as I do!

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: I bet I can burn a hole in the ground with this one...

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: I not eat enough monster today!

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: You no treasure drakla. It MY drakla!

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: You like drakla so much? I give to you.

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: I love stinking up your fresh air, Mr'kuma.

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Empty out everything, master. Even your soul!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: I not eat enough monster today!

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: I'll let go of this poop when I darn well feel like it.

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: My bottom still hurts from the last one.

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: I have got to stop eating so many spicy monsters.

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Good unar. We find many nightmare!

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: No! You try take my eyeballs while I sleep!

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: I no want to! I want eat shopkeeper toes!

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: Good unar. We find many nightmare!

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: I like sleep. Let me eat many monster heads when wake.

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: You sleep too, Mr'kuma. I steal many wallet for you later.

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: No! You try take my eyeballs while I sleep!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: I no want to! I want eat shopkeeper toes!

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: Sleep yourself, Mr'putama. I go find demon friends.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: I like sleep. Let me eat many monster heads when wake.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: You sleep too, Mr'kuma. I steal many wallet for you later.

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: I'll wake up when home freezes over.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Pitchforks, fire, and screaming people. This is going to be a great dream.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I don't need to rest! I'm an infernal machine!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: I ate an entire case of espresso beans while you weren't looking.

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: I know better than to trust you.

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: You want me to talk? There, I talked.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: I am Mr'kuma to ghost of fear like you are Mr'kuma to me.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Have you ever felt true fear, unar-master?

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: I will let you avoid fear, if you prove that you are strong.

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: I will show you the face of fear! Mwahaha!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: If you can scare me like my old boss, we can hang out.

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: I make poona energy for you, Mr'kuma!

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: See my power! We destroy much together!

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: My real form is scary, Mr'kuma!

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: You do trick. I want laugh when you fall.

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: I show you already! You have bad brain!

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: What if I did this at your next surprise party?

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Let's go scare some little girls with this trick!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: With this power, I could conquer all of you puny humans.

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Bask in awe, master! I am a being of pure terror!

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: How about I torch all your underwear instead?

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Are you sure? You can never unsee it.

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Shouldn't we be undermining somebody's hope?

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: I'll eat your eyebrows if you tell me that again!

string.name: f3_f
string.value: Why you talk like wimp, Mr'kuma?

string.name: f4_s
string.value: What are you trying to do to me?!

string.name: s3
string.value: Old boss call me that. He so cool.

string.name: s4
string.value: Hey! Even we demons have some etiquette.

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: I sit on ground for now.

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: Don't wanna! I wanna set your hair on fire!

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: I sit on ground for now.

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: You no want I steal gold? I steal good, Mr'kuma.

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Don't wanna! I wanna set your hair on fire!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Sit? Me not know word. Hehehe...

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Okay, human. You tell me when we are going to eat monsters again.

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: I will sit for you, Mr'kuma. You are scary and powerful!

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: I do as you say, for now...

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Later, you sit and I get to burn houses down!

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: No way! I am not your kr'grana!

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: I don't wanna! I am mighty and full of fangs!

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Rak! Why you always want to sit?!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: You take me to lake of fire first!

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: You no want I steal gold? I steal good, Mr'kuma.

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: No talk to me like kr'gana. Me much strong!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Rak unar! I eat your wallet tonight!

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: My old boss was scary too. He eat my brother! So fun!

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: You scare many monsters with your talk! Scare me a little too...

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: No talk to me like kr'gana. Me much strong!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Rak unar! I eat your wallet tonight!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: I like it when you are angry, Mr'kuma. I will be angry too!

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Yes! Let's find some little kids to yell at!

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: Everytime you yell, I feel a little more at home...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Ha! More! Tell me how worthless I am!

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: You always say the same insults. Think up something new!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: I know you can do better than that, Mr'kuma.

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: I know you have more rage in you than that...

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: I don't want to be flattered right now!

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: Why you talk like wimp, Mr'kuma?

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: Grauk-mouthed unar! You think I simple?!

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Why you talk like wimp, Mr'kuma?

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Grauk-mouthed unar! You think I simple?!

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: I no fall for trick. Old Mr'kuma trick me like this long ago.

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: You are the cruelest of all masters...and I like it.

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Are you mad at me because I tortured your goldfish? He was asking for it!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: That is the rudest thing you can say in demon culture!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Now I see you are just trying to be mean to me. Thank you, Mr'kuma!

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: There is no such thing as love.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: My heart is cold and black like a piece of coal!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I'm almost getting used to this constant abuse.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: You're just trying to make me get mad again.

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: Why say word "poop" all time, Mr'aku?

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Why say word "poop" all time, Mr'aku?

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Master, you love pooping as much as I do!

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: I bet I can burn a hole in the ground with this one...

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: I not eat enough monster today!

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: You no treasure drakla. It MY drakla!

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: You like drakla so much? I give to you.

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: I bet I can burn a hole in the ground with this one...

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: I love stinking up your fresh air, Mr'kuma.

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Empty out everything, master. Even your soul!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: I not eat enough monster today!

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: I'll let go of this poop when I darn well feel like it.

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: My bottom still hurts from the last one.

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: I have got to stop eating so many spicy monsters.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: I am Mr'kuma to ghost of jealousy like you are Mr'kuma to me.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Have you felt jealousy of another, unar-master?

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: I will let you avoid jealousy, if you prove that you are strong.

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: You will see the firey hand of jealousy!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: If you can make me jealous, we can have a real relationship.

string.value: What if I did this at your next surprise party?

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Let's go scare some little girls with this trick!

string.value: With this power, I could conquer all of you puny humans.
