string.name: f3_f
string.value: Why you talk like wimp, Mr'kuma?

string.name: f4_s
string.value: What are you trying to do to me?!

string.name: s3
string.value: Old boss call me that. He so cool.

string.name: s4
string.value: Hey! Even we demons have some etiquette.

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: I'm sitting down. Aren't I obedient?

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: Well if you want me to sit, then I guess I gotta.

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: I don't want to sit around!

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: I guess I should obey you.

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Sorry, I was lightyears away. What's up?

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: I wanna see more of this!

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: I was going to take a break anyway.

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: I wanna go look around some more.

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: You think being the master's all there is?!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: You're going to be sorry if you don't stop!

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: Act like a good owner already!

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: You don't have to sound so ominous...

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Maybe getting hit by a shooting star will make you come around!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: You ever see an angry star?!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: You REALLY want to see me mad!?

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: I'm going to find a new owner!

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: I like you very much also!

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: I feel kinda icky when you say that...

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: I like you very much also!

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Uh, great, let me just go think about that...

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Have you been eating strange mushrooms?

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: We were destined to be together!

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: I'm so happy you're here with me!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: I'll be by your side until I supernova!

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: (Little veins are popping out on its forehead.)

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: Ahhh, that could heat an entire village for a month!

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Do you think me a savage?!

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Like a little golden pile of sunshine!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Why are you laughing at me!?

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Come back when you learn some etiquette!

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: Busy! Doing star business. Come back later.

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Play with me! Don't wait till I fall asleep!

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Did you know that tiny stars in the sky are bigger than the Earth?

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: I may be a tiny star now, but I will grow up someday!

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: You prefer stars or the moon? Or the sun?!

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: Hold on, I need to catch some rays...

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: I saw the neon signs in the city the other day. I can totally do that!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I can produce all kinds of light!

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: I'm usually sleepy when I see Mr. Moon... Is it just me?

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: There are so many stars in the universe that you haven't met!

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: You think it's weird that stars have wings? I think it's weird that YOU DON'T.

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: I heard there was an animal called a starfish that looks like me!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Space is a vast place. You couldn't even imagine!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Starwings dine on Milky Way Essence to become majestic stars!

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: I sometimes want to be the only star.

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: I'm a little busy now, but I'll tell you something interesting later.

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: Starwings can spin like this and not get dizzy!

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: Cool, right? This dance move isn't easy!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Us Starwings dance like this when we're really happy!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: This may look easy, but it isn't!

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: I hardly have the energy to stand right now...

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: I don't think now's a good time.

string.name: f4_f
string.value: I want to eat, but I'm just too stuffed...

string.name: s2
string.value: That's not something a human should say...

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: Landed too hard. Bruised my butt.

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: No thanks. Sometimes when I try to sit, I trip.

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Well, I guess I could use a rest.

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Would you look at that view! Beautiful world we live in, general.

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Sit with me? We can discuss our adventuring strategies, general.

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Whew, I guess I am a little tired.

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: But we still have a lot further to go!

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: To be honest, it's not that easy for me to sit down.

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: I'll just snuggle here next to you, general.

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: Oh, good. I needed to groom my wings anyway.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: My wings need exercise. They're getting pudgy!

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: Please don't hit me! Are you going to hit me?

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: No! I'll be good! I promise!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: When I hum to myself, I can't hear you.

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: I'm going to crawl under a rock.

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: I think I'm going to cry!

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: I'm sorry! I'm sorry! Don't hurt me!

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: You just might make me angry for the first time in my life.

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: Be nice to me! Please! I'm sorry!

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: You... You still love me, don't you?

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: But I love CARROTS, not you.

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: I'm so happy I could fly, except I'm scared of heights.

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Do you have to say that in such a creepy voice?

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Just keep galloping. Just keep galloping.

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: You're the strongest, bestest person I know.

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Just feed me and don't talk, please.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: I'd like to be alone right now.

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: Got any toilet paper? I'm all out.

string.name: c13_s4
string.value: Oh! I feel much better now! Neigh!

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: I'll try not to lose my balance and fall in this time.

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Hey, it's orange! Just like my favorite food, carrots!

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: An adventurer never poops in public!

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Whoops, is that a brown speck on my wing?

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Does the texture look a little off to you?

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: Quick! Make sure no one's peeking!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: I don't need to go right now.

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: This is how I snore: zzzeigh, zzzeigh.

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: I could use a quick little nappy nap.

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: A true adventurer never rests! Right?

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: When I close my eyes, it gets dark, and I'm scared of the dark.

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: But what if monsters get me?!

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: I think you just want an excuse to nap.

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: I hope I dream of carrots!

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: Don't let anyone hurt me, mmkay?

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: But what if I get nightmares?

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: You sleep, general. I'll stand guard.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Can you buy me a stuffed carrot to hug?

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Keep me secret, keep me safe, general.

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Wake me up if anything interesting happens.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: I can't keep my eyes open. Zzzzzeigh.

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: But I just downed an energy drink!

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: No! I want to have an adventure!

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Carrots are amazing! They're nutritious, orange, pointy...

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: I lick my wings to keep them clean, just like a kitten.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: If you have a heart of courage, the world is your carrot!

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: I want to be alone right now, please.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Sometimes people call me a unicorn, so I tried tying a carrot on my head.

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: My second favorite thing in the world? Carrots. My first favorite thing? YOU!

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: I want to be just like you when I grow up!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Where should we adventure to next, general? I can't wait!

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: We're too busy to talk right now!

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: I trip over my own feet sometimes, but I won't let that stop me!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Sometimes, my wings get tangled up in each other and I fall on my face.

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Do you think I'm brave, general? I really hope you do.

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: What's your favorite? Deep-fried carrot, carrot steak, or carrot stew?

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: We should save our energy for our adventures!

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: I'm not good at small talk.

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: But I want to hear about YOUR adventurers, general!

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: Heh, not everyone can pull THIS off.

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: Hold on to your hats, ladies and gents!

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: I'm an adventurer, not a circus performer!

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: Think I deserve a carrot for this, general?

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: Let's see a unicorn try to pull this off.

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: This comes in real handy for an explorer like me.

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: Don't tell me what to do, please.

string.name: f3_f
string.value: Hey, I'm a colt, not a pig!

string.name: s2
string.value: General! An adventurer ought to know better!

string.name: s4
string.value: Do you see the disappointment in my eyes, general?

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Or we could do something else…

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Do you hear yourself? All these commands…

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Check it out… Pretty good, right?

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Ahh... I'm sleepy… Can't hear you…

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Sitting's waaay too easy… I'm feeling underutilized here.

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: I was just minding my own business... then this! Squerch!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: Why do you do this? Squerch?

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: I know squerch kwon do and I WILL use it! Squerch!

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: You're not really mad, right? Right?

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: Some masters let their pets have fun…

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: I looked up some other masters… Turns out there are plenty of options.

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: I promise I'll be good now…

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: I haven't done anything wrong, and still...

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: Is there a reason for this or do you just like yelling?

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: I'm so used to it, I don't even feel it anymore...

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Master gets bored, so I get yelled at…

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: It's not pooping time yet. Squerch.

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: How can I poop if you don't feed me? Squerch.

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: Pooping is only for the bathroom. Squerch.

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Oooh... I almost stepped in it...

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: It hasn't been long enough yet, master.

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Not really into pooping on command…

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: When do I get to tell YOU to poop, master?

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Ahh... whoa, my breakfast just came out like that...

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Phew! Doesn't my poop look as adorable as me?

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Phew... You can tell it's been a while! Yowza!

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: I don't have anything to poop out in the first place!

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: I'm saving it all for one big poop.

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: Did you just say what I think you said? Squerch.

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: I think I love you too!

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: And you just had to tell me?

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Ah... I thought you were going to say something else…

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: That was a good one... haha...

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: You're the only one in my heart, master!

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: You're making my gills red, master...

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Oh! Oh!! Me too! Me too!! hehe...

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: Probably should have kept that one to yourself…

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: You'll have to do better than that…

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: You want me to fake it? Squerch.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: Have you seen a shark smile? Not pretty. Squerch.

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: How about a treat instead? Squerch.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: I'll do whatever you ask me to do, master!

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: I'm already smiling… Cause I'm with you!

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: I only open my mouth for food.

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: Not really feeling the whole happiness thing right now…

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: Now you're in charge of my emotions too?

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: Maybe if there's a reward involved.

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: How can you say such thing... Squerch.

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: M... master… I can't believe you said that…

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: That was a joke… right? Right?

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Master, I get hurt when you say that…

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: And the meanest master of the year award goes to…

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: I see why it's hard for you to make friends.

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: Do you really not like me?

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: You say this all the time. Maybe I'm doing something wrong.

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: Wah? What? I can't hear you.

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: Say it again. See what happens.

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: I'm sick of you berating me!

string.name: c25_s2
string.value: The more you go hunting, the better the items you'll find. Squerch.

string.name: c25_s3
string.value: Isn't it nice out here today? We should go somewhere to play! Squerch.

string.name: c25_s4
string.value: I need a nap on top of a comfortable blanket. Squerch.

string.name: c25_f1
string.value: Have you ever heard of a chatty shark? Squerch.

string.name: c25_f2
string.value: I have nothing to say to you… Squerch…

string.name: c25_f4
string.value: I can't talk to you right now. Squerch.

string.name: c26_s1
string.value: I have a feeling a nice item may come our way today!

string.name: c26_s2
string.value: Master, you'll get me some good food today, right?

string.name: c26_s3
string.value: How are you today? Good? Good!

string.name: c26_s4
string.value: A lot of people are here, so make sure to be courteous!

string.name: c26_f1
string.value: I don't have anything to say…

string.name: c26_f2
string.value: Not much goin on over here…

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: Master, are you dating someone? I just met someone. Maybe we could go on a double date?

string.name: c27_s3
string.value: Master, you have a huge head… hahaha. HUGE!

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: This is boring… I need something more exciting

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: Why do you keep talking to me? I'm trying to sleep...

string.name: c28_s1
string.value: Buurrrrpp. Don't I look cute burping? Squerch.

string.name: c28_s2
string.value: My friends tell me the same thing! Squerch.

string.name: c28_s3
string.value: This is my area of expertise. Squerch.

string.name: c28_f1
string.value: You don't have to tell me that…

string.name: c28_f2
string.value: That doesn't mean much coming from you.

string.name: c28_f3
string.value: Whoa, master must have gone nuts.

string.name: c29_s1
string.value: So you want me to burp? Burrrrrpppp. What do you think?

string.name: c29_s3
string.value: You won't find a cuter pet anywhere! Squerch.

string.name: c29_s4
string.value: Master, what do you think? Cute, right? Squerch!

string.name: c29_f1
string.value: Master! Just get me some food! Squerch!

string.name: c29_f2
string.value: I don't wanna do cute stuff! Squerch!

string.name: c30_s1
string.value: Like this? At least you know a cute act when you see one...

string.name: c30_s2
string.value: Here's a nice gassy burp for you!

string.name: c30_s3
string.value: No one can match my burping skills!

string.name: c30_f1
string.value: You think I'll just do whatever you ask… I thought you were smarter.

string.name: c30_f2
string.value: I need to eat in order to burp, you know...

string.name: c30_f3
string.value: I ate onions and garlic just now... no burping! No cuteness!

string.name: c30_f4
string.value: How do I put this… No?

string.name: c31_s1
string.value: I'm tired. I need to sleep. Squerch...

string.name: c31_s2
string.value: So sleepy... let me sleep... squerch...

string.name: c31_f1
string.value: How am I going to sleep if I'm not even tired! Squerch!

string.name: c32_s3
string.value: Don't go eat something good while I'm asleep! Squerch.

string.name: c32_f2
string.value: So you can doodle on my fins? No thanks!

string.name: c32_f3
string.value: I'm hungry! Can't sleep! Feed me!

string.name: f2_f
string.value: I am about to blow up... squerch...

string.name: f3_s
string.value: Master, this is so delicious... squerch!!!

string.name: f4_s
string.value: This is as good as it gets!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: Are you trying to kill me, master?

string.name: s2
string.value: Squerch? You asking doesn't always mean me doing…

string.name: s3
string.value: Squerch! My precious mouth will not spit those venomous words!

string.name: s4
string.value: Please, no... no flavors like that... Squerch.

string.name: c1_s2
string.value: I'm so hungry that I feel dizzy.

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: I'm getting too heavy these days.

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: Can't you see how fat I'm getting...

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: At this rate, I won't even have enough energy to eat.

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: I don't have much of an appetite.

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: I'm so hungry I can't think.

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: I'm so hungry that I can't go on anymore.

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: My stomach feels like it's going to shrivel up.

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: I'll eat when I want to. Stop treating me like a child!

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Give me something good to eat at least!

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: Why are you being like this to me?

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: I can't understand you these days.

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: You're getting mad at me for nothing...

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: You thought I was going to cry didn't you?

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Why don't we just talk about this?

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Why are you getting mad at me?

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: This is not what I was thinking...

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Do you hate me that much?

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: I know how to get mad too!

string.name: c9_f3
string.value: I don't even have enough energy to poop.

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: It's not going to come out.

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: I've been having trouble going these days.

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: I really had to go bad.

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Something has to go in before it can come out!

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: You want me to go again?

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Do I look like some kind of mutt?

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: I can't go here, it's too dirty.

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Please don't make me do this...

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: I told you I don't want to sleep!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: I don't want to waste my time with sleep.

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: I'm a cute baby tiger! Don't yell at me!

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: That's not going to make me mad.

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: You're always getting mad at me...

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: What did I do?! Tell me!

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: I don't want to hear it.

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: I know how to get angry too!

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: You want me to sleep? Okay.

string.name: c25_f3
string.value: I don't know anything about that...

string.name: c26_f2
string.value: All I want to do is sleep...

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: It doesn't seem like a big deal.

string.name: c29_s1
string.value: What do you want me to say...

string.name: c29_s2
string.value: Aah, you just wanted to hear my voice!

string.name: c30_s3
string.value: We really do need to talk more.

string.name: c30_f2
string.value: I don't feel like talking to you today.

string.name: c31_s1
string.value: A long, long time ago...there was a handsome tiger...

string.name: c31_s2
string.value: What do you want me to talk to you about?

string.name: c31_f2
string.value: I just don't feel like talking.

string.name: c32_s3
string.value: I'll talk if you compliment me.

string.name: c32_f1
string.value: I really don't feel like talking.

string.name: c32_f2
string.value: I want to enjoy the quiet.

string.name: c33_f1
string.value: What's wrong with you all of a sudden?

string.name: c33_f2
string.value: Don't just say it, do it.

string.name: c33_f3
string.value: Love is about action, not just words.

string.name: c34_s3
string.value: We're a match made in heaven.

string.name: c34_f1
string.value: You should've been nice to me.

string.name: c34_f2
string.value: I don't think we would look good together.

string.name: c34_f3
string.value: I'm sorry, but I'm in love with someone else...

string.name: c35_f3
string.value: This popularity just won't go away.

string.name: f1_f
string.value: This tastes bad... I only like steaks.

string.name: f2_s
string.value: It's so yummy. Chomp, chomp. So delicious.

string.name: s2
string.value: Baby Tiger doesn not know that word.

string.name: s3
string.value: Baby Tiger wants the master not to say that.

string.name: s4
string.value: Master never orders me to do that.

string.name: c1_s4
string.value: Ok, I won't budge until you say so...Pink!

string.name: c1_f2
string.value: I'd love to relax on a luxury leather couch.

string.name: c1_f4
string.value: Hey, I don't just sit anywhere, you know.

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: Woohoo, feels like sitting on a cloud.

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: Sure...want me to cross my legs, too?

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: I don't just sit anywhere! I have standards.

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Hmm, think I can reach my toes from here?

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Ah, tummy's full, weather's nice…and master's all right, too.

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: A tail lets you sit without falling backwards. Try it sometime.

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Wah, I can't! I'll roll over backwards if you don't hold on to me.

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Eh, this doesn't exactly look comfortable. No, thank you.

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: Unfortunately for you, your wish is not my command.

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: I learned this posture from a yoga guru!

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: Can I get a drumstick? Pretty pwwwease?

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: I can sit like this for minutes at a time.

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Finally! A chance to rest my stubby legs.

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Ask me again, and I'll bite you!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Planning to steal my food when I lower my guard? No way. I'm onto you...

string.name: c5_s1
string.value: Hey, I did the right thing...just at the wrong time. Oops.

string.name: c5_s2
string.value: Ahh! My tail cramped up, that's why!

string.name: c5_s4
string.value: I learned from my mistake. I'm sorry.

string.name: c5_f2
string.value: Oooh, you're giving me nightmares. Yeah, right.

string.name: c5_f4
string.value: Black Bean framed me, I swear!

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: My bad, my bad. Since when did humans get so smart?

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: Yes, I know. Please don't pull my tail!

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: Yes, yes. I get it. Don't pull my ears, please.

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Don't make me show you my mean and scary side...

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Another word, and I'm putting you on my Ignore list.

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: Yeah, sure. Blame me for your mistake. Nice try.

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: I can't understand what you're saying...lalala.

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: Oh, all right. So when's detention?

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: I love my new name. "Bad" has a nice ring to it.

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: Is that really how you want to treat your pet?

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: I only hear things I like. Selective hearing, you know.

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: It takes one to know one! Ahahaha!

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: Well, my mother disagrees with you.

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: C'mon, I know you have a bigger heart than that.

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: I'll try to be nicer next time.

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: No one loves me anymore. Sniffle.

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: I do accept apologies, you know.

string.name: c9_f1
string.value: Do I have to listen to this?

string.name: c9_f3
string.value: I am rubber, you are glue...

string.name: c9_f4
string.value: You need to wash your mouth with soap.

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: Please tell me that was a lie. Please...

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: Sniff, but I'll still follow you wherever you go.

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: You don't have to announce it like that.

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: You don't have to tell me that.

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Pink…isn't our favorite color anymore? Sniffle...

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Are you really angry? I'm sorry...

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: I'm sorry...I didn't do it on purpose.

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: What are you talking about? I learned my bad habits from you...

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: Hmm, I suddenly don't quite recall who you are...

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Fine! Then I'm telling everyone you're a bad master!

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: I'll start exercising! If I lose ten pounds, will you like me better?

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: I'm only misbehaving to get your attention. Pika pikaaaa...

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Master! What'd I do wrong anyway?!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: If you keep doing that, I'm going to tell on you.

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: Good thing it's too loud in here for me to hear you.

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Are you just trying to pick a fight?

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Don't take your bad mood out on me!

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: As long as you don't mind.

string.name: c13_f1
string.value: Hey, pooping is not a skill!

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: This isn't my only trick, you know...

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Oops! Can't hold it anymore...Excuse me.

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: Please don't let anyone see me!

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: I have more important things to do.

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: I need to hug my plush dolls, or else I can't do it...

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: I can do more than poop, you know!

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Aw, all that good food gone to waste.

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Where is the nearest pink toilet?

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Where is my poop poop newspaper?

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Are you kidding? You haven't fed me enough...

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: Ah, the effects of a good fiber supplement.

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: Keep an eye out for Peeping Toms.

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Woo... I feel my tummy's getting smaller...

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: Not now. Put it on my to-do list.

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Unlike you, I don't want to soil this beautiful place.

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: What do you want to hear...pika?

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: I can't stay balanced and talk at the same time.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Wanna know how I got this tail?

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Why am I called a bean? I look more like a mouse...

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Baked bean, coffee bean, jelly bean...None of those compare to me!

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: I roll on the floor when I'm tired of walking.

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: Don't you have anything better to say?

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: Just keep quiet and stop making me talk.

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: You didn't know Tory and Tommy aren't real bunnies?

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: I don't want to be all emo and rot in a corner...

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: My hands are too short! I can't tap my head and rub my tummy at the same time...

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Have you met Mr. Bean, my dad?

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Can someone get Ronnie a pacifier? He's always sucking his thumb.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Do you think I'll ever get a double chin?

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: I do not wish to be disturbed right now.

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: Talk is cheap. Let's get the show started!

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: Put on your shoes! Your feet stink! Ugh.

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Sometimes, I just look at you, and it seems like you're not that smart.

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I've been waiting for you to say those words.

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: I feel so comfortable around you.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: It's fantastic hanging out with you.

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Scram. I'm so not in the mood.

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Yawn. I can't be bothered with you at the moment. Zzzz.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Shower me with all your love! Pikaaa!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: I love the phrase "I love you" more than anything else in the world!

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: Lurve? Lub? What? Forget it, I'll just sit around and rub my tummy.

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: You're annoying. I have nothing else to say.

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: You are so boring me right now.

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: I'm afraid I'll have to reject you. Pink!

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: I've been waiting for you to say those words.

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: That's so nice! I feel the same way about you!

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: I love you, too. This is quite embarassing...

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: I'm liking you more and more with each passing day.

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: I don't get it. First you hate me. Now you love me?

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: Don't lie. It'll cause my delicate heart to shatter into tiny little pieces.

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: I am very busy right now. Can we talk about this later?

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: You can't possibly think I have a good impression of you, can you?

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: Let me do my belly dance! Aw, yeah!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: Aren't you dazzled by my sweet dance moves?

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Pink Bean's freestyle time! Be dazzled.

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: I don't like the music here.

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Not when I'm the only one grooving.

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: I am not here to entertain you.

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: Let's pound the ground with our dancing!

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: I think you'll laugh at me, so no.

string.name: c25_s3
string.value: You can't ever be as cute as me doing this...Bleah!

string.name: c25_s4
string.value: Oops, did I spit on you?

string.name: c25_f1
string.value: The time for jokes has ended.

string.name: c25_f2
string.value: Keep joking and see what happens.

string.name: c26_s2
string.value: Let's put a smile on that face of yours.

string.name: c26_s3
string.value: Let me show you how to freak someone out...

string.name: c26_f1
string.value: Stop doing stupid things in public.

string.name: c26_f2
string.value: You are more gross than funny.

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: This is boring. I'm going to look in the mirror instead.

string.name: c27_s1
string.value: Your legs are shorter than mine. You can't catch me!

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: This is how I express myself.

string.name: c27_f2
string.value: You don't have any class, do you?

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: Can you ask me to do something a little more challenging?

string.name: c28_s1
string.value: Goody-goody Pink Bean is sleeping early!

string.name: c28_s4
string.value: Nighty night, master! I lov...vee...ee... Zzzz.

string.name: c29_s1
string.value: Can you tuck in my blankie if I accidently kick it off?

string.name: c29_s3
string.value: Can you wake me before September ends?

string.name: c29_s4
string.value: Please leave the lights on. I'm scared of the dark...

string.name: c29_f1
string.value: It's too noisy to sleep here!

string.name: c29_f2
string.value: You see these circles around my eyes? I'm suffering from insomnia!

string.name: c29_f3
string.value: I'm not going to sleep tonight, and you can't make me!

string.name: c29_f4
string.value: I need a snack before I go to bed...

string.name: c30_s2
string.value: Join me in a jumping race!

string.name: c30_s3
string.value: Boing! Bouncing up into the clouds! Piiink!!

string.name: c30_s4
string.value: I have a bouncy personality. Pink!

string.name: c30_f2
string.value: I'm too full to do anything...

string.name: c30_f4
string.value: I don't think we're on the same page, you and me...

string.name: f2_f
string.value: I can't eat anymore...My stomach's about to explode.

string.name: f3_f
string.value: Ugh, I feel like throwing up. Pink...

string.name: f4_f
string.value: I need to go on a diet.

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: You want me to sit like this? Bark?

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: It's so sleepy sitting down, bark!

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: I don't understand what the master's saying! Kong!

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: I have no clue what you said! Barkbark!

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: No I don't want to sit! Barkbark!

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Master, this is how you sit, right? Woof!

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Master, I'm doing well, right? Right? Woof woof!

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: I hope the master keeps asking me to sit...woof woof!

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: I have short legs, so it's easy to sit! woof woof!

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Master, I can't tell what you're saying! woof woof!

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Master, do I HAVE to sit right now? woof woof!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Let's do something else right now! woof woof!

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: It's too dirty to sit here! Woof woof!

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Yo master...still telling me to sit? IT's waaay too easy...

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: My back legs are so short, I feel more comfortable sitting like this...hehe...

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: You want me to sit? Here...this is the right way, right?

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Ahh...itchy...(acting like I didn't hear it...)

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Sitting is waaaay too easy. Give me something hard to work on.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: (scratching) Whoa? What did you just say? I didn't hear you!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: I'm sick of doing stuff at your command...

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: Please don't give me that look...bark bark!

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Krrr...Do you want to be punished by ME?

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: I didn't do anything wrong! Bark Bark Bark!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: I was just sitting here...BARK BARK BARK!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Krrrr...One of these days, I won't take it anymore...BARK BARK!

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: Master, I'll be careful from here on out...wooof...

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: Master! Things like that happen at times...why so mad? Woof woof!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Master, just because you're bored, doesn't mean you have a right to abuse me! Woof woof!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Where else will you find a cute pet like this? Krrrr...

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: I didn't do anything wrong! Woof woof!!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: Master...I'll be more careful next time...

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: Master, I'll be good, I'll be good...

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Man...the master's going off on me again...and I didn't do a thing...

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Rrrr...master's not happy over a nothing...

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: Huh? I was too itchy to hear that...bark...!

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: Ahh, itchy...I'll just pretend I never heard that...bark...

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: What did the master just say? Bark...

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: How can you say such thing...woof woof...

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: Master, are you for real...? Woof........

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Master, was that a joke? Woof!

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: You didn't mean that, right? Woof woof...

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Ey...You mean that for real? Woof???

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Ey...you were just saying that because you're bored, right? Woof?

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: You say that everyday...that hurts you know...

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Master, I'll be good...just don't leave me alone...

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Whatever you tell me, I'll still be following you and only you...sigh...

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: How can you...you don't really mean it, right?

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: What? What did you say? I can't hear you!

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Ahh, itchy...stop saying that and bathe me instead!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I'm sick of hearing that now...hehe...

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Oh that felt good! Bark bark!

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: Hehe...I must have drank a lot of water...bark bark!

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: I don't feel like peeing right now...bark...

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: How am I supposed to pee on purpose when there's nothing coming out...bark...

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: It's embarassing to pee here...BARK! BARK BARK!

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Hehe...NO!! Got some on my legs!!! Woof.........

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Master...it hasn't been long since I last peed...woof...

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: Hey master, it's not time to pee just yet...woof...

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Ahhhh, that feels good...but it's still embarassing...

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: Shhhh....wait, that OJ I drank...that's a funny-looking pee there...

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Shhhhhhh! Oops, almost stepped on it...

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: I haven't had anything to pee out anyway...

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: It's a secret, just between you and me...I have a hidden bone around this area...bark bark!

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: What's the latest on radio? Bark bark bark! Kong!

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: What's your hobby? Hopefully it's something that involves me...hehe...BARK!

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: I heard in one of the hidden streets at Henesys ther's a huuuuuge mushroom called Mushmom, am I right? Bark!

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: How's a dog supposed to talk? Bark!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: NO! Don't feel like talking! BARK BARK!

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: I have nothing to say to you! Bark!

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I feel like crap! Bark bark!!!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Please change up the menu every once in a while...I'm sick of eating the same thing over and over again...

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Every once in a while, I feel like riding a boat to some other island and just chill there...woof woof!

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: How are you today? Good? Right? Good!! Woof woof!

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: You better be careful not to get ripped off when doing business with someone else...woof woof...

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: Don't feel like talking...I'm really depressed...woof woof...

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: II'm depressed...everything's annoying...don't feel like talking...woof...

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: What's the menu for today? Can I get something nice?

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Master, you have a huge head! hahha!

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: You look like you've got yourself quite a belly there...haha!

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Ey...how about feeding me right now?

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: So annoying! must have nothing to do right now...

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: Man...do I have to talk again? Don't feel like it...

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: What do you think? Good? GOOD? Bark bark!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Well, I'm smart, what can I say? Bark bark!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Sweeet! Here, what do you think? Bark bark!

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: No! I wanna do something else! Bark bark!

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: I don't know what you're saying!!! Bark! Bark!

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Can't understand what you're saying! Bark bark!

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: You have a short tongue, right? I have noooo idea what you're saying! Bark bark!

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Master, that was good, right? Right? Woof woof!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Hehe...this is really easy! Woof woof!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: I'll do whatever you ask me to do! Woof woof!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Master, is this how you do it? Woof woof!

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: Just feed me first! Woof woof!!

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: The floor's too dirty so I don't want to do that! Woof!

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: Why don't you lie on your belly first! Woof...!

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: You show me first!! Woof woof!

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: Like...this? I'm just going to do this once...

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: Like this, huh? Whatever you ask me to do...

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: Hey master! I won't do everything you ask me to do...!

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: Master! I'm hungry; just feed me!

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: Like this? Woof woof...this is hard...

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: Whoa...the air's much cleaner up here...woof!

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: MMy...my legs are short...that's why it's hard...woof!

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: How am I supposed to get up with these legs? Woof woof!

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: Hey master, but I can't walk on two feet...

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: Whoa...with these shorties? I'm incredible, kong kong kong!

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: Maybe if I get fed right now...

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: With these short legs, I can't even stand on four feet well..

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: Is the master trying to put me on showcase for a circus?

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: Can't be asking too much from a dog...

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: What did you just say? Bark bark...

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: That's MY MASTER, ladies and gentlemen...

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: I know you're lying, master...woof woof.

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: I was thinking of something else...and I didn't hear it...Woof...

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: You think I'll like you back? Woof...

string.name: c28_s1
string.value: I love you too master very very much!

string.name: c28_s3
string.value: You better love me and no one else!

string.name: c28_f2
string.value: Everyone knows that's just a token gesture...

string.name: c28_f3
string.value: And then the master will go off on me later...

string.name: c28_f4
string.value: You think I'll fall for that again...?

string.value: Ey...You mean that for real? Woof???

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Ey...you were just saying that because you're bored, right? Woof?

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: You say that everyday...that hurts you know...

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Master, I'll be good...just don't leave me alone...

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Whatever you tell me, I'll still be following you and only you...sigh...

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: How can you...you don't really mean it, right?

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: What? What did you say? I can't hear you!

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Ahh, itchy...stop saying that and bathe me instead!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I'm sick of hearing that now...hehe...

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Oh that felt good! Bark bark!

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: Hehe...I must have drank a lot of water...bark bark!

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: I don't feel like peeing right now...bark...

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: How am I supposed to pee on purpose when there's nothing coming out...bark...

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: It's embarassing to pee here...BARK! BARK BARK!

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Hehe...NO!! Got some on my legs!!! Woof.........

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Master...it hasn't been long since I last peed...woof...

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: Hey master, it's not time to pee just yet...woof...

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Ahhhh, that feels good...but it's still embarassing...

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: Shhhh....wait, that OJ I drank...that's a funny-looking pee there...

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Shhhhhhh! Oops, almost stepped on it...

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: I haven't had anything to pee out anyway...

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: It's a secret, just between you and me...I have a hidden bone around this area...bark bark!

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: What's the latest on radio? Bark bark bark! Kong!

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: What's your hobby? Hopefully it's something that involves me...hehe...BARK!

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: I heard in one of the hidden streets at Henesys ther's a huuuuuge mushroom called Mushmom, am I right? Bark!

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: How's a dog supposed to talk? Bark!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: NO! Don't feel like talking! BARK BARK!

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: I have nothing to say to you! Bark!

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I feel like crap! Bark bark!!!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Please change up the menu every once in a while...I'm sick of eating the same thing over and over again...

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Every once in a while, I feel like riding a boat to some other island and just chill there...woof woof!

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: How are you today? Good? Right? Good!! Woof woof!

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: You better be careful not to get ripped off when doing business with someone else...woof woof...

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: Don't feel like talking...I'm really depressed...woof woof...

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: II'm depressed...everything's annoying...don't feel like talking...woof...

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: What's the menu for today? Can I get something nice?

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Master, you have a huge head! hahha!

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: You look like you've got yourself quite a belly there...haha!

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Ey...how about feeding me right now?

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: So annoying! must have nothing to do right now...

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: Man...do I have to talk again? Don't feel like it...

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: What do you think? Good? GOOD? Bark bark!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Well, I'm smart, what can I say? Bark bark!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Sweeet! Here, what do you think? Bark bark!

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: No! I wanna do something else! Bark bark!

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: I don't know what you're saying!!! Bark! Bark!

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Can't understand what you're saying! Bark bark!

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: You have a short tongue, right? I have noooo idea what you're saying! Bark bark!

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Master, that was good, right? Right? Woof woof!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Hehe...this is really easy! Woof woof!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: I'll do whatever you ask me to do! Woof woof!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Master, is this how you do it? Woof woof!

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: Just feed me first! Woof woof!!

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: The floor's too dirty so I don't want to do that! Woof!

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: Why don't you lie on your belly first! Woof...!

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: You show me first!! Woof woof!

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: Like...this? I'm just going to do this once...

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: Like this, huh? Whatever you ask me to do...

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: Hey master! I won't do everything you ask me to do...!

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: Master! I'm hungry; just feed me!

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: Like this? Woof woof...this is hard...

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: Whoa...the air's much cleaner up here...woof!

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: MMy...my legs are short...that's why it's hard...woof!

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: How am I supposed to get up with these legs? Woof woof!

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: Hey master, but I can't walk on two feet...

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: Whoa...with these shorties? I'm incredible, kong kong kong!

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: Maybe if I get fed right now...

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: With these short legs, I can't even stand on four feet well..

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: Is the master trying to put me on showcase for a circus?

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: Can't be asking too much from a dog...

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: What did you just say? Bark bark...

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: That's MY MASTER, ladies and gentlemen...

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: I know you're lying, master...woof woof.

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: I was thinking of something else...and I didn't hear it...Woof...

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: You think I'll like you back? Woof...

string.name: c28_s1
string.value: I love you too master very very much!

string.name: c28_s3
string.value: You better love me and no one else!

string.name: c28_f2
string.value: Everyone knows that's just a token gesture...

string.name: c28_f3
string.value: And then the master will go off on me later...

string.name: c28_f4
string.value: You think I'll fall for that again...?

string.name: f2_f
string.value: I'm so full I can't eat anymore...woof...

string.name: f3_s
string.value: Master, this is really delicious! Woof woof...

string.name: f3_f
string.value: Master, I can't eat anymore...woof woof...

string.name: s2
string.value: No, please don't say that! Woof!

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: I sit on ground for now.

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: I sit on ground for now.

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: You no want I steal gold? I steal good, Mr'kuma.

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Don't wanna! I wanna set your hair on fire!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Sit? Me not know word. Hehehe...

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Okay, human. You tell me when we are going to eat monsters again.

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: I will sit for you, Mr'kuma. You are scary and powerful!

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: I do as you say, for now...

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Later, you sit and I get to burn houses down!

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: No way! I am not your kr'grana!

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: I don't wanna! I am mighty and full of fangs!

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Rak! Why you always want to sit?!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: You take me to lake of fire first!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: No talk to me like kr'gana. Me much strong!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Rak unar! I eat your wallet tonight!

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: My old boss was scary too. He eat my brother! So fun!

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: You scare many monsters with your talk! Scare me a little too...

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: No talk to me like kr'gana. Me much strong!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Rak unar! I eat your wallet tonight!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: I like it when you are angry, Mr'kuma. I will be angry too!

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Yes! Let's find some little kids to yell at!

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: Everytime you yell, I feel a little more at home...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Ha! More! Tell me how worthless I am!

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: You always say the same insults. Think up something new!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: I know you can do better than that, Mr'kuma.

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: I know you have more rage in you than that...

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: I don't want to be flattered right now!

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: Why you talk like wimp, Mr'kuma?

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: Grauk-mouthed unar! You think I simple?!

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Why you talk like wimp, Mr'kuma?

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Grauk-mouthed unar! You think I simple?!

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: I no fall for trick. Old Mr'kuma trick me like this long ago.

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: You are the cruelest of all masters...and I like it.

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Are you mad at me because I tortured your goldfish? He was asking for it!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: That is the rudest thing you can say in devil culture!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Now I see you are just trying to be mean to me. Thank you, Mr'kuma!

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: There is no such thing as love.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: My heart is cold and black like a piece of coal!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I'm almost getting used to this constant abuse.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: You're just trying to make me get mad again.

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: Why say word "poop" all time, Mr'aku?

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Why say word "poop" all time, Mr'aku?

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Master, you love pooping as much as I do!

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: I bet I can burn a hole in the ground with this one...

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: I not eat enough monster today!

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: You no treasure drakla. It MY drakla!

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: You like drakla so much? I give to you.

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: I love stinking up your fresh air, Mr'kuma.

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Empty out everything, master. Even your soul!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: I not eat enough monster today!

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: I'll let go of this poop when I darn well feel like it.

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: My bottom still hurts from the last one.

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: I have got to stop eating so many spicy monsters.

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Good unar. We find many nightmare!

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: No! You try take my eyeballs while I sleep!

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: I no want to! I want eat shopkeeper toes!

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: Good unar. We find many nightmare!

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: I like sleep. Let me eat many monster heads when wake.

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: You sleep too, Mr'kuma. I steal many wallet for you later.

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: No! You try take my eyeballs while I sleep!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: I no want to! I want eat shopkeeper toes!

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: Sleep yourself, Mr'putama. I go find devil friends.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: I like sleep. Let me eat many monster heads when wake.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: You sleep too, Mr'kuma. I steal many wallet for you later.

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: I'll wake up when home freezes over.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Pitchforks, fire, and screaming people. This is going to be a great dream.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I don't need to rest! I'm an infernal machine!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: I ate an entire case of espresso beans while you weren't looking.

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: I know better than to trust you.

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: You want me to talk? There, I talked.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: I am Mr'kuma to ghost of fear like you are Mr'kuma to me.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Have you ever felt true fear, unar-master?

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: I will let you avoid fear, if you prove that you are strong.

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: I will show you the face of fear! Mwahaha!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: If you can scare me like my old boss, we can hang out.

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: I make poona energy for you, Mr'kuma!

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: See my power! We destroy much together!

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: My real form is scary, Mr'kuma!

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: You do trick. I want laugh when you fall.

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: I show you already! You have bad brain!

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: What if I did this at your next surprise party?

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Let's go scare some little girls with this trick!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: With this power, I could conquer all of you puny humans.

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Bask in awe, master! I am a being of pure terror!

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: How about I torch all your underwear instead?

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Are you sure? You can never unsee it.

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Shouldn't we be undermining somebody's hope?

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: I'll eat your eyebrows if you tell me that again!

string.name: f3_f
string.value: Why you talk like wimp, Mr'kuma?

string.name: f4_s
string.value: What are you trying to do to me?!

string.name: s3
string.value: Old boss call me that. He so cool.

string.name: s4
string.value: Hey! Even we devils have some etiquette.

string.value: I sit on ground for now.

string.value: I will sit for you, Mr'kuma. You are scary and powerful!

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: I do as you say, for now...

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Later, you sit and I get to burn houses down!

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: No way! I am not your kr'grana!

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: I don't wanna! I am mighty and full of fangs!

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Rak! Why you always want to sit?!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: You take me to lake of fire first!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: No talk to me like kr'gana. Me much strong!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Rak unar! I eat your wallet tonight!

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: My old boss was scary too. He eat my brother! So fun!

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: You scare many monsters with your talk! Scare me a little too...

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: No talk to me like kr'gana. Me much strong!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Rak unar! I eat your wallet tonight!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: I like it when you are angry, Mr'kuma. I will be angry too!

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Yes! Let's find some little kids to yell at!

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: Everytime you yell, I feel a little more at home...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Ha! More! Tell me how worthless I am!

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: You always say the same insults. Think up something new!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: I know you can do better than that, Mr'kuma.

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: I know you have more rage in you than that...

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: I don't want to be flattered right now!

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: Why you talk like wimp, Mr'kuma?

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: Grauk-mouthed unar! You think I simple?!

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Why you talk like wimp, Mr'kuma?

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Grauk-mouthed unar! You think I simple?!

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: I no fall for trick. Old Mr'kuma trick me like this long ago.

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: You are the cruelest of all masters...and I like it.

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Are you mad at me because I tortured your goldfish? He was asking for it!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: That is the rudest thing you can say in devil culture!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Now I see you are just trying to be mean to me. Thank you, Mr'kuma!

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: There is no such thing as love.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: My heart is cold and black like a piece of coal!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I'm almost getting used to this constant abuse.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: You're just trying to make me get mad again.

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: Why say word "poop" all time, Mr'aku?

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Why say word "poop" all time, Mr'aku?

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Master, you love pooping as much as I do!

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: I bet I can burn a hole in the ground with this one...

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: I not eat enough monster today!

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: You no treasure drakla. It MY drakla!

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: You like drakla so much? I give to you.

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: I love stinking up your fresh air, Mr'kuma.

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Empty out everything, master. Even your soul!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: I not eat enough monster today!

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: I'll let go of this poop when I darn well feel like it.

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: My bottom still hurts from the last one.

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: I have got to stop eating so many spicy monsters.

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Good unar. We find many nightmare!

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: No! You try take my eyeballs while I sleep!

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: I no want to! I want eat shopkeeper toes!

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: Good unar. We find many nightmare!

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: I like sleep. Let me eat many monster heads when wake.

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: You sleep too, Mr'kuma. I steal many wallet for you later.

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: No! You try take my eyeballs while I sleep!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: I no want to! I want eat shopkeeper toes!

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: Sleep yourself, Mr'putama. I go find devil friends.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: I like sleep. Let me eat many monster heads when wake.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: You sleep too, Mr'kuma. I steal many wallet for you later.

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: I'll wake up when home freezes over.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Pitchforks, fire, and screaming people. This is going to be a great dream.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I don't need to rest! I'm an infernal machine!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: I ate an entire case of espresso beans while you weren't looking.

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: I know better than to trust you.

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: You want me to talk? There, I talked.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: I am Mr'kuma to ghost of fear like you are Mr'kuma to me.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Have you ever felt true fear, unar-master?

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: I will let you avoid fear, if you prove that you are strong.

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: I will show you the face of fear! Mwahaha!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: If you can scare me like my old boss, we can hang out.

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: I make poona energy for you, Mr'kuma!

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: See my power! We destroy much together!

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: My real form is scary, Mr'kuma!

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: You do trick. I want laugh when you fall.

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: I show you already! You have bad brain!

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: What if I did this at your next surprise party?

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Let's go scare some little girls with this trick!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: With this power, I could conquer all of you puny humans.

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Bask in awe, master! I am a being of pure terror!

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: How about I torch all your underwear instead?

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Are you sure? You can never unsee it.

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Shouldn't we be undermining somebody's hope?

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: I'll eat your eyebrows if you tell me that again!

string.name: f3_f
string.value: Why you talk like wimp, Mr'kuma?

string.name: f4_s
string.value: What are you trying to do to me?!

string.name: s3
string.value: Old boss call me that. He so cool.

string.name: s4
string.value: Hey! Even we devils have some etiquette.

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: I sit on ground for now.

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: I sit on ground for now.

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: You no want I steal gold? I steal good, Mr'kuma.

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Don't wanna! I wanna set your hair on fire!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Sit? Me not know word. Hehehe...

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: I do as you say, for now...

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Later, you sit and I get to burn houses down!

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: No way! I am not your kr'grana!

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: I don't wanna! I am mighty and full of fangs!

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Rak! Why you always want to sit?!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: You take me to lake of fire first!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: No talk to me like kr'gana. Me much strong!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Rak unar! I eat your wallet tonight!

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: My old boss was scary too. He eat my brother! So fun!

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: You scare many monsters with your talk! Scare me a little too...

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: No talk to me like kr'gana. Me much strong!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Rak unar! I eat your wallet tonight!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: I like it when you are angry, Mr'kuma. I will be angry too!

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Yes! Let's find some little kids to yell at!

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: Everytime you yell, I feel a little more at home...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Ha! More! Tell me how worthless I am!

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: You always say the same insults. Think up something new!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: I know you can do better than that, Mr'kuma.

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: I know you have more rage in you than that...

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: I don't want to be flattered right now!

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: Why you talk like wimp, Mr'kuma?

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: Grauk-mouthed unar! You think I simple?!

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Why you talk like wimp, Mr'kuma?

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Grauk-mouthed unar! You think I simple?!

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: I no fall for trick. Old Mr'kuma trick me like this long ago.

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: You are the cruelest of all masters...and I like it.

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Are you mad at me because I tortured your goldfish? He was asking for it!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: That is the rudest thing you can say in devil culture!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Now I see you are just trying to be mean to me. Thank you, Mr'kuma!

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: There is no such thing as love.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: My heart is cold and black like a piece of coal!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I'm almost getting used to this constant abuse.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: You're just trying to make me get mad again.

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: Why say word "poop" all time, Mr'aku?

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Why say word "poop" all time, Mr'aku?

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Master, you love pooping as much as I do!

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: I bet I can burn a hole in the ground with this one...

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: I not eat enough monster today!

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: You no treasure drakla. It MY drakla!

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: You like drakla so much? I give to you.

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: I love stinking up your fresh air, Mr'kuma.

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Empty out everything, master. Even your soul!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: I not eat enough monster today!

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: I'll let go of this poop when I darn well feel like it.

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: My bottom still hurts from the last one.

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: I have got to stop eating so many spicy monsters.

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Good unar. We find many nightmare!

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: No! You try take my eyeballs while I sleep!

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: I no want to! I want eat shopkeeper toes!

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: Good unar. We find many nightmare!

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: I like sleep. Let me eat many monster heads when wake.

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: You sleep too, Mr'kuma. I steal many wallet for you later.

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: No! You try take my eyeballs while I sleep!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: I no want to! I want eat shopkeeper toes!

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: Sleep yourself, Mr'putama. I go find devil friends.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: I like sleep. Let me eat many monster heads when wake.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: You sleep too, Mr'kuma. I steal many wallet for you later.

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: I'll wake up when home freezes over.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Pitchforks, fire, and screaming people. This is going to be a great dream.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I don't need to rest! I'm an infernal machine!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: I ate an entire case of espresso beans while you weren't looking.

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: I know better than to trust you.

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: You want me to talk? There, I talked.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: I am Mr'kuma to ghost of fear like you are Mr'kuma to me.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Have you ever felt true fear, unar-master?

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: I will let you avoid fear, if you prove that you are strong.

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: I will show you the face of fear! Mwahaha!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: If you can scare me like my old boss, we can hang out.

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: I make poona energy for you, Mr'kuma!

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: See my power! We destroy much together!

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: My real form is scary, Mr'kuma!

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: You do trick. I want laugh when you fall.

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: I show you already! You have bad brain!

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: What if I did this at your next surprise party?

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Let's go scare some little girls with this trick!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: With this power, I could conquer all of you puny humans.

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Bask in awe, master! I am a being of pure terror!

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: How about I torch all your underwear instead?

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Are you sure? You can never unsee it.

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Shouldn't we be undermining somebody's hope?

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: I'll eat your eyebrows if you tell me that again!

string.name: f3_f
string.value: Why you talk like wimp, Mr'kuma?

string.name: f4_s
string.value: What are you trying to do to me?!

string.name: s3
string.value: Old boss call me that. He so cool.

string.name: s4
string.value: Hey! Even we devils have some etiquette.

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: I sit on ground for now.

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: I sit on ground for now.

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: You no want I steal gold? I steal good, Mr'kuma.

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Don't wanna! I wanna set your hair on fire!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Sit? Me not know word. Hehehe...
