string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Later, you sit and I get to burn houses down!

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: No way! I am not your kr'grana!

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: I don't wanna! I am mighty and full of fangs!

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Rak! Why you always want to sit?!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: You take me to lake of fire first!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: No talk to me like kr'gana. Me much strong!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Rak unar! I eat your wallet tonight!

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: My old boss was scary too. He eat my brother! So fun!

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: You scare many monsters with your talk! Scare me a little too...

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: No talk to me like kr'gana. Me much strong!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Rak unar! I eat your wallet tonight!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: I like it when you are angry, Mr'kuma. I will be angry too!

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Yes! Let's find some little kids to yell at!

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: Everytime you yell, I feel a little more at home...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Ha! More! Tell me how worthless I am!

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: You always say the same insults. Think up something new!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: I know you can do better than that, Mr'kuma.

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: I know you have more rage in you than that...

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: I don't want to be flattered right now!

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: Why you talk like wimp, Mr'kuma?

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: Grauk-mouthed unar! You think I simple?!

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Why you talk like wimp, Mr'kuma?

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Grauk-mouthed unar! You think I simple?!

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: I no fall for trick. Old Mr'kuma trick me like this long ago.

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: You are the cruelest of all masters...and I like it.

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Are you mad at me because I tortured your goldfish? He was asking for it!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: That is the rudest thing you can say in devil culture!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Now I see you are just trying to be mean to me. Thank you, Mr'kuma!

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: There is no such thing as love.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: My heart is cold and black like a piece of coal!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I'm almost getting used to this constant abuse.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: You're just trying to make me get mad again.

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: Why say word "poop" all time, Mr'aku?

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Why say word "poop" all time, Mr'aku?

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Master, you love pooping as much as I do!

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: I bet I can burn a hole in the ground with this one...

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: I not eat enough monster today!

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: You no treasure drakla. It MY drakla!

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: You like drakla so much? I give to you.

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: I love stinking up your fresh air, Mr'kuma.

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Empty out everything, master. Even your soul!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: I not eat enough monster today!

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: I'll let go of this poop when I darn well feel like it.

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: My bottom still hurts from the last one.

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: I have got to stop eating so many spicy monsters.

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Good unar. We find many nightmare!

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: No! You try take my eyeballs while I sleep!

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: I no want to! I want eat shopkeeper toes!

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: Good unar. We find many nightmare!

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: I like sleep. Let me eat many monster heads when wake.

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: You sleep too, Mr'kuma. I steal many wallet for you later.

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: No! You try take my eyeballs while I sleep!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: I no want to! I want eat shopkeeper toes!

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: Sleep yourself, Mr'putama. I go find devil friends.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: I like sleep. Let me eat many monster heads when wake.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: You sleep too, Mr'kuma. I steal many wallet for you later.

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: I'll wake up when home freezes over.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Pitchforks, fire, and screaming people. This is going to be a great dream.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I don't need to rest! I'm an infernal machine!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: I ate an entire case of espresso beans while you weren't looking.

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: I know better than to trust you.

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: You want me to talk? There, I talked.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: I am Mr'kuma to ghost of fear like you are Mr'kuma to me.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Have you ever felt true fear, unar-master?

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: I will let you avoid fear, if you prove that you are strong.

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: I will show you the face of fear! Mwahaha!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: If you can scare me like my old boss, we can hang out.

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: I make poona energy for you, Mr'kuma!

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: See my power! We destroy much together!

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: My real form is scary, Mr'kuma!

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: You do trick. I want laugh when you fall.

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: I show you already! You have bad brain!

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: What if I did this at your next surprise party?

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Let's go scare some little girls with this trick!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: With this power, I could conquer all of you puny humans.

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Bask in awe, master! I am a being of pure terror!

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: How about I torch all your underwear instead?

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Are you sure? You can never unsee it.

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Shouldn't we be undermining somebody's hope?

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: I'll eat your eyebrows if you tell me that again!

string.name: f3_f
string.value: Why you talk like wimp, Mr'kuma?

string.name: f4_s
string.value: What are you trying to do to me?!

string.name: s3
string.value: Old boss call me that. He so cool.

string.name: s4
string.value: Hey! Even we devils have some etiquette.

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: I sat like Master told me to~

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: I'm sitting nicely~ Tell me I did well~

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: Can't I just stay like this?

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: I wish we can do easy things everyday~

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Yes~ have a seat here, Master

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: What's the point? There's not much difference in sitting and standing up...

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: I'm not going to leave Master's side~

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: It would be better to sit on your wide soft legs~

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Sometimes, I have to listen to Master~

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: You can rest next to me for a while~

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Master~ you can ask me to do harder stuff sometimes~

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: I will sit if Master, sits!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Sometimes, I want to try other stuff~

string.name: c5
string.value: Punch|No|I dare you|You asked for it

string.name: c5_f1
string.value: Master, you have to take the lead~

string.name: c6
string.value: Punch|No|I dare you|You asked for it

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: I will think about what I did, but don't starve me...

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: Don't look at me with that angry face... I'm sad...

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: But I'm trying to be good...

string.name: c7
string.value: Punch|No|I dare you|You asked for it

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: I can't go on if you hate me...

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: You have to tell me properly~ I can't understand~

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: Master, you don't know how I feel!

string.name: c8
string.value: Punch|No|I dare you|You asked for it

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: It's so sad when Master talks like that...

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: I'm sorry! It will never happen again

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: I want to be adored by Master, that's all~ Please understand~

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Master~ It will never happen again~

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: How could you get angry at a nice pet like me?

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: You have to let it go now~!

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: I'm leaving.. How could my Master not trust me…?

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: Ah well... I don't know.. what to say

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: No matter how many times I hear it, it feels so good~♡

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: I have butterflies in my stomach. I don't know what to do~

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: I love you~ I love you~♡

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: I'm not such an easy pet, you know

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: I feel so good, I can fly♡

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Tell me you love me ten times a day~ Promise~♡

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: I too will love only you, Master♡

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Now I will also show how I feel~ Master~♡ Master♡ How about it? You like?

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: Master... Please change your clothes and come back~ smells~

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Master, but you will get mad!

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Master, you've also fallen for me!

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: It's embarrassing, but if Master asks..!

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: An adventurer must know the time and place!

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: We have to uphold public ethics!

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: Ah! Master, please think before you order me!

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: It's embarrassing when you look at my bottom~

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: It's hard to poop, my stomach hurts

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: Why.. are you making me do this?

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: Why are you forcing me to poop?!

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: If you order me to poop, then I shall~ (...Pooh~..)

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: My poop even doesn't even smell~♡

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Ow~ My bottom is huge and it's so easy to poop~

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: I don't know what poop is~

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: You have to take me to the bathroom, Master!

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Aren't you going to bed? You look tired...

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: I'm going to bed now! Master~

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Master, see you in my dreams!

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: Are you sleepy, Master? I'm not...!

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: It doesn't look like it's time for bed already

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: I'll just take a brief rest~ Zzzz♡

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: Now you're tucking me in~ not bad~

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: I want to go downtown with you, Master~

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: I just got up, and you want me to go back to sleep?

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: Why are you trying to make me sleep.. It's not bedtime yet.

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: At least sing me a lullaby!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: I want to fall asleep on your lap...

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Will you sleep with me Master? Lie next to me

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: It was a tiring day Zzzz....

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: We have to be together longer, but I'm too sleepy right now! I'm sorry~ Master~!

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: Making me sleep when I'm not even fed yet! You're a bad Master!

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I want to play with Master~ Wanna play~

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: I'm not sleepy, I want to play♡

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Tasty food~ Your soft arms are the best~♡

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: I like Henesys grass because it's so soft~

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Master, where do you think I look the prettiest? Tell me yourself

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: The falling leaves are making me sad...

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: I'm not saying a word from now on~

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Ah... Why is the sky blue? I'm sad...

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Well, the pet languages are all different actually~ I can't talk with Yetis or White Tigers~

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I want to go on an exciting adventure with Master~♬

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: I get jealous when Master talks with another pet!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: You can hunt comfortably if you leave the potion with me

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Are you bored? Let's get a facial together~

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Let's talk next time~ I'm tired today~

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Master, you're the best in the whole universe~ right?

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Talking to you makes me so happy

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: I'm so happy to be with you~♡

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Sometimes, fairies recommend those who did good deeds~

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: I don't know what to say~

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: Sometimes, I want to be alone. Can you be quiet?

string.name: f1_s
string.value: This is my favorite time of all times~♡

string.name: f2_f
string.value: Master, are you bothered by me for some reason?

string.name: f3_s
string.value: It suits my refined taste buds perfectly~

string.name: f3_f
string.value: I ate too much and my stomach hurts...

string.name: f4_s
string.value: Master, you eat too~ It's so good!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: You don't deserve to be a master! Why are you feeding me when I've already eaten?

string.name: s2
string.value: Master! You can't say those things!

string.name: s4
string.value: I'm not going to say that~

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: Master, you're so great for looking out for my legs~

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: Master, are you taking care of me?

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: I have to sit with you, Master~!

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Haven't taken a rest since forever~

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: I will sit later~ Right now I got cramps in my legs~

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: I think I'll get dirt on me!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: If I sit, I won't be able to play~ Let's just go out to play~

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Master, you think I'm good at everything, right?

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: I listen to whatever you tell me to, Master~

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: I'm happy to see you are pleased~

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: But I want to run around more...

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: What did you just say, Master? I didn't hear you~

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Right now, standing up feels more comfortable!

string.name: c5
string.value: Punch|No|I dare you|You asked for it

string.name: c5_f1
string.value: Master, you have to take the lead~

string.name: c6
string.value: Punch|No|I dare you|You asked for it

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: Don't be mad~ I won't do it anymore~

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: But I'm trying to be good...

string.name: c7
string.value: Punch|No|I dare you|You asked for it

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: Don't be mad, Master. I'll never do it again

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: But you're still my favorite, Master...

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: I'm so good and sincere~ Why are you getting mad all the time?

string.name: c8
string.value: Punch|No|I dare you|You asked for it

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: Master, if you feel better again, I will kiss you 100 times~♡

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Master~ It will never happen again~

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Hm... I'm thinking about what I did wrong...

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: It's not fun. Let's play something else, Master~♡

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: How could you get angry at a nice pet like me?

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: Ah well... I don't know.. what to say

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: No matter how many times I hear it, it feels so good~♡

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: My heart will always be yours too~!

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Okay~ Okay~ I'll take your word for it~

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: I'm not such an easy pet, you know

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Now I will also show how I feel~ Master~♡ Master♡ How about it? You like?

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: Master... Please change your clothes and come back~ smells~

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Love is not a game. Get it together, Master!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Master, but you will get mad!

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: I was going to say you, Master, but~ I won't~! Touchy!

string.name: c13_s4
string.value: It's embarrassing, but if Master asks...!

string.name: c13_f1
string.value: Ah! Master, please think before you order me!

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: An adventurer must know the time and place!

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: We have to uphold public ethics!

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: For some reason, the poop seems to have a special energy.

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Why are you forcing me to poop?!

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: There's no bag to pick up my poop~

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Ah... Looking at my poop makes me feel as if there is another one of me...

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Hee hee~ Pooping makes me feel good~

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: My poop even doesn't even smell~♡

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: I have to want it to go though... Can you do it by will, Master?

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: I'm going next door to play~

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: I want to pee... Can I pee?

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: I can't sleep in such a loud place!

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: Master, do you think it's time for bed?

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: I was tired. It's good that you asked me to go to sleep...

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: I want to see myself in my dreams..

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: I've been waiting for this! Good night, Master ♡

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: Are you going to bed already?

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: You go to bed first Master~

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: Sleeping all day will make you fat!

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: Next to you, I sleep better, Master...

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Master, your voice is like a lullaby...

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: I hope you sleep tight too Master...

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Next to you, I sleep better, Master...

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: I'm not sleepy, I want to play♡

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: Master, you must be a sleeepy head. You always ask me to sleep

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: I want to rest sitting down!

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: If you keep ordering me, I will get bad!

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: I like Henesys grass because it's so soft~

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Master, you look so great today~! I think I'm falling for you~!

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Whenever you are down and tired~ Just call me~

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Master, guard me if we see scary monsters during hunts!

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Is it fascinating for you to see me talk? Why do you keep talking to me?

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: It's a secret that I can talk...

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: I don't feel like talking today...

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: I've gotten picky lately~ but I like anything Master gives me♡

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Niki in the night market is so cheesy~

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Factory owner Mr. Kaho in Ludibrium is so nice~

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: How does the penguin and Pepe know each other?

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: Your beauty is so stunning I can't talk~

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: I've gotten picky lately~ but I like anything Master gives me♡

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Sometimes, fairies recommend those who did good deeds~

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: I think my Master is the strongest in the whole world!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Master, don't you have a lover? Do you want me to fix you up with someone?

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: My dream is for you to be happy~

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: I can't hear you~ can't hear you~~!

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: I don't know what to say~

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: I want to be left alone in my solitude...

string.name: f1_f
string.value: ... I don't want a Master who tells me to eat until I feel bad...

string.name: f3_s
string.value: It's so good, I think I'm passing out~♡

string.name: f4_f
string.value: Uh... I'm so full. I can't eat anymore...

string.name: s1
string.value: You shouldn't say those bad things!

string.name: s4
string.value: You gotta talk nice to hear nice stuff!

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: Do you want to sit together~?

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: Master, you're so great for looking out for my legs~

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: Is this how I'm supposed to sit?

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: I have to sit with you, Master~!

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: I don't know~ I don't know things like that~

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Sitting makes your body and mind relaxed.

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Yes~ have a seat here, Master

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: I wish we can do easy things everyday~

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: I think I'll get dirt on me!

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Let's just do rock-paper-scissors and have the losing person sit~ Oh! I'm not a person~

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: I can do anything with you, Master!

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: Can't I sit like this everyday~?

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Let's do some sports, and get up~

string.name: c5
string.value: Punch|No|I dare you|You asked for it

string.name: c5_f2
string.value: Master, you have to take the lead~

string.name: c6
string.value: Punch|No|I dare you|You asked for it

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: I will be good~ Just don't scold me~

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: I will think about what I did, but don't starve me...

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: I've never seen you like this before...

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: But I'm trying to be good...

string.name: c7
string.value: Punch|No|I dare you|You asked for it

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: I'll be careful from now on...

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: I think I might hate you, Master…

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: You fool~! You're a fool, Master!

string.name: c8
string.value: Punch|No|I dare you|You asked for it

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: I'm sorry! It will never happen again

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: I want to be adored by Master, that's all~ Please understand~

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: It's so sad when Master talks like that...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Please forgive me for just this once~

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Will you get mad when I'm so pretty~?

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Sure sure~ You're right~ Let's just say so~

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: I have butterflies in my stomach. I don't know what to do~

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: I can't get sick of listening to that~♡

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: No matter how many times I hear it, it feels so good~♡

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: I'm not such an easy pet, you know

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: No thank you! I will just have a glass of juice~

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Do you have feelings for me?

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: I will do anything for you, Master~♡

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: Master, but you will get mad!

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: How far will Captain's lie will go?

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Master, you've also fallen for me!

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: I was going to say you, Master, but~ I won't~! Touchy!

string.name: c13_f1
string.value: Master, you need to learn about public decency…

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: Ah! Master, please think before you order me!

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: We have to uphold public ethics!

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: Poop~ Poop~ Do you know the pooping song?

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Why.. are you making me do this?

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: I don't want to poo poo!

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: Can't be bothered. You do it for me Master?

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: How many times are you asking me to poop a day?

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Ah... Looking at my poop makes me feel as if there is another one of me...

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: How did you know I wanted to poop?

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: Hee hee~ Now that I went, wipe me~

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: So much poop, thanks to your love, Master~♡

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: You're too fond of poop you know that? You said poop just before~!

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: I want to pee... Can I pee?

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: I can't poop when I haven't eaten anything!

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: I don't know what poop is~

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: It feels too early for bed

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: It doesn't look like it's time for bed already

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: I want to see you in my dreams, Master~♡

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: I want to see you in my dreams, Master~♡

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: If you won't go to sleep with me I'm not sleeping either~!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Master how could you ask me to go to sleep without a bed?

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I hope you sleep tight too Master...

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Going to bed with Master… Zzzzz…

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Sweet dreams to you too Master~

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: It was a tiring day Zzzz....

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: I hope Master has a happy Maple trip, even when I'm asleep~

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: Doesn't it feel to early to go to bed?

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I don't feel like going to bed!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: I want to play with Master~ Wanna play~

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Captain, you're always giving me orders!

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: The world seems to be evolving around me~

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: I like Henesys grass because it's so soft~

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: It wasn't easy learning the human language~

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: I want to chat, but... I was told I was too loud...

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: The falling leaves are making me sad...

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: I'm not saying a word from now on~

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: I want to go on an exciting adventure with Master~♬

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I want to eat ice cream

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: I'm a bit tired today. How about you, Master?

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: They say you can make a wish on the moon, and it might come true~

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Factory owner Mr. Kaho in Ludibrium is so nice~

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: They say you can make a wish on the moon, and it might come true~

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Are you bored? Let's get a facial together~

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: Right now, I'm enjoying the solitude

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: I think my Master is the strongest in the whole world!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: We spent such a long time together... Now shall I call you, Master?

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Talking to you makes me so happy

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: My dream is for you to be happy~

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: I want to hear Master's story~

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: I spent the whole night up talking to Husky… My throat hurts...

string.name: f1_f
string.value: I don't want to transform into a pig...

string.name: s1
string.value: Even if it's Master's orders, I won't do it!

string.name: s3
string.value: Pretty Master always say pretty things please!

string.name: s4
string.value: Don't make me say those things again and again~

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: If you keep saying that, I'm gonna sit on you!

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: On the ground? You've got to be kidding me!

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: You're right. Sometimes we need to slow down.

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Let's take a break, then let's play!

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Ok, but remember. My legs are resting but yours aren't!

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: I don't want any dirt on my suit.

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Do you know how long it takes to get up?

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: Come here, sit with me buddy!

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: It's nice to look at the sky, sometimes.

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Hey, it's a nice suit, even though it may not seem like one.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: If you are THAT considerate of my legs, how about my ears?

string.name: c5_s2
string.value: Yeah, yeah. You can hate me all you want.

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: You need to be CRAZY to live right, man~

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: But, I'm cool. So, it's ok.

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Whatever. I'm stuck with you anyway… *PSY...

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: What did I do to you?

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: It's lucky for you that I listen to you from time to time…

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: You'll catch on, eventually. I believe it.

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Don't be like this. I'm a good fella, buddy.

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: But you wouldn't respect me if I were "NICE". I knew it!

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: You're tense. Wanna share my food?

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: I don't care who's right or who's wrong!

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: You do what you've gotta do; I do what I've gotta do. It's just the way it is.

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: You just can't stand me being happy, can you?

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: What good can come of it?

string.name: c9_f1
string.value: You can't handle my love, baby.

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: It's our dance, just the two of us!

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: That's kind of lame, you know?

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: Do you want me to call you an angel?

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Our love is hotter than the equator!

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: Our love is stronger than any drink in the world, baby.

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Yeah, yeah, you're Mother Theresa. I get it.

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: Noooo, you can do better than that.

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Right now, it's our dream, buddy.

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: You can't resist me! Can you?

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Baby, how am I supposed to live without you?

string.name: c13_f1
string.value: An energetic guy like me doesn't sleep that much.

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: There is neither a bed nor sheets. Not even a sleeping bag!

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Yeah.. It looks like a cozy place to sleep..

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: Don't tickle me or anything during my sleep, man... zzZ

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: The night is for partying, not for sleeping!

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: I can sleep as much as I want when I'm dead.

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: How about you? You don't sleep?

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: ...You're gonna draw on me, aren't you?

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Alright, but don't be disappointed when I get up so fast!

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: I admit. Sleeping could be good for life.

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: For the best nap in the world.

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Siesta is a nice custom... zzZ

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: Don't worry. I'm not gonna die for not resting. I'm gonna die for living.

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: First, get a decent place to do that.

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: It's nice to see you, buddy!

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Sure! What do you want to talk about?

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: You don't wanna get into my head.

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: Do your thing, eat your peas.

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: I, too, sometimes don't wanna talk... *PSY...

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: Tragedy and comedy have one thing in common… they both end in a "y"!

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: Some people think I'm crazy, but others think I'm awesome!

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: How's your level up going, buddy?

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: Can't a pet have a vacation or something?

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: No, talking can get me in trouble.

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: What do you want? I'm not that stupid.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Breaking the trend, making the brand.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: All the famous are lonely people, you know... *PSY...

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: People say I'm too much. But when you think about it, they are too little.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: I can talk to you all night with a certain type of beverage, haha!

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: People who bug you, always the close ones!

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: My throat hurts... Think I sang too much last night.

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: We like-- we we we like to party! Hey!

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: All I ever wanted to do!

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: I can't believe I don't wanna do that right now!

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: I want a stage this time.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: I'm gonna be your entertainer, buddy!

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: You like my moves, don't you?

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Put your hands up in the air!

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: I'm not pretending to be sick... I'm really not!

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: You know, since you've stopped saying "sleep", I've become sleepy... zzZ

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: No... I think I caught a cold... *Sneeze!

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: A pet can still take some days off, right?

string.value: I should go on a diet... sort of.

string.name: f4_s
string.value: I thank you so so much!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: What, you have earplugs? I'm FULL!!

string.value: I'm not even gonna dignify your words.
